analyzed: saṃrambhaḥ kari kīṭa megha śakala uddeśena siṃhasya yaḥ sarvasya eva sa jāti mātra vihitaḥ hevāka leśaḥ kila

original: ityāśādviradakṣayāmbhudaghaṭābandhe 'pyasaṃrabdhavān yo 'sau kutra camatkṛteratiśayaṃ yātvamvikākesarī // VjivC_1.28 //
analyzed: iti āśā dvirada kṣaya ambhuda ghaṭa ābandhe pi a saṃrabdhavān sau kutra camatkṛteḥ atiśayam yātu amvikā kesarī
atra kariṇām tiraskāraḥ
toyadānām ca śakala śabda abhidhānena anādaraḥ
sarvasya iti yasya kasyacid tucchatara prāyastā iti avahelā
jāteḥ ca mātra śabda viśiṣṭa tvena avalepaḥ
hevākasya leśa śabda abhidhānena alpa tā pratipattiḥ iti ete vivakṣita artha eka vācaka tvam dyotayanti
ghaṭa ābandha śabdaḥ ca prastuta mahattva pratipādana para tvena upāttaḥ tad nibandhana tām pratipadyate
viṃśeṣa abhidhāna ākāṅkṣiṇaḥ punar padārtha svarūpasya tad pratipādana para viśeṣāṇa śūnya tayā
tathā
nikhilam nirmāṇam etat vidheḥ utkarṣa pratiyogi kalpanam api nyakkāra koṭiḥ parā
prāṇabhṛtām manoratha gatīḥ ullaṅghya yad saṃpadaḥ tasya ābhāsa maṇīkṛta aśmasu maṇeḥ aśma tvam eva ucitam
atra ābhāsa śabdaḥ svayam eva mātra ādi viśiṣṭa tvam abhilaṣan lakṣyate
pāṭha antara mchāyā mātra maṇīkṛta aśmasu maṇeḥ tasya aśma tā eva ucitā iti
etat ca vācaka vakra tā prakāra svarūpa nirūpaṇa avasare pratipadam prakaṭībhaviṣyati iti alam atiprasaṅgena
arthaḥ ca vācya lakṣaṇaḥ kīdṛśaḥ kāvye yaḥ sahṛdaya āhlāda kāri sva spanda sundaraḥ

original: sahṛdayāḥ kāvyārthavidasteṣāmāhlādamānandaṃ karoti yastena svaspandenātmīyena svabhāvena sundaraḥ sukumāraḥ /
analyzed: sahṛdayāḥ kāvya artha vidaḥ teṣām āhlādam ānandam karoti yaḥ tena sva spandena ātmīyena svabhāvena sundaraḥ sukumāraḥ

original: tadetaduktaṃ bhavati---yadyapi padārthasya nānāvidhadharmakhacitatvaṃ saṃbhavati tathāpi tathāvidhena dharmeṇa saṃbandhaḥ samākhyāyate ya)
analyzed: tat etat uktam bhavati yadi api padārthasya nānāvidha dharma khacita tvam saṃbhavati tathā api tathāvidhena dharmeṇa saṃbandhaḥ samākhyāyate yaḥ
sahṛdaya hṛdaya āhlādam ādhātum kṣamate

original: tasya ca tadāhlādasāmarthyaṃ saṃbhāvyate yena kācideva svabhāvamahattā rasaparipoṣāṅgatvaṃ vā vyaktimāsādayati /
analyzed: tasya ca tad āhlāda sāmarthyam saṃbhāvyate yena kācid eva svabhāva mahattā rasa paripoṣa aṅgatvam vā vyaktim āsādayati
yathā

original: daṃṣṭrāpiṣṭeṣu sadyaḥ śikhariṣu na kṛtaḥ skandhakaṇḍūvinodaḥ sindhuṣvaṅgāvagāhaḥ khurakuharagalattucchatoyeṣu nāptaḥ /

original: labdhāḥ pātālapaṅke na luṭhanaratayaḥ potramātropayukte yenoddhāre dharitryāḥ sa jayati vibhutāvighnitecchovarāhaḥ // VjivC_1.30 //
analyzed: labdhāḥ pātāla paṅke na luṭhana ratayaḥ potra mātra upayukte yena uddhāre dharitryāḥ sa jayati vibhu tā vighnita iccho varāhaḥ

original: atra ca tathāvidhaḥ padārthaparispandamahimā nibaddho yaḥ67 svabhāvasaṃbhavinastatparispandāntarasya
analyzed: atra ca tathāvidhaḥ padārtha parispanda mahimā nibaddhaḥ svabhāva saṃbhavinaḥ tad parispanda antarasya

yathā ca

original: bharturmitraṃ priyamavidhave viddhi māmambuvāhaṃ tatsaṃdeśāddhṛdayanihitādāgataṃ tvatsamīpam /
analyzed: bhartuḥ mitram priyam avidhave viddhi mām ambuvāham tad saṃdeśāt hṛdaya nihitāt āgatam tvad samīpam

priyam iti

original: iti tāmāśvāsyonmukhīkṛtya ca tatsaṃdeśāttvatsamīpamāgamanamiti prakṛtaṃ prastauti /

original: nanu cānyaḥ kaścidevaṃvidhavyavahāravidagdhabuddhiḥ kathaṃ na niyukta ityāha---mamaivātra kauśalaṃ kimapi75 vijṛmbhate /

kena mandra snigdhaiḥ dhvanibhiḥ

original: yadṛcchayā yathākathañcidahametadācarāmīti kiṃ punaḥ prayatnena suhṛtpremanimittiṃ saṃrambhabuddhiṃ76 na karomīti /

abalā śabdena atra tad preyasī viraha vaidhurya asaha tvam bhaṇyate

original: atra yaḥ padārthaparispandaḥ kavinopanibaddhaḥ prabandhasya meghadūtatve paramārthataḥ sa eva jīvitamiti sutarāṃ sahṛdayāhlādakārī77 /

original: yasmātsītāyāḥ sahajena kenāpyaucityena gantumadhyavasitāyāḥ saukumāryādevaṃvidhaṃ vastu hṛdaye parisphuradapi vacanamārohatīti sahṛdayaiḥ saṃbhāvayituṃna  #

original: ubhau dvāvapyetau śabdārthāvalaṅkāryāvalaṅkaraṇīyau kenāpi śobhātiśayakāriṇālaṅkaraṇena yojanīyau /

original: nanu ca kimidaṃ prasiddhārthaviruddhaṃ pratijñāyate yadvakroktirevālaṅkāro nānyaḥ kaściditi,

alaṅkāra kṛtām yeṣām svabhāva uktiḥ alaṅkṛtiḥ

original: yā svabhāvasya padārthadharmalakṣaṇasya parispandasya uktirabhidhā saivālaṅkṛtiralaṅkaraṇamiti pratibhāti,

original: svabhāva evocyamānaḥ sa eva yadyalaṅkārastatkimanyattadvyatiriktaṃ kāvyaśarīrakalpaṃ vastu vidyate yattoṣāmalaṅkāryatayā vibhūṣyatvenāvatiṣṭhate

iti anena ākāśa carvaṇa pratimena alam alīka nibandhanena
prakṛtam anusarāmaḥ

original: sarvathā yasya kasyacit padārthajātasya kavivyāpāriviṣayatvena varṇanāpadavīmavatarataḥ svabhāva eva sahṛdayāhlādakārī kāvyaśarīratvena varṇanīyatāṃ  #
analyzed: sarvathā yasya kasyacid padārtha jātasya kavi vyāpāri viṣaya tvena varṇanā padavīm avatarataḥ svabhāvaḥ eva sahṛdaya āhlāda kārī kāvya śarīra tvena varṇanīya tām
pratipadyate

original: sa eva ca yathāyogaṃ śobhātiśayakāriṇā yena kenacidalaṅkāreṇa yojayitavyaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ eva ca yathāyogam śobhā atiśaya kāriṇā yena kenacid alaṅkāreṇa yojayitavyaḥ
tat idam uktam arthaḥ sahṛdaya āhlāda kāri sva spanda sundaraḥ iti
ubhau etau alaṅkāryau iti ca
evam śabda arthayoḥ parama artham abhidhāya śabda arthau iti
kāvya lakṣaṇa vākye padam ekam vyākhyātam
idānī sahitau iti
vyākhyātum sāhityam etayoḥ paryālocyate
śabda arthau sahitau eva pratītau sphurataḥ sadā
sahitau iti tau eva sima pūrvam vidhīyate

original: śabdārthāvabhidhānābhidheyau sahitāvaviyuktāveva sadā sarvakālaṃ pratītau sphurataḥ jñāne pratibhāsete /
analyzed: śabda arthau abhidhāna abhidheyau sahitau a viyuktau eva sadā sarvakālam pratītau sphurataḥ jñāne pratibhāsete

original: tatastāveva sahitāvaviyuktāviti punaḥ kimapūrvaṃ vidhīyate na kiñcidapūrvaṃ niṣpādyate,
analyzed: tatas tau eva sahitau a viyuktau iti punar kim apūrvam vidhīyate na kiñcid apūrvam niṣpādyate
siddham sādhyate iti arthaḥ

original: tadevaṃ śabdārthayoḥ svabhāvasiddhaṃ sāhityaṃ kaḥ sacetāḥ punastadabhidhānena niṣprayojanamātmānamāyāsayati ?
analyzed: tat evam śabda arthayoḥ svabhāva siddham sāhityam kaḥ sa cetāḥ punar tad abhidhānena niṣprayojanam ātmānam āyāsayati
satyam etat
kintu na vācya vācaka lakṣaṇa śāśvata saṃbandha nibandhanam vastutas sāhitām iti ucyate

original: yasmādetasmin sāhitayaśabdenābhidhīyamāne kaṣṭakalpanoparacitāni gāṅkuṭādivākyānyasaṃbaddhāni śākaṭikādivākyāni ca sarvāṇi sāhityaśabdenābhidhīyeran
analyzed: yasmāt etasmin sāhitaya śabdena abhidhīyamāne kaṣṭa kalpanā uparacitāni gāṅkuṭa ādi vākyāni asaṃbaddhāni śākaṭika ādi vākyāni ca sarvāṇi sāhitya śabdena abhidhīyeran

original: tena padavākyapramāṇavyatiriktaṃ kimapi tattvāntaraṃ sāhityamiti vibhāgo 'pi na syāt /
analyzed: tena pada vākya pramāṇa vyatiriktam kim api tattva antaram sāhityam iti na syāt

original: nanu ca padādivyatiriktaṃ yatkimapi sāhityaṃ nāma tadapi suprasiddhameva,
analyzed: nanu ca pada ādi vyatiriktam yat kim api sāhityam nāma tat api su prasiddham eva
punar tad abhidhāne pi katham na paunaruktya prasaṅgaḥ

original: ata evaitaducyate---yadidaṃ sāhityaṃ nāma tadetāvati niḥsīmani samayādhvani sāhityaśabdamātreṇaiva prasiddham /
analyzed: atas eva etat ucyate yat idam sāhityam nāma tat etāvati niḥsīmani samayādhvani sāhitya śabda mātreṇa eva prasiddham

original: na punaretasya kavikarmakauśalakāṣṭhādhirūḍharamaṇī yasyādyāpi kaścidapi vipaścidayamasya paramārtha iti manāṅmātramapi vicārapadavīmavatīrṇaḥ
analyzed: na punar etasya kavi karma kauśala kāṣṭha adhirūḍha ramaṇī yasya adya api kaścid api vipaścit ayam asya paramārthaḥ iti manāk mātram api vicāra padavīm avatīrṇaḥ
tat adya sarasvatī hṛdaya aravinda makaranda bindu sandoha sundarāṇām sat kavi vacasām antar āmoda manohara tvena parisphurat etat sahṛdaya ṣaṭcaraṇa gocara tām
nīyate
sāhityam anayoḥ śobhā śāli tām prati kā api asau
sahi itayoḥ bhāvaḥ sāhityam

original: anayoḥ śabdārthayoryā kāpyalaukikī cetanacamatkārakāritāyāḥ kāraṇam avasthitirvicitraiva vinyāsabhaṅgī /
analyzed: anayoḥ śabda arthayoḥ yā kā api alaukikī cetana camatkāra kāri tāyāḥ kāraṇam avasthitiḥ vicitrā eva vinyāsa bhaṅgī
kīdṛśī anyūna anatirikta tva manohāriṇī
paraspara spardhi tva ramaṇīyā

original: yasyāṃ dvayorekatarasyāpi nyūnatvaṃ nikarṣo na vidyate nāpyatiriktatvamutkarṣo vāstītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: yasyām dvayoḥ ekatarasya api nyūna tvam nikarṣaḥ na vidyate na api atirikta tvam utkarṣaḥ vā asti iti arthaḥ

original: nanu ca tathāvidhaṃ sāmyaṃ dvayorupahatayorapi saṃbhavatītyāha---śobhāśālitāṃ prati /
analyzed: nanu ca tathāvidham sāmyam dvayoḥ upahatayoḥ api saṃbhavati iti āha śobhā śāli tām prati
śobhā saundaryam ucyate

original: tayā śālate ślāghate yaḥ sa śobhāśālī,
analyzed: tayā śālate ślāghate yaḥ sa śobhā śālī
tasya bhāvaḥ śobhā śāli tā
tām prati saundarya ślāghitām prati iti aryaḥ
sā eva ca sahṛdaya āhlāda kāritā

original: tasyāṃ spardhitvena yāsāvavasthitiḥ parasparasāmyasubhagamavasthānaṃ sā sāhityamucyate /
analyzed: tasyām spardhi tvena yā asau avasthitiḥ paraspara sāmya subhagam avasthānam sā sāhityam ucyate

original: atra ca vācakasya vācakāntareṇa vācyasya vācyāntareṇa sāhityamabhipretam,
analyzed: atra ca vācakasya vācaka antareṇa vācyasya vācya antareṇa sāhityam abhipretam
vākye kāvya lakṣaṇasya parisamāpta tvāt iti pratipāditam eva

original: nanu ca vācakasya vācyāntareṇa vācyasya vācakāntareṇa kathaṃ na sāhityamiti cettanna,
analyzed: nanu ca vācakasya vācya antareṇa vācyasya vācaka antareṇa katham na sāhityam iti ced tat na
krama vyutkrame prayojana abhāvāt asamanvayāt ca

original: tasmādetayoḥ śabdārthayoryathāsvaṃ yasyāṃ svasampatsāmagrīsamudayaḥ sahṛdayāhlādakārī parasparaspardhayā parisphurati,
analyzed: tasmāt etayoḥ śabda arthayoḥ yathāsvam yasyām sva sampad sāmagrī samudayaḥ sahṛdaya āhlāda kārī paraspara spardhayā parisphurati
sā kācid eva vākya vinyāsa sampad sāhitya vyapadeśa bhāj bhavati
alaṅkaraṇa vinyāsaḥ vakra tā atiśaya anvitaḥ
vṛtti aucitya manohāri rasānām paripoṣaṇam
spardhayā vidyate yatra yathāsvam ubhayoḥ api
sā kā api avasthitiḥ tad vid āhlāda eka nibandhanam
pada ādi vākya parispanda sāraḥ sāhityam ucyate
eteṣām ca pada vākya pramāṇa sāhityānām caturṇām api prativākyam upayogaḥ
tathā ca etat padam evaṃsvarūpam gakāra aukāra visarjanīya ātmakam etasya ca arthasya pratipadikā artha pañcaka lakṣaṇasya ākhyāta padārtha ṣaṭka lakṣaṇasya
vā vācakam iti pada saṃskāra lakṣaṇasya vyāpāraḥ
padānām ca paraspara anvaya lakṣaṇa saṃbandha nibandhanam etat vākya artha tātparyam iti vākya vicāra lakṣaṇasya upayogaḥ

original: pramāṇena pratyakṣādinaitadupapannamiti yuktiyuktatvaṃ nāma pramāṇalakṣaṇasya prayojanam /
analyzed: pramāṇena pratyakṣa ādinā etat upapannam iti yuktiyukta tvam nāma pramāṇa lakṣaṇasya prayojanam
idam eva parispanda māhātmyāt sahṛdaya hāri tām pratipannam iti sāhityasya upayujyamāna tā

original: eteṣāṃ yadyapi pratyekaṃ svaviṣaye prādhānyamanyeṣāṃ guṇībhāvastathāpi sakalavākya parispandajīvitāyamānasyāsya sāhityalakṣaṇasyaiva kavivyāpārasya  #
analyzed: eteṣām yadi api pratyekam sva viṣaye prādhānyam anyeṣām guṇībhāvaḥ tathā api sakala vākya parispanda jīvitāyamānasya asya sāhitya lakṣaṇasya eva kavi vyāpārasya
vastutas sarva atiśāyi tvam

original: yasmādetadamukhyatayāpi yatra vākyasandarbhāntare svaparimalamātreṇaiva saṃskāramārabhave tasyaitadadhivāsanāśūnya tāmātreṇaiva rāmaṇīyakavirahaḥ  #
analyzed: yasmāt etad amukhya tayā api yatra vākya sandarbha antare sva parimala mātreṇa eva saṃskāra māra bhave tasya etad adhivāsanā śūnya tā mātreṇa eva rāmaṇīyaka virahaḥ
paryavasyati
tasmāt upādeya tāyāḥ parihāṇiḥ utpadyate
tathā ca sva pravṛtti vaiyarthya prasaṅgaḥ
śāstra atirikta prayojana tvam śāstra abhidheya caturvarga adhika phala tvam ca asya pūrvam eva pratipāditam  /
a paryālecite pi arthe bandha saundarya sampadā
gīta vat hṛdaya āhlādam tad vidām vidadhāti yat
vācya avabodha niṣpattau pada vākya artha jīvitam
yat kim api arpayati antar pānaka āsvāda vat satām
śarīram jīvitena iva sphuritena iva jīvitam

original: vinā nirjovatāṃ yena yāti kāvyaṃ vipaścitām // VjivC_1.39 //
analyzed: vinā nirjovatām yena yāti kāvyam vipaścitām
yasmāt kim api saubhāgyam tad vidām eva socaram
vicāryate
iti antaraślokāḥ
evam sahitau iti vyākhyāya kavi vyāpāra vakra tvam vyācaṣṭe
kavi vyāpāra vakra tva prakārāḥ saṃbhavanti ṣaṭ
pratyekam bahavaḥ bhedāḥ teṣām vicchitti śobhinaḥ

original: kavīnāṃ vyāpāraḥ kavivyāpāraḥ kāvyakriyālakṣaṇastasya vakratvaṃ vakrabhāvaḥ prasiddhaprasthānavyatireki vaicitryaṃ tasya prakārāḥ prabhedāḥ  #
analyzed: kavīnām vyāpāraḥ kavi vyāpāraḥ kāvya kriyā lakṣaṇaḥ tasya vakra tvam vakra bhāvaḥ prasiddha prasthāna vyatireki vaicitryam tasya prakārāḥ prabhedāḥ
ṣaṭ saṃbhavanti
mukhya tayā tāvantaḥ eva santi iti arthaḥ
teṣām pratyekam prakārāḥ bahavaḥ bheda viśeṣāḥ
kīdṛśāḥ vicchitti śobhinaḥ vaicitrya bhaṅgī bhrājiṣṇavaḥ
saṃbhavanti iti saṃbandhaḥ
tat eva darśayati
vakra tāyāḥ paraḥ pi asti prakāraḥ pratyaya āśrayaḥ

original: varṇānāṃ vinyāso varṇavinyasāḥ lakṣarāṇāṃ viśiṣṭanyasanaṃ tasya vakratvaṃ vakrabhāvaḥ
analyzed: varṇānām vinyāsaḥ varṇa vinyasāḥ lakṣarāṇām viśiṣṭa nyasanam tasya vakra tvam vakra bhāvaḥ
prasiddha prasthāna vyatirekiṇā vaicitryeṇa upanibandhaḥ saṃniveśa viśeṣa vihitaḥ tad vid āhlāda kārī śabda śobhā atiśayaḥ
yathā prathamam aruṇa chāyaḥ tāvat tatas kanaka prabhaḥ tadanu viraha uttāmyat tanvī kapola tala dyutiḥ

original: prasarati tato dhvāntadhvaṃsakṣamaḥ kṣaṇadāmukhe sarasabisinīkandacchavirmṛgalāñchanaḥ // VjivC_1.41 //
analyzed: prasarati tatas dhvānta dhvaṃsa kṣamaḥ kṣaṇadā mukhe sarasa bisinī kanda chaviḥ mṛga lāñchanaḥ
atra varṇa vinyāsa vakra tā mātra vihitaḥ śabda śobhā atiśayaḥ sutarām samunmīlitaḥ
etat eva varṇa vinyāsa vakra tvam cirantaneṣu anuprāsaḥ iti prasiddham

original: asya ca prabhedasvarūpanirūpaṇaṃ svalakṣaṇā vasare kariṣyate (2 /1) /
analyzed: asya ca prabheda svarūpa nirūpaṇam sva lakṣaṇā vasare kariṣyate

original: padapūrvārdhavakratā---padasya subantasya tiṅantasya vā yatpūrvārdhaṃ prātipadikalakṣaṇaṃ dhātulakṣaṇaṃ vā tasya vakratā vakrabhāvo vinyāsavaicitryam
analyzed: pada pūrva ardha vakra tā padasya sup antasya tiṅ antasya vā yat pūrva ardham prātipadika lakṣaṇam dhātu lakṣaṇam vā tasya vakra tā vakra bhāvaḥ vinyāsa vaicitryam
tatra ca bahavaḥ prakārāḥ saṃbhavanti

original: yatra rūḍhiśabdasyaiva prastāvasamucitatvena vācyaprasiddhadharmāntarādhyāropagarbhatvena nibandhaḥ sa padapūrvārdhavakratāyāḥ prathamaḥ prakāraḥ
analyzed: yatra rūḍhi śabdasya eva prastāva samucita tvena vācya prasiddha dharma antara adhyāropa garbha tvena nibandhaḥ sa pada pūrvārdha vakratāyāḥ prathamaḥ prakāraḥ
yathā smi sarvam sahe

original: dvitīyaḥ---yatra saṃjñāśabdasya vācyaprasiddhasya dharmasya lokottarātiśayādhyāropaṃ garbhokṛtyopanibandhaḥ /
analyzed: dvitīyaḥ yatra saṃjñā śabdasya vācya prasiddhasya dharmasya lokottara atiśaya adhyāropam garbhokṛtya upanibandhaḥ

original: yathā rāmo 'sau bhuvaneṣu vikramaguṇaiḥ prāptaḥ prasiddhiṃ parā- masmadbhāgyaviparyayādyadi paraṃ devo na jānāti tam /
analyzed: yathā bhuvaneṣu vikrama guṇaiḥ prāptaḥ prasiddhim parā mā asmad bhāgya viparyayāt yadi param devaḥ na jānāti tam

original: vandīvaiṣa yaśāṃsi gāyati marudyasyaikabāṇāhati- śreṇībhūtaviśālatālavivarodgīrṇaiḥ svaraiḥ saptabhiḥ // VjivC_1.43 //
analyzed: vandī iva eṣa yaśāṃsi gāyati marut yasya eka bāṇa āhati śreṇī bhūta viśāla tāla vivara udgīrṇaiḥ svaraiḥ saptabhiḥ
atra rāma śabdaḥ lokottara śaurya ādi dharma atiśaya adhyāropa paratvena upāttaḥ vakratām prathayati

original: paryāyavakratvaṃ nāma prakārāntaraṃ padapūrvārdhavakratāyāḥ---yatrānekaśabdābhidheyatve vastunaḥ kimapi paryāyapadaṃ prastutānuguṇatvena prayujyate
analyzed: paryāya vakra tvam nāma prakāra antaram pada pūrva ardha vakra tāyāḥ yatra aneka śabda abhidheya tve vastunaḥ kim api paryāya padam prastuta anuguṇa tvena prayujyate
tathā

original: vāmaṃ kajjalavadvilocanamuro rohadvisāristanaṃ madhyaṃ kṣāmamakāṇḍa eva vipulābhogā nitambasthalī /
analyzed: vāmam kajjalavat vilocanam uraḥ rohat visāri stanam madhyam kṣāmam akāṇḍe eva vipula ābhogā nitamba sthalī

original: sadyaḥ prodgatavismayairiti gaṇairālokyamānaṃ muhuḥ pāyādvaḥ prathamaṃ vapuḥ smararipormiśrībhavatkāntayā // VjivC_1.44 //
analyzed: sadyas prodgata vismayaiḥ iti gaṇaiḥ ālokyamānam muhur pāyāt vaḥ prathamam vapuḥ smararipoḥ miśrībhavat kāntayā
atra smararipoḥ iti paryāyaḥ kām api vakra tām unmīlayati

original: yasmātkāmaśatroḥ kāntayā saha miśrībhāvaḥ śarīrasya na kathañcidapi saṃbhāvyata iti gaṇānāṃ sadyaḥ prodgatavismayatvamupapannam /
analyzed: yasmāt kāmaśatroḥ kāntayā saha miśrībhāvaḥ śarīrasya na kathañcid api saṃbhāvyate iti gaṇānām sadyas prodgata vismaya tvam upapannam
saḥ pi punar punar pariśīlanena āścarya kārī iti prathama śabdasya jīvitam
etat ca paryāya vakra tvam paridṛśyate
yathā

original: aṅgarāja senāpate rājavallabha rakṣainaṃ bhīmādduḥśāsanam iti // VjivC_1.45 //
analyzed: aṅga rāja senāpate rāja vallabha rakṣa enam bhīmāt duḥśāsanam iti
atra trayāṇām api paryāyāṇām asaṃbhāvyamāna tad paritrāṇa pātratva lakṣaṇam akiñcitkaratvam

original: padapūrvārdhavakratāyā upacāravakratvaṃ nāma prakārāntaraṃ vidyate---yatrāmūrtasya vastuno mūrtadravyābhidhāyinā śabdenābhidhānamupacārāt /
analyzed: pada pūrva ardha vakra tāyāḥ upacāra vakra tvam nāma prakāra antaram vidyate yatra amūrtasya vastunaḥ mūrta dravya abhidhāyinā śabdena abhidhānam upacārāt
yathā a niṣkāraṇam nikāra kaṇikā api manasvinām mānasam āyāsayati
yathā ahasta avaceyam yaśaḥ iti
kaṇikā śabdaḥ mūrta vastu stoka artha abhidhāyī stoka tva sāmānya upacārāt amūrtasya api nikārasya stoka abhidhāna paratvena prayuktaḥ tadvida āhlāda kāri tvāt vakra tām
puṣṇāti
hasta avaceyam iti mūrta puṣpa ādi vastu sabhavi saṃhata tva sāmānya upacārāt amūrtasya api yaśasaḥ hasta avaceyam iti abhidhānam vakra tvam āvahati

original: dravarūpasya vastuno vācakaśabdastaraṅgitatvādidharmanibandhanaḥ kimapi sādṛśyamātramavalambya saṃhatasyāpi vācakatvena prayujyamānaḥ kavipravāhe  #
analyzed: drava rūpasya vastunaḥ vācaka śabdaḥ taraṅgita tva ādi dharma nibandhanaḥ kim api sādṛśya mātram avalambya saṃhatasya api vācaka tvena prayujyamānaḥ kavi pravāhe
prasiddhaḥ
yathā
śvāsa utkampa taraṅgiṇi stana taṭe iti
kvacid amūrtasya api drava rūpa artha abhidhāyī vācaka tvena prayujyate
yathā

original: ekāṃ kāmapi kālavipruṣamamī śauryoṣmakaṇḍūvyaya- vyagrāḥ syuściravismṛtāmaracamūḍimbāhavā bāhavaḥ // VjivC_1.47 //
analyzed: ekām kām api kāla vipruṣam amī śaurya ūṣma kaṇḍū vyaya vyagrāḥ syuḥ cira vismṛta amara camū ḍimba āhavāḥ bāhavaḥ
etayoḥ taraṅgiṇī iti vipruṣam iti ca kām api vakra tām āvahataḥ

original: viśeṣaṇavakratvaṃ nāma padapūrvārdhavakratāyāḥ prakāro saṃbhavati---yatra viśeṣaṇamāhātmyādeva tadvidāhlādakāritvalakṣaṇaṃ vakratvamabhivyajyate
analyzed: viśeṣaṇa vakra tvam nāma pada pūrva ardha vakra tāyāḥ saṃbhavati yatra viśeṣaṇa māhātmyāt eva tadvida āhlāda kāri tva lakṣaṇam vakra tvam abhivyajyate
yathā

original: dāho 'mbhaḥ prasṛtiṃpacaḥ pracayavān bāṣpaḥ praṇālocitaḥ śvāsāḥ preṅkhitadīpradīpalatikāḥ pāṇḍimni magnaṃ vapuḥ /
analyzed: dāhaḥ mbhaḥ prasṛtiṃpacaḥ pracayavān bāṣpaḥ praṇāla ucitaḥ śvāsāḥ preṅkhita dīpra dīpa latikāḥ pāṇḍimni magnam vapuḥ

original: kiñcānyatkathayāmi rātrimakhilāṃ tvadvartma vātāyane hastacchattravirudvacandramahasastasyāḥ sthitirvartate // VjivC_1.48 //
analyzed: kiñca anyat kathayāmi rātrim akhilām tvad vartma vātāyane hasta chattra virudva candra mahasaḥ tasyāḥ sthitiḥ vartate

original: atra dāho bāṣpaḥ śvāsā vapuriti na kiñcidvaicitryamunmīlitam /
analyzed: atra dāhaḥ bāṣpaḥ śvāsāḥ vapuḥ iti na kiñcid vaicitryam unmīlitam
pratyekam ca viśeṣaṇa māhātmyāt kācid eva vakra tā pratītiḥ
yathā ca
vrīḍā yogāt nata vadanayā saṃnidhāne gurūṇām baddha utkampa stana kalaśayā manyum anatar niyamya

original: tiṣṭhetyuktaṃ kimiva na tayā yatsamutsṛjya bāṣpaṃ mayyāsaktaścakitahariṇīhārinetratribhāgaḥ // VjivC_1. 49 //
analyzed: tiṣṭha iti uktam kim iva na tayā yat samutsṛjya bāṣpam mayi āsaktaḥ cakita hariṇī hāri netra tri bhāgaḥ

original: atra cakitahariṇīhārīti kriyāviśeṣaṇaṃ netratribhāgāsaṅgasya gurusaṃnidhānavihitāpragalbhatvaramaṇīyasya kāmapi kāma nīyatāmāvahati cakitahariṇīhārivilokana  #
analyzed: atra cakita hariṇī hārī iti kriyāviśeṣaṇam netra tri bhāga āsaṅgasya guru saṃnidhāna vihita a pragalbha tva ramaṇīyasya kām api kāma nīya tām āvahati cakita hariṇī hāri vilokana
sāmyena

original: ayamaparaḥ padapūrvārdhavakratāyāḥ prakāro yadidaṃ saṃvṛtivakratvaṃ nāma---yatra
analyzed: ayam aparaḥ pada pūrva ardha vakra tāyāḥ prakāraḥ yat idam saṃvṛti vakra tvam

original: padārthasvarūpaṃ prastāvānuguṇyena kenāpi nikarṣeṇotkarṣeṇa vā yuktaṃ vyaktatayā
analyzed: padārtha svarūpam prastāva ānuguṇyena kena api nikarṣeṇa utkarṣeṇa vā yuktam vyakta tayā
sākṣāt abhidhātum aśakyam saṃvṛti sāmarthya upayoginā śabdena abhidhīyate
yathā

original: so 'yaṃ dambhadhṛtavrataḥ priyatame kartuṃ kimapyudyataḥ // VjivC_1.50 //
analyzed: saḥ yam dambha dhṛta vrataḥ priyatame kartum kim api udyataḥ
atra vatsa rāje vāsavadattā vipatti vidhura hṛdayaḥ tad prāpni pralobhana vaśena padmāvatīm
pariṇetum īhamānaḥ tat eva a karaṇīyam iti avagacchan tasya vastunaḥ mahā patākasya iva a kīrtanīya tām
khyāpayati kim api iti anena saṃvaraṇa samarthena sarvanāma padena
yathā ca

original: nidrānimīlatadṛśo madamantharāyā nāpyarthavanti na ca yāni nirthakāni /
analyzed: madamantharāyāḥ nā api arthavanti na ca yāni

original: adyāpi me varatanormadhurāṇi tasyā- stānyakṣarāṇi hṛdaye kimapi dhvananti // VjivC_1.51 //
analyzed: adyā api me vara tanoḥ madhurāṇi tasyāḥ stāni akṣarāṇi hṛdaye kim api dhvananti
atra kim api iti tad ākarṇana vihitāyāḥ citta camatkṛteḥ anubhava eka gocara tva lakṣaṇam avyapadeśya tvam pratipādyate
tāni iti tathāvidha anubhava viśiṣṭa tayā smaryamāṇāni
na api arthavanti iti sva saṃvedya tvena vyapadeśa aviṣaya tvam prakāśyate

original: teṣāṃ ca na ca yāni nirarthakānītyalaukikacamatkārakāritvādapārthakatvaṃ nivāryate /
analyzed: teṣām ca na ca yāni nirarthakāni iti alaukika camatkāra kāri tvāt apārthaka tvam nivāryate
triṣu api eteṣu viśeṣaṇa vakra tvam pratīyate

original: idamaparaṃ padapūrvārdhavakratāyāḥ prakārāntaraṃ saṃbhavati vṛttivaicitryavakratvaṃ nāma---yatra samāsādivṛttīnāṃ kāsāṃcid vicitrāṇāmeva kavibhiḥ  #
analyzed: idam aparam pada pūrva ardha vakra tāyāḥ prakāra antaram saṃbhavati vṛtti vaicitrya vakra tvam nāma yatra samāsa ādi vṛttīnām kāsāṃcid vicitrāṇām eva kavibhiḥ
parigrahaḥ kriyate
yathā
madhye ṅkuram pallavāḥ
yathā ca
pāṇḍimni magnam vapuḥ
yathā vā sudhā visara nisyanda samullāsa vidhāyini

original: himadhāmani khaṇḍe 'pi na jano nonmanāyate // VjivC_1.54 //
analyzed: hima dhāmani khaṇḍe pi na janaḥ nā unmanāyate

original: aparaṃ liṅgavaicitryavakratvaṃ nāma padapūrvārdhavakratāyāḥ prakārāntaraṃ dṛśyate---yatra bhinnaliṅgānāmapi śabdānāṃ vaicitryāya sāmānādhikaraṇyopanibandhaḥ
analyzed: aparam liṅga vaicitrya vakra tvam nāma pada pūrva ardha vakra tāyāḥ prakāra antaram dṛśyate yatra bhinna liṅgānām api śabdānām vaicitryāya sāmānādhikaraṇya upanibandhaḥ
yathā

original: itthaṃ jaḍe jagati ko nu bṛhatpramāṇakarṇaḥ karī nanu bhaved dhvanitasya pātram // VjivC_1.55 //
analyzed: ittham jaḍe jagati kaḥ nu bṛhat pramāṇa karṇaḥ karī nanu bhavet dhvanitasya pātram
yathā ca
maithilī tasya dārāḥ iti
anyat api saukumāryāt kavibhiḥ strī liṅgam eva prayujyate
nāma eva strī iti peśalam
iti kṛtvā
yathā
etām paśya purastaṭīm iti

original: padapūrvārdhasya dhātauḥ kriyāvaicitryavakratvaṃ nāma vakratā prakārāntaraṃ vidyate---yatra
analyzed: pada pūrva ardhasya dhātauḥ kriyā vaicitrya vakra tvam nāma vakra tā prakāra antaram vidyate yatra
kriyā vaicitrya pratipādana para tvena vaidagdhya bhaṅgī bhaṇiti ramaṇīyān prayogān nibadhnanti kavayaḥ
tatra kriyā vaicitryam bahuvidham vicchatti vitata vyavahāram dṛśyate
yathā
rai keli hia aṇi aṃsaṇa kara kisalaya ruddha naaṇa jualasya
ruddassa pavvai paricumbiam
rati keli hṛta nivasana kari kisalaya ruddha nayana yugalasya
rudrasya tṛtīya nayanam pārvatī paricumbitam jayati
iti chāyā

original: atra samāne 'pi hi sthaganaprayojane sādhye sāmānye ca locanatve,
analyzed: atra samāne hi sthagana prayojane sādhye sāmānye ca locana tve

original: devyāḥ paricumbanena yasya nirodhaḥ saṃpādyate tadbhagavatastṛtīyanayanaṃ jayati sarvotkarṣeṇa vartata iti vākyārthaḥ /
analyzed: devyāḥ paricumbanena yasya nirodhaḥ saṃpādyate tat bhagavataḥ tṛtīyanayanam jayati sarva utkarṣeṇa vartate iti vākya arthaḥ

original: atra jayatīti kriyāpadasya kimapi sahṛdayahṛdayasaṃvedyaṃ vaicitryaṃ parisphuradeva lakṣyate /
analyzed: atra jayati iti kriyā padasya kim api sahṛdaya hṛdaya saṃvedyam vaicitryam parisphurat eva lakṣyate
yathā ca

original: trāyantāṃ vo madhuripoḥ prapannārticchido nakhāḥ // VjivC_1.59 //
analyzed: trāyantām vaḥ madhuripoḥ prapanna ārti chidaḥ nakhāḥ
atra nakhānām sakala loka prasiddha chedana vyāpāra vyatireki kim api apūrvam eva prapanna ārti chedana lakṣaṇam kriyā vaicitryam upanibaddham
yathā ca

original: sa dahatu duritaṃ śāmbhavo vaḥ śarāgniḥ // VjivC_1.60 //
analyzed: sa dahatu duritam śāmbhavaḥ vaḥ śara agniḥ
atra ca pūrvavat eva kriyā vaicitrya pratītiḥ
yathā ca
kaṇṇu ppala dala milia loaṇehim helā lolaṇa māṇia aṇaaṇehim

original: līlai līlāvarihi ṇiruddhāo siḍhiliacāo jaai maaraddhao // VjivC_1.61 //
analyzed: līlai ṇiruddhāo
karṇa utpala dala milita locanaiḥ helā lolana mānita nayanābhiḥ
līlayā līlāvatībhiḥ niruddhaḥ śithilīkṛta cāpaḥ jayati makaradhvajaḥ

original: atra locanairlolayā līlāvatībhirniruddhaḥ svavyāpāraparāṅmukhīkṛtaḥ san śithilīkṛtacāpaḥ kandarpo jayati sarvotkarṣeṇa vartata iti kimucyate,
analyzed: atra locanaiḥ lolayā līlāvatībhiḥ niruddhaḥ sva vyāpāra parāṅmukhīkṛtaḥ san śithilīkṛta cāpaḥ kandarpaḥ jayati sarva utkarṣeṇa vartate iti kim ucyate
yatas tāḥ tathāvidha vijaya avāptau satyām jayanti iti vaktavyam

original: tadayamatrābhiprāyaḥ---yadelallo canavilāsānāmevaṃvidhaṃ jaitratāprauḍhibhāvaṃ paryālocya cetanatvena sa svacāpādhiropa ṇāyāsamupasaṃhṛtavān
analyzed: tat ayam atra abhiprāyaḥ yat elat locana vilāsānām evaṃvidham jaitra tā prauḍhi bhāvam paryālocya cetana tvena sa sva cāpa adhiropa ṇa āyāsam upasaṃhṛtavān
yatas tena eva tribhuvana vijaya avāptiḥ parisamāpyate

original: mameti manyamānasya tasya sahāyatvotkarṣātiśayo jayatīti kriyāpadena kartṛtāyāḥ kāraṇatvena kaveścetasi parisphuritaḥ /
analyzed: mama iti manyamānasya tasya sahāya tva utkarṣa atiśayaḥ jayati iti kriyā padena kartṛ tāyāḥ kāraṇa tvena kaveḥ cetasi parisphuritaḥ
tena kim api kriyā vaicitryam atra tadvida āhlāda kāri pratīyate
yathā ca
tāni akṣarāṇi hṛdaye kim api dhvananti
atra jalpanti vadanti ityādi na prayuktam

original: yasmāttāni kayāpi vicchittyā kimapyanākhyeyaṃ samarpayantīti kaverabhipretam /
analyzed: yasmāt tāni kayā api vicchittyā kim api anākhyeyam samarpayanti iti kaveḥ abhipretam
vakra tāyāḥ paraḥ pi asti prakāraḥ pratyaya āśrayaḥ iti
vakra bhāvasya anyaḥ pi prabhedaḥ vidyate
kīdṛśaḥ pratyaya āśrayaḥ

original: pratyayaḥ suptiṅ ca yasyāśrayaḥ sthānaṃ sa tathoktaḥ /
analyzed: pratyayaḥ sup tiṅ ca yasya āśrayaḥ sthānam sa tathā uktaḥ
tasya api bahavaḥ prakārāḥ saṃbhavanti saṃkhyā vaicitrya vihitaḥ
puruṣa vaicirtya vihitaḥ ca
tatra saṃkhyā vaicitrya vihitaḥ yasmin vacana vaicitryam kāvya śobhā upanibandhanāya nibadhnanti
yathā vā
maithilī tasya dārāḥ iti

original: yathā vā phullendīvarakānanāni nayane pāṇī sarojākarāḥ // VjivC_1.64 //
analyzed: yathā vā phulla indīvara kānanāni nayane pāṇī saroja ākarāḥ
atra dvivacana bahuvacanayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyam atīva camatkāra kāri

original: kārakavaicitryavihitaḥ---yatrācetanasyāpi padārthasya cetanatvādhyāropeṇa cetanasyaiva kriyāsamāveśalakṣaṇaṃ rasādiparipoṣaṇārthaṃ kartṛtvādikārakatvaṃ  #
analyzed: kāraka vaicitrya vihitaḥ yatra acetanasya api padārthasya cetana tva adhyāropeṇa cetanasya eva kriyā samāveśa lakṣaṇam rasa ādi paripoṣaṇa artham kartṛ tva ādi kāraka tvam
nibadhyate
yathā

original: stanadvandvaṃ mandaṃ snapayati balādvāṣpanivaho haṭhādantaḥ kaṇṭhaṃ luṭhati sarasaḥ pañcamaravaḥ /
analyzed: stana dvandvam mandam snapayati balāt vāṣpa nivahaḥ haṭhāt antar kaṇṭham luṭhati sarasaḥ pañcama ravaḥ

original: śarajjyotsnāpāṇḍuḥ patati ca kapolaḥ karatale na jānīmastasyā ka iva hi vikāravyatikaraḥ // VjivC_1.65 //
analyzed: śarad jyotsnā pāṇḍuḥ patati ca kapolaḥ kara tale na jānīmaḥ tasyāḥ kaḥ iva hi vikāra vyatikaraḥ
tra

original: atra bāṣpanivahādīnāmacetavānāmapi cetanatvādhyāropeṇa kavinā kartṛtvamupanibaddham---yattasyā vivaśāyāḥ satyāsteṣāmevaṃvidho vyavahāraḥ,
analyzed: atra bāṣpa nivaha ādīnām acetavānām api cetana tva adhyāropeṇa kavinā kartṛ tvam upanibaddham yat tasyāḥ vivaśāyāḥ satyāḥ teṣām evaṃvidhaḥ vyavahāraḥ

original: sā punaḥ svayaṃ na kiñcidapyācarituṃ samarthetyabhiprāyaḥ /
analyzed: sā punar svayam na kiñcid api ācaritum samarthā iti abhiprāyaḥ
anyat ca kapola ādīnām tad avayavānām etad avastha tvam pratyakṣatayā asmat ādi gocara tām āpadyate
tasyāḥ punar saḥ antar vikāra vyatikaraḥ tam tad anubhava eka viṣaya tvāt vayam na janīmaḥ
yathā ca

original: cāpācāryastripuravijayī kārtikeyo vijeyaḥ bāṇavyastaḥ sadanamudadhirbhūriyaṃ hantakāraḥ /
analyzed: cāpa ācāryaḥ tripura vijayī kārtikeyaḥ vijeyaḥ bāṇa vyastaḥ sadanam udadhiḥ bhūḥ iyam hantakāraḥ

original: astyevaitat kimu kṛtavatā reṇukākaṇṭhabādhāṃ baddhaspardhastava paraśunā lajjate candrahāsaḥ // VjivC_1.66 //
analyzed: asti eva etat kimu kṛtavatā reṇukā kaṇṭha bādhām baddha spardhaḥ tava paraśunā lajjate candrahāsaḥ

original: atra candrahāso lajjata iti pūrvavat kārakavaicitryapratītiḥ /
analyzed: atra candrahāsaḥ lajjate iti pūrvavat kāraka vaicitrya pratītiḥ

original: puruṣavaicitryavihitaṃ vakratvaṃ vidyate---yatra pratyaktāparabhāvaviparyāsaṃ prayuñjate kavayaḥ,
analyzed: puruṣa vaicitrya vihitam vakra tvam vidyate yatra pratyakta apara bhāva viparyāsam prayuñjate kavayaḥ

original: kāvyavaicitryārthaṃ yuṣmadyasmadi vā prayoktavye prātipadikamātraṃ nibadhnanti /
analyzed: kāvya vaicitrya artham yuṣmad yasmadi vā prayoktavye prātipadika mātram nibadhnanti
yathā

original: asmadbhāgayaviparyayādyadi paraṃ devo na jānāti tam // VjivC_1.67 //
analyzed: asmad bhāgaya viparyayāt yadi param devaḥ na jānāti tam

original: atra tvaṃ na jānāsīti vaktavye vaicitryāya devo na jānātītyuktam /
analyzed: atra tvam na jānāsi iti vaktavye vaicitryāya devaḥ na jānāti iti uktam

original: evaṃ yuṣmadādivaparyāsaḥ kriyāpadaṃ vinā prātipadikamātre 'pi dṛśyate /
analyzed: evam yuṣmad ādi va paryāsaḥ kriyā padam vinā prātipadika mātre dṛśyate
yathā

original: ayaṃ janaḥ praṣṭumanāstapodhane na cedrahasyaṃ prativaktumarhasi // VjivC_1.68 //
analyzed: ayam janaḥ praṣṭu manāḥ tapodhane na ced rahasyam prativaktum arhasi

original: atrāhaṃ praṣṭukāma iti vaktavye tāṭasthyapratītyarthamayaṃ jana ityuktam /
analyzed: atra aham praṣṭu kāmaḥ iti vaktavye tāṭasthya pratīti artham ayam janaḥ iti uktam
yathā vā
saḥ ya dambha dhṛ vrataḥ iti

original: atra so 'hamiti vaktavye pūrvavad “ayam' iti vaicitryapratītiḥ /
analyzed: atra saḥ ham iti vaktavye pūrvavat ayam iti vaicitrya pratītiḥ

original: ete ca mukhyatayā vakratāprakārāḥ katicinnadarśanārthaṃ pradarśitāḥ /
analyzed: ete ca mukhya tayā vakra tā prakārāḥ pradarśitāḥ

original: śiṣṭāśca sahastraśaḥ saṃbhavantīti mahākavipravāhe sahṛdayaiḥ svayamevotprekṣaṇīyāḥ /
analyzed: śiṣṭāḥ ca sahastraśas saṃbhavanti iti mahā kavi pravāhe sahṛdayaiḥ svayam eva utprekṣaṇīyāḥ

original: evaṃ vākyāvayavānāṃ padānāṃ pratyekaṃ varṇādyavayavadvāreṇa yathāsaṃbhava vakrabhāvaṃ vyākhyāyedānīṃ padasamūhabhūtasya vākyasya vakratā vyākhyāyate---
analyzed: evam vākya avayavānām padānām pratyekam varṇa ādi avayava dvāreṇa yathāsaṃbhava vakra bhāvam vyākhyāya idānīm pada samūha bhūtasya vākyasya vakra tā vyākhyāyate
vākyasya vakra bhāvaḥ nyaḥ bhidyate yaḥ sahastradhā
yatra alaṅkāra vargaḥ sau antarbhaviṣyati
vākyasya vakra bhāvaḥ nyaḥ
vākyasya pada samūha bhūtasya

original: ākhyātaṃ sāvyayakārakaviśeṣaṇaṃ vākyamiti yasya pratītistasya ślokādervakrabhāvo
analyzed: ākhyātam sa avyaya kāraka viśeṣaṇam vākyam iti yasya pratītiḥ tasya śloka ādeḥ vakra bhāvaḥ

original: bhaṅgībhaṇitivaicitryam anyaḥ pūrvoktavakratāvyatirekī samudāyavaicitryanibandhanaḥ ko 'pi saṃbhavati /
analyzed: bhaṅgī bhaṇiti vaicitryam anyaḥ pūrvokta vakra tā vyatirekī samudāya vaicitrya nibandhanaḥ saṃbhavati
yathā

original: upasthitāṃ pūrvamapāsya lakṣmīṃ vanaṃ mayā sārdhamasi prapannaḥ /
analyzed: upasthitām pūrvam apāsya lakṣmīm vanam mayā sārdham asi prapannaḥ

original: tvamāśrayaṃ prāpya tayā nu kopā- tsoḍhāsmi na tvadbhavane vasantī // VjivC_1.70 //
analyzed: tvam āśrayam prāpya tayā nu kopāt soḍhā asmi na tvad bhavane vasantī

original: etatsītayā tathāvidhakaruṇākrāntāntaḥ karaṇayā vallabhaṃ prati saṃdiśyate ---yadupasthitāṃ
analyzed: etat sītayā tathāvidha karuṇā ākrānta antar karaṇayā vallabham prati saṃdiśyate yat upasthitām

original: sevāsamāpannāṃ lakṣmīmapāsya śriyaṃ parityajya pūrvaṃ yastvaṃ mayā sārdhaṃ prapanno
analyzed: sevā samāpannām lakṣmīm apāsya śriyam parityajya pūrvam yaḥ tvam mayā sārdham prapannaḥ
vipinam prāptaḥ tasya tava svapne pi etat na sabhāvyate

original: tayā punastasmādeva kopāt strīsvabhāvasamucitasapatnīvidveṣāttvadgṛhe vasantī na soḍhāsmi /
analyzed: tayā punar tasmāt eva kopāt strī svabhāva samucita sapatnī vidveṣāt tvad gṛhe vasantī na soḍhāsmi

original: tadidamuktaṃ bhavati--- yattasmin vidhuradaśāvisaṃṣṭhule 'pi samaye tathāvidhaprasādāspadatā /
analyzed: tat idam uktam bhavati yat tasmin vidhura daśā visaṃṣṭhule samaye tathāvidha prasāda āspada tā
m adhyāropya yat idānīm sāmrājye niṣkāraṇa parityāga tiraskāra pātra tā
nītā asmi iti etat ucitam anucitam vā vidita vyavahāra paraṃpareṇa bhavata svayam eva vicāryatām iti

original: sa ca vakrabhāvastathāvidho yaḥ sahastradhā bhidyate bahuprakāraṃ bhedamāsādayati /
analyzed: sa ca vakra bhāvaḥ tathāvidhaḥ yaḥ sahastradhā bhidyate bahu prakāram bhedam āsādayati
sahastra śabdaḥ tra saṃkhyā bhūyastva mātra vācī
na niyata artha vṛttiḥ
yathāsahastram avadhyam iti
yasmāt kavi pratibhānām ānantyāt niyata tvam na saṃbhavati
yaḥ sau vākyasya vakra bhāvaḥ bahu prakāraḥ
na jānīmaḥ kīdṛśaḥ iti āha yatra alaṅkāra vargaḥ sau antarbhaviṣyati

original: yatra yasminnasāvalaṅkāravargaḥ kavipravāhaprasiddhapratītirupamādiralaṅkaraṇakalāpaḥ sarvaḥ sakalo 'pyantarbhaviṣyati antarbhāvaṃ gamiṣyati  #
analyzed: yatra yasmin asau alaṅkāra vargaḥ kavi pravāha prasiddha pratītiḥ upamā ādiḥ alaṅkaraṇa kalāpaḥ sarvaḥ sakalaḥ api antarbhaviṣyati antarbhāvam gamiṣyati  /
pṛthaka tvena na avasthāpyate
tad prakāra bheda tvena eva vyapadeśam āsādayiṣyati iti arthaḥ
sa ca alaṅkāra vargaḥ sva lakṣaṇa avasare pratipadam udāhariṣyate

original: evaṃ vākyavakratāṃ vyākhyāya vākyasamūharūpasya prakaraṇasya tatsamudāyātmakasya ca prabandhasya vakratā vyākhyāyate---
analyzed: evam vākya vakra tām vyākhyāya vākya samūha rūpasya prakaraṇasya tad samudāya ātmakasya ca prabandhasya vakra tā vyākhyāyate
vakra bhāvaḥ prakaraṇe prabandhe pi asti yādṛśaḥ
ucyate sahaja āhārya saukumārya manohara

original: vakrabhāvo vinyāsavaicitryaṃ prabandhaikadeśabhūte prakaraṇe yādṛśo 'sti yādṛg vidyate prabandhe vā nāṭakādau so 'pyucyate kathyate /
analyzed: vakra bhāvaḥ vinyāsa vaicitryam prabandha eka deśa bhūte prakaraṇe sti yādṛś vidyate prabandhe vā nāṭaka ādau saḥ u pi ucyate kathyate
kīdṛśaḥ sahaja āhārya saukumārya manoharaḥ

original: sahajaṃsvābhāvikamāhāryaṃ vyutpattyupārjitaṃ yatsaukumāryaṃ rāmaṇīyakaṃ tena manoharo hṛdayahārī yaḥ sa tathoktaḥ /
analyzed: sahajam svābhāvikam āhāryam vyutpatti upārjitam yat saukumāryam rāmaṇīyakam tena manoharaḥ hṛdaya hārī yaḥ sa tathā uktaḥ

original: tatra prakaraṇe vakrabhāvo yathā---rāmāyaṇe mārīcamāyāmayamāṇikyamṛgānusāriṇo rāmasya
analyzed: tatra prakaraṇe vakra bhāvaḥ yathā rāmāyaṇe mārīca māyā maya māṇikya mṛga anusāriṇaḥ rāmasya
karuṇa ākranda ākarṇana kātarantaḥ karaṇayā janaka rāja putryā tad prāṇa paritrāṇāya sva jīvita parirakṣā nirapekṣayā
lakṣmaṇaḥ nirbhartsya preṣitaḥ
tat etat atyantam anaucitya yuktam
yasmāt anucara saṃnidhāne pradhānasya tathāvidha vyāpāra karaṇam asaṃbhāvanīyam

original: tasya ca sarvātiśāyicarita yuktatvena varṇyamānasya tena kanīyasā prāṇakaritrāṇasaṃbhāvanetyedatyantamasamīcīnamiti
analyzed: tasya ca sarva atiśāyi carita yukta tvena varṇyamānasya tena kanīyasā prāṇa kari trāṇa saṃbhāvanā ityet atyantam asamīcīnam iti

original: paryālocya udāttarāghave kavinā vaidagdhyavaśena mārīcamṛgamāraṇāya prayātasya paritrāṇārthaṃ
analyzed: paryālocya udātta rāghave kavinā vaidagdhya vaśena mārīca mṛga māraṇāya prayātasya paritrāṇa artham
lakṣmaṇasya sītayā kātara tvena rāmaḥ preritaḥ iti upanibaddham
atra ca tadvida āhlāda kāri tvam eva vakra tvam

original: yathā vā kirātārjunīye kirātapuruṣoktiṣu vācyatvena svamārgaṇamārgaṇamātramevopakrāntam /
analyzed: yathā vā kirātārjunīye kirāta puruṣa uktiṣu vācya tvena sva mārgaṇa mārgaṇa mātram eva upakrāntam

original: vastutaḥ punararjunena saha tātparyārthaparyālocanayā vigraho vākyārthatāmupanītaḥ /
analyzed: vastutas punar arjunena saha tātparya artha paryālocanayā vigrahaḥ vākya artha tām upanītaḥ
tathā ca tatra eva ucyate

original: prayujya sāmācaritaṃ vilobhanaṃ bhayaṃ vibhedāya dhiyaḥ pradarśitam /
analyzed: prayujya sāma ācaritam vilobhanam bhayam vibhedāya dhiyaḥ pradarśitam
tathā abhiyuktam ca śilīmukha arthinā yathā itarat nyāyyam iva avabhāsate
prabandhe vakra bhāvaḥ yathā kutracid mahā kavi viracite rāmakathā upanibandhe nāṭaka ādau
pañcavidha vakra tā sāmagrī samudaya sundaram sahṛdaya hṛdaya hāri mahāpuruṣa varṇanam upakrame pratibhāsate
paramārthataḥ tu vidhi niṣedha ātmaka dharma upadeśaḥ paryavasyati
rāma vat vartivyam na rāvaṇa vat iti

original: yathā ca tāpasavatsarāje kusumasukumāracetasaḥ sarasavinodaikarasikasya nāyakasya caritavarṇanamupakrāntam /
analyzed: yathā ca tāpasa vatsa rāje kusuma su kumāra cetasaḥ sa rasa vinoda eka rasikasya nāyakasya carita varṇanam upakrāntam
vastutas tu vyasana arṇave nimajjan nijaḥ rājā tathāvidha naya vyavahāra nipuṇaiḥ amātyaiḥ taiḥ taiḥ upāyaiḥ uttāraṇīyaḥ iti upadiṣṭam
etat ca sva lakṣaṇa vyākhyāna avasare vyakti māyā syati
evam kavi vyāpāra vakra tā ṣaṭkam uddeśa mātreṇa vyākhyātam
vistureṇa tu sva lakṣaṇa avasare vyākhyāsyate
krama prāpta tvena bandhaḥ dhunā vyākhyāsyate

original: vyāpāraśālī vākyasya vinyāso bandha ucyate // Vjiv_1.22 //
analyzed: vyāpāra śālī vākyasya vinyāsaḥ bandhaḥ ucyate

original: vinyāso viśiṣṭaṃ nyasanaṃ yaḥ sanniveśaḥ sa eva vyāpāraśālī bandha ucyate /
analyzed: vinyāsaḥ viśiṣṭam nyasanam yaḥ sanniveśaḥ saḥ eva vyāpāra śālī bandhaḥ ucyate
vyāpāraḥ tra prastuta tvāt kāvya kriyā lakṣaṇaḥ

original: tena śālate ślāghate yaḥ sa tathoktaḥ /
analyzed: tena śālate ślāghate yaḥ sa tathā uktaḥ
kasya vākyasya śloka ādeḥ
kīdṛśaḥ vācya vācaka saubhāgya lāvaṇya paripoṣakaḥ

original: vācyavācakayordvayorapi vācyasyābhidheyasya vācakasya ca śabdasya vakṣyamāṇaṃ saubhāgyalāvaṇyalakṣaṇaṃ yadguṇadvayaṃ tasya paripoṣakaḥ puṣṭatātiśayakārī
analyzed: vācya vācakayoḥ dvayoḥ api vācyasya abhidheyasya vācakasya ca śabdasya vakṣyamāṇam saubhāgya lāvaṇya lakṣaṇam yat guṇa dvayam tasya paripoṣakaḥ puṣṭa tā atiśaya kārī
saubhāgyam pratibhā saṃrambha phala bhūtam cetana camatkāri tva lakṣaṇam
lāvaṇyam saṃniveśa saundaryam
tayoḥ paripoṣakaḥ
yathā

original: dattvā vāmakaraṃ nitambaphalake līlāvalanmadhyayā prottuṅgastanamaṃsacumbicibukaṃ kṛtvā tayā māṃ prati /
analyzed: dattvā vāma karam nitamba phalake līlā valat madhyayā prottuṅga stanam aṃsa cumbi cibukam kṛtvā tayā mām prati

original: prāntaprotanavendranīlamaṇimanmuktāvalīvibhramāḥ sāsūyaṃ prahitāḥ smarajvaramuco dvitrāḥ kaṭākṣacchaṭāḥ // VjivC_1.72 //
analyzed: prānta prota nava indranīla maṇimat muktā āvalī vibhramāḥ sa asūyam prahitāḥ smara jvara mucaḥ dvitrāḥ kaṭākṣa chaṭāḥ
atra samagra kavi kauśala saṃpādyasya cetana camatkāri tva lakṣaṇasya saubhāgyasya kiyat mātra varṇa vinyāsa vicchitti vihitasya

original: padasaṃdhānasampadupārjitasya ca lāvaṇyasya paraḥ paripoṣo vidyate /
analyzed: pada saṃdhāna sampad upārjitasya ca lāvaṇyasya paraḥ paripoṣaḥ vidyate
evam ca svarūpam abhidhāya tad vid āhlāda kāri tvam abhidhatte
tad vid āhlāda kāri tvam kim api āmoda sundaram
kīdṛśam vācya vācaka vakrokti tritaya atiśaya uttaram
vācyam abhidheyam vācakaḥ śabdaḥ vakroktiḥ alaṅkaraṇam
etasya tritayasya yaḥ atiśayaḥ kaḥ pi utkarṣaḥ tasmāt uttaram atiriktam
sva rūpeṇa atiśayena ca sva rūpeṇa anyat kim api tattva antaram etat atiśayena etasmāt tritayāt api loka uttaram iti arthaḥ
anyat ca kīdṛśam kim api āmoda sundaram

original: kimapyavyapadeśyaṃ sahṛdayahṛdayasaṃvedyam āmodaḥ sukumāravastudharmo rañjakatvaṃ nāma,
analyzed: kim api avyapadeśyam sahṛdaya hṛdaya saṃvedyam āmodaḥ sukumāra vastu dharmaḥ rañjaka tvam nāma
tena sundaram rañjaka tva ramaṇīyam
yathā

original: haṃsānāṃ ninadeṣu yaiḥ kavalitairāsajyate kūjatā- manyaḥ ko 'pi kaṣāyakaṇṭhaluṭhanādāghargharo vibhramaḥ /
analyzed: haṃsānām ninadeṣu yaiḥ kavalitaiḥ āsajyate kūjatā manyaḥ kaḥ pi kaṣāya kaṇṭha luṭha nāda aghargharaḥ vibhramaḥ
te saṃpratya kaṭhora vāraṇa vadhū danta aṅkura spardhinaḥ niryātāḥ kamala ākareṣu bisinī kanda agrima granthayaḥ

original: atra tritaye 'pi vācyavācakavakroktilakṣaṇe prādhānyena na kaścidapi kaveḥ saṃrambho vibhāvyate /
analyzed: atra tritaye vācya vācaka vakrokti lakṣaṇe prādhānyena na kaścid api kaveḥ saṃrambhaḥ vibhāvyate
kintu pratibhā vaicitrya vaśena kim api tadvida āhlāda kāri tvam unmīlitam
yadi api sarveṣām udāharaṇānām avikala kāvya lakṣaṇa parisamāptiḥ saṃbhavati tathā api yat prādhānyena abhidhīyate

original: sa evāṃśaḥ pratyekamudriktatayā teṣāṃ parisphuratīti sahṛdayaiḥ svayamevotprekṣaṇīyam /
analyzed: saḥ eva aṃśaḥ pratyekam udrikta tayā teṣām parisphurati iti sahṛdayaiḥ svayam eva utprekṣaṇīyam
evam kāvya sāmānya lakṣaṇam abhidhāya tad viśeṣa lakṣaṇa viṣaya pradarśana artham mārga bheda nibandhanam traividhyam abhidhatte
santi tatra trayaḥ mārgāḥ kavi prasthāna hetavaḥ
sukumāraḥ vicitraḥ ca madhyamaḥ ca ubhaya ātmakaḥ

original: tatra tasmin kāvye mārgāḥ panthanastrayaḥ santi saṃbhavanti /
analyzed: tatra tasmin kāvye mārgāḥ panthanaḥ trayaḥ santi saṃbhavanti

original: na dvau na catvāraḥ svarādisaṃkhyāvattāvatāmeva vastutastajjñairupalambhāt /
analyzed: na dvau na catvāraḥ svara ādi saṃkhyāvat tāvatām eva vastutas tad jñaiḥ upalambhāt
te ca kīdṛśāḥ kavi prasthāna hetavaḥ
kavīnām prasthānam vartanam tasya hetavaḥ
kāvya karaṇasya kāraṇa bhūtāḥ
kimabhidhānāḥ sukumāraḥ vicitraḥ ca madhyamaḥ ca iti
kīdṛśaḥ madhyamaḥ ubhaya ātmakaḥ

original: ubhayamanantaroktaṃ mārgadvayamātmā yasyeti vigṛhya chāyādvayopajīvītyuktaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: ubhayam anantara uktam mārga dvayam ātmā yasya iti vigṛhya chāyā dvaya upajīvī iti uktam bhavati
teṣām ca sva lakṣaṇa avasare svarūpam ākhyāsyate
atra bahuvidhāḥ vipratipattayaḥ saṃbhavanti
yasmāt cirantanaiḥ vidarbha ādi deśa viśeṣa samāśrayaṇena vaidarbho prabhṛtayaḥ rītayaḥ tistraḥ samāmnātāḥ
tāsām ca uttama adhama madhyama tvena traividhyam
anyaiḥ ca vaidarbha gauḍīya lakṣaṇam mārga dvitayam ākhyātam
etat ca ubhayam api ayukti yuktam
yasmāt deśa bheda nibandhana tve rīti bhedānām deśānām ānantyāt asaṃkhyā tvam prasajyate

original: na ca viśiṣṭarītiyuktatvena kāvyakaraṇaṃ mātuleyabhaginīvivāhavad deśadharmatayā vyavasthāpayituṃ śakyam /
analyzed: na ca viśiṣṭa rīti yukta tvena kāvya karaṇam mātuleya bhaginī vivāha vat deśa dharma tayā vyavasthāpayitum śakyam
deśa dharmaḥ hi vṛddha vyavahāra paraṃparā mātra śaraṇaḥ śakya anuṣṭhāna tām na ativartate

original: tathāvidhakāvyakaraṇaṃ punaḥ śaktyādikaraṇakalāpasākalyamapekṣyamāṇaṃ na śakyate yathākathañcidanuṣṭhātum /
analyzed: tathāvidha kāvya karaṇam punar śakti ādi karaṇa kalāpa sākalyam apekṣyamāṇam na śakyate yathā kathañcid anuṣṭhātum

original: na ca dākṣiṇātyagītaviṣayasusvaratvādi dhvanirāmaṇīyakavattasya svābhāvikaṃ kiñcid vaktuṃ pāryate /
analyzed: na ca dākṣiṇātya gīta viṣaya su svara tva ādi dhvani rāmaṇīyaka vat tasya svābhāvikam kiñcid vaktum pāryate
tasmin sati tathāvidha kāvya karaṇam sarvasya syāt
kiñca śaktau vidyamānāyām api vyutpatti ādiḥ āhārya kāraṇa sampad pratiniyata deśa viṣaya tayā na vyatiṣṭhate
niyama nibandhana abhāvāt tatra adarśanāt anyatra ca darśanāt

original: na ca rītīnāmuttamamadhyamādhamatvabhedena traividhyaṃ vyavasthāpayituṃ nyāyyam /
analyzed: na ca rītīnām uttama madhyama adhama tva bhedena traividhyam vyavasthāpayitum nyāyyam
yasmāt sahṛdaya hṛdayā hlāda kāri kāvya lakṣaṇa prastāve vaidarbhoḥ sadṛśa saundarya asaṃbhavāt madhyama adhamayoḥ upadeśa vaiyarthyam āyāti
parihārya tvena api upadeśaḥ na yukta tām ālambate
taiḥ eva anabhyupagata tvāt

original: na cāgatikagatinyāyena yathāśakti daridradānavat kāvyaṃ karaṇīyatā marhati /
analyzed: na ca āgatika gati nyāyena yathāśakti daridra dānavat kāvyam karaṇīya tā marhati

original: tadevaṃ nirvacanasamākhyāmātrakaraṇakāraṇatve deśaviśeṣāśrayaṇasya vayaṃ na vivadāmahe /
analyzed: tat evam nirvacana samākhyā mātra karaṇa kāraṇa tve deśa viśeṣa āśrayaṇasya vayam na vivadāmahe
mārga dvitaya vādinām api etāni eva dūṣaṇān
tidalam anena niḥsāra vastu parimalana vyasanena
kavi svabhāva bheda nibandhana tvena kāvyaprasthāna bhedaḥ samañjasa tām gāhate

original: sukumārasvabhāvasya hi kavestathāvidhaiva sahajā śaktiḥ samudbhavati,
analyzed: sukumāra svabhāvasya hi kaveḥ tathāvidhā eva sahajā śaktiḥ samudbhavati
śakti śaktimatoḥ abhedāt
tayā ca tathāvidha saukumārya ramaṇīyām vyutpattim ābadhnāti
tābhyām ca sukumāra vartmanā abhyāsa tatparaḥ kriyate

original: tathaivai tasmād vicitraḥ svabhāvo yasya kavestadvidāhlādakārikāvyalakṣaṇaprastā vāt saukumāryavyatirekiṇā vaicitryeṇa ramaṇīya eva,
analyzed: tathā evai tasmāt vicitraḥ svabhāvaḥ yasya kaveḥ tadvid āhlāda kāri kāvya lakṣaṇa prastāvāt saukumārya vyatirekiṇā vaicitryeṇa ramaṇīyaḥ eva
tasya kācid vicitrā eva tad anurūpā śaktiḥ samullasati
tayā ca tathāvidha vaidagdhya bandhurām vyutpattim ābadhnāti
tābhyām ca vaicitrya vāsanā adhivāsita mānasaḥ vicitra vartmanā abhyāsa bhāj bhavati
evam etad ubhaya kavi nibandhana saṃvalita svabhāvasya kaveḥ tat ucitā eva śabala śobhā atiśaya śālinī śaktiḥ samudeti
tayā ca tad ubhaya parispanda sundaram vyutpatti upārjanam ācarati
tatas tad chāyā dvitaya paripoṣa peśala abhyāsa paravaśaḥ saṃpadyate

original: tadevamete kavayaḥ kāvya karaṇakalāpakāṣṭhādhirūḍhiramaṇīyaṃ kimapi kāvyamārabhante,
analyzed: tat evam ete kavayaḥ kāvya karaṇa kalāpa kāṣṭhā adhirūḍhi ramaṇīyam kim api kāvyam ārabhante
sukumāram vicitram ubhaya ātmakam ca
te eva tad pravartana nimitta bhūtāḥ mārgāḥ iti ucyante
yadi api kavi svabhāva bheda nibandhana tvāt ananta bheda bhinna tvam anivāryam
tathā api parisaṃkhyātum aśakya tvāt sāmānyena traividhyam eva upapadyate
tathā ca ramaṇīya kāvya parigraha prastāve svabhāva su kumāraḥ tāvat ekaḥ rāśiḥ
tad vyatiriktasya aramaṇīyasya anupādeya tvāt
tad vyatirekī rāmaṇīyaka viśiṣṭaḥ vicitraḥ iti ucyate
tat etayoḥ dvayoḥ api ramaṇīya tvāt etadīya chāyā dvitaya upajīvinaḥ ramaṇīya tvam eva nyāya upapannam paryavasyati
tasmāt eteṣām pratyekam askhalita sva parispanda mahimnā tadvida āhlāda kāri tva parisamāpteḥ na kasyacid nyūna tā

original: nanu ca śaktyorāntaratamyāt svābhāvikatvaṃ vaktuṃ yujyate,
analyzed: nanu ca śaktyoḥ āntaratamyāt svābhāvika tvam vaktum yujyate
vyutpatti abhyāsayoḥ punar āhāryayoḥ katham etat ghaṭate
na eṣa doṣaḥ
yasmāt āstām tāvat kāvya karaṇam

original: viṣayāntare 'pi sarvasya kasyacidanādivāsanābhyāsādhivāsitacetasaḥ svabhāvānusāriṇāveva vyutpattyabhyāsau pravartate /
analyzed: viṣaya antare pi sarvasya kasyacid anādi vāsanā abhyāsa adhivāsita cetasaḥ svabhāva anusāriṇau eva vyutpatti abhyāsau pravartate
tau ca svabhāva abhivyañjanena eva sāphalyam bhajataḥ
svabhāvasya tayoḥ ca parasparam upakārya upakāraka bhāvena avasthānāt svabhāvaḥ tāvat ārabhate
tau ca tad paripoṣam ātanutaḥ
tathā ca acetanānām api padārthānām svabhāvaḥ svabhāva saṃvādi bhāva antara saṃnidhāna māhātmyāt abhivyaktim āsādayati

original: yathā candrakāntamaṇayaścandramasaḥ kiraṇaparā marśavaśena spandamānasahajarasaprasarāḥ saṃpadyante /
analyzed: yathā candrakānta maṇayaḥ candramasaḥ kiraṇa parāḥ marśa vaśena spandamāna sahaja rasa prasarāḥ saṃpadyante
tat evam mārgān uddiśya tān eva krameṇa lakṣayati
vidhi vaidagdhya niṣpanna nirmāṇa atiśaya upamaḥ
yat kiñcana api vaicitryam tat sarvam pratibhā udbhavam
saukumārya parispanda syandi yatra virājate
sukumāra abhidhaḥ saḥ yam yena sat kavayaḥ gatāḥ
mārgeṇa utphulla kusuma kānanena iva ṣaṭpadāḥ
sukumāra abhidhaḥ saḥ yam
saḥ yam sukumāra śabda abhidhānaḥ

original: yena mārgeṇa satkavayaḥ kālidāsaprabhṛtayo gatāḥ priyātāḥ,
analyzed: yena mārgeṇa sat kavayaḥ kālidāsa prabhṛtayaḥ gatāḥ pri yātāḥ
tad āśrayeṇa kāvyāni kṛtavantaḥ
katham utphulla kusuma kānanā eva ṣaṭpadāḥ

original: utphullāni vikasitāni kusumāni puṣpāṇi yasmin kānane vane tena ṣaṭpadā iva bhramarā yathā /
analyzed: utphullāni vikasitāni kusumāni puṣpāṇi yasmin kānane vane tena ṣaṭpadāḥ iva bhramarāḥ yathā
vikasita kusuma kānana sāmyena tasya kusuma saukumārya sadṛśam ābhaijātyam dyotyate
teṣām ca bhramara sādṛśyena kusuma makaranda kalpa sāra saṃgraha vyasani tā

original: sa ca kīdṛśaḥ---yatra yasmin kiñcanāpi kiyanmātramapi vaicitryaṃ vicitrabhāvo vakroktiyuktatvam /
analyzed: sa ca kīdṛśaḥ yatra yasmin kiñcana api kiyat mātram api vaicitryam vicitra bhāvaḥ vakrokti yuktatvam
tat sarvam alaṅkāra ādi pratibhā udbhavam kavi śakti samullasitam eva
na punar āhāryam yathā kathañcid prayatnena niṣpādyam
kīdṛśam saukumārya parispanda syandi

original: saukumāryamābhijātyaṃ tasya parispandastadvidāhlādakāritvalakṣaṇaṃ rāmaṇīyakaṃ tena syandate rasamayaṃ saṃpadyate yattathoktam /
analyzed: saukumāryam ābhijātyam tasya parispandaḥ tad vid āhlāda kāri tva lakṣaṇam rāmaṇīyakam tena syandate rasa mayam saṃpadyate yat tathā uktam
yatra virājate śobhā atiśayam puṣṇāti iti saṃbandhaḥ
yathā

original: pravṛddhatāpo divaso 'timātra- matyarthameva kṣaṇadā ca tanvī /
analyzed: pravṛddha tāpaḥ timātra matyartham eva kṣaṇadā ca tanvī

original: ubhau virodhakriyayā vibhinnau jāyāpatī sānuśayāvivāstām // VjivC_1.74 //
analyzed: ubhau virodha kriyayā vibhinnau jāyā patī sa anuśayau iva āstām
atra śleṣa chāyā ācchuritam kavi śakti mātra samullasitam alaṅkaraṇam anāhāryam kām api kamanīya tām puṣṇāti

original: tathā ca “pravṛddhatāpaḥ' tanvī' iti vācakau sundarasvabhāvamātrasamarpaṇaparatvena vartamānāvarthāntarapratītyanurodhaparatvena pravṛttiṃ
analyzed: tathā ca pravṛddha tāpaḥ tanvī iti vācakau sundara svabhāva mātra samarpaṇa paratvena vartamānau artha antara pratīti anurodha paratvena pravṛttim

original: kavivyaktakauśalasamullasitasya punaḥ prakārāntirasya pratītāvānuguṇyamātreṇa tadvidāhlādakāritāṃ pratipadyete /
analyzed: kavi vyakta kauśala samullasitasya punar prakāra antiḥ asya pratītau ānuguṇya mātreṇa tadvid āhlāda kāri tām pratipadyete
kim tat prakārāntaram nāma
virodha vibhinnayoḥ śabdayoḥ artha antara pratīti kāriṇoḥ upanibandhaḥ
tathā ca upameyayoḥ saha anavasthāna lakṣaṇaḥ virodhaḥ
svabhāva bheda lakṣaṇam ca vibhinna tvam
upamānayoḥ punar īrṣyā kalaha lakṣaṇaḥ virodhaḥ
kopāt pṛthak avasthāna lakṣaṇam vibhinna tvam
atimātram atyartham ca iti viśeṣaṇa dvitayam pakṣa dvaye sa atiśaya tā pratīti kāri tvena atitarām ramaṇīyam
śleṣa chāyā kleśa saṃpādya api ayatna ghaṭita tvena atra manohāriṇī
punar ca kīdṛśaḥ amlāna pratibhā udbhinna nava śabda artha bandhuraḥ

original: amlānā yāsāvadoṣopahatā prāktanādyatanasaṃskāraparipākaprauḍhā pratibhā kācideva kaviśaktiḥ,
analyzed: a mlānā yā asau adoṣa upahatā prāktana adyatana saṃskāra paripāka prauḍhā pratibhā kācid eva kavi śaktiḥ
tatas udbhinnau natana aṅkura nyāyena svayam eva samullasitau

original: na punaḥ kadarthanākṛṣṭau navau pratyagrau tadvidāhlādakāritvasāmarthyayuktau śabdārthāvabhidhānābhidheyau tābhyāṃ bandhuro hṛdayahārī /
analyzed: na punar kadarthana ākṛṣṭau navau pratyagrau tadvida āhlāda kāri tva sāmarthya yuktau śabda arthau abhidhāna abhidheyau tābhyām bandhuraḥ hṛdaya hārī
anyat ca kīdṛśaḥ ayatna vihita su alpa manohāri vibhūṣaṇaḥ

original: ayatnenākleśena vihitaṃ kṛtaṃ yat svalpaṃ manāṅmātraṃ manohāri hṛdayāhlādakaṃ vibhūṣaṇamalaṅkaraṇaṃ yatra sa tathoktaḥ /
analyzed: ayatnena akleśena vihitam kṛtam yat su alpam manāk mātram manohāri hṛdaya āhlādakam vibhūṣaṇam alaṅkaraṇam yatra sa tathā uktaḥ
su alpa prakaraṇa ādi apekṣaḥ
na vākya mātra paraḥ
udāharaṇam yathā
bāla indu vakrāṇi avikāsa bhāvāt babhuḥ palāśāni ati lohitāni

original: sadyo vasantena samāgatānāṃ nakhakṣatānīva vanasthalīnām // VjivC_1.75 //
analyzed: sadyas vasantena samāgatānām nakha kṣatāni iva vana sthalīnām

original: atra “bālenduvakrāṇi' “atilohitāni' “sadyo vasantena samāgatānām' iti padāni saukumāryāt
analyzed: atra bāla indu vakrāṇi ati lohitāni sadyas vasantena samāgatānām iti padāni saukumāryāt
svabhāva varṇanā mātra para tvena upāttāni api nakha kṣatāni iva iti alakaraṇasya manohāriṇaḥ

original: kleśaṃ vinā svabhāvodbhannatvena yojanāṃ bhajamānāni camatkārakāritā māpadyante /
analyzed: kleśam vinā svabhāva udbhanna tvena yojanām bhajamānāni camatkāra kāri tā mā āpadyante
yaḥ ca anyat ca kīdṛśaḥ bhāva svabhāva pradhāni anyakkṛta āhārya kauśalaḥ

original: bhāvāḥ padārthasteṣāṃ svabhāvastattvaṃ tasya prādhānyaṃ mukhyabhāvastena nyakkṛtaṃ tiraskṛtamāhārthaṃ vyutpattivihitaṃ kauśalaṃ naipuṇyaṃ yatra  #
analyzed: bhāvāḥ padārthaḥ teṣām svabhāvaḥ tattvam tasya prādhānyam mukhya bhāvaḥ tena nyakkṛtam tiraskṛtam āha artham vyutpatti vihitam kauśalam naipuṇyam yatra
sa tathā uktaḥ
tat ayam atra abhiprāyaḥ padārtha paramārtha mahimā eva kavi śakti samunmīlitaḥ
tathāvidhaḥ tatra vijṛmbhate

original: yena vividhamapi vyutpattivilasitaṃ kāvyāntaragataṃ tiraskārāspadaṃ saṃpadyate /
analyzed: yena vividham api vyutpatti vilasitam kāvya antara gatam tiraskāra āspadam saṃpadyate
atra udāharaṇam raghu vaṃśe mṛgayā varṇana param prakaraṇam yathā
tasya stana praṇayibhiḥ muhureṇa śāvaiḥ vyāhanyamāna hariṇī gamanam purastāt

original: āvirbabhūva kuśagarbhamukhaṃ mṛgāṇāṃ yūthaṃ tadagrasaragarvitakṛṣṇasāram // VjivC_1.76 //
analyzed: āvirbabhūva kuśa garbha mukham mṛgāṇām yūtham tad agrasara garvita kṛṣṇa sāram
ityādi
yathā ca kumārasambhave
dvandvāni bhāvam kriyayā vivavruḥ
iti
atas param prāṇi dharma varṇanam

original: śṛṅgeṇa ca sparśanimīlitākṣīṃ mṛgīmakaṇḍūyata kṛṣṇasāraḥ // VjivC_1.78 //
analyzed: śṛṅgeṇa ca sparśa nimīlita akṣīm mṛgīm akaṇḍūyata kṛṣṇasāraḥ
anyat ca kīdṛśaḥ rasa ādi parama artha jña manaḥ saṃvāda sundaraḥ
rasāḥ śṛṅgāra ādayaḥ
tad ādi grahaṇena rati ādayaḥ pi gṛhyante

original: teṣāṃ paramārthaḥ para rahasyaṃ tajjānantīti tajjñāstadvidasteṣāṃ manaḥ saṃvādo hṛdayasaṃvedanaṃ svānubhavagocaratayā pratibhāsaḥ,
analyzed: teṣām paramārthaḥ rahasyam tat jānanti iti tajjñāḥ tad vidaḥ teṣām manaḥ saṃvādaḥ hṛdaya saṃvedanam sva anubhava gocara tayā pratibhāsaḥ

original: tena sundaraḥ sukumāraḥ sahṛdayahṛdayāhlādakārī vākyasyopanibandha ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tena sundaraḥ su kumāraḥ sahṛdaya hṛdaya āhlāda kārī vākyasya upanibandhaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: atrodāharaṇāni raghau rāvaṇaṃ nihatya puṣpakeṇāgacchato rāmasya sītāyāstadvirahavidhurahṛdayena
analyzed: atra udāharaṇāni raghau rāvaṇam nihatya puṣpakeṇa āgacchataḥ rāmasya sītāyāḥ tad viraha vidhura hṛdayena

original: mayāsminnasmin samuddeśe kimapyevaṃvidhaṃ vaiśasamanubhūtamiti varṇayataḥ sarvāṇyeva vākyāni /
analyzed: mayā asmin asmin samuddeśe kim api evaṃvidham vaiśasam anubhūtam iti varṇayataḥ sarvāṇi eva vākyāni
tathā

original: pūrvānubhūtaṃ smaratā ca rātrau kampottaraṃ bhīru tavopagūḍham /
analyzed: pūrva anubhūtam smaratā ca rātrau kampa uttaram bhīru tava upagūḍham
guhā visārīṇi ativāhitāni mayā kathañcid ghana garjitāni
atra rāśi dvaya karaṇasya ayam abhiprāyaḥ yat vibhāva ādi rūpeṇa rasa aṅga bhūtāḥ śakuni ruta taru salila kusuma samaya prabhṛtayaḥ
padārthāḥ sa atiśaya svabhāva varṇana prādhānyena eva rasa aṅga tām pratipadyante

original: tadvyatiriktāḥ suragandharvaprabhṛtayaḥ sotkarṣacetanāyoginaḥ śṛṅgārādirasanirbharatayā varṇyamānāḥ sarasahṛdayāhlādakāritāmāyāntīti kavibhirabhyupagatam
analyzed: tad vyatiriktāḥ sura gandharva prabhṛtayaḥ sa utkarṣa cetanā yoginaḥ śṛṅgāra ādi rasa nirbhara tayā varṇyamānāḥ sa rasa hṛdaya āhlāda kāri tām āyānti iti kavibhiḥ abhyupagatam
tathāvidham eva lakṣye dṛśyate
anyat ca kīdṛśaḥ avibhāvita saṃsthāna rāmaṇīya karañjakaḥ

original: avibhāvitamanālocitaṃ saṃsthānaṃ saṃsthitiryatra tena rāmaṇīyakena ramaṇīyatvena rañjakaḥ sahṛdayāhlādakaḥ /
analyzed: avibhāvitam anālocitam saṃsthānam saṃsthitiḥ yatra tena rāmaṇīyakena ramaṇīya tvena rañjakaḥ sahṛdaya āhlādakaḥ

original: tenāyamarthaḥ---yadi tathā vidhaṃ kavikauśalamatra saṃbhavati tad vyapadeṣṭumiyattayā na kathañcidapi pāryate,
analyzed: tena ayam arthaḥ yadi tathā vidham kavi kauśalam atra saṃbhavati tat vyapadeṣṭum iyat tayā na kathañcid api pāryate
kevalam sarva atiśāyi tayā cetasi parisphurati
anyat ca kīdṛśaḥ vidhi vaidagdhayā aniṣpanna nirmāṇa atiśaya upamaḥ

original: vidhirvidhātā tasya vaidagdhyaṃ kauśalaṃ tena niṣpannaḥ parisamāpto yo 'sau nirmaṇātiśayaḥ sundaraḥ sargollekho ramaṇīyalāvaṇyādiḥ sa upamā  #
analyzed: vidhiḥ vidhātā tasya vaidagdhyam kauśalam tena niṣpannaḥ parisamāptaḥ sau nirmaṇa atiśayaḥ sundaraḥ sarga ullekhaḥ ramaṇīya lāvaṇya ādiḥ saḥ upamā
nidarśanam tasya sa tathā uktaḥ

original: tena vidhāturiva kaveḥ kauśalaṃ yatra vivektumaśakyam /
analyzed: tena vidhātuḥ iva kaveḥ kauśalam yatra vivektum aśakyam
yathā
jyā bandha niṣpanda bhujena yasya viniḥśvasat vaktra paraṃpareṇa
kārā gṛhe nirjita vāsavena daśānanena uṣita mā prasādāt
atra vyapadeśa prakāra antara nirapekṣaḥ kavi śakti pariṇāmaḥ param paripākam adhirūḍhaḥ

original: etasmin kulake---prathamaśloke prādhānyena śabdālaṅkārayoḥ saundaryaṃ pratipāditam /
analyzed: etasmin kulake prathama śloke prādhānyena śabda alaṅkārayoḥ saundaryam pratipāditam
dvitīye varṇanīyasya vastunaḥ saukumāryam
tṛtīye prakāra antara nirapekṣasya saṃniveśasya saukumāryam
caturthe vaicitryam api saukumārya avisaṃvādi vidheyam iti uktam

original: evaṃ sukumārābhidhānasya mārgasya lakṣaṇaṃ vidhāya tasyaiva guṇān lakṣayati---
analyzed: evam sukumāra abhidhānasya mārgasya lakṣaṇam vidhāya tasya eva guṇān lakṣayati
asamasta manohāri pada vinyāsa jīvitam

original: mādhuryaṃ sukumārasya mārgasya prathamo guṇaḥ // Vjiv_1.30 //
analyzed: mādhuryam sukumārasya mārgasya prathamaḥ guṇaḥ
asamastāni samāsa varjitāni manohārīṇi hṛdaya āhlādakāni śruti ramya tvena artha ramaṇīya tvena

original: ca yāni padāni suptiṅantāni teṣāṃ vinyāsaḥ saṃniveśavaicitryaṃ jīvitaṃ sarvasvaṃ
analyzed: ca yāni padāni sup tiṅ antāni teṣām vinyāsaḥ saṃniveśa vaicitryam jīvitam sarva svam

original: yasya tattathoktaṃ mādhṛryaṃ nāma sukumāralakṣaṇasya mārgasya prathamaḥ pradhānabhūto guṇaḥ /
analyzed: yasya tat tathā uktam mādhṛryam nāma sukumāra lakṣaṇasya mārgasya prathamaḥ pradhāna bhūtaḥ guṇaḥ
a samasta śabdaḥ tra prācurya arthaḥ
na samāsa abhāva niyama arthaḥ
udāharaṇam yathā

original: krīḍārasena rahasi smatapūrvamindor lekhāṃ vikṛṣya vinibad ca mūrdhni gauryā /
analyzed: krīḍā rasena rahasi smata pūrvam indoḥ lekhām vikṛṣya ca mūrdhni gauryā

original: kiṃ śobhitāhamanayota śaśāṅkamauleḥ pṛṣṭasya pātu paricumbhanamuttaravaḥ // VjivC_1.81 //
analyzed: kim śobhitā aham anayā uta śaśāṅka mauleḥ pṛṣṭasya pātu paricumbhanam uttaravaḥ

original: atra padānāmasamastatvaṃ śabdārtharamaṇīyatā vinyāsavaicitryaṃ ca tritayamapi cakāsti /
analyzed: atra padānām asamasta tvam śabda artha ramaṇīya tā vinyāsa vaicitryam ca tritayam api cakāsti
tat evam mādhuryam abhidhāya prasādam abhidhatte
akleśa vyañjita ākūtam jha g iti artha samarpaṇam
rasa vakrokti viṣayam yat prasādaḥ sa kathyate
jha c iti prathamataram eva artha samarpaṇam vastu pratipādanam
kīdṛśam a kleśa vyañjita ākūtam a kadarthanā prakaṭita abhiprāyam
kiṃviṣayam rasa vakrokti viṣayam
rasāḥ śṛṅgāra ādayaḥ
vakroktiḥ sakala alaṅkāra sāmānyam viṣayaḥ yasya tat tathā uktam

original: sa eva prasādākhyo guṇaḥ kathyate bhaṇyate /
analyzed: saḥ eva prasāda ākhyaḥ guṇaḥ kathyate bhaṇyate

original: atra padānāmasamastatvaṃ prasiddhābhidhānatvam avyavahitasaṃbandhatvaṃ samāsasadbhāve 'pi gamakasamāsayuktatā ca paramārthaḥ /
analyzed: atra padānām asamasta tvam prasiddha abhidhāna tvam avyavahita saṃbandha tvam samāsa sadbhāve gamaka samāsa yukta tā ca paramārthaḥ
ākūta śabdaḥ tātparye vicchittau ca vartate
udāharaṇam yathā
hima vyapāyāt viśada adharāṇām mā āpāṇḍurībhūta mukha chavīnām

original: svedodgamaḥ kiṃpuruṣāṅganānāṃ cakre padaṃ patraviśeṣakeṣu // VjivC_1.82 //
analyzed: sveda udgamaḥ kiṃpuruṣa aṅganānām cakre padam patra viśeṣakeṣu
atra asamasta tva ādi sāmagrī vidyate

original: yadapi vividhapatraviśeṣakavaicitryavihitaṃ kimapi vadanasaundaryaṃ muktākaṇākārasvedalavopabṛṃhitaṃ tadapi suvyaktameva /
analyzed: yat api vividha patra viśeṣaka vaicitrya vihitam kim api vadana saundaryam muktā kaṇā ākāra sveda lava upabṛṃhitam tat api su vyaktam eva
yathā vā
anena sārdham vihara amburāśeḥ tīreṣu tāḍīvana marmareṣu
dvīpa antara ānīta lavaṅga puṣpaiḥ apākṛta sveda lavāḥ marudbhiḥ
alaṅkā ākhyaktiḥ yathā
evam prasādam abhidhāya lāvaṇyam lakṣayati
su alpayā bandha saundaryam lāvaṇyam abhidhīyate

original: bandho vākyavinyāsastasya saundaryaṃ rāmaṇīyakaṃ lāvaṇyamabhidhīyate lāvaṇyamityucyate /
analyzed: bandhaḥ vākya vinyāsaḥ tasya saundaryam rāmaṇīyakam lāvaṇyam abhidhīyate lāvaṇyam iti ucyate

original: kīdṛśam---varṇānāmakṣarāṇāṃ vinyāso vicitraṃ nyasanaṃ tasya vicchittiḥ śobhā vaidagdhyabhaṅgī tayā lakṣitaṃ padānāṃ suptiṅantānāṃ saṃdhānaṃ  #
analyzed: kīdṛśam varṇānām akṣarāṇām vinyāsaḥ vicitram nyasanam tasya vicchittiḥ śobhā vaidagdhya bhaṅgī tayā lakṣitam padānām sup tiṅ antānām saṃdhānam
saṃyojanam tasya sampad
sā api śobhā eva
tayā lakṣitam
kīdṛśyā ubhaya rūpayā api su alpayā manāk mātrayā na ati nirbandha nirmitayā
tat ayam atra arthaḥ śabda artha saukumārya subhagaḥ saṃniveśa mahimā lāvaṇya rūpaḥ guṇaḥ kathyate
yathā
snāna ārdra mukteṣu anu dhūpa vāsam vinyasta sāyantana mallikeṣu

original: kāmo vasantātyayamandavīryaḥ keśeṣu lebhe balamaṅganānām // VjivC_1.85 //
analyzed: kāmaḥ vasanta atyaya manda vīryaḥ keśeṣu lebhe balam aṅganānām

original: atra saṃniveśasaundaryamahimā sahṛdayasaṃvedyo na vyapadeṣṭuṃ pāryate /
analyzed: atra saṃniveśa saundarya mahimā sahṛdaya saṃvedyaḥ na vyapadeṣṭum pāryate
yathā vā
cakāra bāṇaiḥ asura aṅganānām gaṇḍa sthalīḥ proṣita patra lekhāḥ
atrā api varṇa vinyāsa vicchittiḥ pada saṃdhāna sampad ca saṃniveśa saundarya nibandhanā sphuṭa avabhāsā eva
evam lāvaṇyam abhidhāya ābhijātyam abhidhatte
śruti peśala tā śāli su sparśam iva cetasā
svabhāva masṛṇa chāyam ābhijātyam pracakṣate

original: evaṃ vidhaṃ vastu ābhijātyaṃ pracakṣate ābhijātyābhidhānaṃ guṇaṃ varṇayanti /
analyzed: evaṃvidham vastu ābhijātyam pracakṣate ābhijātya abhidhānam guṇam varṇayanti

original: śrutiḥ śravaṇendriyaṃ tatra peśalatā rāmaṇīyakaṃ tena śālate ślāghate yattathoktam /
analyzed: śrutiḥ śravaṇa indriyam tatra peśala tā rāmaṇīyakam tena śālate ślāghate yat tathā uktam
sura parśam iva cetasā manasā su sparśam iva
sukhena spṛśyate iva iti atiśayoktiḥ iyam

original: yasmādubhayamapi sparśayogyatve sati saukumāryāt kimapi cetasi sparśasukhamarpayatīva /
analyzed: yasmāt ubhayam api sparśa yogya tve sati saukumāryāt kim api cetasi sparśa sukham arpayati iva

original: yataḥ svabhāvamasṛṇacchāyam ahāryaślakṣṇakānti yattad ābhijātyaṃ kathayantītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: yatas svabhāva masṛṇa chāyam ahārya ślakṣṇa kānti yat tat ābhijātyam kathayanti iti arthaḥ
yathā

original: jyotirlekhāvalayi galitaṃ yasya barhaṃ bhavānī putraprītyā kuvalayadalaprāpi karṇe karoti // VjivC_1.87 //
analyzed: jyotiḥ lekhā valayi galitam yasya barham bhavānī putra prītyā kuvalaya dala prāpi karṇe karoti

original: atra śrutipeśalatādi svabhāvamasṛṇacchāyatvaṃ kimapi sahṛdayasaṃvedyaṃ parisphurati /
analyzed: atra śruti peśala tā ādi svabhāva masṛṇa chāya tvam kim api sahṛdaya saṃvedyam parisphurati

original: nanu ca lāvaṇyamābhijātyaṃ ca lokottarataruṇīrūpalakṣaṇavastudharmatayā yat prasiddhaṃ tat kathaṃ kāvyasya bhavitumarhatīti cettanna /
analyzed: nanu ca lāvaṇyam ābhijātyam ca lokottara taruṇī rūpa lakṣaṇa vastu dharma tayā yat prasiddham tat katham kāvyasya bhavitum arhati iti ced tat na

original: yasmādanena nyāyena pūrvaprasiddhayorapi mādhuryaprasādayoḥ kāvyadharmatvaṃ vighaṭate /
analyzed: yasmāt anena nyāyena pūrva prasiddhayoḥ api mādhurya prasādayoḥ kāvya dharma tvam vighaṭate

original: mādhuryaṃ hi guḍādimadhuradravyadharmatayā prasiddhaṃ tathāvidhāhlādakāritvasāmānyopacārāt kāvye vyapadiśyate /
analyzed: mādhuryam hi guḍa ādi madhura dravya dharmatayā prasiddham tathāvidha āhlāda kāri tva sāmānya upacārāt kāvye vyapadiśyate

original: tathaiva ca prasādaḥ svacchasalilasphaṭikādidharmatayā prasiddhaḥ sphuṭāvabhāsitvasāmānyopacārāj
analyzed: tathā eva ca prasādaḥ svaccha salila sphaṭika ādi dharma tayā prasiddhaḥ sphuṭa avabhāsi tva sāmānya upacārāt
jha giti pratīti kāriṇi kāvye pravartitavya hāraḥ tat evaṃvidha vaidagdhya vihita vicitra vinyāsa ramaṇī rāmaṇīyakam
yathā lāvaṇya śabda abhidheya tayā pratīti peśala tām pratipadyate

original: tadvadeva ca kāvye kaviśaktikauśalollikhitakāntikamanīyaṃ bandhasaundaryaṃ cetanacamatkārakāritvasāmānyopacārāllavaṇyaśabdavyatirekeṇa śabdāntarābhidheyatāṃ  #
analyzed: tadvat eva ca kāvye kavi śakti kauśala ullikhita kānti kamanīyam bandha saundaryam cetana camatkāra kāri tva sāmānya upacārāt lavaṇya śabda vyatirekeṇa śabda antara abhidheya tām
na utsahate
tathā eva ca kāvye svabhāva masṛṇa chāya tvam ābhijātya śabdena abhidhīyate
nanu ca kaiścid pratīyamānam vastu lalanā lāvaṇya sāmyāt lāvaṇyam iti utpādita pratīti
pratīyamānam pur anyat eva vastu asti vāṇīṣu mahā kavīnām
yat tat prasiddha avayava atiriktam ābhāti lāvaṇyam iva aṅganāsu
tat katham bandha saundarya mātram lāvaṇyam iti abhidhīyate
na eṣa doṣaḥ
yasmāt anena dṛṣṭāntena vācya vācaka lakṣaṇa prasiddha avayava vyatirikta tvena astitva mātram sādhyate pratīyamānasya
na punar sakala loka locana savedyasya lalanā lāvaṇyasya

original: sahṛdayahṛdayānāmeva saṃvedyaṃ sat pratīyamānaṃ samīkartuṃ pāryate /
analyzed: sahṛdaya hṛdayānām eva saṃvedyam sat pratīyamānam samīkartum pāryate
tasya bandha saundaryam eva avyutpanna pada padārthānām api śravaṇa mātreṇa eva hṛdayahāri tva spardhayā vyapadiśyate
pratīyamānam punar kāvya parama artha jñānām eva anubhava gocara tām pratipadyate

original: yathā kāminīnāṃ kimapi saubhāgyaṃ tadupabhogocitānāṃ nāyakānāmeva saṃvedyatāmarhati,
analyzed: yathā kāminīnām kim api saubhāgyam tad upabhoga ucitānām nāyakānām eva saṃvedya tām arhati
lāvaṇyam punar tāsām eva sat kavi girām iva saundaryam sakala loka gocara tām āyāti iti uktam eva iti alam atiprasaṅgena
evam sukumārasya lakṣaṇam abhidhāya vicitram pratipādayati
pratibhā prathama udbheda samaye yatra vakra tā
sabhda abhidheyayoḥ antar sphuratī iva vibhāvyate
alaṅkārasya kavayaḥ yatra alaṅkāraṇa antaram
asaṃtuṣṭāḥ nibadhnanti hāra ādeḥ maṇibandha vat
ratna raśmi chaṭā utseka bhāsuraiḥ bhūṣaṇaiḥ yathā
kāntā śarīram ācchādya bhūṣāyai parikalpyate
yatra tadvat alaṅkāraiḥ bhrājamānaiḥ nija ātmanā
sva śobhā atiśaya antar stham alaṅkāryam prakāśate
yat api anūtana ullekham vastu yatra tat api alam
ukti vaicitrya mātreṇa kāṣṭhām kām api nīyate
yatra anyathā abhavat sarvam anyathā eva yathāruci
bhāvyate pratibhā ullekha mahat tvena mahā kaveḥ
pratiyamāna tā yatra vākya arthasya nibadhyate
vācya vācaka vṛttibhyām vyatiriktasya kasyacid
svabhāvaḥ sa rasa ākūtaḥ bhāvānām yatra badhyate
kena api kamanīyena vaicitryeṇa upabṛṃhitaḥ
vicitraḥ yatra vakrokti vaicitryam jīvitāyate
parisphurati yasya antar sā kā api atiśaya abhidhā
saḥ ti duḥsaṃcaraḥ yena vidagdha kavayaḥ gatāḥ
khaḍga dhārā pathena iva su bhaṭānām manorathāḥ
sa vicitra abhidhānaḥ panthāḥ kīdṛśaḥ ati duḥsaṃcaraḥ
yatra ati duḥkhena saṃcarante

original: kiṃ bahunā, yena vidagdhakavayaḥ kecideva vyutpannāḥ kevalaṃ gatāḥ prayātāḥ,
analyzed: kim bahunā yena vidagdha kavayaḥ kecid eva vyutpannāḥ kevalam gatāḥ prayātāḥ
tad āśrayeṇa kāvyāni cakruḥ iti arthaḥ
katham kaṅga dhārāpathena iva su bhaṭānām manorathāḥ
nistraiṃśa dhārā mārgeṇa yathā su bhaṭānām mahā vīrāṇām manorathāḥ

original: nistriṃśadhārāmārgeṇa yathā subhaṭānāṃ mahāvīrāṇāṃ manorathāḥ saṃkalpaviśeṣāḥ /
analyzed: nistriṃśa dhārā mārgeṇa yathā su bhaṭānām mahāvīrāṇām manorathāḥ saṃkalpa viśeṣāḥ

original: tadayamatrābhiprāyaḥ---yadasidhārāmārgagamane manorathānāmaucityānusāreṇa yathāruci pravartamānānāṃ manāṅmātramapi mlānatā na saṃbhāvyate /
analyzed: tat ayam atra abhiprāyaḥ yat asi dhārā mārga gamane manorathānām aucitya anusāreṇa yathāruci pravartamānānām manāk mātram api mlāna tā na saṃbhāvyate

original: sākṣātsamarasaṃmardana samācaraṇe punaḥ kadācit kimapi mlānatvamapi saṃbhāvyeta /
analyzed: sākṣāt samara saṃmardana samācaraṇe punar kadācid kim api mlāna tvam api saṃbhāvyeta

original: tadanena mārgasya durgamatvaṃ tatprasthitānāṃ ca viharaṇaprauḍhiḥ pratipādyate /
analyzed: tat anena mārgasya durgama tvam tad prasthitānām ca viharaṇa prauḍhiḥ pratipādyate

original: kīdṛśaḥ sā mārgaḥ---yatra yasmin śabdābhidheyayorabhidhānābhidhīyamānayorantaḥ svarūpānupraveśinī vakratā bhaṇitivicchittiḥ sphuratīva praspandamāneva  #
analyzed: kīdṛśaḥ sā mārgaḥ yatra yasmin śabda abhidheyayoḥ abhidhāna abhidhīyamānayoḥ antar svarūpa anupraveśinī vakra tā bhaṇiti vicchittiḥ sphurati iva praspandamānā iva
vibhāvyate lakṣyate
kadā pratibhā prathama udbheda samaye
pratibhāyāḥ kavi śakteḥ acarama ullekha avasare

original: tadayamatra paramārthaḥ---yat kaviprayatnanirapekṣayoreva śabdārthayoḥ svābhāvikaḥ ko 'pi vakratāprakāraḥ parisphuran paridṛśyate /
analyzed: tat ayam atra paramārthaḥ yat kavi prayatna nirapekṣayoḥ eva śabda arthayoḥ svābhāvikaḥ kaḥ pi vakra tā prakāraḥ parisphuran paridṛśyate
yathā

original: ko 'yaṃ bhāti prakārastava pavana padaṃ lokapādāhatīnāṃ tejasvivrātasevye nabhasi nayasi yatpāṃsupūraṃ pratiṣṭhām /
analyzed: kaḥ yam bhāti prakāraḥ tava pavana padam loka pāda āhatīnām tejasvi vrāta sevye nabhasi nayasi yat pāṃsu pūram pratiṣṭhām

original: yasminnutthāpyamāne jananayanapathopadravastāvadāstāṃ kenāpāyena sahyo vapuṣi kaluṣatādoṣa eva tvayaiva // VjivC_1.89 //
analyzed: yasmin utthāpyamāne jana nayana pathā upadravaḥ tāvat āstām kena apāyena sahyaḥ vapuṣi kaluṣa tā doṣaḥ eva tvayā eva
atra aprastuta praśaṃsā lakṣaṇaḥ laṅkāraḥ prādhānyena vākya arthaḥ
pratīyamāna padārtha antara tvena prayukta tvāt tatra ca vicitra kavi śakti samullikhita vakra śabda artha upanibandha māhātmyāt pratīyamānam api abhidheya tām iva
prāpitam

original: prakrama eva pratibhāsamānatvānna cārthāntarapratītikāritvena padānāṃ śleṣavyapadeśaḥ śakyate kartum,
analyzed: prakramaḥ eva pratibhāsamāna tvāt na ca artha antara pratīti kāri tvena padānām śleṣa vyapadeśaḥ śakyate kartum
vācyasya sama pradhāna bhāvena anavasthānāt

original: arthāntarapratītikāritvaṃ ca padānāṃ pratīyamānārthasphuṭatāva bhāsanārthamupanibadhyamānamatīva camatkārakāritāṃ pratipadyate /
analyzed: artha antara pratīti kāri tvam ca padānām bhāsana artham upanibadhyamānam atīva camatkāra kāri tām pratipadyate
tam eva vicitram prakāra antareṇa lakṣayati alaṅkārasya ityādi
yatra yasmin mārge kavayaḥ nibadhnanti viracayanti
alaṅkārasya vibhūṣaṇasya alaṅkāraṇa antaram bhūṣaṇa antaram asaṃtuṣṭāḥ santaḥ
katham hāra ādeḥ maṇibandha vat
muktā kalāpa prabhṛteḥ yathā padaka ādi maṇibandham ratna viśeṣa vinyāsam vaikaṭikāḥ
yathā

original: he helājitabodhisattva vacasāṃ kiṃ vistaraistoyadhe nāsti tvatsadṛśaḥ paraḥ parahitādhāne gṛhītavrataḥ /
analyzed: he helā jita bodhisattva vacasām kim vistaraiḥ toyadhe nā asti tvad sadṛśaḥ paraḥ para hita ādhāne gṛhīta vrataḥ

original: tṛṣyatpānthajanopakāraghaṭanāvaimukhyalabdhāyaśo bhāraprodvahane karoṣi kṛpayā sāhāyyakaṃ yanmaroḥ // VjivC_1.90 //
analyzed: tṛṣyat pāntha jana upakāra ghaṭanā vaimukhya labdha ayaśaḥ bhāra prodvahane karoṣi kṛpayā sāhāyyakam yat maroḥ

original: atrātyantagarhaṇīyacaritaṃ padārthāntaraṃ pratīyamānatayā cetasi nidhāya tathāvidhavilasitaḥ salilanidhirvācyatayopakrāntaḥ /
analyzed: atra atyanta garhaṇīya caritam padārtha antaram pratīyamāna tayā cetasi nidhāya tathāvidha vilasitaḥ salilanidhiḥ vācya tayā upakrāntaḥ
tat etāvat eva alaṅkṛteḥ aprastuta praśaṃsāyāḥ svarūpam garhaṇīya pratīyamāna padārtha antara paryavasānam api vākyam śruti upakrama ramaṇīya tayā upanibadhyamānam
tadvida āhlāda kāri tām āyāti
tat etat vyāja stuti pratirūpaka prāyam alaṅkaraṇa antaram aprastuta praśaṃsāyāḥ bhūṣaṇa tvena upāttam
na ca atra saṃkara alaṅkāra vyavahāraḥ bhavitum arhati
pṛthak ati parisphuṭa tvena avabhāsanāt
na ca api saṃsṛṣṭi saṃbhavaḥ sama pradhāna bhāvena anavasthiteḥ
na ca dvayoḥ api vācyālaṅkāra tvam
vibhinna viṣaya tvāt
yathā vā

original: nāmāpyanyatarornimīlitamabhūttattāvadunmīlitaṃ prasthāne skhalataḥ svartmani vidheranyad gṛhītaḥ karaḥ /
analyzed: nāma api anya taroḥ nimīlitam abhūt tat tāvat unmīlitam prasthāne skhalataḥ sva artmani vidheḥ anyat gṛhītaḥ karaḥ

original: lokaścāyamadṛṣṭadarśanakṛtā dṛgvaiśasāduddhṛto yuktaṃ kāṣṭhika lūnavān yadasi tāmāmrālimākālikīm // VjivC_1.91 //
analyzed: lokaḥ ca ayam adṛṣṭa darśana kṛtā dṛś vaiśasāt uddhṛtaḥ yuktam kāṣṭhika lūnavān yat asi tām āmra alim ākālikīm
atra ayam eva nyāyaḥ nusaṃdheyaḥ
yathā ca

original: kiṃ tāruṇyataroriyaṃ rasabharodbhinnā navā mañjarī līlāprocchalitasya kiṃ laharikā lāvaṇyavārāṃnidheḥ /
analyzed: kim tāruṇya taroḥ iyam rasa bhara udbhinnā navā mañjarī līlā procchalitasya kim laharikā lāvaṇya vārāṃnidheḥ

original: udgāḍhotkalikāvatāṃ svasamayopanyāsaviśrambhiṇaḥ kiṃ sākṣādupadeśayaṣṭirathavā devasya śṛṅgāriṇaḥ // VjivC_1.92 //
analyzed: udgāḍha utkalikāvatām sva samaya upanyāsa viśrambhiṇaḥ kim sākṣāt upadeśa yaṣṭiḥ athavā devasya śṛṅgāriṇaḥ

original: atra rūpakalakṣaṇo yo 'yaṃ kāvyālaṅkāraḥ tasya sandehoktiriyaṃ chāyāntarātiśayotpadānāyopanibaddhā cetanacamatkārakāritā māvahita /
analyzed: atra rūpaka lakṣaṇaḥ yaḥ yam kāvyālaṅkāraḥ tasya sandeha uktiḥ iyam chāyā antara atiśaya utpadānāya upanibaddhā cetana camatkāra kāri tā
śiṣṭam pūrva udāharaṇa dvaya uktam anusartavyam
anyat ca kīdṛś ratna ityādi
yugalakam

original: yatra yasminnalaṅkārairbhrājamānairnijātmanā svajīvitena bhāsamānairbhūṣāyai parikalpyate śobhāyai bhūṣyate /
analyzed: yatra yasmin alaṅkāraiḥ bhrājamānaiḥ nija ātmanā sva jīvitena bhāsamānaiḥ bhūṣāyai parikalpyate śobhāyai bhūṣyate
katham yathā bhūṣaṇaiḥ
kaṅkaṇa ādibhiḥ
kīdṛśaiḥ ratna raśmi chaṭā utseka bhāsuraiḥ maṇi mayūkha ullāsa bhrājiṣṇubhiḥ
kim kṛtvā akāntā śarīram ācchādya kāminī vapuḥ sva prabhā prasara tirohitam vidhāya

original: bhūṣāyai kalpanam---yadetaiḥ svaśobhātiśayāntaḥ sthaṃ nijakāntikamanīyāntargatamalaṅkāryamalaṅkāraṇīyaṃ prakāśyate dyotyate /
analyzed: bhūṣāyai kalpanam yat etaiḥ sva śobhā atiśaya antar stham nija kānti kamanīya antargatam alaṅkāryam alaṅkāraṇīyam prakāśyate dyotyate

original: tadidamatra tātparyam---tadalaṅkāramahimaiva tathāvidho 'tra bhrājate tasyātyantodriktavṛtteḥ svaśobhātiśayāntargatamalaṅkāryaṃ prakāśyate
analyzed: tat idam atra tātparyam tad alaṅkāra mahimā eva bhrājate tasya atyanta udrikta vṛtteḥ sva śobhā atiśaya antargatam alaṅkāryam prakāśyate
yathā

original: āryasyājimahotsavavyatikare nāsaṃvibhakto 'tra vaḥ kaścit kāpyavaśiṣyate tyajata re naktañcarāḥ saṃbhramam /
analyzed: āryasya āji mahā utsava vyatikare na a saṃvibhaktaḥ tra vaḥ kaścid kā api avaśiṣyate tyajata re naktañcarāḥ saṃbhramam

original: bhūyiṣṭheṣvapi kā bhavatsu gaṇanātyarthaṃ kimuttāmyate tasyodārabhujoṣmaṇo 'navasitā nārāca saṃpattayaḥ // VjivC_1.93 //
analyzed: bhūyiṣṭheṣu api kā bhavatsu gaṇanā atyartham kim uttāmyate tasya udāra bhuja ūṣmaṇaḥ nava sitāḥ nārāca saṃpattayaḥ

original: atrājermahotsavavyatikaratvena tathāvidhaṃ rūpaṇaṃ vihitaṃ yatrālaṅkāryam “āryaḥ svaśauryeṇa yuṣmān sarvāneva mārayati” ityalaṅkāraśobhātiśayāntargatatvena  #
analyzed: atra ājeḥ mahā utsava vyatikara tvena tathāvidham rūpaṇam vihitam yatra alaṅkāryam āryaḥ sva śauryeṇa yuṣmān sarvān eva mārayati iti alaṅkāra śobhā atiśaya antargata tvena
bhrājate

original: tathā ca kaścit sāmānyo 'pi kvāpi davīyasyapi deśe nāsaṃvibhakto yuṣmākamavaśiṣyate /
analyzed: tathā ca kaścid sāmānyaḥ kvāpi davīyasi api deśe na a saṃvibhaktaḥ yuṣmākam avaśiṣyate

original: tasmāt samaramahotsavasavibhāgalampaṭatayā pratyekaṃ yūyaṃ saṃbhramaṃ tyajata /
analyzed: tasmāt samara mahā utsava savibhāga lampaṭa tayā pratyekam yūyam saṃbhramam tyajata

original: gaṇanayā vayaṃ bhūyiṣṭhā ityaśakyānuṣṭhānatāṃ yadi manyadhve tadapyayuktam /
analyzed: gaṇanayā vayam bhūyiṣṭhāḥ iti aśakya anuṣṭhāna tām yadi manyadhve tat api ayuktam
yasmāt asaṃkhya saṃvibhāga aśakya tā kadācid asaṃpattyā kārpaṇyena vā saṃbhāvyate
tat etat ubhayam api na asti iti uktam tasya udāra bhuja ūṣmaṇaḥ nava sitāḥ nārāca saṃpattayaḥ iti
yathā ca

original: katamaḥ pravijṛmbhitavirahavyathaḥ śanyatāṃ nīto deśaḥ // VjivC_1.94 //
analyzed: katamaḥ pravijṛmbhita viraha vyathaḥ śanya tām nītaḥ deśaḥ
iti

original: yathā ca kāni ca puṇyabhāñji bhajantyabhikhyāmakṣarāṇi // VjivC_1.95 //
analyzed: yathā ca kāni ca puṇya bhāñji bhajanti abhikhyām akṣarāṇi
iti
atra kasmāt āgatāḥ stha
kim ca asya nāma iti alaṅkāryam aprasuta praśaṃsā lakṣaṇa alaṅkāra chāyā ācchurita tvena etadīya śobhā antargata tvena sahṛdaya hṛdaya āhlāda kāri tām prāpitam
etat ca vyāja stuti paryāya ukta prabhṛtīnām bhūyasā vibhāvyate

original: nanu ca rūpakādīnāṃ svalakṣaṇāvasara eva svarūpaṃ nirṇeṣyate tat kiṃ prayojanameteṣāmihodāharaṇasya ?
analyzed: nanu ca rūpaka ādīnām sva lakṣaṇa avasare eva svarūpam nirṇeṣyate tat kim prayojanam eteṣām iha udāharaṇasya
satyam etat

original: kintvetadeva vicitrasya vaicitryaṃ nāma yadalaukikacchāyātiśayayogitvena bhūṣaṇopanibandhaḥ kāmapi vākyavakratāmunmīlayati /
analyzed: kintu etat eva vicitrasya vaicitryam nāma yat alaukika chāyā atiśaya yogi tvena bhūṣaṇa upanibandhaḥ kām api vākya vakra tām unmīlayati
vicitram eva rūpa antareṇa lakṣaṇayati yat api ityādi

original: yadapi vastu vācyamanūtanollekhamanabhinavatvenollikhitaṃ tadapi yatra yasminnalaṃ kāmapi kāṣṭhāṃ nīyate lokottarātiśayakoṭimadhiroṣyate /
analyzed: yat api vastu vācyam anūtana ullekham anabhinava tvena ullikhitam tat api yatra yasmin alam kām api kāṣṭhām nīyate lokottara atiśaya koṭim adhiroṣyate
katham ukti vaicitrya mātreṇa
bhaṇiti vaidagdhyena eva iti arthaḥ
yathā

original: aṇṇaṃ laḍahattaṇaaṃ aṇṇa ccia kāvi vattaṇacchāā /
analyzed: aṇṇam ccia kā vi

original: sāmā sāmaṇṇāpaāvaiṇo reha ccia ṇa hoi // VjivC_1.96 //
analyzed: sāmā ccia ṇa hoi
anyat laṭabha tvam anyā eva ca kā api vartana chāyā

original: śyāmā sāmānyaprajāpate rekhaiva ca na bhavati //
analyzed: śyāmā sāmānya prajāpate rekhā eva ca na bhavati
iti chāyā

original: yathā vā uddeśo 'yaṃ saṃrasaviṭapi śreṇiśobhātiśāyī kuñjotkarṣāṅkuritahariṇīvibhramo narmadāyāḥ /
analyzed: yathā vā uddeśaḥ yam saṃrasa viṭapi śreṇi śobhā atiśāyī kuñja utkarṣa aṅkurita hariṇī vibhramaḥ narmadāyāḥ

original: kiṃ caitasmin suratasuhṛdastanvi te vānti vātā yeṣāmagre sarati kalitākāṇḍakopo manobhūḥ // VjivC_1.97 //
analyzed: kim ca etasmin surata suhṛdaḥ tanvi te vānti vātāḥ yeṣām agre sarati kalita akāṇḍa kopaḥ manobhūḥ
bhaṇiti vaicitrya mātram eva atra kāvya arthaḥ
na tu nūtana ullekha śāli vācya vijṛmbhitam
etat ca bhaṇiti vaicitryam sahastra prakāram saṃbhavati iti svayam eva utprekṣaṇīyam
punar vicitram eva prakāra antareṇa lakṣayati yatra anyathā ityādi

original: yatra yasminnanyathābhavadanyena prakāreṇa sat sarvameva padārthajātam anyathaiva prakārāntareṇaiva bhāvyate /
analyzed: yatra yasmin anyathā bhavat anyena prakāreṇa sat sarvam eva padārtha jātam anyathā eva prakāra antareṇa eva bhāvyate
katham yathāruci
sva pratibhāsa anurūpeṇa utpādyate
kena pratibhā ullekha mahattvena mahā kaveḥ
pratibhāsa unmeṣa atiśaya tvena sat kaveḥ

original: yatkila varṇyamānasya vastunaḥ prastāvamucitaṃ kimapi sahṛdayahṛdayahāri rūpāntaraṃ nirmimīte kaviḥ /
analyzed: yat kila varṇyamānasya vastunaḥ prastāva mucitam kim api sahṛdaya hṛdaya hāri rūpa antaram nirmimīte kaviḥ
yathā

original: tāpaḥ svātmani saṃśritadrumalatāśoṣo 'dhyavagairvarjanaṃ sakhyaṃ duḥśamayā tṛṣā tava maro ko 'sāvanartho na yaḥ /
analyzed: tāpaḥ sva ātmani saṃśrita druma latā śoṣaḥ dhī avagaiḥ varjanam sakhyam duḥśamayā tṛṣā tava saḥ anarthaḥ na yaḥ

original: ekor'thastu mahānayaṃ jalalavasvāmyasmayodgarjinaḥ saṃnahyanti na yattavopakṛtaye dhārādharāḥ prākṛtāḥ // VjivC_1.98 //
analyzed: eka orthaḥ tu mahān ayam jala lava svāmi asmaya udgarjinaḥ saṃnahyanti na yat tava upakṛtaye dhārādharāḥ prākṛtāḥ
yathā vā

original: viśati yadi no kañcitkālaṃ kilāmbunidhaṃ vidheḥ kṛtiṣu sakalāsveko loke prakāśakatāṃ gataḥ /
analyzed: viśati yadi no kañcid kālam kila ambunidham vidheḥ kṛtiṣu sakalāsu ekaḥ loke prakāśaka tām gataḥ

original: kathamitarathā dhāmnāṃ dhātā tamāṃsi niśākaraṃ sphuradidamiyattārācakraṃ prakāśayati sphuṭam // VjivC_1.99 //
