analyzed: katham itarathā dhāmnām dhātā tamāṃsi niśākaram sphurat idam iyat tārā cakram prakāśayati sphuṭam
atra jagat garhitasya api maroḥ kavi pratibhā ullikhitena lokottara audārya dhura adhiropaṇena
tādṛś sva rūpa antaram unmīlitam yat pratīyamāna tvena udāra caritasya kasya api satsu api ucita parispanda sundareṣu
padārtha sahastreṣu tat eva vyapadeśa pātra tām arhati iti tātparyam
avayava arthaḥ tu duḥśamayet tṛṣ viśeṣaṇena pratīyamānasya trailokya rājyena api aparitoṣaḥ paryavasyati
adhvagaiḥ varjanam iti audārye tasya samucita saṃvibhāga asaṃbhavāt arthibhiḥ lajjamānaiḥ api svayam eva anabhisaraṇam pratīyate

original: saṃśritadrumalatāśoṣa iti tadāśritānāṃ tathāvidhe 'pi saṅkaṭe tadekaniṣṭhatāpratipattiḥ /
analyzed: saṃśrita druma latā śoṣaḥ iti tad āśritānām tathāvidhe saṅkaṭe tad eka niṣṭha tā pratipattiḥ

original: tasya ca pūrvoktasvaparikaraparipo ṣākṣamatayā tāpaḥ svātmani na bhogalavalaulyeneti pratipādyate /
analyzed: tasya ca pūrva ukta sva parikara paripo ṣa akṣama tayā tāpaḥ sva ātmani na bhoga lava laulyena iti pratipādyate
uttara ardhena tādṛśe durvilasite pi para upakāra aviṣaya tvena ślāghā āspada tvam unmīlitam
aparatra api vidhi vihita samucita samaya saṃbhavam salilanidhi nimajjanam nija udaya nyakkṛta nikhila sva para pakṣaḥ
prajāpati praṇīta sakala padārtha prakāśana vrata abhyupagama nirvahaṇāya vivasvāna svayam eva
samācarati iti anyathā kadācid api śaśāṅkatamaḥ tārā prabhṛtī nām abhivyaktiḥ manāk api na

original: saṃbhavatīti kavinā nūtanatvena yadullikhitaṃ tadatīva pratīyamānamahattvavyaktiparatvena
analyzed: saṃbhavati iti kavinā nūtana tvena yat ullikhitam tat atīva pratīyamāna mahat tva vyakti para tvena
camatkāri tām āpadyate
vicitram eva prakāra antareṇa unmīla yāta pratīyamāna tā ityādi

original: yatra yasmin pratīyamānatā gamyamānatā vākyārthasya mukhyatayā vivakṣitasya vastunaḥ kasyacidanākhyeyasya nibadhyate /
analyzed: yatra yasmin pratīyamāna tā gamyamāna tā vākya arthasya mukhya tayā vivakṣitasya vastunaḥ kasyacid anākhyeyasya nibadhyate
kayā yuktyā a vācya vācaka vṛttibhyām śabda artha śaktibhyām
vyatiriktasya tad atirikta vṛtteḥ anyasya vyaṅgya bhūtasya abhivyaktiḥ kriyate
vṛtti śabdaḥ tra śabda arthayoḥ tad prakāśana sāmarthyam abhidhatte
eṣa ca pratīyamāna vyavahāraḥ vākya vakra tā vyākhyā avasare sutarām samunmīlyate
anantara uktam udāharaṇa dvayam atra yojanīyam
yathā vā

original: vaktrendorna haranti bāṣpapayasāṃ dhārā manojñāṃ śriyaṃ niśvāsā na kadarthayanti madhurāṃ bimbādharasya dyatim /
analyzed: vaktra indoḥ na haranti bāṣpa payasām dhārāḥ manojñām śriyam niśvāsāḥ na kadarthayanti madhurām bimba adharasya dyatim

original: tasyāstvadvirahe vipakvalavalīlāvaṇyasaṃvādinī chāyā kāpi kapolayoranudinaṃ tanvyāḥ paraṃ puṣyati // VjivC_1.100 //
analyzed: tasyāḥ tvad virahe vipakva lavalī lāvaṇya saṃvādinī chāyā kā api kapolayoḥ anudinam tanvyāḥ param puṣyati
atra tvad viraha vaidhurya saṃvaraṇa kadarthanām anubhavantyāḥ tasyāḥ tathāvi dhe mahati guru saṅkaṭe vartamānāyāḥ kim bahunā
pi na saṃbhavati iti

original: kevalaṃ pariṇatalavalīlāvaṇyasaṃvādasubhagā kāpi kapolayoḥ kāntiraśakyasaṃvaraṇā pratidinaṃ paraṃ paripoṣamāsādayatīti vācyavyatiriktavṛtti  #
analyzed: kevalam pariṇata lavalī lāvaṇya saṃvāda subhagā kā api kapolayoḥ kāntiḥ aśakya saṃvaraṇā pratidinam param paripoṣam āsādayati iti vācya vyatirikta vṛtti
dūtī ukti tātparyam pratīyate
ukta prakāra kāntimat tva kathanam ca kānta kautuka utkalikā kāraṇatām pratipadyate
vicitram eva rūpa antareṇa pratipādayati svabhāvaḥ ityādi

original: yatra yasmin bhāvānāṃ svabhāvaḥ parispandaḥ sarasākūto rasanirbharābhiprāyaḥ padārthānāṃ nibadhyate niveśyate /
analyzed: yatra yasmin bhāvānām svabhāvaḥ parispandaḥ sa rasa ākūtaḥ rasa nirbhara abhiprāyaḥ padārthānām nibadhyate niveśyate
kīdṛśaḥ kena api kamanīyena vaicitryeṇa upabṛṃhitaḥ
lokottareṇa hṛdaya hāriṇā vaidagdhyena uttejitaḥ
bhāva śabdena atra sarva padārthaḥ bhidhīyate
na rati ādiḥ eva
udāharaṇam

original: krīḍāsu bālakusumāyudhasaṃgatāyā yattat smitaṃ na khalu tat smitamātrameva /
analyzed: krīḍāsu bāla kusumāyudha saṃgatāyāḥ yat tat smitam na khalu tat smita mātram eva

original: ālokyate smitapaṭāntaritaṃ mṛgākṣyās tasyāḥ parisphuradivāparameva kiñcit // VjivC_1.101 //
analyzed: ālokyate smita paṭa antaritam mṛga akṣyāḥ tasyāḥ parisphurat iva aparam eva kiñcid

original: atra na khalu tat smitamātrameveti prathamārdhe 'bhilāṣasubhagaṃ sarasābhiprāyatvamuktam /
analyzed: atra na khalu tat smita mātram evā iti prathama ardhe bhilāṣa subhagam sarasa abhiprāya tvam uktam

original: aparārdhe tu---hasitāṃśukatirohitamanyadeva kimapi parisphuradālokyata iti kamanīyavaicitryavicchittiḥ /
analyzed: apara ardhe tu hasita aṃśuka tirohitam anyat eva kim api parisphurat ālokyate iti kamanīya vaicitrya vicchittiḥ
idānīm vicitram eva upasaṃharati vicitraḥ yatra ityādi

original: evaṃvidho vicitro mārgo yatra yasmin vakroktivaicitryam alaṅkāravicitrabhāvo jīvitāyate jīvatavadācarati /
analyzed: evaṃvidhaḥ vicitraḥ mārgaḥ yatra yasmin vakrokti vaicitryam alaṅkāra vicitra bhāvaḥ jīvitāyate jīvata vat ācarati
vaicitryāt eva vicitre vicitra śabdaḥ pravartate
tasmāt tat eva tasya jīvitam

original: kiṃ tadvaicitryaṃ nāmetyāha---parisphurati yasyāntaḥ sā kāpyatiśayābhidhā /
analyzed: kim tat vaicitryam nāma iti āha parisphurati yasya antar sā kā api atiśaya abhidhā

original: yasyāntaḥ svarūpānupraveśena sā kāpyalaukikātiśayoktiḥ parisphurati bhrājate /
analyzed: yasya antar sva rūpa anupraveśena sā kā api alaukikā atiśayoktiḥ parisphurati bhrājate
yathā

original: yatsenārajasāmudañcati yade dvābhyāṃ davīyo 'ntarān pāṇibhyāṃ yugapadvilocanapuṭānaṣṭākṣamo rakṣitum /
analyzed: yat senā rajasām udañcati yade dvābhyām davīyaḥ ntarān pāṇibhyām yugapad vilocana puṭān aṣṭa akṣamaḥ rakṣitum

original: ekaikaṃ dalamunnamayya gamayan vāsāmbujaṃ kośatāṃ dhātā saṃvaraṇākulaściramabhūtsvādhyāyavandhyānanaḥ // VjivC_1.102 //
analyzed: ekaikam dalam unnamayya gamayan vāsa ambujam kośa tām dhātā saṃvaraṇa ākulaḥ ciram abhūt svādhyāya vandhya ānanaḥ
evam vaicitryam saṃbhāvanā anumāna pravṛttāyāḥ pratīyamāna tvam utprekṣāyāḥ
tat ca dhārā adhiroharaṇa ramaṇīya tayā atiśayokti parispanda syandi saṃdṛśyate

original: tadevaṃ vaicitryaṃ vyākhyāya tasyaiva guṇān vyācaṣṭe---
analyzed: tat evam vaicitryam vyākhyāya tasya eva guṇān vyācaṣṭe
vaidagdhya syandi mādhuryam padānām atra badhyate
yāti yatta yakta śaithilyam bandha bandhura tā aṅga tām

original: atrāsmin mādhuryaṃ vaidagdhyasyāndi vaicitryasamarpakaṃ padānāṃ badhyate vākyaikadeśānāṃ niveśyate /
analyzed: atrā asmin mādhuryam vaidagdhyasya āndi vaicitrya samarpakam padānām badhyate vākya ekadeśānām niveśyate
yat tyakta śaithilyam ujjhita komala bhāvam bhavat vandha bandhura tā aṅga tām yāti saṃniveśa saundarya upakaraṇa tām gacchati
yathā
kim tāruṇya taroḥ iti atra pūrva ardhe
evam mādhuryam abhidhāya prasādam abhidhatte

original: kiñcidojaḥ spṛśan prāyaḥ prasādo 'pyatra dṛśyate // Vjiv_1.45 //
analyzed: kiñcid ojaḥ spṛśan prāyas prasādaḥ u pi atra dṛśyate

original: asamastānāṃ samāsarahitānāṃ padānāṃ nyāso nibandhaḥ kavivartmani vipaścinmārgeyaḥ
analyzed: asamastānām samāsa rahitānām padānām nyāsaḥ nibandhaḥ kavi vartmani vipaścit mārgeyaḥ

original: prasiddhaḥ prakhyātaḥ so 'pyasmin vicitrākhye prasādābhidhāno guṇaḥ kiñcit kiyanmātramojaḥ
analyzed: prasiddhaḥ prakhyātaḥ saḥ pi asmin vicitra ākhye prasāda abhidhānaḥ guṇaḥ kiñcid kiyanmātram ojaḥ

original: spṛśannuttānatayā vyavasthitaḥ prāyo dṛśyate prācuryeṇa lakṣyate /
analyzed: spṛśan uttāna tayā vyavasthitaḥ prāyas dṛśyate prācuryeṇa lakṣyate
bandha saundarya nibandhana tvāt
tathāvidhasya ojasaḥ samāsavatī vṛttiḥ ojaḥ śabdena cirantanaiḥ ucyate

original: tadayamatra paramārthaḥ---pūrvasmin prasādalakṣaṇe satyojaḥ saṃsparśamātramiha vidhīyate /
analyzed: tat ayam atra parama arthaḥ pūrvasmin prasāda lakṣaṇe sati ojaḥ saṃsparśa mātram iha vidhīyate
yathā
apāṅga gata tārakāḥ stimita pakṣma pālībhṛtaḥ sphurat subhaga kāntayaḥ smita samudgati dyotitāḥ

original: atrāsmin vicitre yadvākyaṃ padasamudāyastasmin gamakāni samarpakāṇyanyāni vākyāntarāpi nibadhyante niveśyante /
analyzed: atra asmin vicitre yat vākyam pada samudāyaḥ tasmin gamakāni samarpakāṇi anyāni vākya antarā api nibadhyante niveśyante

atha prasādam abhidhāya lāvaṇyam lakṣayati
atra alupta visarga antaiḥ padaiḥ protaiḥ parasparam

kīdṛśaiḥ parasparam anyonyam protaiḥ saṃśleṣam nītaiḥ
anyat ca kīdṛśaiḥ a lupta visarga antaiḥ

original: aluptavisargāḥ śrūyamāṇavisarjanīyā antā yeṣāṃ tāni tathoktāni taiḥ /
analyzed: a lupta visargāḥ śrūyamāṇa visarjanīyāḥ antāḥ yeṣām tāni tathā uktāni taiḥ

yathā

original: śvāsotkampataraṅgiṇi stanataṭe dhautāñjanaśyāmalāḥ kīryante kaṇaśaḥ kṛśāṅgi kimamī bāṣpāmbhasāṃ bindavaḥ /
analyzed: śvāsa utkampa taraṅgiṇi stana taṭe dhauta añjana śyāmalāḥ kīryante kaṇaśas kṛśa aṅgi kim amī bāṣpa ambhasām bindavaḥ

original: kiñcākuñcitakaṇṭharodhakuṭilāḥ karṇāmṛtasyandino hūṅkārāḥ kalapañcamapraṇayinastrucyantiniryānti ca // VjivC_1.106 //
analyzed: kiñca ākuñcita kaṇṭha rodha kuṭilāḥ karṇa amṛta syandinaḥ hūṅkārāḥ kala pañcama praṇayinaḥ trucyanti niryānti ca
yathā vā
etat manda vipakva tinduka phala śyāma udara āpāṇḍura prāntam hanta pulanda sundara kara sparśa kṣamam lakṣyate

original: tat pallīpatiputri kuñjarakulaṃ kumbhābhayābhyarthanā- dīnaṃ tvāmanunāthate kucayugaṃ patrāṃśukairmā pidhāḥ // VjivC_1.107 //
analyzed: tat pallī pati putri kuñjara kulam kumbha abhaya abhyarthanā dīnam tvām anunāthate kuca yugam patra aṃśukaiḥ mā pidhāḥ
yathā vā
haṃsānām ninadeṣu iti
evam lāvaṇyam abhidhāya ābhijātyam abhidhīyate
yat na ati komala chāyam na ati kāṭhinyam udvahat
ābhijātyam manohāri tat atra prauḍhi nirmitam
atra asmin tat ābhijātyam yat na ati komala chāyam na atyanta masṛṇa kānti na ati kāṭhinyam udvahat na ati kaṭhora tām

original: dhārayat tat prauḍhinirmitaṃ sakalakavikauśalasaṃpāditaṃ sanmanohāri hṛdayarañjakaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: dhārayat tat prauḍhi nirmitam sakala kavi kauśala saṃpāditam sat manohāri hṛdaya rañjakam bhavati iti arthaḥ
yathā
adhi kara tala talpam kalpita svāpa līlā parimalana nimīlat pāṇḍimā gaṇḍa pālī

original: sutanu kathaya kasya vyañjayatyañjasaiva smaranarapatikelīyauvarājyābhiṣekam // VjivC_1.109 //
analyzed: su tanu kathaya kasya vyañjayati añjasā eva smara narapati kelī yauvarājya abhiṣekam

original: evaṃ sukumāravihitānāmeva guṇānāṃ vicitre kaścidatiśayaḥ saṃpādyata iti boddhavyam /
analyzed: evam sukumāra vihitānām eva guṇānām vicitre kaścid atiśayaḥ saṃpādyate iti boddhavyam
ābhijātya prabhṛtayaḥ pūrva mārga uditāḥ guṇāḥ
atra atiśayam āyānti janita āhārya saṃpadaḥ
iti antara ślokaḥ
evam vicitram abhidhāya madhyamam upakramate

original: vaicitryaṃ saukumāryaṃ ca yatra saṃkīrṇatāṃ gate /
analyzed: vaicitryam saukumāryam ca yatra saṃkīrṇa tām gate
bhrājete sahaja āhārya śobhā atiśaya śālinī
mādhurya ādi guṇa grāmaḥ vṛttim āśritya madhyamām
yatra kām api puṣṇāti bandha chāyā atirikta tām
sau madhyamaḥ nāma nānā ruci manoharaḥ
spardhayā yatra vartante mārga dvitaya saṃpadaḥ
mārgaḥ sau madhyamaḥ nāma madhyama abhidhānaḥ sau panthāḥ
kīdṛśaḥ nānā ruci manoharaḥ

original: nānāvidhā rucayaḥ pratibhāsā yeṣāṃ te tathoktāsteṣāṃ sukumāravicitramadhyamavyasanināṃ sarveṣāmeva manoharo hṛdayahārī /
analyzed: nānāvidhāḥ rucayaḥ pratibhāsāḥ yeṣām te tathā uktāḥ teṣām sukumāra vicitra madhyama vyasaninām sarveṣām eva manoharaḥ hṛdaya hārī

original: yasmin spardhayā mārgadvitayasaṃpadaḥ sukumāravicitraśobhāḥ sāmyena vartante vyavatiṣṭhante,
analyzed: yasmin spardhayā mārga dvitaya saṃpadaḥ sukumāra vicitra śobhāḥ sāmyena vartante vyavatiṣṭhante
na nyūna atirikta tvena

original: yatra vaicitryaṃ vicitratvaṃ saukumāryaṃ sukumāratvaṃ saṃkīrṇatāṃ gate tasmin miśratāṃ prāpte satī bhrājete śobhete /
analyzed: yatra vaicitryam vicitra tvam saukumāryam sukumāra tvam saṃkīrṇa tām gate tasmin miśra tām prāpte satī bhrājete śobhete
kīdṛśe sahaja āhārya śobhā atiśaya śālinī

original: śaktivyutpattisaṃbhavo yaḥ śobhātiśayaḥ kāntyutkarṣastena śālete ślāghet ye te tathokte /
analyzed: śakti vyutpatti saṃbhavaḥ yaḥ śobhā atiśayaḥ kānti utkarṣaḥ tena ślāghet ye te tathā ukte
mādhurya ityādi
yatra ca mādhurya ādi guṇa grāmaḥ mādhurya prabhṛti guṇa samūhaḥ madhyamām ubhaya chāyā ācchuritām
vṛttim sva spanda gatim āśritya kām api apūrvām bandha chāyā atirikta tām saṃniveśa kānti adhika tām
puṣṇāti puṣyati iti arthaḥ
guṇāḥ nām udāharaṇāni
tatra mādhuryasya yathā
velā anilaiḥ mṛdubhiḥ ākulita alaka antāḥ gāyanti yasya caritāni aparānta kāntāḥ

original: līlānatāḥ samavalambya latāstarūṇāṃ hintālamāliṣu taṭeṣu mahārṇavasya // VjivC_1.111 //
analyzed: līlā natāḥ samavalambya latāḥ tarūṇām hintāla māliṣu taṭeṣu mahā arṇavasya
prasādasya yathā tad vaktra indu vilokanena ityādi
lāvaṇyasya yathā
saṃkrānta aṅguli parva sūcita kara svāpā kapola sthalī netre nirbhara mukta bāṣpa kaluṣe niśvāsa tāntaḥ dharaḥ

original: baddhodbhedavisaṃṣṭhulālakalatā nirvedaśūnyaṃ manaḥ kaṣṭaṃ durnayavedibhiḥ kusacivairvatsā dṛḍhaṃ khedyate // VjivC_1.113 //
analyzed: baddha udbheda visaṃṣṭhu lālaka latā nirveda śūnyam manaḥ kaṣṭam durnaya vedibhiḥ ku sacivaiḥ vatsā dṛḍham khedyate
ābhijātyasya yathā

original: ālambya lambāḥ sarasāgravallīḥ pibanti yatra stanabhāranamrāḥ /
analyzed: ālambya lambāḥ sarasa agra vallīḥ pibanti yatra stana bhāra namrāḥ
strotaḥ cyutam śīkara kūṇita akṣyaḥ mandākinī nirjharam aśva mukhyaḥ
atra arocakinaḥ kecid chāyā vaicitrya rañjake
vidagdha nepathya vidhau bhujaṅgāḥ iva sādarāḥ
evam madhyamam vyākhyāya tam eva upasaṃharati atra iti

original: atraitasmin kecit katipaye sādarāstadāśrayeṇa kāvyāni kurvanti /
analyzed: atra etasmin kecid katipaye sādarāḥ tad āśrayeṇa kāvyāni kurvanti
yasmāt arocakinaḥ kamanīya vastu vyasaninaḥ
kīdṛśe ca asmin chāyā vaicitrya rañjake kānti vicitra bhāva āhlādake
katham vidagdha nepathya vidhau bhujaṅgāḥ iva
agrāmya akalpa kalpane nāgarāḥ yathā
saḥ pi chāyā vaicitrya rañjakaḥ eva
atra guṇa udāharaṇāni parimita tvāt pradarśitāni
pratipadam punar chāyā vaicitryam sahṛdayaiḥ svayam eva anusartavyam
anusaraṇa diś pradarśanam punar kriyate
yathā mātṛgupta māyu rājamañjīra prabhṛtīnām saukumārya vaicitrya saṃvalita parispanda syandīni kāvyāni saṃbhavanti
tatra madhyama mārga saṃvalitam svarūpam vicāraṇīyam
evam sahaja saukumārya subhagāni kālidāsa sarva senā ādīnām kāvyāni dṛśyante
tatra sukumāra mārga svarūpam carcanīyam

original: tathaiva ca vicitravakratvavijṛmbhitaṃ harṣacarite prācuryeṇa bhaṭṭabāṇasya vibhāvyate,
analyzed: tathā eva ca vicitra vakra tva vijṛmbhitam harṣa carite prācuryeṇa bhaṭṭabāṇasya vibhāvyate
bhavabhūti rājaśekhara viraciteṣu bandha saundarya subhaga iṣu muktakeṣu paridṛśyate
tasmāt sahṛdayaiḥ sarvatra sarvam anusartavyam
evam mārga tritaya lakṣaṇam diś mātram eva pradarśitam

original: na punaḥ sākalyena satkavikauśalaprākārāṇāṃ kenacidapi svarūpamabhidhātuṃ pāryate /
analyzed: na punar sākalyena sat kavi kauśala prākārāṇām kenacid api svarūpam abhidhātum pāryate
mārgeṣu guṇānām samudāya dharma tā

original: yathā na kevalaṃ śabdādidharmatvaṃ tathā tallakṣaṇavyākhyāvasara eva pratipāditam /
analyzed: yathā na kevalam śabda ādi dharma tvam tathā tad lakṣaṇa vyākhyā avasare eva pratipāditam

original: evaṃ pratyekaṃ pratiniyataguṇagrāmaramaṇīyaṃ mārgatritayaṃ vyākhyāya sādhāraṇaguṇasvarūpavyākhyānārthamāha---
analyzed: evam pratyekam pratiniyata guṇa grāma ramaṇīyam mārga tritayam vyākhyāya sādhāraṇa guṇa svarūpa vyākhyāna artham āha
āñjasena svabhāvasya mahat tvam yena poṣyate
prakāreṇa tad aucityam ucita ākhyāna jīvitam
tad aucityam nāma guṇaḥ

original: kīdṛk---āñjasena suspaṣṭena svabhāvasya padārthasya mahattvamutkarṣo yena poṣyate paripoṣaṃ prāpyate /
analyzed: kīdṛka añjasena su spaṣṭena svabhāvasya padārthasya mahattvam utkarṣaḥ yena poṣyate paripoṣam prāpyate
prakāreṇa iti prastuta tvāt abhidhā vaicitryam atra prakāra śabdena ucyate
kīdṛśam ucita ākhyānam udāra abhidhānam jīvitam parama arthaḥ yasya tat tathā uktam
etad ānuguṇyena eva vibhūṣaṇa vinyāsaḥ vicchattim āvahati
yathā
kara tala kalita akṣamālayoḥ samudita sādhvasa sanna hastayoḥ
kṛta rucira jaṭā niveśayoḥ iva īśvarayoḥ samāgamaḥ
yathā vā
upagiri puruhūtasya eṣa senā niveśaḥ taṭam aparam itas dreḥ tvad valāni āvasantu

original: dhruvamiha kariṇaste durdharāḥ saṃnikarṣe suragajamadalekhāsaurabhaṃ na kṣamante // VjivC_1.116 //
analyzed: dhruvam iha kariṇaḥ te durdharāḥ saṃnikarṣe sura gaja mada lekhā saurabham na kṣamante
yathā ca

original: he nāgarāja bahudhāsya nitambabhāgaṃ bhogena gāḍhamabhiveṣṭaya mandarādreḥ /
analyzed: he nāga rāja bahudhā asya nitamba bhāgam bhogena gāḍham abhiveṣṭaya mandara adreḥ
soḍhā aviṣahya vṛṣavāhana yoga līlā paryaṅka bandhana vidheḥ tava kaḥ ti bhāraḥ
atra pūrvatra udāharaṇayoḥ bhūṣaṇa guṇena eva tad guṇa paripoṣaḥ
itaratra ca svabhāva audārya abhidhānena
aucityasya eva chāyā antareṇa svarūpam unmīlayati
yatra vaktuḥ pramātuḥ vā vācyam śobhā atiśāyinā
ācchādyate svabhāvena tat api aucityam ucyate

original: yatra yasmin vakturabhidhātuḥ pramāturanubhaviturvā svabāvena svaparispandena vcyamabhidheyaṃ
analyzed: yatra yasmin vaktuḥ abhidhātuḥ pramātuḥ anubhavituḥ vā svabāvena sva parispandena vcyam abhidheyam

original: vastu śobhātiśāyinā rāmaṇīyakamanohareṇa ācchādyate saṃvriyate tadapyaucityamevocyate /
analyzed: vastu śobhā atiśāyinā rāmaṇīyaka manohareṇa ācchādyate saṃvriyate tat api aucityam eva ucyate
yathā
śarīra mātreṇa narendra tiṣṭhan ābhāsi tīrtha pratipādita ṛddhiḥ
āraṇyaka upātta phala prasūtiḥ stambena nīvāraḥ iva avaśiṣṭaḥ
atra ślāghya tayā tathāvidha mahā rāja parispande varṇyamāne muninā sva anubhava siddha vyavahāra anusāreṇa alaṅkaraṇa yojanam aucitya paripoṣam āvahati

original: atra vaktuḥ svabhāvena ca vācyaparispandaḥ saṃvṛtaprāyo lakṣyate /
analyzed: atra vaktuḥ svabhāvena ca vācya parispandaḥ saṃvṛta prāyaḥ lakṣyate
pramātuḥ yathā
nipīyamāna stabakā śilīmukhaiḥ aśoka yaṣṭiḥ cala bāla pallavā
viḍambayantī dadṛśe vadhū janaiḥ amanda daṣṭa oṣṭha kara avadhūnanam
atra vadhū janaiḥ nija anubhava vāsanā anusāreṇa tathāvidha śobhā abhirāma tā anubhūtiḥ aucitya m āvahati
yathā vā

original: vāpītaḍe kuḍuṅgā piasahi hnāuṃ gaehiṃ dīsaṃti /
analyzed: vāpī taḍe kuḍuṅgā piasahi gaehim dīsaṃti

original: ṇa dharanti kareṇa bhaṇanti ṇa tti valiuṃ puṇa ṇar deti // VjivC_1.120 //
analyzed: ṇa dharanti kareṇa bhaṇanti na tti valium puṇa
vāpī taṭe nikuñjāḥ snātum gataiḥ daśyante

original: na dharanti kareṇa bhajanti na kimapi valituṃ punarna dadati //
analyzed: na dharanti kareṇa bhajanti na kim api valitum punar na dadati
iti chāyā
atra kasyāścid pramātṛ bhūtāyāḥ sa atiśaya maugdhya parispanda sundareṇa svabhāvena vācyam ācchāditam aucitya paripoṣam āvahati
evam aucityam abhidhāya saubhāgyam abhidhatte
iti upādeya varge smin yad artham pratibhā kaveḥ

original: samyak saṃrabhate tasya guṇaḥ saubhāgyamucyate // Vjiv_1.55 //
analyzed: samyak saṃrabhate tasya guṇaḥ saubhāgyam ucyate

original: ityevaṃvidhe 'sminnupādeyavarge śabdādyupeyasamūhe yadarthaṃ yannimittaṃ kaveḥ saṃbandhinī
analyzed: iti evaṃvidhe smin upādeya varge śabda ādi upeya samūhe yad artham yad nimittam kaveḥ saṃbandhinī

original: pratibhā śaktiḥ samyak sāvadhānatayā saṃrabhate vyavasyati tasya vastunaḥ prastutatvāt
analyzed: pratibhā śaktiḥ samyak sāvadhāna tayā saṃrabhate vyavasyati tasya vastunaḥ prastuta tvāt

original: kāvyābhidhānasya yo guṇaḥ sa saubhāgyamityucyate bhaṇyate //
analyzed: kāvya abhidhānasya yaḥ guṇaḥ sa saubhāgyam iti ucyate bhaṇyate
tat ca na pratibhā saṃrambha mātra sādhyam
kintu tad vihita samasta sāmagrī saṃpādyam iti āha

original: sarvasaṃpatparispandasaṃpādyaṃ sarvasyopādeyarāśeryā saṃpattiranavadyatākāṣṭhā tasyāḥ parispandaḥ sphuritatvaṃ tena saṃpādyaṃ niṣpādanīyam
analyzed: sarva saṃpad parispanda saṃpādyam sarvasya upādeya rāśeḥ yā saṃpattiḥ anavadya tā kāṣṭhā tasyāḥ parispandaḥ sphurita tvam tena saṃpādyam niṣpādanīyam
anyat ca kīdṛśam sarasa ātmanām ārdra cetasām alaukika camatkāra kāri lokottara āhlāda vidhāyi

original: kiṃ bahunā, tacca kāvyaikajīvitaṃ kāvyasya paraḥ paramārtha ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: kim bahunā tat ca kāvya eka jīvitam kāvyasya paraḥ paramārthaḥ iti arthaḥ
yathā

original: dormūlāvadhisūtritastanamuraḥ snihyatkaṭākṣe daśau kiñcittāṇḍavapaṇḍite smitasudhāsiktoktiṣa bhrūlate /
analyzed: dormūla avadhi sūtrita stanam uraḥ snihyat kaṭākṣe daśau kiñcid tāṇḍava paṇḍite bhrū late

original: cetaḥ kandalitaṃ smaravyatikarairlāvyamaṅgairvṛtaṃ tanvaṅgyāstaruṇimnisarpatiśanairanyaiva kāciddyutiḥ // VjivC_1.121 //
analyzed: cetaḥ kandalitam smara vyatikaraiḥ lāvyam aṅgaiḥ vṛtam tanu aṅgyāḥ taruṇimni sarpati śanais anyā eva kācid dyutiḥ
tanvyāḥ prathamatara tāruṇye vatīrṇe
ākārasya cetasaḥ ceṣṭāyāḥ ca vaicitryam atra varṇitam
tatra sūtrita stanam uraḥ lāvaṇyam aṅgaiḥ vṛtam iti ākārasya
smara vyatikaraiḥ kandalitam iti cetasaḥ

original: snihyatkaṭākṣe dṛśāviti kiñcittāṇḍavapaṇḍite smitasudhāsiktoktiṣu bhrūlate iti ceṣṭāyāśca /
analyzed: snihyat kaṭākṣe dṛśau iti kiñcid tāṇḍava paṇḍite smita sudhā sikta uktiṣu bhrū late iti ceṣṭāyāḥ ca
sūtrita sikta tāṇḍava paṇḍita kandalitānām upacāra vakra tvam lakṣyate
snihyat iti etasya kāla viśeṣa āvedakaḥ pratyaya vakra bhāvaḥ
anyā eva kācid avarṇanīyā iti saṃvṛti vakra tā vicchittiḥ
aṅgaiḥ vṛtam iti kāraka vakra tvam
vicitra mārga viṣayaḥ lāvaṇya guṇa atirekaḥ
tat evam etasmin pratibhā saṃrambha janita sakala sāmagrī samunmīlitam sa rasa hṛdaya āhlāda kāri kim api saubhāgyam samudbhāsate
anantara uktasya guṇa dvayasya viṣayam pradarśayati
etat triṣu api mārgeṣu guṇa dvitayam ujjvalam
pada vākya prabandhānām vyāpaka tvena vartate

original: etadguṇadvaya maucityasaubhāgyābhidhānam ujjvalamatīva bhrājiṣṇu padavākyaprabandhānāṃ trayāṇāmapi vyāpakatvena vartate sakalāvayavavyāptyāvatiṣṭhate
analyzed: etat guṇa dvaya maucitya saubhāgya abhidhānam ujjvalam atīva bhrājiṣṇu pada vākya prabandhānām trayāṇām api vyāpaka tvena vartate sakala avayava vyāptyā avatiṣṭhate
kva iti āha triṣu api mārgeṣu sukumāra vicitra madhyama ākhyeṣu
tatra padasya tāvat aucityam bahuvidha bheda bhinnaḥ uvakra bhāvaḥ

original: svabhāvasyāñjasena prakāreṇa paripoṣaṇameva vakratāyāḥ paraṃ rahasyam /
analyzed: svabhāvasya añjasena prakāreṇa paripoṣaṇam eva vakra tāyāḥ param rahasyam
vākyasya api eka deśe pi aucitya virahāt tad vid āhlāda kāri tva hāniḥ
yathā

original: raghuvaṃśe puraṃ niṣādādhipatestadeta- dyasminmayā maulimaṇiṃ vihāya /
analyzed: raghu vaṃśe puram niṣāda adhipateḥ tat eta dyasmin mayā mauli maṇim vihāya

original: jaṭāsu baddhāsvarudatsumantraḥ kaikeyi kāmāḥ phalītāstaveti // VjivC_1.122 //
analyzed: jaṭāsu baddhāsu arudat sumantraḥ kaikeyi kāmāḥ phalītāḥ tava iti

original: atra raghupateranarghamahāpuruṣasaṃpadupetatvena varṇyamānasya “kaikeyi kāmāḥ phalitāstava' ityevaṃvidhatucchatarapadārthasaṃsmaraṇaṃ tadabhidhānaṃ  #
analyzed: atra raghu pateḥ anargha mahāpuruṣa saṃpad upeta tvena varṇyamānasya kaikeyi kāmāḥ phalitāḥ tava iti evaṃvidha tucchatara padārtha saṃsmaraṇam tat abhidhānam
ca atyantam anaucityam āvahati
prabandhasya api kvacid prakaraṇa eka deśe pi aucitya virahāt eka deśa dāha dūṣita dagdha paṭa prāya tā prasajyate
yathā araghu vaṃśe eva dilīpa siṃha saṃvāda avasare
athā eka dhenoḥ aparādha caṇḍāt guroḥ kṛśānu pratimāt vibheṣi

original: śakyo 'sya manyurbhavatāpi netuṃ gāḥ koṭiśaḥ sparśayatā ghaṭodhnīḥ // VjivC_1.123 //
analyzed: śakyaḥ sya manyuḥ bhavatā api netum gāḥ koṭiśas sparśayatā ghaṭa udhnīḥ
iti siṃhasya abhidhātum ucitam eva
rāja upahāsa para tvena abhaidhīyamāna tvāt

original: rājñaḥ punarasya nijayaśaḥ parirakṣaṇaparatvena tṛṇavallaghuvṛttayaḥ prāṇāḥ pratibhāsante /
analyzed: rājñaḥ punar asya nija yaśaḥ parirakṣaṇa para tvena tṛṇa vat laghu vṛttayaḥ prāṇāḥ pratibhāsante
tasya etat pūrvapakṣa uttara tvena
katham nu śakya anunayaḥ mahā ṛṣiḥ viśrāṇana adanya payasvinīnām

original: imāmanūnāṃ surabheravehi rudraujasā tu prahṛtaṃ tvayāsyām // VjivC_1.124 //
analyzed: imām anūnām surabheḥ avehi rudra ojasā tu prahṛtam tvayā asyām

original: ityanyāsāṃ gavāṃ tatprativastupradānayogyatā yadi kadācitsaṃbhavati tatastasya munermama
analyzed: iti anyāsām gavām tad prativastu pradāna yogya tā yadi kadācid saṃbhavati tatas tasya muneḥ mama
ca ubhayoḥ api etat jīvita parirakṣaṇa nairapekṣyam upapannam iti tātparya paryavasānāt atyantam anaucitya yuktā iyam uktiḥ

original: yathā ca kumārasaṃbhave trailokyākrāntipravaṇaparākramasya tārakākhyasya riporjigīṣāvasare surapatirmanmathenābhidhīyate---
analyzed: yathā ca kumārasaṃbhave trailokya ākrānti pravaṇa parākramasya tāraka ākhyasya ripoḥ jigīṣā avasare surapatiḥ manmathena abhidhīyate
kāma eka patnīm vrata duḥkha śīlām lolam manaḥ cāru tayā praviṣṭām
nitambinīm icchasi mukta lajjām kaṇṭhe svayaṅgrāha niṣakta bāhum
iti avinaya anuṣṭhāna niṣṭham triviṣṭapa ādhipatya pratiṣṭhitasya api tathāvidha abhiprāya anuvartana para tvena abhidhīyamānam anaucityam āvahati
etat ca etasya eva kaveḥ sahaja saukumārya mudrita su ukti para spanda saundaryasya paryālocyate
na punar anyeṣām āhārya mātra kāvya karaṇa kauśala ślāghinām
saubhāgyam api pada vākya prakaraṇa prabandhānām pratyekam aneka ākāra kamanīya kāraṇa kalāpa kalita rāmaṇīyakānām
kim api sahṛdaya hṛdaya saṃvedyam kāvya eka jīvitam alaukika camatkāra kāri saṃvalita aneka rasa āsvāda sundaram
sakala avayava vyāpaka tvena kāvyasya guṇa antaram parisphurati iti alam atiprasaṅgena
idānīm etat upasaṃhṛtya anyat avatārayati

original: mārgāṇāṃ tritayaṃ tadetadasakṛtprāptavyaparyutsukaiḥ kṣuṇṇaṃ kairapi yatra kāmapi bhuvaṃ prāpya prasiddhiṃ gatāḥ /
analyzed: mārgāṇām tritayam tat etat asakṛt prāptavya paryutsukaiḥ kṣuṇṇam kaiḥ api yatra kām api bhuvam prāpya prasiddhim gatāḥ

original: sarve svairavihārahāri kavayo yāsyanti yenādhunā tasmin ko 'pi sa sādhusundarapadānyāsakramaḥ kathyate // Vjiv_1.58 //
analyzed: sarve svaira vihāra hāri kavayaḥ yāsyanti yena adhunā tasmin sa sādhu sundara padānyāsa kramaḥ kathyate
mārgāṇām sukumāra ādīnām etat tritayam kaiḥ api mahā kavibhiḥ eva
na sāmānyaiḥ
prāptavya paryutsukaiḥ prāpya utkaṇṭhitaiḥ asakṛt bahu vāram abhyāsena kṣuṇṇam parigamitam

original: yatra yasmin mārgatraye kāmapi bhuvaṃ prāpya prasiddhiṃ gatāḥ lokottarāṃ bhūmimāsādya pratītiṃ prāptāḥ /
analyzed: yatra yasmin mārga traye kām api bhuvam prāpya prasiddhim gatāḥ lokottarām bhūmim āsādya pratītim prāptāḥ

original: idānīṃ sarve kavayastasminmārgatritaye yena yāsyanti gamiṣyanti svairavihārahāri
analyzed: idānīm sarve kavayaḥ tasmin mārga tritaye yena yāsyanti gamiṣyanti svaira vihāra hāri

original: svecchāviharaṇaramaṇīyaṃ sa ko 'pi alaukikaḥ sādhuśobhanaṃ kṛtvā sundarapadanyāsakramaḥ
analyzed: svecchā viharaṇa ramaṇīyam sa kaḥ pi alaukikaḥ sādhu śobhanam kṛtvā sundara padanyāsa kramaḥ

analyzed: ādiḥ ādiḥ yeṣām te tathā uktāḥ prathama madhya antāḥ tāni eva niyatāni sthānāni viśiṣṭāḥ saṃniveśāḥ taiḥ śobhate bhrājate yat tathā uktam
atra ādi ādayaḥ saṃbandhi śabdāḥ pāda ādi bhiḥ viśeṣaṇīyāḥ

original: sa tu prakāraḥ proktalakṣaṇasaṃpadupeto 'pi bhavan iha nātipratanyate granthe 'sminnātivistāryate /
analyzed: sa tu prakāraḥ prokta lakṣaṇa saṃpad upetaḥ pi bhavan iha na ati pratanyate granthe smin na ati vistāryate
kutas śobhā antara abhāvāt
sthāna niyama vyatiriktasya anyasya śobhā antarasya chāyā antarasya asaṃbhavāt iti arthaḥ
asya ca varṇa vinyāsa vaicitrya vyatirekeṇa anyat kiñcid api jīvita antaram na paridṛśyate
tena anantara ukta alaṅkṛti prakāra tā eva yuktā

original: udāharaṇānyatraśiśupālavadhe caturthe sarge samarpakāṇi kānicideva yamakāni,
analyzed: udāharaṇāni atra śiśupāla vadhe caturthe sarge samarpakāṇi kānicid eva yamakāni
raghuvaṃśe vā vasantavarṇane

original: evaṃ padāvayavānāṃ varṇānāṃ vinyāsavakrabhāve vicārite varṇasamudāyātmakasya padasya ca vakrabhāvavicāraḥ prāptāvasaraḥ /
analyzed: evam pada avayavānām varṇānām vinyāsa vakra bhāve vicārite varṇa samudāya ātmakasya padasya ca vakra bhāva vicāraḥ prāpta avasaraḥ

original: tatra padapūrvārdhasya tāvadvakratāprākārāḥ kiyantaḥ saṃbhavantīti prakramate---
analyzed: tatra pada pūrva ardhasya tāvat vakra tā prākārāḥ kiyantaḥ saṃbhavanti iti prakramate
yatra rūḍheḥ asaṃbhāvya dharma adhyāropa garbha tā
saddharma atiśaya āropa garbha tvam vā pratīyate
vācyasya sā ucyate kā api rūḍhi vaicitrya vakra tā
yatra rūḍheḥ asaṃbhāvya dharma adhyāropa garbha tā pratīyate
śabdasya niyata vṛtti tā nāma dharmaḥ rūḍhiḥ ucyate
rohaṇam rūḍhiḥ iti kṛtvā

original: sā ca dviprakārā saṃbhavati--niyatasāmānyavṛttitā niyataviśeṣavṛttitā ca /
analyzed: sā ca dvi prakārā saṃbhavati niyata sāmānya vṛtti tā niyata viśeṣa vṛtti tā ca
tena rūḍhi śabdena atra rūḍhi pradhānaḥ śabdaḥ abhidhīyate
dharma dharmiṇoḥ abheda upacāra darśanāt

original: yatra yasmin viṣaye rūḍhiśabdasya asaṃbhāvyaḥ saṃbhāvayitumaśakyo yo dharmaḥ kaścitparispandastasyādhyāropaḥ
analyzed: yatra yasmin viṣaye rūḍhi śabdasya asaṃbhāvyaḥ saṃbhāvayitum aśakyaḥ yaḥ dharmaḥ kaścid parispandaḥ tasya adhyāropaḥ

original: samarpaṇaṃ garbho 'bhiprāyo yasya sa tathoktastasya bhāvastattā sā pratīyate pratipādyate /
analyzed: samarpaṇam garbhaḥ bhiprāyaḥ yasya sa tathā uktaḥ tasya bhāvaḥ tattā sā pratīyate pratipādyate
yatra iti saṃbandhaḥ

original: saṃścāsau dharmaśca saddharmaḥ vidyamānaḥ padārthasya parispandastasmin yasya kasyacidapūrvasyātiśayasyādbhutarūpasya
analyzed: san ca asau dharmaḥ ca saddharmaḥ vidyamānaḥ padārthasya parispandaḥ tasmin yasya kasyacid apūrvasya atiśayasya adbhuta rūpasya

original: mahimna āropaḥ samarpaṇaṃ garbho 'prāyo yasya sa tathoktasya bhāvastattvam /
analyzed: mahimnaḥ āropaḥ samarpaṇam prāyaḥ yasya sa tathā uktasya bhāvaḥ tattvam
tat ca vā yasmin pratīyate
kena hetunā aloka uktara tiraskāra ślādhya utkarṣa abhidhitsayā

original: lokottaraḥ sarvātiśāyī yastiraskāraḥ khalīkaraṇaṃ ślādhyaśca spṛhaṇīyo ya utkarṣaḥ sātiśayatvaṃ tayorabhidhitsā abhidhātumicchā vaktukāmatā  #
analyzed: loka uttaraḥ sarva atiśāyī yaḥ tiraskāraḥ khalīkaraṇam ślādhyaḥ ca spṛhaṇīyaḥ yaḥ utkarṣaḥ sa atiśaya tvam tayoḥ abhidhitsā abhidhātum icchā vaktu kāma tā  /
tayā
kasya vācyasya
rūḍhi śabdasya vācyaḥ yaḥ abhidheya ūrthaḥ tasya
sā ucyate kathyate kā api alaukikī rūḍhi vaicitrya vakra tā
rūḍhi śabdasya evaṃvidhena vaicitryeṇa vicitra bhāvena vakra tā vakra bhāvaḥ

original: tadidamatra tātparyam---yatsāmānyavicitrasaṃsparśināṃ śabdānāmanumānavanniyataviśeṣāliṅganaṃ yadyapi svabhāvādeva na kiñcidapi saṃbhavati,
analyzed: tat idam atra tātparyam yat sāmānya vicitra saṃsparśinām śabdānām anumāna vat niyata viśeṣa āliṅganam yadi api svabhāvāt eva na kiñcid api saṃbhavati

original: tathāpyanayā yuktyā kavivivakṣitaniyataviśeṣaniṣṭhatāṃ nīyamānāḥ kāmapi camatkārakāritāṃ pratipadyante /
analyzed: tathā api anayā yuktyā kavi vivakṣita niyata viśeṣa niṣṭha tām nīyamānāḥ kām api camatkāra kāri tām pratipadyante
yathā

original: tālā jāanti guṇā jālāte sahiaehi gheppanti /
analyzed: tālā guṇā sahiaehi
rai kiraṇa aṇuggahiāim kamalāim kamalāim

original: tadā jāyante guṇā yadā te sahṛdayairgṛhyante /
analyzed: tadā jāyante guṇāḥ yadā te sahṛdayaiḥ gṛhyante
ravi kiraṇa anugṛhītāni bhavanti kamalāni kamalāni
iti chāyā

original: pratīyate iti kriyāpadavaicitryasyāyamabhiprāyo yadevaṃvidhe viṣaye śabdānāṃ vācakatvena na vyāpāraḥ,
analyzed: pratīyate iti kriyāpada vaicitryasya ayam abhiprāyaḥ yat evaṃvidhe viṣaye śabdānām vācaka tvena na vyāpāraḥ
api tu vastu antara vat pratīti kāri tva mātreṇa iti yukti yuktam api etat iha na ati pratanyate

original: yasyād dhvanikāreṇa vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāvo 'tra sutarāṃ samarthitastat kiṃ paunaruktyena /
analyzed: dhvanikāreṇa sutarām samarthitaḥ tat kim paunaruktyena

original: sā ca rūḍhivaicitryavakratā mukyatayā dviprakārā saṃbhavati---yatra rūḍhivācyor'thaḥ svayameva ātmanyutkarṣaṃ nikarṣaṃ vā samāropayitukāmaḥ
analyzed: sā ca rūḍhi vaicitrya vakra tā mukya tayā dvi prakārā saṃbhavati yatra rūḍhi vācya ūrthaḥ svayam eva ātmani utkarṣam nikarṣam vā samāropayitu kāmaḥ
tasya anyaḥ vā kaścid vaktā iti
yathā

original: snigdhaśyāmalakāntiliptaviyato velladvalākā ghanā vātāḥ śīkariṇaḥ payodasuhṛdāmānandakekāḥ kalāḥ /
analyzed: snigdha śyāmala kānti lipta viyataḥ vellat valākāḥ ghanāḥ vātāḥ śīkariṇaḥ payoda suhṛdām ānanda kekāḥ kalāḥ

original: kāmaṃ santu dṛḍhaṃ kaṭhorahṛdayo rāmo 'smi sarvaṃ sahe vaidehī tu kathaṃ bhaviṣyati hahā hā devi dhīrā bhava // VjivC_2.27 //
analyzed: kāmam santu dṛḍham kaṭhora hṛdayaḥ smi sarvam sahe vaidehī tu katham bhaviṣyati hahā hā devi dhīrā bhava

original: atra “rāma'-śabdena “dṛḍhaṃ kaṭhorahṛdayaḥ' “sarvaṃ sahe' iti yadubhābhyāṃ pratipādayituṃ na pāryate,
analyzed: atra rāma śabdena dṛḍham kaṭhora hṛdayaḥ sarvam sahe iti yat ubhābhyām pratipādayitum na pāryate
tat evaṃvidha vividha uddīpana vibhāva vibhava sahana sāmarthya kāraṇam duḥsaha janaka rāja putrī viraha
vyathā visaṃṣṭhule samaye nirapatrapa prāṇa parirakṣā vaicakṣaṇya lakṣaṇam saṃjñā pada nibandhanam
kim api asaṃbhāvyam asādhāraṇam krauryam pratīyate

original: vaidehītyanena jaladharasamayasundarapadārthasaṃdarśanāsahatvasamarpakaṃ sahajasaukumāryasulabhaṃ kimapi kātaratvaṃ tasyāḥ samarthyate /
analyzed: vaidehī iti anena jaladhara samaya sundara padārtha saṃdarśana asahatva samarpakam sahaja saukumārya sulabham kim api kātara tvam tasyāḥ samarthyate
etat eva
ca pūrvasmāt viśeṣa abhidhāyinaḥ tuśabdasya jīvitam
vidyamāna dharma atiśaya adhyāropa garbha tvam yathā
tatas prahasya āha punar purandaram vyapeta bhīḥ bhūmi purandara ātmajaḥ

original: gṛhāṇa śastraṃ yadi sarga eṣa te na khalvanirjitya raghuṃ kṛtī bhavān // VjivC_2.28 //
analyzed: gṛhāṇa śastram yadi sargaḥ eṣa te na khalu a nirjitya raghum kṛtī bhavān
raghu śabdena atra sarvatra apratihata prabhāvasya api surapateḥ tathāvidha adhyavasāya vyaghāta sāmarthya nibandhanaḥ kaḥ pi sva pauruṣa atiśayaḥ pratīyate
prahasya iti anena etat eva upabṛṃhitam
anyaḥ vaktā yatra tatra udāharaṇam yathā

original: ājñā śakraśikhāmaṇipraṇayinī śāstrāṇi cakṣurnavaṃ bhaktirbhūtapatau pinākini padaṃ laṅketi divyā purī /
analyzed: ājñā śakra śikhāmaṇi praṇayinī śāstrāṇi cakṣuḥ navam bhaktiḥ bhūtapatau pinākini padam laṅkā iti divyā purī

original: saṃbhūtirdruhiṇānvaye ca tadaho nedṛgvaro labhyate syāccedeṣa na rāvaṇaḥ kva nu punaḥ sarvatra sarve guṇāḥ // VjivC_2.29 //
analyzed: saṃbhūtiḥ druhiṇa anvaye ca tat aho na īdṛś varaḥ labhyate syāt ced eṣa na rāvaṇaḥ kva nu punar sarvatra sarve guṇāḥ
rāvaṇa śabdena atra sakala loka prasiddha daśānana durvilāsa vyatiriktam abhijana viveka sat ācāra prabhāva saṃbhoga sukha samṛddhi lakṣaṇāyāḥ
samasta vara guṇa sāmagrī saṃpadaḥ tiraskāra kāraṇam kim api anupādeya tā nimitta bhūtam aupahatyam pratīyate

original: atraiva vidhyamānaguṇātiśayāvyāropagarbhatvaṃ yathā--- rāmo 'sau bhuvaneṣu vikramaguṇaiḥ prāptaḥ prasiddhiṃ parām // VjivC_2.30 //
analyzed: atra eva vidhyamāna guṇa atiśaya a vyāropa garbha tvam yathā bhuvaneṣu vikrama guṇaiḥ prāptaḥ prasiddhim parām
atra rāma śabdena sakala tribhuvana atiśāyī rāvaṇa anucara vismaya āspadam śaurya atiśayaḥ pratīyate

original: eṣā ca rūḍhivaicitryavakratā pratīyamānadharmabāhulyād bahuprakārā bhidyate /
analyzed: eṣā ca rūḍhi vaicitrya vakra tā pratīyamāna dharma bāhulyāt bahu prakārā bhidyate
tat ca svayam eva utprekṣaṇīyam
yathā
guru artham artho śruta pāra dṛśvā raghoḥ sakāśāt anavāpta kāmaḥ

original: gato vadānyāntaramityayaṃ me mā bhūtparīvādanavāvatāraḥ // VjivC_2.31 //
analyzed: gataḥ vadānya antaram iti ayam me mā
raghu śabdena atra tribhuvana atiśāyi audārya atirekaḥ pratīyate

original: etasyāṃ vakratāyāmayameva paramārtho yat sāmānyamātraniṣṭhatāmapākṛtya kavivivakṣitaviśeṣapratipādanasāmarthyalakṣaṇaḥ śobhātiśayaḥ samullāsyate
analyzed: etasyām vakra tāyām ayam eva parama arthaḥ yat sāmānya mātra niṣṭha tām apākṛtya kavi vivakṣita viśeṣa pratipādana sāmarthya lakṣaṇaḥ śobhā atiśayaḥ samullāsyate

original: saṃjñāśabdānāṃ niyatārthaniṣṭhatvāt sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvo na kaścit saṃbhavatīti na vaktavyam /
analyzed: saṃjñā śabdānām niyata artha niṣṭha tvāt sāmānya viśeṣa bhāvaḥ na kaścid saṃbhavati iti na vaktavyam
yasmāt teṣām api avasthā sahastra sādhāraṇa vṛtteḥ vācyasya niyata daśā viśeṣa vṛtti niṣṭha tā sat kavi vivakṣitā saṃbhavati eva
svara śruti nyāyena lagna aṃśuka nyāyena ca iti

original: evaṃ rūḍhivakratāṃ vivecya kramaprāptasamanvayāṃ paryāyavakratāṃ vivinakti---
analyzed: evam rūḍhi vakra tām vivecya krama prāpta samanvayām paryāya vakra tām vivinakti
abhidheya antaratamaḥ tasya atiśaya poṣakaḥ
ramya chāyā antara sparśāt tat alaṅkartum īśvaraḥ
svayam viśeṣaṇena api sva chāyā utkarṣa peśalaḥ
a saṃbhāvya artha pātra tva garbham yaḥ ca abhidhīyate
paryāyaḥ tena vaicitryam parā paryāya vakra tā

original: pūrvoktaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭaḥ kāvyaviṣaye paryāyastena hetunā yadvaicitryaṃ yo vicitrabhāvo vicchittiviśeṣaḥ sā parā prakṛṣṭā kācideva paryāyavakratetyucyate
analyzed: pūrva ukta viśeṣaṇa viśiṣṭaḥ kāvya viṣaye paryāyaḥ tena hetunā yat vaicitryam yaḥ vicitra bhāvaḥ vicchitti viśeṣaḥ sā parā prakṛṣṭā kācid eva paryāya vakra tā iti ucyate
paryāya pradhānaḥ śabdaḥ paryāyaḥ abhidhīyate

original: tasya caitadeva paryāyaprādhānyaṃ yat sa kadācidvivakṣite vastuni vācakatayā pravartate,
analyzed: tasya ca etat eva paryāya prādhānyam yat sa kadācid vivakṣite vastuni vācaka tayā pravartate
kadācid vācaka antaram iti
tena pūrva uktayā nītyā bahu prakāraḥ paryāyaḥ bhihitaḥ
tat kiyantaḥ tasya prakārāḥ santi iti āha abidheya antaratamaḥ
a bidheyam vācyam vastu tasya antaratamaḥ pratyāsannatamaḥ

original: yasmāt paryāyaśabdatve satyapyantaraṅgatvāt sa yathā vivakṣitaṃ vastu vyanakti tathā nānyaḥ kaściditi /
analyzed: yasmāt paryāya śabda tve sati api antaraṅga tvāt sa yathā vivakṣitam vastu vyanakti tathā na anyaḥ kaścid iti
yathā
na abhiyoktum anṛtam tvam iṣyase kaḥ tapasvi viśikheṣu ca ādaraḥ

original: santi bhūbhṛti hi naḥ śarāḥ pare ye pākramavasūni vajriṇaḥ // VjivC_2.32 //
analyzed: santi bhūbhṛti hi naḥ śarāḥ pare ye pākrama vasūni vajriṇaḥ

original: atra mahendravācakeṣvasaṃkhyeṣu saṃbhavatsu paryāyaśabdeṣu “vajriṇaḥ' iti prayuktaḥ paryāyavakratāṃ puṣṇāti /
analyzed: atra mahendra vācakeṣu asaṃkhyeṣu saṃbhavatsu paryāya śabdeṣu vajriṇaḥ iti prayuktaḥ paryāya vakra tām puṣṇāti

original: yasmāt satasaṃnihitavajrasyāpi surapaterye parākramavasūni vikramadhanānīti sāyakānāṃ lokottaratvapratītiḥ /
analyzed: yasmāt sata saṃnihita vajrasya api surapateḥ ye parākrama vasūni vikrama dhanāni iti sāyakānām loka uttara tva pratītiḥ
tapasvi śabdaḥ pi atitarām ramaṇīyaḥ
yasmāt su bhaṭa sāyakānām ādaraḥ bahu mānaḥ kadācid upapadyate
tāpasa mārgaṇeṣu punar akiñcitkareṣu kaḥ saṃrambhaḥ iti
yathā vā

original: kastavaṃ jñāsyasi māṃ smara smarasi māṃ diṣṭyā kimabhyāgatastvāmunmādayituṃ kathaṃ nanu balāt kiṃ te balaṃ paśya tat /
analyzed: kaḥ tavam jñāsyasi mām smara smarasi mām diṣṭyā kim abhyāgataḥ tvām unmādayitum katham nanu balāt kim te balam paśya tat

original: pasyāmītyabhidhāya pāvakamucā ye locanenaiva taṃ kāntākaṇṭhaniṣaktabāhumadahattasmai namaḥ śūline // VjivC_2.33 //
analyzed: pasyāmi iti abhidhāya pāvaka mucā ye locanena eva tam kāntā kaṇṭha niṣakta bāhum adahat tasmai namaḥ śūline

original: atra parameśvare paryāyasahastreṣvapi saṃbhavatsu “śūline' iti yatprayuktaṃ tatrāyamabhiprāyo yattasmai bhagavate namaskāravyatirekeṇa kimanyadabhidhīyate
analyzed: atra parameśvare paryāya sahastreṣu api saṃbhavatsu śūline iti yat prayuktam tatra ayam abhiprāyaḥ yat tasmai bhagavate namaskāra vyatirekeṇa kim anyat abhidhīyate

original: yattathāvidhotsekaparityaktavinayavṛtteḥ smarasya kupitenāpi tadabhimatāvalokavyatirekeṇa tena satatasaṃnihitaśūlenāpi kopasamucitamāyudhagrahaṇaṃ  #
analyzed: yat tathāvidha utseka parityakta vinaya vṛtteḥ smarasya kupitena api tad abhimata avaloka vyatirekeṇa tena satata saṃnihita śūlena api kopa samucitam āyudha grahaṇam
na ācaritam
locana pāta mātreṇa eva kopa kārya karaṇāt bhagavataḥ prabhāva atiśayaḥ paripoṣitaḥ
ataeva tasmai namaḥ stu iti yukti yukta tām pratipadyate
ayam aparaḥ pada pūrva ardha vakra tā hetuḥ paryāyaḥ yaḥ tasya atiśaya poṣakaḥ
tasya abhidheyasya arthasya atiśayam utkarṣa puṣṇāti yaḥ sa tathā uktaḥ

original: yasmāt sahajasaukumāryasubhago 'pi padārthastena paripoṣitātiśayaḥ sutarāṃ sahṛdayahṛdayahāritāṃ pratipadyate /
analyzed: yasmāt sahaja saukumārya subhagaḥ pi padārthaḥ tena paripoṣita atiśayaḥ sutarām sahṛdaya hṛdaya hāri tām pratipadyate
yathā
saṃbandhī raghu bhūbhujām manasija vyāpāra dīkṣā guruḥ gaurāṅgī vadana upamā paricitaḥ tārā vadhū vallabhaḥ

original: sadyomārjitadākṣiṇātyataruṇīdantāvadātadyuti- ścandraḥ sundari dṛśyatāmayamasau caṇḍī śacūḍāmaṇiḥ // VjivC_2.34 //
analyzed: sadyas mārjita dākṣiṇātya taruṇī danta avadāta dyuti ścandraḥ sundari dṛśyatām ayam asau caṇḍī śa cūḍāmaṇiḥ

original: atra paryāyāḥ sahajasaundaryasaṃpadupetasyāpi candramasaḥ sahṛdayahṛdayāhlādakāraṇaṃ kamapyatiśayamūllāsayantaḥ padapūrvārdhavakratāṃ pūṣṇanti
analyzed: atra paryāyāḥ sahaja saundarya saṃpad upetasya api candramasaḥ sahṛdaya hṛdaya āhlāda kāraṇam kam api atiśayam ūllāsayantaḥ pada pūrva ardha vakra tām pūṣṇanti

original: tathā ca rāmeṇa rāvaṇaṃ nihatya puṣpakena gacchatā sītāyāḥ savistrambhaṃ svairakathāsvetadabhidhīyate yaccandraḥ sundari dṛśyatāmiti,
analyzed: tathā ca rāmeṇa rāvaṇam nihatya puṣpakena gacchatā sītāyāḥ sa vistrambham svaira kathāsu etat abhidhīyate yat candraḥ sundari dṛśyatām iti
rāmaṇīyaka manohāriṇi sakala loka locana utsavaḥ candramāḥ vicāryatām iti
yasmāt tathāvidhānām eva tādṛśaḥ samucitaḥ vicāra gocaraḥ

original: saṃbandhī raghubhūbhujāmityanena cāsmākaṃ nāpūrvo bandhurayamityavalokanena saṃmānyatāmiti prakārāntareṇāpi tadviṣayo bahumānaḥ pratīyate /
analyzed: saṃbandhī raghu bhūbhujām iti anena ca asmākam na apūrvaḥ bandhuḥ ayam iti avalokanena saṃmānyatām iti prakāra antareṇa api tad viṣayaḥ bahu mānaḥ pratīyate
śiṣṭāḥ ca tad atiśaya ādhāna pravaṇa tvam eva ātmanaḥ prathayanti

original: tata eva ca prastutamarthaṃ prati pratyekaṃ pṛthaktvenotkarṣaprakaṭanātparyāyāṇāṃ bahūnāmapyapaunaruktyam /
analyzed: tatas eva ca prastutam artham prati pratyekam pṛthaktvena utkarṣa prakaṭanāt paryāyāṇām bahūnām api apaunaruktyam
tṛtīye pāde viśeṣaṇa vakra tā vidyate
na paryāya vakra tvam
ayam aparaḥ paryāya prakāraḥ pada pūrva ardha vakra tā nibandhanaḥ yaḥ tat alaṅkarttum īśvaraḥ
tad abhidheya lakṣaṇam vastu vibhūṣayitum yaḥ prabhavati iti arthaḥ
kasmāt ramya chāyā antara sparśāt

original: ramyaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ yacchāyāntaraṃ vicchittyantaraṃ śliṣṭatvādi tasya sparśāt,
analyzed: ramyam ramaṇīyam yat chāyā antaram vicchitti antaram śliṣṭa tva ādi tasya sparśāt
śobhā antara pratīteḥ iti arthaḥ
katham svayam viśeṣaṇena api
svayam ātmanā eva
sva viśeṣaṇa bhūtena pada antareṇa vā
tatra svayam yathā

original: itthaṃ jaḍe jagati ko nu bṛhatpramāṇa- karṇaḥ karī nanu bhaved dhvanitasya pātram /
analyzed: ittham jaḍe jagati kaḥ nu bṛhat pramāṇa karṇaḥ karī nanu bhavet dhvanitasya pātram

original: ityāgataṃ jhaṭiti yo 'linamunmamātha mātaṅga eva kimataḥ paramucyate 'sau // VjivC_2.35 //
analyzed: iti āgatam jhaṭiti yaḥ linam unmamātha mātaṅgaḥ eva kim atas param ucyate sau
atra mātaṅga śabdaḥ prastute vāraṇa mātre pravartate

original: śliṣṭayā vṛttyā caṇḍālalakṣaṇasyāprastutasya vastunaḥ pratītimutpādayan rūpakālaṅkāracchāyāsaṃsparśād
analyzed: śliṣṭayā vṛttyā caṇḍāla lakṣaṇasya aprastutasya vastunaḥ pratītim utpādayan rūpaka alaṅkāra chāyā saṃsparśāt

original: gaurvāhīka ityanena nyāyena sādṛśyanibandhanasyopacārasya saṃbhavāt prastutasya vastunastattvamadhyāropayan
analyzed: gauḥ vāhīkaḥ iti anena nyāyena sādṛśya nibandhanasya upacārasya saṃbhavāt prastutasya vastunaḥ tattvam adhyāropayan
paryāya vakra tām puṣṇāti

original: yasmādevaṃvidhe viṣaye prastutasyāprastutena saṃbandhopanibandho rūpakālaṅkāradvāreṇa kadācidupamāmukhena vā /
analyzed: yasmāt evaṃvidhe viṣaye prastutasya aprastutena saṃbandha upanibandhaḥ rūpaka alaṅkāra dvāreṇa kadācid upamā mukhena vā

original: yathā sa evāyaṃ sa ivāyamiti vā /
analyzed: yathā saḥ eva ayam saḥ iva ayam iti vā
eṣaḥ eva ca śabda śakti mūla anuraṇana rūpa vyaṅgyasya pada dhvaneḥ viṣayaḥ
bahuṣu ca evaṃvidheṣu satsu vākya dhvaneḥ vā
yathā
kusuma samaya yugam upasaṃharan utphulla mallikā dhavala aṭṭahāsaḥ vyajṛmbhata grīṣma abhidhānaḥ mahā kālaḥ
yathā
vṛtte smin mahāpralaye dharaṇī dhāraṇāya adhunātvam śeṣaḥ iti

original: atra yugādayaḥ śabdāḥ prastutābhidhānaparatvena prayujyamānāḥ santo 'pyaprastutavastupratītikāritayā
analyzed: atra yuga ādayaḥ śabdāḥ prastuta abhidhāna paratvena prayujyamānāḥ santaḥ pi aprastuta vastu pratīti kāritayā
kām api kāvya chāyām samunmīlayantaḥ pratīyamāna alaṅkāra vyapadeśa bhājanam bhavanti
viśeṣaṇena yathā
su snigdha dugdha dhavala uru dṛśam vidagdha mālokya yat madhura mughdha vilāsa digdham

original: bhasmīcakāra madanaṃ nanu kāṣṭhameva tannunamīśa iti vetti purandhrilokaḥ // VjivC_2.38 //
analyzed: bhasmīcakāra madanam nanu kāṣṭham eva tat nunam īśaḥ iti vetti purandhri lokaḥ

original: atra kāṣṭhamiti viśeṣaṇapadaṃ varṇyamānapadārthāpekṣayā manmathasya nīrasatāṃ pratipādayad
analyzed: atra kāṣṭham iti viśeṣaṇa padam varṇyamāna padārtha apekṣayā manmathasya nīrasa tām pratipādayat
ramya chāyā antara sparśi śleṣa chāyā manojña vinyāsam aparam asmin vastuni aprastute madana abhidhāna pādapa lakṣaṇe
pratītim utpāpayat rūpaka alaṅkāra chāyā saṃsparśāt kām api paryāya vakra tām unmīlayati
ayam aparaḥ paryāya prakāraḥ pada pūrva ardha vakra tāyāḥ kāra namyaḥ sva chāyā utkarṣa peśalaḥ

original: svasyātmanaśchāyā kāntiryā sukumāratā tadutkarṣeṇa tadatiśayena yaḥ peśalo hṛdayahārī /
analyzed: svasya ātmanaḥ chāyā kāntiḥ yā sukumāratā tad utkarṣeṇa tad atiśayena yaḥ peśalaḥ hṛdaya hārī

original: tadidamatra tātparyam---yadyapi varṇyamānasya vastunaḥ prakārāntarollāsakatvena vyavasthitistathāpi parispandasaundaryasaṃpadeva sahṛdayahṛdayahāritāṃ  #
analyzed: tat idam atra tātparyam yadi api varṇyamānasya vastunaḥ prakāra antara ullāsaka tvena vyavasthitiḥ tathā api parispanda saundarya saṃpadā eva sahṛdaya hṛdaya hāri tām
pratipadyate
yathā
ittham utkayati tāṇḍava līlā paṇḍita abdhi laharī guru pādaiḥ

original: utthitaṃ viṣamakāṇḍakuṭumba- syāṃśubhiḥ smaravatīviraho mām // VjivC_2.39 //
analyzed: utthitam viṣama kāṇḍa kuṭumba sya aṃśubhiḥ smaravatī virahaḥ mām
atra indu paryāyaḥ viṣama kāṇḍa kuṭumba śabdaḥ kavinā upanibaddhaḥ
yasmāt mṛgāṅka udaya dveṣiṇā viraha vidhura hṛdayena kenacid etat ucyate
yat ayam aprasiddhaḥ pi aparimlāna samanvaya tayā prasiddhatama tām upanītaḥ tena prathamatara ullikhita tvena ca cetana camatkāra kāri tām avagāhate

original: eṣa ca svacchāyotkarṣapeśalaḥsahajasaundaryasu bhagatvena nūtanollekhavilakṣaṇatvena ca kavibhiḥ paryāyāntaraparihārapūrvakamupavarṇyate /
analyzed: eṣa ca bhaga tvena nūtana ullekha vilakṣaṇa tvena ca kavibhiḥ paryāya antara parihāra pūrvakam upavarṇyate
yathā kṛṣṇa kuṭila keśī iti vaktavye yamunā kallola vakra alaka iti
yathā vā gaurāṅgī vadana upamā paricitaḥ iti atra vanitā ādi vācaka sahastra sadbhāve gaurāṅgī iti abhidhānam atīva ramaṇīyam
ayam aparaḥ paryāya prakāraḥ pada pūrva ardha vakra tā abhidhāyī alaṃbhāvya artha pātra tva garbham

original: varṇyamānasya saṃbhāvyaḥ saṃbhāvayitumaśakyo yor'thaḥ kaścitparispandastatra pātratvaṃ bhājanatvaṃ garbho 'bhiprāyo yatrābhidhāne tattathāvidhaṃ  #
analyzed: varṇyamānasya saṃbhāvyaḥ saṃbhāvayitum aśakyaḥ yaḥ ṛthaḥ kaścid parispandaḥ tatra pātra tvam bhājana tvam garbhaḥ bhiprāyaḥ yatra abhidhāne tat tathāvidham
kṛtvā yaḥ ca abhidhīyate bhaṇyate
yathā

original: alaṃ mahīpāla tava śrameṇa prayuktamapyastramito vṛthā syāt /
analyzed: alam mahīpāla tava śrameṇa prayuktam api astram itas vṛthā syāt

original: na pādaponmūlanaśakti raṃhaḥ śiloccaye mūrchati mārutasya // VjivC_2.40 //
analyzed: na pādapa unmūlana śakti raṃhaḥ śiloccaye mūrchati mārutasya
atra mahīpāla iti rājñaḥ sakala pṛthvī parirakṣaṇa kṣama pauruṣasya api tathāvidha prayatna paripālanīya guru go rūpa jīva mātra paritrāṇa a sāmarthyam
svapne pi asaṃbhāvanīyam yat tat pātra tva garbham āmantraṇam upanibaddham
yathā vā

original: bhūtānukampā tava cediyaṃ gau- rekā bhavet svastimatī tvadante /
analyzed: bhūta anukampā tava ced iyam gauḥ rekā bhavet svastimatī tvad ante

original: jīvan punaḥ śasvadupaplavebhyaḥ prajāḥ prajānātha piteva pāsi // VjivC_2.41 //
analyzed: jīvan punar śasvat upaplavebhyaḥ prajāḥ prajānātha pitā iva pāsi
atra yadi prāṇi karuṇā kāraṇam nija prāṇa parityāgam ācarasi tat api ayuktam
yasmāt tvad ante svastimatī bhavet iyam ekā eva gauḥ iti tritayam api anādara āspadam

original: jivan punaḥ śaśvatsadaivopaplavebhyo 'narthebhyaḥ prajāḥ sakalabhūtadhātrīvalayavartinīḥ prajānātha pāsi rakṣasi /
analyzed: jivan punar śaśvat sadā eva upaplavebhyaḥ narthebhyaḥ prajāḥ sakala bhūta dhātrī valaya vartinīḥ prajānātha pāsi rakṣasi
pitā iva iti anādara atiśayaḥ prathate

original: tadevaṃ yadyapi suspaṣṭasamanvayo 'yaṃ vākyārthastathāpi tātparyāntaramatra pratīyate /
analyzed: tat evam yadi api su spaṣṭa samanvayaḥ yam vākya arthaḥ tathā api tātparya antaram atra pratīyate

original: yasmāt sarvasya kasyācitprajānāthatve sati sadaiva tatparirakṣaṇasyākaraṇamasaṃbhāvyam /
analyzed: yasmāt sarvasya kasyācid prajā nātha tve sati sadā eva tad parirakṣaṇasya akaraṇam asaṃbhāvyam
tad pātra tva garbham eva tat abhihitam
yasmāt pratyakṣa prāṇi mātra bhakṣma māṇa guru homadhenu prāṇa parirakṣaṇa apekṣā nirapekṣasya

original: sato jīvatastavānena nyāyena kadācidapi prijāparirakṣaṇaṃ manāgapi na saṃbhāvyata
analyzed: satas jīvataḥ tava anena nyāyena kadācid api prijā parirakṣaṇam manāk api na saṃbhāvyata
iti pramāṇa upapannam
tat idam uktam
pramāṇavat tvāt āyātaḥ pravāhaḥ kena vāryate
iti
atra abhidhāna pratīti gocarīkṛtānām padārthānām paraspara pratiyogitvam udāharaṇa pratyudāharaṇa nyāyena anusaṃdheyam
ayam aparaḥ paryāya prakāraḥ pada pūrva ardha vakra tām vidadhāti alaṅkāra upasaṃskāra manohāri nibandhanaḥ
atra alaṅkāra upasaṃskāra śabde tṛtīyā samāsaḥ ṣaṣṭhī samāsaḥ ca karaṇīyaḥ
tena artha dvayam abhihitam bhavati

original: alaṅkāreṇa rūpakādinopasaṃskāraḥ śobhāntarādhānaṃ yattena manohāri hṛdayarañjakaṃ nibandhanamupanibandho yasya sa tathoktaḥ /
analyzed: alaṅkāreṇa rūpaka ādinā upasaṃskāraḥ śobhā antara ādhānam yat tena manohāri hṛdaya rañjakam nibandhanam upanibandhaḥ yasya sa tathā uktaḥ
alaṅkārasya utprekṣā ādeḥ upasaṃskāraḥ śobhā antara ādhānam ca iti vigṛhya
tatra tṛtīyā samāsa pakṣa udāharaṇam yathā

original: yo līlātālavṛnto rahasi nirupadhiryaśca kilīpradīpaḥ kopakrīḍāsu yo 'straṃ daśanakṛtarujo yo 'dharasyaikasekaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ līlā tālavṛntaḥ rahasi nirupadhiḥ yaḥ ca kilī pradīpaḥ kopa krīḍāsu daśana kṛta rujaḥ yaḥ dharasya eka sekaḥ

original: ākalpe darpaṇa yaḥ śramaśayanavidho yaśca gaṇḍopadhānaṃ devyāḥ sa vyāpadaṃ vo haratu harajaṭākandalīpuṣpaminduḥ // VjivC_2.43 //
analyzed: ākalpe darpaṇa yaḥ śramaśayana vidhaḥ yaḥ ca gaṇḍa upadhānam devyāḥ sa vyāpadam vaḥ haratu hara jaṭā kandalī puṣpam induḥ
atra tālavṛnta ādi kārya sāmānyāt abheda upacāra nibandhanaḥ rūpaka alaṅkāra vinyāsaḥ sarveṣām eva paryāyāṇām śobhā atiśaya kāri tvena upanibaddhaḥ
ṣaṣṭhī samāsa pakṣa udāharaṇam yathā
devi tvad mukha paṅkajena śaśinaḥ śobhā tiraskāriṇā

original: paśyābjāni vinirjitāni sahasā gacchanti vicchāyatām // VjivC_2.44 //
analyzed: paśya abjāni vinirjitāni sahasā gacchanti vicchāya tām
atra sva rasa saṃpravṛtta sāyaṃsamaya samucitā saroruhāṇām vicchāya tā pratipattiḥ nāyakena
nāgaraka tayā vallabha upalālanā pravṛttena tad nidarśana upakrama ramaṇīya tva mukhena nirjitāni iva iti
pratīyamāna utprekṣā alaṅkāra kāri tvena pratipādyate
etat eva ca yukti yuktam
yasmāt sarvasya kasyacid paṅkajasya śaśāṅka śobhā tiraskāra kāri tā pratipadyate

original: tvanmukhapaṅkajena punaḥ śaśinaḥ śobhātiraskāriṇā nyāyato nirjitāni santi vicchāyatāṃ gacchantīveti pratīyamānasyotprekṣālakṣaṇasyālaṅkārasya  #
analyzed: tvad mukha paṅkajena punar śaśinaḥ śobhā tiraskāriṇā nyāyataḥ nirjitāni santi vicchāya tām gacchanti iva iti pratīyamānasya utprekṣā lakṣaṇasya alaṅkārasya
śobhā atiśayaḥ samullāsyate
evam paryāya vakra tām vicārya krama samucita avasarām upacāra vakra tām vicārayati
yatra dūra antare sāmānyam upacaryate
leśena api bhavat kāñcid vaktum udrikta vṛtti tām
yad mūlā sa rasa ullekhā rūpaka ādiḥ alaṅkṛtiḥ
upacāra pradhānā asau vakra tā kācid ucyate
asau kācid apūrvā vakra tā ucyate vakra bhāvaḥ bhidhīyate
kīdṛśī upacāra pradhānā

original: upacaraṇamupacāraḥ sa eva pradhānaṃ yasyāḥ sā tathoktā /
analyzed: upacaraṇam upacāraḥ saḥ eva pradhānam yasyāḥ sā tathā uktā

original: kiṃsvarūpā---yatra yasyāmanyasmātpadārthāntarāt prastutatvādvarṇyamāne vastuni sāmānyamupacaryate sādhāraṇo dharmaḥ kaścidvaktumabhipretaḥ
analyzed: kiṃsvarūpā atra yasyām anyasmāt padārtha antarāt prastuta tvāt varṇyamāne vastuni sāmānyam upacaryate sādhāraṇaḥ dharmaḥ kaścid vaktum abhipretaḥ
kasmin varṇyamāne vastuni dūra antare
dūram analpam antaram vyavadhānam yasya tat tathā uktam tasmin

original: nanu ca vyavadhānamamūrtatvādvarṇyamānasya vastuno deśavihitaṃ tāvanna saṃbhavati /
analyzed: nanu ca vyavadhānam amūrta tvāt varṇyamānasya vastunaḥ deśa vihitam tāvat na saṃbhavati
kāla vihitam api na asti eva
tasya kriyā viṣaya tvāt

original: kriyāsvarūpaṃ kārakasvarūpaṃ cetyubhayātmakaṃ yadyapi varṇyamānaṃ vastu,
analyzed: kriyā svarūpam kāraka svarūpam ca iti ubhaya ātmakam yadi api varṇyamānam vastu
tathā api deśa kāla vyavadhānena atra na bhavitavyam

original: yasmātpadārthānāmanumānavat sāmānyamātrameva śabdairviṣayīkartuṃ pāryate, na viśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: yasmāt padārthānām anumāna vat sāmānya mātram eva śabdaiḥ viṣayīkartum pāryate na viśeṣaḥ
tat katham dūra antara tvam upapadyate
satyam etat

original: kintu “dūrāntara'-śabdo mukhyatayā deśakālaviṣaye viprakarṣe pratyāsattivirahe vartamāno 'pyupacārāt svabhāvaviprakarṣe vartate /
analyzed: kintu dūra antara śabdaḥ mukhya tayā deśa kāla viṣaye viprakarṣe pratyāsatti virahe vartamānaḥ u pi upacārāt svabhāva viprakarṣe vartate
saḥ yam svabhāva viprakarṣaḥ viruddha dharma adhyāsa lakṣaṇaḥ padārthānām
yathā mūrtimat tvam amūrta tva apekṣayā
drava tvam ca ghana tva apekṣayā
cetana tvam acetana tva apekṣayā iti
kīdṛś tat sāmānya leśena api bhavat
manāk mātreṇa api sat
kimartham kāñcid apūrvām udrikta vṛtti tām vaktum sa atiśaya parispanda tām abhidhātum
yathā
snigdha śyāmala kānti lipta viyataḥ
atra yathā buddhi pūrva kāriṇaḥ kecid cetana varṇa chāyā atiśaya utpādana icchayā kenacid vidyamāna lepana śaktinā

original: mūrtena nīlādinā rañjanadravyaviśeṣeṇa kiñcideva lepanīyaṃ mūrtimadvastu vastraprāyaṃ limpanti,
analyzed: mūrtena nīla ādinā rañjana dravya viśeṣeṇa kiñcid eva lepanīyam mūrtimat vastu vastra prāyam limpanti

original: tadvadeva tatkāritvasāmānyaṃ manāṅmātreṇāpi vidyamānaṃ kāmapyudriktavṛttitāmabhidhātumupacārāt snigdhaśyāmalayā kāntyā liptaṃ viyad dyaurityupanibaddham
analyzed: tadvat eva tad kāri tva sāmānyam manāk mātreṇa api vidyamānam kām api udrikta vṛttitām abhidhātum upacārāt snigdha śyāmalayā kāntyā liptam viyat dyauḥ iti upanibaddham
snigdha śabdaḥ pi upacāra vakraḥ eva

original: yathā mūrtaṃ vastu sparśasaṃvedyaṃ sneha naguṇayogāt snigdhamityucyate,
analyzed: yathā mūrtam vastu sparśa saṃvedyam sneha na guṇa yogāt snigdham iti ucyate
tathā eva kāntiḥ amūrtā api upacārāt snigdhā iti uktā
yathā vā

original: gacchantīnāṃ ramaṇavasatiṃ yoṣitāṃ tatra naktaṃ ruddhāloke narapatipathe sūcibhedyaistamobhiḥ /
analyzed: gacchantīnām ramaṇa vasatim yoṣitām tatra naktam ruddha āloke narapati pathe sūci bhedyaiḥ tamobhiḥ

original: saudāminyā kanakanikaṣasnigdhayā darśayorvoṃ toyotsargastanitamukharo māsma bhūrviklavāsatāḥ // VjivC_2.46 //
analyzed: saudāminyā kanaka nikaṣa snigdhayā darśayoḥ voṃ toya utsarga stanita mukharaḥ mā asma bhūḥ viklava āsatāḥ
atra amūrtānām api tamasām ati bāhulyāt ghana tvāt mūrta samucitam sūci bhedya tvam upacaritam
yathā vā

original: gaaṇaṃ ca mattamehaṃ dhārāluliajjuṇāiṃ a vaṇāiṃ /
analyzed: gaaṇam ca matta meham a vaṇāim

original: ṇirahaṅkāramiaṅkā haranti ṇīlāo a ṇisāo // VjivC_2.47 //
analyzed: haranti ṇīlāaḥ a

original: gaganaṃ ca mattameghaṃ dhārālulitārjunāni ca vanāni /
analyzed: gaganam ca matta megham dhārā lulita arjunāni ca vanāni
nirahaṅkāra mṛga aṅkāḥ haranti nīlāḥ ca niśāḥ
iti chāyā
atra matta tvam nirahaṅkāra tvam ca cetana dharma sāmānyam upacaritam

original: so 'yamupacāravakratāprakāraḥ satkavipravāhe sahastraśaḥ saṃbhavatīti sahṛdayaiḥ svayamevotprekṣaṇīyaḥ ataeva ca pratyāsannāntare 'sminnupacāre  #
analyzed: saḥ yam upacāra vakra tā prakāraḥ sat kavi pravāhe sahastraśas saṃbhavati iti sahṛdayaiḥ svayam evā utprekṣaṇīyaḥ ataeva ca pratyāsanna antare smin upacāre
na vakra tā vyavahāraḥ
yathā gauḥ vāhīkaḥ iti
idam aparam upacāra vakra tāyāḥ svarūpam yad mūlā sa rasa ullekhā rūpaka ādiḥ alaṅkṛtiḥ
yā mūlam yasyāḥ sā tathā uktā
rūpakam ādiḥ yasyāḥ sā tathā uktā
kā sā alaṅkṛtiḥ alaṅkaraṇam rūpaka prabhṛtiḥ alaṅkāra vicchittiḥ iti arthaḥ
kīdṛśī sarasa ullekhā

original: sarasaḥ sāsvādaḥ sacamatkṛtirullekhaḥ samunmeṣoyasyāḥ sā tathoktā /
analyzed: sa rasaḥ sa āsvādaḥ sa camatkṛtiḥ ullekhaḥ samunmeṣaḥ yasyāḥ sā tathā uktā

original: atiguravo rājamāṣā na bhakṣyā iti // VjivC_2.48 //

yad mūlā satī rūpaka ādiḥ alaṅkṛtiḥ sa rasa ullekhā

nanu ca pūrvasmāt upacāra vakra tā prakārāt etasya kaḥ bhedaḥ

original: pūrvasmin svabhāvaviprakarṣāt sāmānyena manāṅmātrameva sāmyaṃ samāśritya sātiśayatvaṃ pratipādayituṃ taddharmamātrādhyāropaḥ pravartate,

etasmin punar adūra viprakṛṣṭa sādṛśya samudbhava pratyāsatti samucita tvāt abheda upacāra nibandhanam tattvam eva adhyāropyate

kāla śravaṇa utpaleṣu senā vanālī viṣa pallaveṣu

original: atra subhagaṃmanyabhāvaprabhṛtiṣu śabdeṣu mumādiparispandasundarāḥ saṃniveśacchāyāvidhāyinī vācakavakratāṃ pratyayāḥ puṣṇanti /
analyzed: atra subhagaṃmanya bhāva prabhṛtiṣu śabdeṣu mum ādi parispanda sundarāḥ saṃniveśa chāyā vidhāyinī vācaka vakra tām pratyayāḥ puṣṇanti

original: evaṃ prasaṅgasamucitāṃ padamadhyavartipratyayavakratāṃ vicārya samanantarasaṃbhavinīṃ vṛttivakratāṃ vicārayati---
analyzed: evam prasaṅga samucitām pada madhya varti pratyaya vakra tām vicārya samanantara saṃbhavinīm vṛtti vakra tām vicārayati
avyayībhāva mukhyānām vṛttīnām ramaṇīya tā
yatra ullasati sā jñeyā vṛtti vaicitrya vakra tā
sā vṛtti vaicitrya vakra tā jñeyā boddhavyā

original: vṛttīnāṃ vaicitryaṃ vicitrabhāvaḥ sajātīyāpekṣayā saukumāryotkarṣastena vakratā vakrabhāvavicchittiḥ /
analyzed: vṛttīnām vaicitryam vicitra bhāvaḥ sajātīya apekṣayā saukumārya utkarṣaḥ tena vakra tā vakra bhāva vicchittiḥ
kīdṛśī ramaṇīya tā yatra ullasati
rāmaṇīyakam yasyām udbhidyate
kasyavṛttīnām
kāsām avyayībhāva mukyānām

original: avyayībhāvaḥ samāsaḥ mukhyaḥ pradhānabhūto yāsaṃ tāstathoktāstāsāṃ samāsataddhitasubdhātuvṛttīnāṃ vaiyākaraṇaprasiddhānām /
analyzed: avyayībhāvaḥ samāsaḥ mukhyaḥ pradhāna bhūtaḥ yāsam tāḥ tathā uktāḥ tāsām samāsa taddhita sup dhātu vṛttīnām vaiyākaraṇa prasiddhānām
tat ayam atra arthaḥ yatra sva parispanda saundaryam etāsām samucita bhitti bhāga upanibandhāt abhivyaktim āsādayati
yathā

original: abhivyaktiṃ tāvad bahiralabhamānaḥ kathamapi sphurannantaḥ svatmanyadhikatarasaṃmūrchitataraḥ /
analyzed: abhivyaktim tāvat bahis alabhamānaḥ katham api sphuran antar sva tmani adhikatara saṃmūrchitataraḥ

original: manojñāmudvṛttasmaraparimala spandasubhagā- maho datte śobhāmadhimadhu latānāṃ navarasaḥ // VjivC_2.72 //
analyzed: manojñām udvṛtta smara parimalaḥ spanda subhagā mahaḥ datte śobhām adhi madhu latānām nava rasaḥ

original: atra “adhimadhu'-śabde vibhaktyarthavihitaḥ samāsaḥ samayābhidhāyyapi viṣayasaptamīpratītimutpādayan “navarasa'-śabdasya śloṣacchāyācchuraṇavaicitryamunmīlayati
analyzed: atra adhimadhu śabde vibhakti artha vihitaḥ samāsaḥ samaya abhidhāyī api viṣaya saptamī pratītim utpādayan nava rasa śabdasya śloṣa chāyā ācchuraṇa vaicitryam unmīlayati

original: etadvṛttivirahite vinyāsāntare vastupratītau satyāmapi na tādṛktadvidāhlādakāritvam /
analyzed: etad vṛtti virahite vinyāsa antare vastu pratītau satyām api na tādṛś tadvida āhlāda kāri tvam
udvṛtta parimala spanda subhaga śabda nāma upacāra vakra tvam parisphurat vibhāvyate
yathā ca

original: ā svarlokāduraganagaraṃ nūtanālokalakṣmīṃ- vyātanvadbhiḥ kimiva sitatāṃ ceṣṭitaiste na nītam /
analyzed: ā svarlokāt uraga nagaram nūtana āloka lakṣmīm vyātanvadbhiḥ kim iva sita tām ceṣṭitaiḥ te na nītam

original: apyetāsāṃ dayitavirahe vidviṣatsundarīṇāṃ yairānītā nakhapadamayī maṇḍanā pāṇḍimānam // VjivC_2.73 //
analyzed: api etāsām dayita virahe vidviṣat sundarīṇām yaiḥ ānītā nakha pada mayī maṇḍanā pāṇḍimānam

original: atra pāṇḍutva-pāṇḍutā-pāṇḍubhāva-śabdebhyaḥ pāṇḍima-śabdasya kimapi vṛttivaicitryavakratvaṃ vidyate /
analyzed: atra pāṇḍu tva pāṇḍu tā pāṇḍu bhāva śabdebhyaḥ pāṇḍima śabdasya kim api vṛtti vaicitrya vakra tvam vidyate
yathā ca
kāntyā unmīlati siṃhalī mukha rucām cūrṇa abhiṣeka ullasat lāvaṇya amṛta vāhi nirjhara juṣām ācāntibhiḥ candramāḥ
yena apāna mahā utsava vyatikareṣu eka ātapa trāyyate devasya tridaśādhipa avadhi jagat jiṣṇoḥ manaḥ janmanaḥ

original: atra subdhātuvṛtteḥ samāsavṛtteśca kimapi vakratāvaicitryaṃ parisphurati /
analyzed: atra sup dhātu vṛtteḥ samāsa vṛtteḥ ca kim api vakra tā vaicitryam parisphurati

original: evaṃ vṛttivakratāṃ vicārya padapūrvārdhabhāvinīmucitāvasarāṃ bhāvavakratāṃ vicārayati---
analyzed: evam vṛtti vakratām vicārya pada pūrva ardha bhāvinīm ucita avasarām bhāva vakratām vicārayati
sādhya tām api an ādṛtya siddha tvena abhidhīyate
yatra bhāvaḥ bhavet eṣā bhāva vaicitrya vakra tā
eṣā varṇita svarūpā bhāva vaicitrya vakra tā bhavati asti

original: bhāvo dhātvartharūpastasyai vaicitryaṃ vicitrabhāvaḥ prakārāntarābhidhānavyatireki rāmaṇīyakaṃ tena vakratā vakratvavicchittiḥ /
analyzed: bhāvaḥ dhātvartha rūpaḥ tasyai vaicitryam vicitra bhāvaḥ prakāra antara abhidhāna vyatireki rāmaṇīyakam tena vakra tā vakra tva vicchittiḥ

original: kīdṛśī---yatra yasyāṃ bhāvaḥ siddhatvena pariniṣpannatvenābhidhīyate bhaṇyate /
analyzed: kīdṛśī iyatra yasyām bhāvaḥ siddha tvena pariniṣpanna tvena abhidhīyate bhaṇyate
kim kṛtvā asādhya tām api an ādṛtya niṣpādyamāna tām prasiddhām api avadhīrya
tat idam atra tātparyam yat sādhya tvena abhidhānāt apariniṣpatteḥ prastutasya arthasya

original: durbalaḥ paripoṣaḥ tasmāt siddhatvenābhidhānaṃ pariniṣpannatvātparyāptaṃ prakṛtārthaparipoṣamāvahati /
analyzed: durbalaḥ paripoṣaḥ tasmāt siddha tvena abhidhānam pariniṣpanna tvāt paryāptam prakṛta artha paripoṣam āvahati
yathā

original: śvāsāyāsamalīmasādhararucerdeḥ kandalītānavāt keyūrāyitamaṅgadaiḥ pariṇataṃ pāṇḍimni gaṇḍatviṣā /
analyzed: śvāsa āyāsa malīmasa adhara ruceḥ deḥ kandalī tānavāt keyūrāyitam aṅgadaiḥ pariṇatam pāṇḍimni gaṇḍa tviṣā

original: asyāḥ kiṃ ca vilocanotpalayugenātyantamaśrustrutā tāraṃ tādṛgapāṅgayoraruṇitaṃ yenotpratāpaḥ smaraḥ // VjivC_2.75 //
analyzed: asyāḥ kim ca vilocana utpala yugena atyantam aśruḥ trutā tāram tādṛś apāṅgayoḥ aruṇitam yena utpratāpaḥ smaraḥ
atra bhāvasya siddha tvena abhidhānam atīva camatkāra kāri

original: evaṃ bhāvavakratāṃ vicārya prātipadikāntarvartinīṃ liṅgavakratāṃ vicārayati---
analyzed: evam bhāva vakra tām vicārya prātipadika antar vartinīm liṅga vakra tām vicārayati
bhinnayoḥ liṅgayoḥ yasyām sāmānādhikaraṇyataḥ
kā api śobhā abhyudeti eṣā liṅga vaicitrya vakra tā
eṣā kathita svarūpā liṅga vaicitrya vakra tā
bhavati iti saṃbandhaḥ
kriyā antara abhāvāt kīdṛśī iyasyām yatra bhinnayoḥ vibhakta svarūpayoḥ liṅgayoḥ dvayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyataḥ tulya āśraya tvāt eka dravya vṛtti tvāt kā api apūrvā  /
śobhā abhyudeti kāntiḥ ullasati
yathā
yasya āropaṇa karmaṇā api bahavaḥ vīra vratam tyājitāḥ kāryam puṅkhita bāṇam īśvara dhanuḥ tad dorbhiḥ ebhiḥ mayā

original: strīratnaṃ tadagarbhasaṃbhavamito labhyaṃ ca līlāyitā tenaiṣā mama phullapaṅkajavanaṃ jātā dṛśāṃ viṃśatiḥ // VjivC_2.76 //
analyzed: strī ratnam tat a garbha saṃbhavam itas labhyam ca līlāyitā tena eṣā mama phulla paṅkaja vanam jātā dṛśām viṃśatiḥ
yathā vā
nabhasvatā lāsita kalpa vallī pravāla bāla vyajanena yasya

original: uraḥ sthale 'kīryata dakṣiṇena sarvāspadaṃ saurabhamaṅgarāgaḥ // VjivC_2.77 //
analyzed: uraḥ sthale kīryata dakṣiṇena sarva āspadam saurabham aṅgarāgaḥ
āyojya mālām ṛtubhiḥ prayatna saṃpāditām maṃsa taṭe cakre

original: karāravindaṃ makarandabindu- syandi śriyā vibhramakarṇapūraḥ // VjivC_2.78 //
analyzed: kara aravindam makaranda bindu syandi śriyā vibhrama karṇapūraḥ
iyam aparā ca liṅga vaicitrya vakra tā

original: sati liṅgāntare yatra strīliṅgaṃ ca prayujyate /
analyzed: sati liṅga antare yatra strī liṅgam ca prayujyate
śobhā niṣpattaye yasmāt nāma eva strī iti peśalam

original: yatra yasyāṃ liṅgāntare satyanyasmin saṃbhavatyapi liṅge strīliṅgaṃ prayujyate nibadhyate /
analyzed: yatra yasyām liṅga antare sati anyasmin saṃbhavati api liṅge strī liṅgam prayujyate nibadhyate
aneka liṅga tve pi padārthasya strī liṅga viṣayaḥ prayogaḥ kriyate
kimartham śobhā niṣpattaye kānti sampattaye
kasmāt kāraṇāt yasmāt nāma eva strī iti peśalam
strī iti abhidhānam eva hṛdaya hāri
vicchiti antareṇa rasa ādi prayojana yogya tvāt
udāharaṇam
yathā iyam grīṣma ūṣma vyatikaravatī pāṇḍura bhidā mukha udbhinna mlāna anila tarala vallī kisalayā

original: taṭī tāraṃ tāmyatyatiśaśiyaśāḥ ko 'pi jalada- stathā manye bhāvī bhuvanavalayākrāntisubhagā // VjivC_2.79 //
analyzed: taṭī tāram tāmyati ati śaśi yaśāḥ kaḥ pi jaladaḥ tathā manye bhāvī bhuvana valaya ākrānti subhagā
atra tri liṅga tve sati api taṭa śabdasya
saukumāryāt strī liṅgam eva prayuktam

original: tena vicchintyantareṇa bhāvī nāyakavyavahāraḥ kaścidāsūtrita ityatīva ramaṇīyatvādvakratāmāvahati //
analyzed: tena vicchinti antareṇa bhāvī nāyaka vyavahāraḥ kaścid āsūtritaḥ iti atīva ramaṇīya tvāt vakra tām āvahati
idam aparam etasyāḥ prakāra antaram lakṣayati
viśiṣṭam yojyate liṅgam anyasmin saṃbhavati api
yatra vichittaye sā anyā vācya aucitya anusārataḥ

original: sā coktasvarūpā anyā aparā liṅgavakratā vidyate /
analyzed: sā ca ukta svarūpā anyā aparā liṅga vakra tā vidyate

original: yatra yasyāṃ viśiṣṭaṃ yojyate liṅgatrayāṇāmekatamaṃ kimapi kavivivakṣayā nibadhyate /
analyzed: yatra yasyām viśiṣṭam yojyate liṅga trayāṇām ekatamam kim api kavi vivakṣayā nibadhyate
katham anyasmin saṃbhavati api
liṅga antare vidyamāne pi
kimartham vicchittaye śobhāyai
kasmāt
vācyasya varṇyamānasya vastunaḥ yat aucityam ucita bhāvaḥ tasya anusaraṇam anusāraḥ tasmāt
padārtha aucityam anusṛtya iti arthaḥ
yathā

original: tvaṃ rakṣasā bhīru yato 'panītā taṃ mārgametāḥ kṛpayā latā me /
analyzed: tvam rakṣasā bhīru yatas upanītā tam mārgam etāḥ kṛpayā latāḥ me
adarśayan vaktum aśaknuvantyaḥ śākhābhiḥ āvarjita pallavābhiḥ

original: atra sītayā saha rāmaḥ puṣpakenāvataraṃstasyāḥ svayameva tadvirahavaidhuryamāvedayati---tattvaṃ
analyzed: atra sītayā saha rāmaḥ puṣpakena avataran tasyāḥ svayam eva tad viraha vaidhuryam āvedayati tat tvam
rāvaṇena tathāvidha tvarā paratantra cetasā mārge yasmin apanītā tatra tad upamarda vaśāt tathāvidha saṃsthāna yukta tvam

original: latānāmunmukhatvaṃ mama tvanmārgānumānasya nimittatāmāpannamiti vastu vicchittyantareṇa rāmeṇa yojyate /
analyzed: latānām unmukha tvam mama tvad mārga anumānasya nimitta tām āpannam iti vastu vicchitti antareṇa rāmeṇa yojyate
yathā ahe bhīru svābhāvika saukumārya kātara antar karaṇe

original: rāvaṇena tathāvidhakrūrakarmakāriṇā yasminmārge tvamapanītā tametāḥ sākṣātkāraparidṛśyamānamūrtayo latāḥ kila mamādarśa yanniti /
analyzed: rāvaṇena tathāvidha krūra karma kāriṇā yasmin mārge tvam apanītā tam etāḥ sākṣātkāra paridṛśyamāna mūrtayaḥ latāḥ kila mama ādarśa yan iti

original: tanmārgapradarśanaṃ paramārthatastāsāṃ niścetanatayā na saṃbhāvyata iti pratīyamānavṛttirutprekṣālaṅkāraḥ kaverabhimataḥ /
analyzed: tad mārga pradarśanam paramārthataḥ tāsām niścetana tayā na saṃbhāvyate iti pratīyamāna vṛttiḥ utprekṣā alaṅkāraḥ kaveḥ abhimataḥ

original: yathā---tava bhīrutvaṃ rāvaṇasya krauryaṃ mamāpi tvatparitrāṇaprayatnaparatāṃ paryālocya
analyzed: yathā tava bhīru tvam rāvaṇasya krauryam mama api tvad paritrāṇa prayatna para tām paryālocya
strī svabhāvāt ārdra hṛdaya tvena samucita sva viṣaya pakṣapāta māhātmyāt etāḥ kṛpayā eva mama
mārga pradarśanam akurvan iti
kena karaṇa bhūtena śākhābhiḥ āvarjita pallavābhiḥ
yasmāt vāc indriya varjita tvāt vaktum aśaknuvantyaḥ

original: yatkila ye kecidajalpanto mārgapradarśanaṃ prakurvanti te tadunmukhībhūtahastapallavairbāhubhirityetadatīva yuktiyuktam /
analyzed: yat kila ye kecid a jalpantaḥ mārga pradarśanam prakurvanti te tad unmukhībhūta hasta pallavaiḥ bāhubhiḥ iti etat atīva yukti yuktam
tathā ca atrā eva vākya antaram api vidyate
mṛgyaḥ ca darbha aṅkura nirvyapekṣā stava āgati jñam samabodhayat mām

original: vyāpārayantyo dikhi dakṣiṇasyā- mutpakṣmarājīni vilocanāni // VjivC_2.81 //
analyzed: vyāpārayantyaḥ dakṣiṇasyāḥ mud pakṣma rājīni vilocanāni
hariṇyaḥ ca mām samabodhayan
kīdṛśam tava āgati jñam
latā pradarśita mārgam a jānantam
tatas tāḥ mamyak abodhayan iti
yatas tāḥ tad apekṣayā kiñcid prabuddhāḥ iti
tāḥ ca kīdṛśyaḥ tathāvidha vaiśasa saṃdarśana vaśāt duḥkhita tvena parityakta tṛṇa grāsāḥ
kim kurvāṇāḥ tasyām diśi nayanāni samarpayantyaḥ
kīdṛśāni ūrdhvokṛta pakṣma paṅktīni

original: tadevaṃ tathāvidhasthānakayuktatvena dakṣiṇāṃ diśamantarikṣeṇa nīteti saṃjñayā nivedayantyaḥ /
analyzed: tat evam tathāvidha sthānaka yukta tvena dakṣiṇām diśam antarikṣeṇa nītā iti saṃjñayā nivedayantyaḥ

original: atra vṛkṣamṛgādiṣu liṅgāntareṣu saṃbhavatsvapi strīliṅgameva padārthaucityānusāreṇa cetanacamatkārakāritayā kaverabhipretam /
analyzed: atra vṛkṣa mṛga ādiṣu liṅga antareṣu saṃbhavatsu api strī liṅgam eva padārtha aucitya anusāreṇa cetana camatkāra kāri tayā kaveḥ abhipretam
tasmāt kām api vakra tām āvahati

original: evaṃ prātipadikalakṣaṇasya subantasaṃbhavinaḥ padapūrvārdhasya yathāsaṃbhavaṃ vakrabhāvaṃ
analyzed: evam prātipadika lakṣaṇasya sup anta saṃbhavinaḥ pada pūrva ardhasya yathāsaṃbhavam vakra bhāvam

original: vicāryedānīmubhayorapi suptiṅantayordhātusvarūpaḥ pūrvabhāgo yaḥ saṃbhavati tasya
analyzed: vicārya idānīm ubhayoḥ api sup tiṅ antayoḥ dhātu svarūpaḥ pūrva bhāgaḥ yaḥ saṃbhavati tasya
vakra tām vicārayati
tasya ca kriyā vaicitrya nibandhana gā iva vakra tvam vidyate

original: tasmāt kriyāvaicitryasyaiva kīdṛśāḥ kiyantaśca prakārāḥ saṃbhavantīti tatsvarūpanirūpaṇārthamāha---
analyzed: tasmāt kriyā vaicitryasya eva kīdṛśāḥ kiyantaḥ ca prakārāḥ saṃbhavanti iti tad svarūpa nirūpaṇa artham āha
karttuḥ ati antar aṅga tvam kartṛ antara vicitra tā
sva viśeṣaṇa vaicitryam upacāra manojña tā
kriyā vaicitrya vakra tva prakārāḥ te ime smṛtāḥ

original: kriyāvaicitryavakratvaprikārā dhātvarthavicitrabhāvavakratāprabhedāsta ime smṛtā varṇyamānasvarūpāḥ kīrtitāḥ /
analyzed: kriyā vaicitrya vakra tva prikārāḥ dhātvartha vicitra bhāva vakra tā prabhedāḥ te ime smṛtāḥ varṇyamāna svarūpāḥ kīrtitāḥ
kiyantaḥ pañca pañca saṃkhyā viśiṣṭāḥ
kīdṛśāḥ prastuta aucitya cāravaḥ

original: prastutaṃ varṇyamānaṃ vastu tasya yadaucityamucitabhāvastena cāravo ramaṇīyāḥ /
analyzed: prastutam varṇyamānam vastu tasya yat aucityam ucita bhāvaḥ tena cāravaḥ ramaṇīyāḥ
tatra prathamaḥ tāvat prakāraḥ yat kartuḥ ati antaraṅga tvam nāma

original: kartuḥ svatantratayā mukhyabhūtasya kārakasya kriyāṃ prati nirvartayituryadatyantaraṅgatvam atyantamāntaratamyam /
analyzed: kartuḥ svatantra tayā mukhya bhūtasya kārakasya kriyām prati nirvartayituḥ yat ati antaraṅga tvam atyantam āntaratamyam
yathā
cūḍāratna niṣaṇṇa durvaha jagat bhāra unnamat kandharaḥ dhattām uddhura tām asau bhagavataḥ śeṣasya mūrdhā param

original: svairaṃ saṃspṛśatīṣadapyavanatiṃ yasmin luṭhantyakramaṃ śūnye nūnamiyanti nāma bhuvanānyuddāmakampottaram // VjivC_2.82 //
analyzed: svairam saṃspṛśati īṣat api avanatim yasmin luṭhanti akramam śūnye nūnam iyanti nāma bhuvanāni uddāma kampa uttaram

original: atroddhuratā dhāraṇalakṣaṇakriyā kartuḥ phaṇīśvaramastakasya prastutaucityamāhātmyādantarbhāvaṃ yathā bhajate tathā nānyā kāciditi kriyāvaicitryavakratāmāvahati
analyzed: atra uddhura tā dhāraṇa lakṣaṇa kriyā kartuḥ phaṇīśvara mastakasya prastuta aucitya māhātmyāt antarbhāvam yathā bhajate tathā na anyā kācid iti kriyā vaicitrya vakra tām āvahati
yathā vā

original: kiṃ śobhitāhamanayeti pinākapāṇeḥ pṛṣṭasya pātu paricumbanamuttara vaḥ // VjivC_2.83 //
analyzed: kim śobhitā aham anayā iti pinākapāṇeḥ pṛṣṭasya pātu paricumbanam uttara vaḥ

original: atra cumbanavyatirekeṇa bhagavatā tathāvidhalokottaragaurī śobhātiśayābhidhānaṃ na kenacit kriyāntareṇa kartuṃ pāryata iti kriyāvaicitryanibandhanaṃ  #
analyzed: atra cumbana vyatirekeṇa bhagavatā tathāvidha lokottara gaurī śobhā atiśaya abhidhānam na kenacid kriyā antareṇa kartum pāryate iti kriyā vaicitrya nibandhanam
vakra bhāvam āvahati
yathā ca
ruddassa pavvai paricumbiam
rudrasya tṛtīya nayanam pārvatī paricumbitam jayati
iti chāyā

original: yathā vā siḍhiliacāo jaai maaraddhao // VjivC_2.85 //
analyzed: yathā vā
śithilīkṛta cāpaḥ jayati makaradhvajaḥ
iti chāyā

ayam aparaḥ kriyā vaicitrya vakra tāyāḥ prakāraḥ kartṛ antara vicitra tā
anyaḥ kartā kartā antaram tasmāt vicitra tā vaicitryam
prastuta tvāt sajātīya tvāt ca kartuḥ eva

original: etadeva ca tasya vaicitryaṃ yad kriyāmeva kartrantarāpekṣayā vicitrasvarūpāṃ saṃpādayati /
analyzed: etat eva ca tasya vaicitryam yat kriyām eva kartṛ antara apekṣayā vicitra svarūpām saṃpādayati
yathā

original: naikatra śaktiviratiḥ kvacidasti sarve bhāvāḥ svabhāvapariniṣṭhitatāratamyāḥ /

atra eka culakena ambhodhi pānam satata adhyavasāya ābhā āyāsa kāṣṭha adhirūḍhi prauḍha tvāt vāḍaba agneḥ kim api kriyā vaicitryam udvahat vakra tām unmīlayati

original: sa dahatu duritaṃ śāmbhavo vaḥ śarāgniḥ // VjivC_2.88 //
analyzed: sa dahatu duritam śāmbhavaḥ vaḥ śara agniḥ
etayoḥ vaicitryam pūrvam eva pradarśitam
