original: mukhyatayā prastutatvāt kriyāyāḥ svasyātmano yad viśeṣaṇaṃ bhedakaṃ tena vaicitryaṃ vicitrabhāvaḥ /
analyzed: mukhya tayā prastuta tvāt kriyāyāḥ svasya ātmanaḥ yat viśeṣaṇam bhedakam tena vaicitryam vicitra bhāvaḥ
yathā
iti udgate śaśini peśala kānti dūtī saṃlāpa saṃvalita locana mānasābhiḥ
agrāhi maṇḍana vidhiḥ viparīta bhūṣā vinyāsa hāsita sakhī janam aṅganābhiḥ

original: atra maṇḍanavidhigrahaṇalakṣaṇāyāḥ kriyāyā viparītabhūṣāvinyāsahāsitasakhījanamiti viśeṣaṇena kimapi saukumāryamunmīlitam /
analyzed: atra maṇḍana vidhi grahaṇa lakṣaṇāyāḥ kriyāyāḥ viparīta bhūṣā vinyāsa hāsita sakhī janam iti viśeṣaṇena kim api saukumāryam unmīlitam

original: yasmāttathāvidhādaroparacitaṃ prasādhanaṃ yasya vyañjakatvenopāttaṃ mukhyatayā varṇyamānavṛttervallabhānurāgasya so 'pyanena sutarāṃ samuttejitaḥ
analyzed: yasmāt tathāvidha ādara uparacitam prasādhanam yasya vyañjaka tvena upāttam mukhya tayā varṇyamāna vṛtteḥ vallabha anurāgasya saḥ pi anena sutarām samuttejitaḥ
yathā vā
mayi āsaktaḥ cakita hariṇī hāri netra tri bhāgaḥ
asya vaicitryam pūrvam eva uditam
etat ca kriyā viśeṣaṇam dvayoḥ api kriyā kārakayoḥ vakra tvam ullāsayati
yasmāt vicitra kriyā kāri tvam eva kāraka vaicitryam
idam aparam kriyā vaicitrya vakra tāyāḥ prakāra antaram upacāra manojña tā

original: upacāraḥ sādṛśyādisamanvayaṃ samāśritya dharmāntarādhyāropastena manojñatā vakratvam /
analyzed: upacāraḥ sādṛśya ādi samanvayam samāśritya dharma antara adhyāropaḥ tena manojña tā vakra tvam
yathā

original: tarantīvāṅgāni skhaladamalalāvaṇyajaladhau prathimnaḥ prāgalbhyaṃ stanajaghanamunmudrayati ca /
analyzed: taranti iva aṅgāni skhalat amala lāvaṇya jaladhau prathimnaḥ prāgalbhyam stana jaghanam unmudrayati ca

original: dṛśorlolārambhāḥ sphuṭamapavadante saralatāmaho sāraṅgākṣyāstaruṇimani gāḍhaḥ paricayaḥ // VjivC_2.91 //
analyzed: dṛśoḥ lola ārambhāḥ sphuṭam apavadante sarala tām aho sāraṅga akṣyāḥ taruṇimani gāḍhaḥ paricayaḥ
atra skhalat amala lāvaṇya jaladhau samullasat vimala saundarya saṃbhāra sindhau parisphura parispanda tayā
plavamāna tvena lakṣyamāṇāni pāra prāptim āsādayitum vyavasyanti iva iti cetana padārtha saṃbhavi sādṛśya upacārāt tāruṇya tarala taruṇī gātrāṇām
taraṇam utprekṣitam

original: utprekṣāyāścopacāra eva bhūyasā jīvitatvena parisphuratītyutprekṣāvasara eva vicārayiṣyate /
analyzed: utprekṣāyāḥ ca upacāraḥ eva bhūyasā jīvita tvena parisphurati iti utprekṣā avasare eva vicārayiṣyate
prathimnaḥ prāgalbhyam stana jaghanam unmudrayati ca iti

original: -atra stanajaghanaṃ kartṛ prathimnaḥ prāgalbhyaṃ mahattvasya prauḍhimunmudrayatyunmīlayati /
analyzed: atra stana jaghanam kartṛ prathimnaḥ prāgalbhyam mahattvasya prauḍhim unmudrayati unmīlayati

original: yathā kaściccetanaḥ kimapi rakṣaṇīyaṃ vastu mudrayitvā kamapi samayamavasthāpya samucitopayogāvasare svayamunmudrayatyuddhāṭayati,
analyzed: yathā kaścid cetanaḥ kim api rakṣaṇīyam vastu mudrayitvā kam api samayam avasthāpya samucita upayoga avasare svayam unmudrayati uddhāṭayati
tat evam tad kāri tva sāmyāt stana jaghanasya unmudraṇam uparitam

original: tadidamuktaṃ bhavati yad tadeva śaiśavadaśāyāṃ śaktyātmanā vimīlitasvarūpamanavasthitamāsīt,
analyzed: tat idam uktam bhavati yat tat eva śaiśava daśāyām śakti ātmanā vimīlita svarūpam anavasthitam āsīt

original: tasya prathimnaḥ prāgalbhyasya prathamataratāruṇyāvatārāvasarasamucitaṃ prathanaprasaraṃ samarpayati /
analyzed: tasya prathimnaḥ prāgalbhyasya prathamatara tāruṇya avatāra avasara samucitam prathana prasaram samarpayati
dṛśoḥ lola ārambhāḥ sphuṭam apavadante sarala tām iti

original: ---atra śaiśavapratiṣṭhitāṃ spaṣṭatāṃ prakaṭamevāpasārya dṛśorvilāsollāsāḥ kamapi navayauvanasamucitaṃ vibhramamadhiropayanti /
analyzed: atra śaiśava pratiṣṭhitām spaṣṭa tām prakaṭam eva apasārya dṛśoḥ vilāsa ullāsāḥ kam api nava yauvana samucitam vibhramam adhiropayanti

original: yathā keciccetanāḥ kutracidviṣaye kamapi vyavahāraṃ samāsāditaprasaramapasārya kimapi
analyzed: yathā kecid cetanāḥ kutracid viṣaye kam api vyavahāram samāsādita prasaram apasārya kim api
sva abhiprāya abhimatam parispanda antaram pratiṣṭhāpayanti iti tad kāri tva sādṛśyāt līlāvatī locana vilāsa ullāsānām
sarala tva apavadanam upacaritam
tat evaṃvidhena upacāreṇa etāḥ tistraḥ api vakratā prakārāḥ pratipadam saṃbhavanti iti avasara antare vicāryante
idam aparam kriyā vaicitrya vakra tāyāḥ prakāra antaram karma ādi saṃvṛtiḥ
karma prabhṛtīnām kārakāṇām saṃvṛtiḥ saṃvaraṇam
sā ca kriyā vaicitrya kāri tvāt prakāra tvena abhidhīyate
kāraṇe kārya upacārāt yathā

original: netrāntare madhuramarpayatīva kiñcit karṇāntike kathayatīva kimapyapūrvam /
analyzed: netra antare madhuram arpayatī iva kiñcid karṇa antike kathayatī iva kim api apūrvam

original: antaḥ samullikhati kiñcidivāsitākṣyā rāgālase manasi ramyapadārthalakṣmīḥ // VjivC_2.92 //
analyzed: antar samullikhati kiñcid iva asita akṣyāḥ rāga alase manasi ramya padārtha lakṣmīḥ

original: atra tadanubhavaikagocaratvādanākhyeyatvena kimapi sātiśayaṃ pratipadaṃ karma saṃpādayantyaḥ kriyāḥ svātmani kamapi vakrabhāvamudbhāvayanti
analyzed: atra tad anubhava eka gocara tvāt anākhyeya tvena kim api sa atiśayam pratipadam karma saṃpādayantyaḥ kriyāḥ sva ātmani kam api vakra bhāvam udbhāvayanti
upacāra manojña tā api atra vidyate
yasmāt arpaṇa kathana ullekhanāni upacāra nibandhanāni eva cetana padārtha dharma tvāt
yathā ca

original: nṛttārambhādviratarabhasastiṣṭha tāvanmuhūrtaṃ yāvanmaulau ślathamacalatāṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ te nayāmi /
analyzed: nṛtta ārambhāt virata rabhasaḥ tiṣṭha tāvat muhūrtam yāvat maulau ślatham acala tām bhūṣaṇam te nayāmi

original: ityākhyāya praṇayamadhuraṃ kāntayā yojyamāne cūḍācandre jayati sukhinaḥ ko 'pi śarvasya garvaḥ // VjivC_2.93 //
analyzed: iti ākhyāya praṇaya madhuram kāntayā yojyamāne cūḍā candre jayati sukhinaḥ kaḥ pi śarvasya garvaḥ

original: atra “ko 'pi' ityanena sarvanāmapadena tadanubhavaikagocaratvādavyapadeśyatvena sātiśayaḥ śarvasya garva iti kartṛsaṃvṛtiḥ /
analyzed: atra kaḥ pi iti anena sarvanāma padena tad anubhava eka gocara tvāt avyapadeśya tvena sa atiśayaḥ śarvasya garvaḥ iti kartṛ saṃvṛtiḥ
jayati sarva utkarṣeṇa vartate iti kriyā vaicitrya nibandhanam
iti ayam pada pūrva ardha vakra bhāvaḥ vyavasthitaḥ
diś mātram evam etasya śiṣṭam lakṣye nirūpyate
iti saṃgraha ślokaḥ

original: tadevaṃ suptiṅantayordvayorapi padapūrvārdhasya prātipadikasya dhātośca yathāyukti vakratāṃ vicāryedānīṃ tayoreva yathāsvamaparārdhasya pratyayalakṣaṇasya  #
analyzed: tat evam sup tiṅ antayoḥ dvayoḥ api pada pūrva ardhasya prātipadikasya dhātoḥ ca yathāyukti vakra tām vicārya idānīm tayoḥ eva yathāsvam apara ardhasya pratyaya lakṣaṇasya
vakra tām vicārayati

original: tatra kriyāvaicitryavakrātāyāḥ samanantarasaṃbhavinaḥ kramasamanvitatvāt kālasya vakratvaṃ paryālocyate,
analyzed: tatra kriyā vaicitrya vakrā tāyāḥ samanantara saṃbhavinaḥ krama samanvita tvāt kālasya vakra tvam paryālocyate
kriyā paricchedaka tvāt tasya
aucitya āntaratamyena samayaḥ ramaṇīya tām
yāti yatra bhavati eṣā kāla vaicitrya vakra tā
eṣā prakrānta svarūpā bhavati asti kāla vaicitrya vakra tā
kālaḥ vaiyākaraṇa ādi prasiddhaḥ vartamāna ādiḥ laṭ prabhṛti pratyaya vācyaḥ yaḥ padārthānām udaya tirodhāna vidhāyī
tasya vaicitryam vicitra bhāvaḥ tathāvidha tvena upanibandhaḥ tena vakra tā vakra tva vicchittiḥ

original: kīdṛśī---yatra yasyāṃ samayaḥkālākhyo ramaṇīyatāṃ yāti rāmaṇīyakaṃ gacchati /
analyzed: kīdṛśī iyatra yasyām samayaḥ kāla ākhyaḥ ramaṇīya tām yāti rāmaṇīyakam gacchati
kena hetunā aucitya āntaratamyena
prastuta tvāt prastāva adhikṛtasya vastunaḥ yat aucityam ucita bhāvaḥ tasya āntaratamyena antaraṅga tvena
tad atiśaya utpādaka tvena iti arthaḥ
yathā
sama visama nivvisesā samantataḥ manda manda saṃcārā

original: airā hohinti pahā maṇorahāṇaṃ pi dullaṅghā // VjivC_2.95 //
analyzed: airāḥ hohinti pahā maṇorahāṇam pi
sama viṣama nirviśeṣāḥ samantataḥ manda manda sañcārāḥ
acirāt bhaviṣyanti panthānaḥ manorathānām api durlaṅghyāḥ
iti chāyā

original: atra vallabhāvirahavaidhuryakātarāntaḥ karaṇena bhāvinaḥ samayasya saṃbhāvanānumānamahātmyamutprekṣya
analyzed: atra vallabhā viraha vaidhurya kātara antar karaṇena bhāvinaḥ samayasya saṃbhāvanā anumāna mahātmyam utprekṣya
uddīpana vibhāva tva vibhava vilasitam tad parispanda saundarya sandarśana a sahiṣṇunā kim api
bhaya visaṃṣṭhula tvam anubhūya śaṅkā ākula tvena kenacid etat abhidhīyate yat acirāt bhaviṣyanti

original: panthāno manorathānāmapyalaṅaghanīyā iti bhaviṣyatkālābhidhāyī pratyayaḥ kāmapi parārdhavakratāṃ vikāsayati /
analyzed: panthānaḥ manorathānām api alaṅaghanīyāḥ iti bhaviṣyat kāla abhidhāyī pratyayaḥ kām api parārdha vakra tām vikāsayati
yathā vā

original: yāvatkiñcidapūrvamārdramanasāmāvedayanto navāḥ saubhāgyātiśayasya kāmapi daśāṃ gantuṃ vyavasyantyamī /
analyzed: yāvat kiñcid apūrvam ārdra manasām āvedayantaḥ navāḥ saubhāgya atiśayasya kām api daśām gantum vyavasyanti amī

original: bhāvāstāvadananyajasya vidhuraḥ ko 'pyudyamo jṛmbhate paryāpte madhuvibhrame tu kimayaṃ karteti kampāmahe // VjivC_2.96 //
analyzed: bhāvāḥ tāvat ananyajasya vidhuraḥ kaḥ pi udyamaḥ jṛmbhate paryāpte madhu vibhrame tu kim ayam kartā iti kampāmahe

original: atra vyavasyanti jṛmbhate kartā kampāmahe ceti pratyayāḥ pratyekaṃ pratiniyatakālābhidhāyinaḥ kāmapi padaparārdhavakratāṃ prakhyāpayanti /
analyzed: atra vyavasyanti jṛmbhate kartā kampāmahe ca iti pratyayāḥ pratyekam pratiniyata kāla abhidhāyinaḥ kām api pada parārdha vakra tām prakhyāpayanti
tathā ca prathamatara avatīrṇa madhu samaya saukumārya samullasita sundara padāthra sārtha samunmeṣa samuddīpita sahaja vibhava vilasita tvena
makaraketoḥ manāk mātra mādhava sāmarthya samullasita atula śakteḥ sarasa hṛdaya vidhura tā vidhāyī
kaḥ pi saṃrambhaḥ samujjṛmbhate
tasmāt anena anumānena punar param paripoṣam adhirohati
kusumākara vibhava vibhrame māninī māna dalana durlalita samudita sahaja saukumārya saṃpad saṃjanita samucita jigīṣā avasaraḥ
kim asau vidhāsyati iti vikalpayantaḥ tad kusuma śara nikara nipāta kātara antar karaṇāḥ kim api

original: kampāmahe cakitacetasaḥ saṃpadyāmaha iti priyatamāvirahavidhuracetasaḥ sarasahṛdayasya
analyzed: kampāmahe cakita cetasaḥ saṃpadyāmahe iti priyatamā viraha vidhura cetasaḥ sa rasa hṛdayasya
kasyacid etat abhidhānam

original: evaṃ kālavakratāṃ vicārya kramasamucitāvasarāṃ kārakavakratāṃ vicārayati---
analyzed: evam kāla vakra tām vicārya krama samucita avasarām kāraka vakra tām vicārayati
yatra kāraka sāmānyam prādhānyena nibadhyate
tattva adhyāropaṇāt mukhya guṇa bhāva abhidhānataḥ
paripoṣayitum kāñcid bhaṅgī bhaṇiti ramya tām
kārakāṇām viparyāsaḥ sā uktā kāraka vakra tā
sā uktā kāraka vakra tā sā kāraka vakra tva vicchittiḥ abhihitā

original: kīdṛśī---yatra yasyāṃ kārakāṇāṃ viparyāsaḥ sādhanānāṃ viparivartanam,
analyzed: kīdṛśī i atra yasyām kārakāṇām viparyāsaḥ sādhanānām viparivartanam
gauṇa mukhyayoḥ itaretaratva āpattiḥ

original: katham---yat kārakasāmānyaṃ mukhyāpekṣayā karaṇādi tat prādhānyena nibadhyate mukhyabhāvena prayujyate /
analyzed: katham yat kāraka sāmānyam mukhya apekṣayā karaṇa ādi tat prādhānyena nibadhyate mukhya bhāvena prayujyate
kayā yuktyā tattva adhyāropaṇāt
tat iti mukhya parāmarśaḥ
tasya bhāvaḥ tattvam tad adhyāropaṇāt mukhya guṇa bhāva abhidhānataḥ
mukhyasya yaḥ guṇa bhāvaḥ tad abhidhānāt amukhya tvena upanibandhāt iti arthaḥ
kimartham paripoṣayitum kāñcid bhaṅgī bhaṇiti ramya tām
kāñcid apūrvām vicchiti ukti ramaṇīya tām ullāsayitum
tat evam acetanasya api cetana sabhavi svātantrya samarpaṇāt amukhyasya karaṇa ādeḥ vā kartṛ tva adhyāropaṇāt yatra kāraka viparyāsaḥ camatkāra kārī saṃpadyate
yathā

original: yāñcāṃ dainyaparigrahapraṇayinīṃ nekṣvākavaḥ śikṣitāḥ sevāsaṃvalitaḥ kadā raghukule maulau nibaddho 'ñjaliḥ /
analyzed: dainya parigraha praṇayinīm na ikṣvākavaḥ śikṣitāḥ sevā saṃvalitaḥ kadā raghu kule maulau nibaddhaḥ ñjaliḥ

original: sarvaṃ tadvihitaṃ tathāpyudadhinā naivoparodhaḥ kṛtaḥ pāṇiḥ saṃprati me haṭhāt kimaparaṃ spraṣṭuṃ dhanurdhāvati // VjivC_2.97 //
analyzed: sarvam tat vihitam tathā api udadhinā nā evā uparodhaḥ kṛtaḥ pāṇiḥ saṃprati me haṭhāt kim aparam spraṣṭum dhanuḥ dhāvati

original: atra pāṇinā dhanurgrahītumicchāmīti vaktavye pāṇeḥ karaṇabhūtasya kartṛtvādhyāropaḥ kāmapi kārakavakratāṃ pratipadyate /
analyzed: atra pāṇinā dhanuḥ grahītum icchāmi iti vaktavye pāṇeḥ karaṇa bhūtasya kartṛ tva adhyāropaḥ kām api kāraka vakra tām pratipadyate
yathā vā
stana dvandvam ityādau
yathā vā
niṣparyāya niveśa peśala rasaiḥ anyonya nirbhartsibhiḥ hasta agraiḥ yugapad napatya daśabhiḥ vāmaiḥ dhṛtam kārmukam

original: savyānāṃ punaraprathīyasi vidhāvasmin guṇāropaṇe matsevāviduṣāmahaṃprathamikā kāpyambare vartate // VjivC_2.99 //
analyzed: savyānām punar aprathīyasi vidhau asmin guṇa āropaṇe mad sevā viduṣām ahaṃprathamikā kā api ambare vartate
atra pūrvaṃvat eva kartṛ tva adhyāropa nibandhanam kāraka vakra tvam
yathā vā
baddha sparddhaḥ iti

original: evaṃ kārakavakratāṃ vicārya kramasamanvitāṃ saṃkhyāvakratāṃ vicārayati,
analyzed: evam kāraka vakra tām vicārya krama samanvitām saṃkhyā vakra tām vicārayati
tad paricchedaka tvāt saṃkhyāyāḥ
kurvanti kāvya vaicitrya vivakṣā paratantritāḥ

original: yatra saṃkhyāviparyāsaṃ tāṃ saṃkhyāvakratāṃ viduḥ // Vjiv_2.29 //
analyzed: yatra saṃkhyā viparyāsam tām saṃkhyāvakra tām viduḥ
yatra yasyām kavayaḥ kāvya vaicitrya vivakṣā paratantritāḥ sva karma vicitra bhāva abhidhitsā paravaśāḥ

original: saṃkhyāviparyāsaṃ vacanaviparivartanaṃ kurvanti vidadhate tāṃ saṃkhyāvakratāṃ viduḥ
analyzed: saṃkhyā viparyāsam vacana viparivartanam kurvanti vidadhate tām saṃkhyāvakra tām viduḥ
tad vacana vakra tvam jānanti tad vidaḥ

original: tadayamatrārthaḥ---yadekavacane dvivacane prayoktavye vaicitryārthaṃ vacanāntaraṃ yatra prayujyate,
analyzed: tat ayam atra arthaḥ yat ekavacane dvivacane prayoktavye vaicitrya artham vacana antaram yatra prayujyate
bhinna vacanayoḥ vā yatra sāmānādhikaraṇyam vidhīyate
yathā

original: kapole patrālī karatalanirodhena mṛditā nipīto niśvāsairayamamṛtahṛdyo 'dhararasaḥ /
analyzed: kapole patra ālī kara tala nirodhena mṛditā nipītaḥ niśvāsaiḥ ayam amṛta hṛdyaḥ dhara rasaḥ

original: muhuḥ kaṇṭhe lagnastaralayati bāṣpaḥ stanataṭīṃ priyo manyurjātastava niranurodhe na tu vayam // VjivC_2.101 //
analyzed: muhur kaṇṭhe lagnaḥ taralayati bāṣpaḥ stana taṭīm priyaḥ manyuḥ jātaḥ tava niranurodhe na tu vayam
atra na tu aham iti vaktavye

original: “na tu vayam' ityanantaraṅgatvapratipādanārthaṃ tāṭasthyapratītaye bahuvacanaṃ prayuktam /
analyzed: na tu vayam iti anantaraṅga tva pratipādana artham tāṭasthya pratītaye bahuvacanam prayuktam
yathā vā

original: vayaṃ tattvānveṣānmadhukara hatāstvaṃ khalu kṛtī // VjivC_2.102 //
analyzed: vayam tattva anveṣāt madhukara hatāḥ tvam khalu kṛtī
atrā api pūrvavat eva tāṭasthya pratītiḥ
yathā vā
phulla indīvara kānanāni nayane pāṇī saroja ākarāḥ
atra dvivacana bahuvacanayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇya lakṣaṇaḥ saṃkhyā viparyāsaḥ sahṛdaya hṛdaya hāri tām āvahati
yathā vā
śāstrāṇi cakṣuḥ navam iti
atra pūrvavat eva ekavacana bahuvacanayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyam vaicitrya vidhāyi

original: evaṃ saṃkhyāvakratāṃ vicārya tadviṣayatvāt puruṣāṇāṃ kramasamarpitāvasarāṃ puruṣavakratāṃ vicārayati---
analyzed: evam saṃkhyā vakra tām vicārya tad viṣaya tvāt puruṣāṇām krama samarpita avasarām puruṣa vakra tām vicārayati
pratyak tā para bhāvaḥ ca viparyāsena yojyate

original: yatra vicchittaye saiṣā jñeyā puruṣavakratā // Vjiv_2.30 //
analyzed: yatra vicchittaye sā eṣā jñeyā puruṣa vakra tā

original: yatra yasyāṃ pratyaktā nijātmabhāvaḥ parabhāvaśca anyatvamubhyamapyetadviparyāsena yojyate viparivartanena nibadhyate /
analyzed: yatra yasyām pratyaktā nija ātma bhāvaḥ para bhāvaḥ ca anya tvam ubhyam api etat viparyāsena yojyate viparivartanena nibadhyate
kimartham vicchittaye vaicitryāya

original: saiṣā varṇitasvarūpā jñeyā jñātavyā puruṣavakratā puruṣavakratvavicchittiḥ /
analyzed: sā eṣā varṇita svarūpā jñeyā jñātavyā puruṣa vakra tā puruṣa vakra tva vicchittiḥ

original: tadayamatrārthaḥ---yadanyasminnuttame madhyame vā puruṣe prayoktavye vaicitryāyānyaḥ kadācit prathamaḥ prayujyate /
analyzed: tat ayam atra arthaḥ yat anyasmin uttame madhyame vā puruṣe prayoktavye vaicitryāya anyaḥ kadācid prathamaḥ prayujyate

original: tasmācca puruṣaikayogakṣematvādasmādādeḥ prātipadikamātrasya ca viparyāsaḥ paryavasyati /
analyzed: tasmāt ca puruṣa eka yogakṣema tvāt asmāt ādeḥ prātipadika mātrasya ca viparyāsaḥ paryavasyati
yathā

original: kauśāmbīṃ paribhūya naḥ kṛpaṇakairvidveṣibhiḥ svīkṛtāṃ jānāmyeva tathā pramādaparatāṃ patyurnayadveṣiṇaḥ /
analyzed: kauśāmbīm paribhūya naḥ kṛpaṇakaiḥ vidveṣibhiḥ svīkṛtām jānāmi eva tathā pramāda para tām patyuḥ naya dveṣiṇaḥ

original: strīṇāṃ ca priyaviprayogavidhuraṃ cetaḥ sadaivātra me vaktuṃ notsahate manaḥ paramato jānātu devī svayam // VjivC_2.105 //
analyzed: strīṇām ca priya viprayoga vidhuram cetaḥ sadā eva atra me vaktum na utsahate manaḥ param atas jānātu devī svayam

original: atra “jānātu devī svayam' iti yuṣmadi madhyamapuruṣe prayoktavye prātipadikamātraprayogeṇa vaktustadaśakyānuṣṭhānatāṃ manyamānasyaudāsīnyapratītiḥ
analyzed: atra jānātu devī svayam iti yuṣmadi madhyamapuruṣe prayoktavye prātipadika mātra prayogeṇa vaktuḥ tad aśakya anuṣṭhāna tām manyamānasya audāsīnya pratītiḥ

original: tasyāśca prabhutvāt svātantryeṇa hitāhitavicārapūrvakaṃ svayameva kartavyārthapratipattiḥ kamapi vākyavakrabhāvamāvahati /
analyzed: tasyāḥ ca prabhu tvāt svātantryeṇa hita ahita vicāra pūrvakam svayam eva kartavya artha pratipattiḥ kam api vākya vakra bhāvam āvahati
yasmāt etat eva asya vākyasya jīvita tvena parisphurati
evam puruṣa vakratām vicārya puruṣa āśraya tvāt ātmanepada parasmaipadayoḥ ucita avasarām vakratām vicārayati

original: dhātūnāṃ lakṣaṇānusāreṇa niyatapadāśrayaḥ prayogaḥ pūrvācāryāṇām “upagraha'-śabdābhidheyatayā prasiddhaḥ /
analyzed: dhātūnām lakṣaṇa anusāreṇa niyata pada āśrayaḥ prayogaḥ pūrva ācāryāṇām upagraha śabda abhidheya tayā prasiddhaḥ
tasmāt tad abhidhānena eva vyavaharati
padayoḥ ubhayoḥ ekam aucityāt viniyujyate
śobhāyai yatra jalpanti tām upagraha vakra tām
tām ukta svarūpām upagraha vakra tām upagraha vakra tva vicchittim jalpanti kavayaḥ kathayanti

original: kīdṛśī---yatra yasyāṃ padayorubhayormadhyādevakamātmanepadaṃ parasmaipadaṃ vā viniyujyate vinibadhyate niyamena /
analyzed: kīdṛśī iyatra yasyām padayoḥ ubhayoḥ madhyāt devakam ātmanepadam parasmaipadam vā viniyujyate vinibadhyate niyamena
kasmāt kāraṇa ataucityāt
varṇyamānasya vastunaḥ yat aucityam ucita bhāvaḥ tasmāt
tam samāśritya iti arthaḥ
kimartham śobhāyai vicchittaye
yathā

original: tasyāpareṣvapi mṛgeṣu śarānmumukṣoḥ karṇāntametya bibhide nibiḍo 'pi muṣṭiḥ /
analyzed: tasya apareṣu api mṛgeṣu śarān mumukṣoḥ karṇa antam etya bibhide nibiḍaḥ u pi muṣṭiḥ
trāsa atimātra caṭulaiḥ smarayatsu netraiḥ prauḍha priyā nayana vibhrama ceṣṭitāni
atra rājñaḥ su lalita vilāsavatī locana vilāseṣu smaraṇa gocaram avataratsu tad parāyatta citta vṛtteḥ āṅgika prayatna parispanda vinivartamānaḥ muṣṭiḥ bibhide  /
bhidyate sma

original: svayameveti karmakartṛnibandhanamātmane padamatīva camatkārakāriṇīṃ kāmapi vākyavakratāmāvahati /
analyzed: svayam evā iti karma kartṛ nibandhanam ātmane padam atīva camatkāra kāriṇīm kām api vākya vakra tām āvahati
evam upagraha vakra tām vicārya tad anusaṃbhavinīm pratyaya antara vakra tām vicārayati
vihitaḥ pratyayāt anyaḥ pratyayaḥ kamanīya tām

original: yatra kāmapi puṣṇāti sānyā pratyayavakratā // Vjiv_2.32 //
analyzed: yatra kām api puṣṇāti sā anyā pratyaya vakra tā

original: sānyā pratyayavakratā sā samāmnātarūpādanyāparā kācit pratyayavakratvavicchittiḥ /
analyzed: sā anyā pratyaya vakra tā sā samāmnāta rūpāt anyā aparā kācid pratyaya vakra tva vicchittiḥ
asti iti saṃbandhaḥ

original: yatra yasyāṃ pratyayaḥ kāmapyapūrvāṃ kamanīyatāṃ ramyatāṃ puṣṇāti puṣyati /
analyzed: yatra yasyām pratyayaḥ kām api apūrvām kamanīya tām ramya tām puṣṇāti puṣyati
kīdṛśaḥ pratyayāt tiṅ ādeḥ vihitaḥ pada tvena vinirmitaḥ kaścid iti
yathā

original: līnaṃ vastuni yena sūkṣmasubhagaṃ tattvaṃ girā kṛṣyate nirmātuṃ prabhavenmanoharamidaṃ vācaiva yo vā bahiḥ /
analyzed: līnam vastuni yena sūkṣma subhagam tattvam girā kṛṣyate nirmātum prabhavet manoharam idam vācā eva yaḥ vā bahis

original: vande dvāvapi tāvahaṃ kavivarau vandetarāṃ taṃ punar- yo vijñātapariśramo 'yamanayorbhārāvatārakṣamaḥ // VjivC_2.107 //
analyzed: vande dvau api tau aham kavi varau vandetarām tam punar yaḥ vijñāta pariśramaḥ yam anayoḥ bhāra avatāra kṣamaḥ
vandetarām iti atra kā api pratyaya vakra tā kaveḥ cetasi parisphurati
tatas eva punar śabdaḥ pūrvasmāt viśeṣa abhidhāyi tvena prayuktaḥ

original: evaṃ nāmākhyātasvarūpayoḥ padayoḥ pratyekaṃ prakṛtyādyavayavavibhāgadvāreṇa yathāsaṃbhavaṃ
analyzed: evam nāma ākhyāta svarūpayoḥ padayoḥ pratyekam prakṛti ādi avayava vibhāga dvāreṇa yathāsaṃbhavam
vakra bhāvam vicārya idānīm upasarga nipātayoḥ avyutpanna tvāt asaṃbhavat vibhaktika tvāt ca
nirasta avayava tve sati avibhaktayoḥ sākalyena vakra tām vicārayati
rasa ādi dyotanam yasyām upasarga nipātayoḥ
vākya eka jīvita tvena sā aparā pada vakra tā
sā aparā samarpita sva rūpā aparā pūrva ukta vyatiriktā padavaka tva vicchittiḥ
asti iti saṃbandhaḥ
kīdṛśā iyasyām vakra tāyām upasarga nipātayoḥ vaiyākaraṇa prasiddha abhidhānayoḥ rasa ādi dyotanam śṛṅgāra prabhṛti prakāśanam
katham vākya eka jīvita tvena

original: vākyasya ślokāderekajīvitaṃ vākyaikajīvitaṃ tasya bhāvastattvaṃ tena /
analyzed: vākyasya śloka ādeḥ eka jīvitam vākya eka jīvitam tasya bhāvaḥ tattvam tena
tat idam uktam bhavati yat vākyasya eka sphurita bhāvena parisphurati yaḥ rasa ādiḥ tad prakāśanena iti arthaḥ
yathā

original: vaidehī tu kathaṃ bhaviṣyati hahā hā devi dhīrā bhava // VjivC_2.108 //
analyzed: vaidehī tu katham bhaviṣyati hahā hā devi dhīrā bhava
atra raghu pateḥ tad kāla jvalita uddīpana vibhāva saṃpad samullāsitaḥ saṃbhramaḥ niścita janita jānakī vipatti saṃbhāvanaḥ tad paritrāṇa karaṇa utsāha kāraṇatām
pratipadyamānaḥ te ekāgra tā ullikhita sākṣātkāraḥ tad ākāra tayā vismṛta viprakarṣaḥ pratyagra rasa parispanda sundaraḥ
nipāta paraṃparā pratipādyamāna vṛttiḥ vākya eka jīvita tvena pratibhāsamānaḥ kām api vākya vakra tām samunmīlayati
tuśabdasya ca vakra bhāvaḥ pūrvam eva vyākhyātaḥ
yathā vā

original: ayamekapade tayā viyogaḥ priyayā copanataḥ suduḥsaho me /
analyzed: ayam eka pade tayā viyogaḥ priyayā ca upanataḥ su duḥsahaḥ me
nava vāridhara udayāt ahobhiḥ bhavitavyam ca nirātapa tva ramyaiḥ
atra dvayoḥ parasparam su duḥsaha tva uddīpana sāmarthya sametayoḥ priyā viraha varṣā kālayoḥ tulya kālatva pratipādana param
caśabda dvitayam sama samaya samullasita vahni dāha dakṣa dakṣiṇa vāta vyajana samāna tām
samarthayat kām api vākya vakra tām samuddīpayati
duḥśabdābhyām ca priyā virahasya aśakya pratīkāra tā pratīyate

original: mukhamaṃsavivarti pakṣmalākṣyāḥ kathamapyunnamitaṃ na cumbitaṃ tu // VjivC_2.110 //
analyzed: mukham aṃsa vivarti pakṣma lākṣyāḥ katham api unnamitam na cumbitam tu

etat uttaratra pratyaya vakra tvam evaṃvidha pratyaya antara vakra bhāva antarbhūta tvāt pṛthaktvena na uktam iti svayam eva utprekṣaṇīyam

original: yena śyāmaṃ vapuratitarāṃ kāntimāpatsyate te barheṇeva sphuritarucinā gopaveṣasya viṣaṇoḥ // VjivC_2.111 //
analyzed: yena śyāmam vapuḥ atitarām kāntim āpatsyate te barheṇa iva sphurita rucinā gopa veṣasya viṣaṇoḥ
atra atitarām iti atīva camatkāra kāri
evam anyeṣām api sajātīya lakṣaṇa dvāreṇa lakṣaṇa niṣpattiḥ svayam anusartavyā

iti antara ślokaḥ
yadi evam ekasya api vakra tā prakārasya yat evaṃvidhaḥ mahimā

original: tadete bahavaḥ saṃpatitāḥ santaḥ kiṃ saṃpādayantītyāha---
analyzed: tat ete bahavaḥ saṃpatitāḥ santaḥ kim saṃpādayanti iti āha
parasparasya śobhāyai bahavaḥ patitāḥ kvacid

original: kvacidekasmin padamātre vākye vā vakratāprakārā vakratvaprabhedā bahavaḥ prabhūtāḥ patitāḥ kavipratibhāmāhātmyasamullasitāḥ /
analyzed: kvacid ekasmin pada mātre vākye vā vakra tā prakārāḥ vakra tva prabhedāḥ bahavaḥ prabhūtāḥ patitāḥ kavi pratibhā māhātmya samullasitāḥ

original: atra kriyāpadānāṃ trayāṇāmapi pratyekaṃ triprakāraṃ vaicitryaṃ parisphurati---kriyāvaicitryaṃ kārakavaicitryaṃ kālavaicitryaṃ ca /
analyzed: atra kriyā padānām trayāṇām api pratyekam tri prakāram vaicitryam parisphurati kriyā vaicitryam kāraka vaicitryam kāla vaicitryam ca

original: tadevamete bahavo vakratāprakārā ekasmin pade vākye vā saṃpatitāścitracchāyāmanoharāmetāmeva cetanacamatkārakāriṇīṃ vākyavakratāmāvahanti /
analyzed: tat evam ete bahavaḥ vakra tā prakārāḥ ekasmin pade vākye vā saṃpatitāḥ citra chāyā manoharām etām eva cetana camatkāra kāriṇīm vākya vakra tām āvahanti

original: evaṃ nāmākhyāto pasarganipātalakṣaṇasya caturvidhasyāpi padasya yathāsaṃbhavaṃ vakratāprakārān vicāryedānīṃ prakaraṇamupasaṃhṛtyānyadavatārayati---
analyzed: evam caturvidhasya api padasya yathāsaṃbhavam vakra tā prakārān vicārya idānīm prakaraṇam upasaṃhṛtya anyat avatārayati

original: vāgvallyāḥ padapallavāspadatayā yā vakratodbhāsinī vicchittiḥ sarasatvasaṃpaducitā kāpyujjvalā jṛmbhate /
analyzed: vāgvallyāḥ pada pallava āspada tayā yā vakra tā udbhāsinī vicchittiḥ sarasa tva saṃpad ucitā kā api ujjvalā jṛmbhate

original: tāmālocya vidagdhaṣaṭpadagaṇairvākyaprasūnāśrayaṃ sphārāmodamanoharaṃ madhu navotkaṇṭhākulaṃ pīyatām // Vjiv_2.35 //
analyzed: tām ālocya vidagdha ṣaṭpada gaṇaiḥ vākya prasūna āśrayam sphāra āmoda manoharam madhu nava utkaṇṭhā ākulam pīyatām

original: vāgeva vallī vāṇīlatā tasyāḥ kāpyalaukikī vicchittirjṛsbhate śobhā samallasati /

original: padānyeva pallavāni suptiṅantānyeva patrāṇi tadāspadatayā tadāśrayatvena /

rasavat tva atiśaya upapannā

original: kiṃviśiṣṭā ca---vakratayā vakrabhāvenodbhāsate bhrājate yā sā tathoktā /

kīdṛśam vākya prasūna āśrayam

original: vākyānyeva padasamudāyarūpāṇi prasūnāni puṣpāṇyāśrayaḥ sthānaṃ yasya tattathoktam /

sphāraḥ sphītaḥ saḥ avāmodaḥ tad dharma viśeṣaḥ tena manoharam hṛdaya hāri
katham āsvādya tā āmnava utkaṇṭhā ākulam nūtana utkalikā vyagram
madhukara samūhāḥ khalu vallyāḥ prathama ullasita pallava ullekham ālocya pratita cetasaḥ samanantara udbhinna vastu su kumāra kusuma makaranda pāna mahā utsavam anubhavanti

original: tadvadeva sahṛdayāḥ padāspadaṃ kāmapi vakratāvicchittimālocya navotkalikākalitacetaso vākyāśrayaṃ kimapi vakratājīvitasarvasvaṃ vicārayantviti  #
analyzed: tadvat eva sahṛdayāḥ pada āspadam kām api vakra tā vicchittim ālocya nava utkalikā kalita cetasaḥ vākya āśrayam kim api vakra tā jīvita sarvasvam vicārayantu iti
tātparyārthaḥ
atra ekatra sa rasa tvam sva samaya saṃbhavi rasa ārdra tvam
vakra tā ekatra bāla indu sundara saṃsthāna yukta tvam
itaratra rūḍhi ādi vaicitryam
vicchittiḥ ekatra su vibhakta patra tvam
anyatra kavi kauśala kamanīya tā
ujjvala tvam ekatra parṇa chāyā atiśaya yukta tvam aparatra saṃniveśa saundarya samudayaḥ

vākyeṣu tad vid āhlāda kāri tā
madhu kusumeṣu makarandaḥ
vākyeṣu sakala kāvya kāraṇa kalāpa saṃpad samudayaḥ iti

original: iti śrīrājānakakuntakaviracite vakroktijīvite kāvyālaṅkāre dvitīya unmeṣaḥ / ====================================================================
analyzed: iti śrī rājānaka kuntaka viracite vakroktijīvite kāvyālaṅkāre dvitīyaḥ unmeṣaḥ

original: vakroktijīvitam tṛtīyonmeṣaḥ evaṃ pūrvasmin prakaraṇe vākyāvayavānāṃ padānāṃ yathāsaṃbhava vakrabhāvaṃ vicārayan vācakavakratāvicchittiprakāraṇāṃ  #
analyzed: vakrokti jīvitam tṛtīya unmeṣaḥ evam pūrvasmin prakaraṇe vākya avayavānām padānām yathā saṃbhava vakra bhāvam vicārayan vācaka vakra tā vicchitti prakāraṇām
diś pradarśanam vihitavān

original: idānīṃ vākyavakratāvaicitryamāsūtrayirtu vācyasya varṇanīyatayā prastāvādhikṛtasya vastuno vakrātāsvarūpaṃ nirūpayati,
analyzed: idānīm vākya vakra tā vaicitrya māsūtrayiḥ tu vācyasya varṇanīya tayā prastāva adhikṛtasya vastunaḥ vakrā tā svarūpam nirūpayati
padārtha avabodha pūrvaka tvāt vākya artha avasiteḥ
udāra sva parispanda sundara tvena varṇanam
vastunaḥ vakra śabda eka gocara tvena vakra tā
vastunaḥ varṇanīya tayā prastāvitasya padārthasya

original: yadevaṃvidhatvena varṇanaṃ sā tasya vakratā vakratvavicchittiḥ /
analyzed: yat evaṃvidha tvena varṇanam sā tasya vakra tā vakra tva vicchittiḥ
kiṃvidha tvena iti āha audāra sva parispanda sundara tvena

original: udāraḥ sotkarṣaḥ sarvātiśāyī yaḥ svaparispandaḥ svabhāvamahimā tasya sundaratvaṃ saukumāryātiśayastena,
analyzed: udāraḥ sa utkarṣaḥ sarva atiśāyī yaḥ sva parispandaḥ svabhāva mahimā tasya sundara tvam saukumārya atiśayaḥ tena
atyanta ramaṇīya svābhāvika dharma yukta tvena
varṇanam pratipādanam
katham vakra śabda eka gocara tvena

original: vakro yo 'sau nānāvidhavakratāviśiṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ kaścideva vācakaviśeṣo vivakṣitārthasamarpaṇa samarthastasyaivaikasya kevalasya gocaratvena pratipādyatayā  #
analyzed: vakraḥ sau nānāvidha vakra tā viśiṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ kaścid eva vācaka viśeṣaḥ vivakṣita artha samarpaṇa samarthaḥ tasya eva ekasya kevalasya gocara tvena pratipādya tayā
viṣaya tvena
vācya tvena iti na uktam
vyaṅgya tvena api pratipādana saṃbhavāt

original: tadidamuktaṃ bhavati---yadevaṃvidhe bhāvasvabhāvasausumāryavarṇanaprastāve bhūyasāṃ na vācyālaṅkārāṇāmupamādīnāmupayogayogyatā saṃbhavati,
analyzed: tat idam uktam bhavati yat evaṃvidhe bhāva svabhāva sausumārya varṇana prastāve bhūyasām na vācya alaṅkārāṇām upamā ādīnām upayoga yogyatā saṃbhavati
svabhāva saukumārya atiśaya mlāna tā prasaṅgāt

original: nanu ca saiṣā sahṛdayāhlādakāriṇī svabhāvoktiralaṅkāratayā samāmnāt,
analyzed: nanu ca sā eṣā sahṛdaya āhlāda kāriṇī svabhāva uktiḥ alaṅkāra tayā samāmnāt
tasmāt kim tad daṣaṇa durvyasana prayāsena
yatas teṣām sāmānya vastu dharma mātram alaṅkāryam
sa atiśaya svabhāva saundarya paripoṣaṇam alaṅkāraḥ pratibhāsate

original: tena svabhāvokteralaṅkāratvameva yuktiyuktamiti ye manyante tān prati samādhīyate---tadetannāticaturastram /
analyzed: tena svabhāvokteḥ alaṅkāra tvam eva yukti yuktam iti ye manyante tān prati samādhīyate tat etat na ati caturastram
yasmāt agatika gati nyāyena kāvya karaṇam na yathā kathañcid anuṣṭheya tām arhati
kiñca anutkṛṣṭa dharma yuktasya varṇanīyasya alaṅkaraṇam api asamucita bhitti bhāga ullikhita ālekhya vat na śobhā atiśaya kāri tām āvahati
yasmāt atyanta ramaṇīya svābhāvika dharma yuktam varṇanīya vastu parigrahaṇīyam
tathāvidhasya tasya yathāyogam aucitya anusāreṇa rūpaka ādi alaṅkāra yojanayā bhavitavyam

original: etāvāṃstu viśeṣo yat svābhāvikasaukumāryaprādhānyena vivakṣitasya na bhūyasā rūpakādyalaṅkāraupakārāya kalpate,
analyzed: etāvān tu viśeṣaḥ yat svābhāvika saukumārya prādhānyena vivakṣitasya na bhūyasā rūpaka ādi alaṅkāra aupakārāya kalpate
vastu svabhāva saukumāryasya rasa ādi paripoṣaṇasya vā samācchādana prasaṅgāt

original: tathā caitasmin viṣaye sarvākāramalaṅkāryaṃ vilāsavatīva snānasamaya-virahavrataparigraha-suratāvasānādau nātyantamalaṅkaraṇasahatāṃ pratipadyate,
analyzed: tathā ca etasmin viṣaye sarvākāram alaṅkāryam vilāsavatī iva snāna samaya viraha vrata parigraha surata avasāna ādau na atyantam alaṅkaraṇa saha tām pratipadyate
svābhāvika saukumāryasya eva rasika hṛdaya āhlāda kāri tvāt
yathā

original: tāṃ prāṅmukhīṃ tatra niveśya tanvīṃ kṣaṇaṃ vyalambanta puro niṣaṇṇāḥ /
analyzed: tām prāc mukhīm tatra niveśya tanvīm kṣaṇam vyalambanta puras niṣaṇṇāḥ
bhūta artha śobhā hriyamāṇa netrāḥ prasādhane saṃnihite nāryaḥ
atra tathāvidha svabhāvika saukumārya manoharaḥ śobhā atiśayaḥ kaveḥ pratipādayitum abhipretaḥ
asyāḥ alaṅkaraṇa kalāpa kalanam sahaja chāyā tirodhāna śaṅkā āspada tvena saṃbhāvitam
yasmāt svābhāvika saukumārya prādhānyena varṇyamānasya udāra sva parispanda mahimnaḥ sahaja chāyā tirodhāna vidhāyi pratīti antara apekṣam alaṅkaraṇa kalpanam
na upakāri tām pratipadyate
viśeṣataḥ tu rasa paripoṣa peśalāyāḥ pratīteḥ vibhāva anubhāva vyabhicāri aucitya vyatirekeṇa prakāra antareṇa pratipattiḥ prastuta śobhā parihāra kāri tām āvahati
tathā ca prathamatara taruṇī tāruṇya avatāra prabhṛtayaḥ padārthāḥ su kumāra vasanta ādi samaya samunmeṣa paripoṣa parisamāpti prabhṛtayaḥ ca

original: svapratipādakavākyavakratāvyatirekeṇa bhūyasā na kasyacidalaṅkaraṇāntarasya kavibhiralaṅkaraṇīyatāmupanīyamānāḥ paridṛśyante /
analyzed: sva pratipādaka vākya vakra tā vyatirekeṇa bhūyasā na kasyacid alaṅkaraṇa antarasya kavibhiḥ alaṅkaraṇīya tām upanīyamānāḥ paridṛśyante
yathā

original: smitaṃ kiñcinmugdhaṃ taralamadhuro dṛṣṭivibhavaḥ parispando vācāmabhinavavilāsoktisarasaḥ /
analyzed: smitam kiñcid mugdham tarala madhuraḥ dṛṣṭi vibhavaḥ parispandaḥ vācām abhinava vilāsa ukti sarasaḥ

original: gatānāmārambhaḥ kisalayitalīlāparimalaḥ spṛśantyāstāruṇyaṃ kimiva hi na ramyaṃ mṛgadṛśaḥ // VjivC_3.2 //
analyzed: gatānām ārambhaḥ kisalayita līlā parimalaḥ spṛśantyāḥ tāruṇyam kim iva hi na ramyam mṛga dṛśaḥ
yathā vā

original: avyutpannamanobhavā madhurimasparśollasanmānasā bhinnāntaḥ karaṇaṃ dṛśau mukulayantyāghrātabhūtodbhramāḥ /
analyzed: avyutpanna manobhavāḥ madhurima sparśa ullasat mānasāḥ bhinna antar karaṇam dṛśau mukulayanti āghrāta bhūta udbhramāḥ

original: rāgecchāṃ na samāpayanti manasaḥ khedaṃ vinaivālasā vṛttāntaṃ na vidanti yānti ca vaśaṃ kanyā manojanmanaḥ // VjivC_3.3 //
analyzed: rāga icchām na samāpayanti manasaḥ khedam vinā eva alasāḥ vṛttāntam na vidanti yānti ca vaśam kanyāḥ manaḥ janmanaḥ
yathā ca
dormūla avadhi iti
yathā vā

original: garbhagranthiṣu vīrudhāṃ sumanaso madhye 'ṅkuraṃ pallavā vāñchāmātraparigrahaḥ pikavadhūkaṇṭhodare pañcamaḥ /
analyzed: garbhagranthiṣu vīrudhām sumanasaḥ madhye ṅkuram pallavāḥ vāñchā mātra parigrahaḥ pika vadhū kaṇṭha udare pañcamaḥ

original: kiṃ ca trīṇi jaganti jiṣṇu divasairdvitrairmanojanmano devasyāpi cirojjhitaṃ yadi bhavedabhyāsavaśyaṃ dhanuḥ // VjivC_3.5 //
analyzed: kim ca trīṇi jaganti jiṣṇu divasaiḥ dvitraiḥ manaḥ janmanaḥ devasya api cira ujjhitam yadi bhavet abhyāsa vaśyam dhanuḥ
yathā vā
haṃsānām ninadeṣu iti
yathā ca

original: sajjehi surahimāso ṇa dāva appei juaijaṇalakkhasahe /
analyzed: sajjehi surahi māsaḥ ṇa dāva
ahi naa saha āra muhe ṇava pallava pattale aṇaṅgassa sare
sajjayati surabhi māsaḥ na tāvat arpayati yuvati jana lakṣya sahān
abhīnava sahakāra mukhān nava pallava patralān anaṅgasya śarān
iti chāyā

original: evaṃvidhaviṣaye svābhāvikasaukumāryaprādhānyena varṇyamānasya vastunastadācchādanabhayādeva na bhūyasā tatkavibhiralaṅkaraṇamupanibadhyate
analyzed: evaṃvidha viṣaye svābhāvika saukumārya prādhānyena varṇyamānasya vastunaḥ tad ācchādana bhayāt eva na bhūyasā tat kavibhiḥ alaṅkaraṇam upanibadhyate

original: yadi vā kadācidupanibadhyate tattadeva svābhāvikaṃ saukumāryaṃ sutarāṃ samunmīlayitum,
analyzed: yadi vā kadācid upanibadhyate tat tat eva svābhāvikam saukumāryam sutarām samunmīlayitum
na punar alaṅkāra vaicitrya upapattaye
yathā

original: dhautāñjane ca nayane sphaṭikācchakāntir- gaṇḍasthalī vigatakṛtrimarāgamoṣṭham /
analyzed: dhauta añjane ca nayane sphaṭika accha kāntiḥ gaṇḍa sthalī vigata kṛtrima rāgam oṣṭham

original: aṅgāni dantiśiśudantavinirmalāni kiṃ yanna sundaramabhuttaruṇījanasya // VjivC_3.8 //
analyzed: aṅgāni danti śiśu danta vinirmalāni kim yat na sundaram abhut taruṇī janasya
atra danti śiśu danta vinirmalāni iti upamayā svābhāvikam eva saundaryam unmīlitam
yathā vā
a kaṭhora vāraṇa vadhū danta aṅkura spardhinaḥ iti
etat eva atīva yukta yuktam

original: yasmānmahākavīnāṃ prastutaucityānurodhena kadācit svābhāvikameva saundaryamaikarājyena vijṛmbhayitumabhipretaṃ bhavati,
analyzed: yasmāt mahā kavīnām prastuta aucitya anurodhena kadācid svābhāvikam eva saundaryam aikarājyena vijṛmbhayitum abhipretam bhavati
kadācid
atra pūrvasmin pakṣe
rūpaka ādeḥ alaṅkāraṇa kalāpasya na ati ādṛta tvam
aparasmin punar saḥ eva sutarām samujjṛmbhate

original: tasmādanena nyāyena sarvātiśāyinaḥ svābhāvikasaundaryalakṣaṇasya padārthaparispandasyālaṅkāryatvameva yuktiyuktatāmālambate,
analyzed: tasmāt anena nyāyena sarva atiśāyinaḥ svābhāvika saundarya lakṣaṇasya padārtha parispandasya alaṅkārya tvam eva yukti yukta tām ālambate
na punar alaṅkāraṇa tvam
sātiśaya tva śūnya dharma yuktasya vastunaḥ vibhūṣitasya api piśāca ādeḥ iva tadvid āhlāda kāri tva virahāt anupādeyatvam eva iti alam atiprasaṅgena

original: yadi vā prastutaucityamāhātmyānmukyatayā bhāvasvabhāvaḥ sātiśayatvena varṇyamānaḥ
analyzed: yadi vā prastuta aucitya māhātmyāt mukya tayā bhāva svabhāvaḥ sātiśaya tvena varṇyamānaḥ
sva mahimnā bhūṣaṇa antara asahiṣṇuḥ svayam eva śobhā atiśaya śāli tvāt alaṅkārya upi alaṅkaraṇam iti abhidhīyate
tat ayam āsmākīnaḥ eva pakṣaḥ
tad atirikta vṛtteḥ alaṅkāra antarasya tiraskāra tātparyeṇa abhidhānāt na atra vayam vivadāmahe
evam eṣā eva varṇyamānasya vastunaḥ vakra tā iti uta anyā kācid asti iti āha
aparā sahaja āhārya kavi kauśala śālinī
nirmitiḥ nūtana ullekha loka atikrānta gocarā

original: aparā dvitīyā varṇyamānavṛtteḥ padārthasya nirmitiḥ sṛṣṭiḥ /
analyzed: aparā dvitīyā varṇyamāna vṛtteḥ padārthasya nirmitiḥ sṛṣṭiḥ
vakra tā iti saṃbandhaḥ
kīdṛśī sahaja āhārya kavi kauśala śālinī

original: sahajaṃ svābhāvikamāhāryaṃ śikṣābhāyāsasamullāsitaṃ ca śaktivyutpattiparipākaprauḍhaṃ yat kavikauśalaṃ nirmātṛnaipuṇaṃ tena śālate ślāghyate  #
analyzed: sahajam svābhāvikam āhāryam śikṣā bhā āyāsa samullāsitam ca śakti vyutpatti paripāka prauḍham yat kavi kauśalam nirmātṛ naipuṇam tena śālate ślāghyate  /
yā sā tathā uktā
anyat ca kīdṛśī nūtana ullekha loka atikrānta gocarā
nūtanaḥ tad prathamaḥ saḥ ullikhyate iti ullekhaḥ tad kālam ullikhyamāna atiśayaḥ

original: tena lokātikrāntaḥ prasiddhavyāpārātītaḥ ko 'pi sarvātiśāyī gocaro viṣayo yasyāḥ sā tathokteti vigrahaḥ /
analyzed: tena loka atikrāntaḥ prasiddha vyāpāra atītaḥ kaḥ pi sarva atiśāyī gocaraḥ viṣayaḥ yasyāḥ sā tathā uktā iti vigrahaḥ
nirmitiḥ tena rūpeṇa vihitiḥ iti arthaḥ

original: tadidamatra tātparyam--- yanna varṇyamānasvarūpāḥ padārthāḥ kavibhirabhūtāḥ santaḥ kriyante,
analyzed: tat idam atra tātparyam yat na varṇyamāna svarūpāḥ padārthāḥ kavibhiḥ abhūtāḥ santaḥ kriyante

original: kevalaṃ sattāmātreṇaiva parisphuratāṃ teṣāṃ tathāvidhaḥ ko 'pyatiśayaḥ purādhīyate,
analyzed: kevalam sattā mātreṇa eva parisphuratām teṣām tathāvidhaḥ kaḥ pi atiśayaḥ purā ādhīyate
yena kām api sahṛdaya hṛdaya hāriṇīm ramaṇīya tām adhiropyante
tat idam uktam
līnam vastuni
ityādi

original: tadevaṃ sattāmātreṇaiva parisphurataḥ padārthasya ko 'pyalaukikaḥ śobhātiśayavidhāyī vicchittiviśeṣo 'bhidhīyate,
analyzed: tat evam sattā mātreṇa eva parisphurataḥ padārthasya kaḥ pi alaukikaḥ śobhā atiśaya vidhāyī vicchitti viśeṣaḥ bhidhīyate

original: yena nūtanacchāyāmano hāriṇā vāstavasthititirodhānapravaṇena nijāvabhāsodbhāsitasvarūpeṇa tatkālollikhita iva varṇanīyapadārthaparispandamahimā
analyzed: yena nūtana chāyā manaḥ hāriṇā vāstava sthiti tirodhāna pravaṇena nija avabhāsa udbhāsita svarūpeṇa tad kāla ullikhitaḥ iva varṇanīya padārtha parispanda mahimā
yena vidhātṛ vyapadeśa pātra tām pratipadyante kavayaḥ
tat idam uktam
apāre kāvya saṃsāre kaviḥ eva prajāpatiḥ

original: yathāsmai rocate viśvaṃ tathedaṃ parivartate // VjivC_3.11 //
analyzed: yathā asmai rocate viśvam tathā idam parivartate

original: saiṣā sahajāryabhedabhinnā varṇanīyasya vastuno dviprakārā vakratā /
analyzed: sā eṣā sahaja ārya bheda bhinnā varṇanīyasya vastunaḥ dvi prakārā vakra tā
tat evam āhāryā yā iyam sā prastuta vicchitti vidhāpi alaṅkāra vyatirekeṇa nā anyā kācid upapadyate
tasmāt bahuvidha tad prakāra prabheda dvāreṇa atyanta vitata vyavahārāḥ paridṛśyante
yathā

original: asyāḥ sargavidhau prajapatirabhūccandro nu kāntadyutiḥ śṛṅgāraikarasaḥ svayaṃ nu madano māso nu puṣpākaraḥ /
analyzed: asyāḥ sarga vidhau praja patiḥ abhūt candraḥ nu kānta dyutiḥ śṛṅgāra eka rasaḥ svayam nu madanaḥ māsaḥ nu puṣpa ākaraḥ

original: vedābhyāsajaḍaḥ kathaṃ nu viṣayavyāvṛttakautūhalo nirmātuṃ prabhavenmanoharamidaṃ rūpaṃ purāṇo muniḥ // VjivC_3.12 //
analyzed: veda abhyāsa jaḍaḥ katham nu viṣaya vyāvṛtta kautūhalaḥ nirmātum prabhavet manoharam idam rūpam purāṇaḥ muniḥ

original: atra kāntāyāḥ kimapi kāntimattvamasamavilāsasaṃpadāṃ padaṃ ca rasavattvamasāmānyasauṣṭhavaṃ
analyzed: atra kāntāyāḥ kim api kāntimat tvam asama vilāsa saṃpadām padam ca rasavat tvam asāmānya sauṣṭhavam
ca saukumāryam pratipādayitum pratyekam tad parispanda prādhānya samucita saṃbhāvanā anumāna māhātmyāt
pṛthak pṛthak apūrvam eva nirmāṇam utprekṣitam

original: tathā ca kāraṇatritayasyāpyetasya sarveṣāṃ viśeṣaṇānāṃ svayam iti saṃbadhyamānametadeva sutarāṃ samuddīpayati /
analyzed: tathā ca kāraṇa tritayasya api etasya sarveṣām viśeṣaṇānām svayam iti saṃbadhyamānam etat eva sutarām samuddīpayati

original: yaḥ kila svayameva kāntadyutistasya saujanyasamucitādarocakitvāt kāntikatkāryakaraṇakauśalamevopapannam /
analyzed: yaḥ kila svayam eva kānta dyutiḥ tasya saujanya samucitāt arocaki tvāt kāntikatkārya karaṇa kauśalam evā upapannam

original: yaśca svayameva śṛṅgāraikarasastasya rasikatvāde rasavadvastuvidhānavaidagdhyamaucityaṃ bhajate /
analyzed: yaḥ ca svayam eva śṛṅgāra eka rasaḥ tasya rasika tva ādeḥ rasavat vastu vidhāna vaidagdhyam aucityam bhajate

original: yaśca svayameva puṣpākarastasyābhijātyādeva tathāvidhaḥ sukumāra eva sargaḥ samucitaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ ca svayam eva puṣpākaraḥ tasya ābhijātyāt eva tathāvidhaḥ su kumāraḥ eva sargaḥ samucitaḥ
tathā ca uttara ardhe vyatireka mukhena trayasya api etasya kāntimat tva ādeḥ viśeṣaṇaiḥ anyathā anupapattiḥ upapāditā
viṣaya vyāvṛtta kautuka tvāt rasavat padārthe vihita vaimukhyam
purāṇa tvāt saukumārya sarasa bhāva viracana vairasyam prajāpateḥ pratīyate
tat evam utprekṣā lakṣaṇaḥ yam alaṅkāraḥ kavinā varṇanīyasya vastunaḥ kam api alaukika ullekha vilakṣaṇam atiśayam ādhātum a nibaddhaḥ

original: sa ca svabhāvasaundaryamahimnā svayameva tatsahāyasaṃpadā mahārghamahanīyatāmīhamānaḥ sandehasaṃsargamaṅgīkarotīti tenopabṛṃhitaḥ /
analyzed: sa ca svabhāva saundarya mahimnā svayam eva tad sahāya saṃpadā mahārgha mahanīya tām īhamānaḥ sandeha saṃsargam aṅgīkaroti iti tena upabṛṃhitaḥ

original: tasmāllokottaranirmātṛnirmitatvaṃ nāma nūtanaḥ ko 'pyatiśayaḥ padārthasya varṇayamānavṛtternāyikāsvarūpasaundaryalakṣaṇasyātra nirmitaḥ kavinā,
analyzed: tasmāt loka uttara nirmātṛ nirmita tvam nāma nūtanaḥ kaḥ pi atiśayaḥ padārthasya varṇayamāna vṛtteḥ nāyikā sva rūpa saundarya lakṣaṇasya atra nirmitaḥ kavinā
yena tat eva tat prathamam utpāditam iva pratibhāti
yatra api utpādyam vastu prabandha arthavat apūrva tayā vākya arthaḥ tad kālam ullikhyate kavibhiḥ

original: tasmin svasattāsamanvayena svayameva parisphuratāṃ padārthānāṃ tathāvidhaparasparānvayalakṣaṇasaṃbandhopanibandhanaṃ nāma navīnamatiśayamātrameva  #
analyzed: tasmin sva sattā samanvayena svayam eva parisphuratām padārthānām tathāvidha paraspara anvaya lakṣaṇa saṃbandha upanibandhanam nāma navīnam atiśaya mātram eva
nirmiti viṣaya tām nīyate
na punar svarūpam
yathā

original: kastvaṃ bho divi māliko 'hamiha kiṃ puṣpārthamabhyāgataḥ kiṃ tenāstu mahān krayo yadi mahaccitraṃ tadākarṇyatām /
analyzed: kaḥ tvam bho divi mālikaḥ ham iha kim puṣpa artham abhyāgataḥ kim tena astu mahān krayaḥ yadi mahat citram tat ākarṇyatām

original: saṃgrāmeṣvalabhābhidhānanṛpatau divyāṅganābhaiḥ strajaḥ projjhantībhiravidyamānakusumaṃ yasmātkṛtaṃ nandanam // VjivC_3.13 //
analyzed: saṃgrāmeṣu alabha abhidhāna nṛpatau divya aṅganā ābhaiḥ strajaḥ projjhantībhiḥ a vidyamāna kusumam yasmāt kṛtam nandanam

original: tadevaṃvidhe viṣaye varṇanīyavastuviśiṣṭātiśayavidhāyī vibhūṣaṇavinyāso vidheyatāṃ pratipadyate /
analyzed: tat evaṃvidhe viṣaye varṇanīya vastu viśiṣṭa atiśaya vidhāyī vibhūṣaṇa vinyāsaḥ vidheya tām pratipadyate

original: tathā ca---prakṛtamidamudāharaṇamalaṅkaraṇakalpanaṃ vinā samyaṅ na kathañcidapi vākyārthasaṅgati bhajate /
analyzed: tathā ca prakṛtam idam udāharaṇam alaṅkaraṇa kalpanam vinā samyak na kathañcid api vākya artha saṅgati bhajate

original: yasmāt pratyakṣādipramāṇopapattiniścayābhāvāt svābhāvikaṃ vastu dharmitayā vyavasthāpanaṃna sahate,
analyzed: yasmāt pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇa upapatti niścaya abhāvāt svābhāvikam vastu dharmi tayā vyavasthāpanam na sahate
tasmāt vidagdha kavi pratibhā ullikhita alaṅkaraṇa gocara tvena eva sahṛdaya hṛdaya āhlādam ādadhāti
tathā ca duḥsaha samarasa maya samucita śaurya atiśaya ślāghayā prastuta nara nātha viṣaye
vallabha lābha rabhasa ullasita sura sundarī samūha samarpyamāṇa mandāra ādi kusuma dāma sahastra saṃbhāvanā anumāna nandana udyāna pādapa prasūna samṛddhi pradhvaṃsa bhāva siddhiḥ
su utprekṣitā

original: yasmādutprekṣāviṣayaṃ vastu kavayastadiveti tadeveti vā dvividhamupanabadhnantītyeta (tta)
analyzed: yasmāt utprekṣā viṣayam vastu kavayaḥ tat iva iti tat eva iti vā dvividham
tat evam iyam utprekṣā pūrva ardha vihita aprastuta praśaṃsā upanibandha bandhurā prakṛta pārthiva pratāpa atiśaya paripoṣa pravaṇa tayā
sutarām samudbhāsamānā tad vidā āvarjanam janayati iti sa atiśaya tvam
utprekṣā atiśaya anvitā
iti etasyāḥ
sva lakṣaṇa anupraveśaḥ iti atiśayokteḥ ca
kālaṅkāraḥ nayāḥ vinā
iti sakala alaṅkaraṇa anugrāhaka tvam
tasmāt pṛthak atiśayoktiḥ evā iyam mukhya tayā iti ucyamāne na kiñcid atiricyate
kavi pratibhā utprekṣita tvena ca atyantam asaṃbhāvyam api upanibadhyamānam anayā eva yuktyā samañjasa tām gāhate
na tapunaḥ svatantryeṇa
yat vā kāraṇataḥ loka atikrānta gocara tvena vacasaḥ sā evā iyam iti astu
tathā api prastuta atiśaya vidhāna vyatirekeṇa na kiñcid apūrvam atra asti

original: tadevamabhidhānasya pūrvamabhidheyasya ceha vakratāmabhidhāyedānīṃ vākyasya vakratvamabhidhātumupakramate---
analyzed: tat evam abhidhānasya pūrvam abhidheyasya ca iha vakra tām abhidhāya idānīm vākyasya vakra tvam abhidhātum upakramate
mārga stha vakra śabda artha guṇa alaṅkāra saṃpadaḥ
anyat vākyasya vakra tvam tathā abhihiti jīvitam
manojña phalaka ullekha varṇa chāyā śriyaḥ pṛthak

original: citrasyeva manohāri kartuḥ kimapi kauśalam // Vjiv_3.4 //
analyzed: citrasya iva manohāri kartuḥ kim api kauśalam

original: anyadvākyasya vakratvam---vākyasya parasparānvitavṛtteḥ padasamudāyasyānyadapūrvaṃ vyatiriktameva vakratvaṃ vakrabhāvaḥ /
analyzed: anyat vākyasya vakra tvam vākyasya paraspara anvita vṛtteḥ pada samudāyasya anyat apūrvam vyatiriktam eva vakra tvam vakra bhāvaḥ
bhavati iti saṃbandhaḥ
kriyā antara abhāvāt
kutas mārga stha vakra śabda artha guṇa alaṅkāra saṃpadaḥ

original: mārgāḥ sukumārādayastatrasthāḥ kecideva vakrāḥ prasiddhavyavahāravyatirekiṇo ye śabdārthaguṇālaṅkārāsteṣāṃ saṃpat kāpyupaśobhā tasyāḥ pṛthagbhūtaṃ  #
analyzed: mārgāḥ sukumāra ādayaḥ tatrasthāḥ kecid eva vakrāḥ prasiddha vyavahāra vyatirekiṇaḥ ye śabda artha guṇa alaṅkārāḥ teṣām saṃpad kā api upaśobhā tasyāḥ pṛthak bhūtam
kim api vakra tva antaram eva
kīdṛśam tathā abhihita jīvitam

original: tathā tena prakāreṇa kenāpyavyapadeśyena yābihitiḥ kāpyapūrvaivābhidhā saiva jīvitaṃ sarvasvaṃ yasya tattathoktam /
analyzed: tathā tena prakāreṇa kena api avyapadeśyena yā a vihitiḥ kā api apūrvā eva abhidhā sā eva jīvitam sarva svam yasya tat tathā uktam
ki svarūpam iti āha kartuḥ kim api kauśalam

original: karturvidhātuḥ kimapyalaukikaṃ yatkauśalaṃ naipuṇaṃ tadeva vākyasya vakratvamityarthaḥ /
analyzed: kartuḥ vidhātuḥ kim api alaukikam yat kauśalam naipuṇam tat eva vākyasya vakra tvam iti arthaḥ
kathañcid citrasya iva
ālekhyasya yathā

original: manohāri hṛdayarañjakaṃ prakṛtopakaraṇavyatireki kartureva kauśalaṃ kimapi pṛthagbhūtaṃ vyatiriktam /
analyzed: manohāri hṛdaya rañjakam prakṛta upakaraṇa vyatireki kartuḥ eva kauśalam kim api pṛthak bhūtam vyatiriktam
kutas iti āha manojña phalaka ullekha varṇa chāyā śriyaḥ

original: manojñāḥ kāścideva hṛdayahāriṇyo yāḥ phalakollekhavarṇacchāyāstāsāṃ śrīrupasobhā tasyāḥ /
analyzed: manojñāḥ kāścid eva hṛdaya hāriṇyaḥ yāḥ phalaka ullekha varṇa chāyāḥ tāsām śrīḥ upasobhā tasyāḥ
pṛthagrūpam kim api tattva antaram eva iti arthaḥ
phalakam ālekhya ādhāra bhūtā bhittiḥ
ullekhaḥ citra sūtra pramāṇa upapannam rekhā vinyasana mātram
varṇāḥ rañjaka dravya viśeṣāḥ
chāyā kāntiḥ

original: tadidamatra tātparyam---yathā citrasya kimapi phalakādyupakaraṇakalāpavyatireki sakalaprakṛtapadārthajīvitāyamānaṃ citrakarakauśalaṃ pṛthakatvena
analyzed: tat idam atra tātparyam yathā citrasya kim api phalaka ādi upakaraṇa kalāpa vyatireki sakala prakṛta padārtha jīvitāyamānam citrakara kauśalam pṛthaka tvena

original: tathaiva vākyasya mārgādiprakṛtapadārthasārthavyatireki kavikauśalalakṣaṇaṃ kimapi sahṛdayahṛdayasaṃvedyaṃ sakalaprastutapadārthasphuritabhūtaṃ  #
analyzed: tathā eva vākyasya mārga ādi prakṛta padārtha sārtha vyatireki kavi kauśala lakṣaṇam kim api sahṛdaya hṛdaya saṃvedyam sakala prastuta padārtha sphurita bhūtam
vakra tvam ujjṛmbate

original: tathā ca, bhāvasvabhāvasaukumāryavarṇane śṛṅgārādirasasvarūpasamunmīlane vā vividhavibhūṣaṇavinyāsavicchittiviracane ca yaḥ paraḥ paripoṣātiśayastadvidāhlādakāritāyāḥ  #
analyzed: tathā ca bhāva svabhāva saukumārya varṇane śṛṅgāra ādi rasa sva rūpa samunmīlane vā vividha vibhūṣaṇa vinyāsa vicchitti viracane ca yaḥ paraḥ paripoṣa atiśayaḥ tad vid āhlāda kāri tāyāḥ
kāraṇam

original: padavākyaikadeśavṛttirvā yaḥ kaścidvakratāprakārastasya kavikauśalameva nibandhanatayā vyavatiṣṭhate /
analyzed: pada vākya eka deśa vṛttiḥ vā yaḥ kaścid vakra tā prakāraḥ tasya kavi kauśalam eva nibandhana tayā vyavatiṣṭhate
yasmāt ā kalpānām eva tāvat mātra sva rūpa niyata niṣṭha tayā vyavasthitānām rasa svabhāva alaṅkaraṇa vakra tā prakārāṇām
nava nava ullekha vilakṣaṇam cetana camatkāra kāri kim api svarūpa antaram etasmāt eva samujjṛmbhate
yena idam abhidhīyate
āsaṃsāram kaipuṅgavehim vi

original: ajjavi abhinnamuddo vva jaai vāāṃ paripphando // VjivC_3.16 //
analyzed: ajjavi abhinna muddaḥ vva jaai vāām paripphandaḥ
āsaṃsāram kavi puṅgavaiḥ prati divasa gṛhīta sāraḥ pi
adyā api abhinna mudraḥ iva jayati vācām parispandaḥ
iti chāyā

original: atra sargārambhāt prabhṛti kavipradhānaiḥ prātisvikapratibhāparispandamāhātmyāt pratidivasagṛhītasarvasvo
analyzed: atra sarga ārambhāt prabhṛti kavi pradhānaiḥ prātisvika pratibhā parispanda māhātmyāt
pi adya api nava nava pratibhāsa ānantya vijṛmbhaṇāt an uddhāṭita prāyaḥ iva yaḥ vākya parispandaḥ

original: sa jayati sarvotkarṣeṇa vartate ityevamasmin susaṅgate 'pi vākyārthe kavikauśalasya
analyzed: sa jayati sarva utkarṣeṇa vartate iti evam asmin vākya arthe kavi kauśalasya
vilasitam kim api alaukikam eva parisphurati

original: yasmāt svābhimānadhvaniprādhānyena tenaitadabhihitam yathā---āsaṃsāraṃ kavipuṅgavaiḥ pratidivasaṃ gṛhītasāro 'pyadyāpyabhinnamudra ivāyam /
analyzed: yasmāt sva abhimāna dhvani prādhānyena tena etat abhihitam yathā āsaṃsāram kavi puṅgavaiḥ pratidivasam gṛhīta sāraḥ pi adya api abhinna mudraḥ iva ayam

original: evamaparijñātatattvatayā na kenacita kimapyetasmād gṛhītamiti matpratibhoddhāṭitaparamārthasyedānīmeva
analyzed: evam aparijñāta tattva tayā na kenacid kim api etasmāt gṛhītam iti mad pratibhā uddhāṭita paramārthasya idānīm eva
mudrābandha udbhedaḥ bhaviṣyati iti loka uttara sva parispanda sāphalya āpatteḥ vākya parispandaḥ
jayati iti saṃbandhaḥ
yadi api rasa svabhāva alaṅkārāṇām sarveṣām kavi kauśalam eva jīvitam
tathā api alaṅkārasya viśeṣataḥ tad anugraham vinā varṇanā viṣaya vastunaḥ bhūṣaṇa abhidhāyi tvena abhimatasya
sva rūpa mātreṇa parisphurataḥ yathārtha tvena nibadhyamānasya tadvida āhlāda nidhāna anupapatteḥ manāk mātram api
na vaicitryam utprekṣāmahe
pracura pravāha patita itara padārtha sāmānyena pratibhāsanāt
yathā

original: dūrvākāṇḍamiva śyāmā tanvī śyāmālatā yathā // VjivC_3.17 //
analyzed: dūrvā kāṇḍam iva śyāmā tanvī śyāmā latā yathā

original: iti ca nūtanollekhamanohāriṇaḥ puretasya lokottaravinyasanavicchittiviśeṣitaśobhātiśayasya kimapi tadvidāhlādakāritvamudbhidyate /
analyzed: iti ca nūtana ullekha manohāriṇaḥ purā itasya lokottara vinyasana vicchitti viśeṣita śobhā atiśayasya kim api tadvida āhlāda kāri tvam udbhidyate
yathā
