original: teṣāṃ gopavadhūvilāsasuhṛdāṃ rādhārahaḥ sākṣiṇāṃ kṣemaṃ bhadra kalindaśailatanayātīre latāveśmānām /
analyzed: teṣām gopa vadhū vilāsa suhṛdām rādhā rahaḥ sākṣiṇām kṣemam bhadra kalinda śaila tanayā tīre latā veśmānām

original: vicchinne smaratalpakalpanamṛducchedopayoge 'dhunā te jāne jaraṭhībhavanti vigalannīlatviṣaḥ pallavāḥ // VjivC_3.21 //
analyzed: vicchinne smara talpa kalpana mṛdu cheda upayoge dhunā te jāne jaraṭhībhavanti vigalat nīla tviṣaḥ pallavāḥ

original: atra yadyapi sahṛdayasaṃvedyaṃ vastusaṃbhavi svabhāvamātrameva varṇitam,
analyzed: atra yadi api sahṛdaya saṃvedyam vastu saṃbhavi svabhāva mātram eva varṇitam
tathā api anuttāna tayā vyavasthitasya asya virala vidagdha hṛdaya eka gocaram kim api nūtana ullekha manohāri

original: padārthāntarlonavṛtti sūkṣmasubhagaṃ tādṛk svarūpamunmīlitaṃ yena vākyavakratātmanaḥ
analyzed: padārtha antar lona vṛtti sūkṣma subhagam tādṛś svarūpam unmīlitam yena vākya vakra tā ātmanaḥ
kavi kauśalasya kācid eva kāṣṭhā adhirūḍhiḥ upapadyate
yasmāt tad vyatirikta vṛttiḥ artha atiśayaḥ na kaścid labhyate
rasa udāharaṇam yathā

original: loko yādṛśamāha sāhasadhanaṃ taṃ kṣatriyāputrakaṃ syātsatyena sa tādṛgeva na bhavedvārtā visaṃvādinī /
analyzed: lokaḥ yādṛśam āha sāhasa dhanam tam kṣatriyā putrakam syāt satyena sa tādṛś eva na bhavet vārtā visaṃvādinī

original: ekāṃ kāmapi kālavipruṣamamī śauryoṣmakaṇḍūvyaya- vyagrāḥ syuściravismṛtāmaracamūḍimbāhavā bāhavaḥ // VjivC_3.22 //
analyzed: ekām kām api kāla vipruṣam amī śaurya ūṣma kaṇḍū vyaya vyagrāḥ syuḥ cira vismṛta amara camū ḍimba āhavāḥ bāhavaḥ
atra utsāha abhidhānaḥ sthāyibhāvaḥ samucita ālambana vibhāva lakṣaṇa viṣaya saundarya atiśaya ślāghā śraddhālu tayā
vijigīṣoḥ vaidagdhya bhaṅgī bhaṇita vaicitryeṇa parām paripoṣa padavīm adhiropitaḥ san
rasa tām nīyamānaḥ kim api vākya vakra bhāva svabhāvam kavi kauśalam āvedayati

original: anyeṣāṃ pūrvaprakaraṇodāharaṇānāṃ pratyekantathābhihitijīvitalakṣaṇaṃ vākyavakratvaṃ svayameva sahṛdayairvicāraṇīyam /
analyzed: anyeṣām pūrva prakaraṇa udāharaṇānām pratyekam tathā abhihiti jīvita lakṣaṇam vākya vakra tvam svayam eva sahṛdayaiḥ vicāraṇīyam
vakra tāyāḥ prakārāṇām aucitya guṇa śālinām
etat uttejanāya alam sva spanda mahatām api
rasa svabhāva alaṅkārāḥ āsaṃsāram api sthitāḥ
anena nava tām yānti tad vida āhlāda dāyinīm
iti antara ślokau

original: evamabhidhānābhideyābhidhālakṣaṇasya kāvyopayoginastritayasya svarūpamullikhya varṇanīyasya vastuno viṣayavibhāgaṃ vidadhāti---
analyzed: evam abhidhāna abhideya abhidhā lakṣaṇasya kāvya upayoginaḥ tritayasya svarūpam ullikhya varṇanīyasya vastunaḥ viṣaya vibhāgam vidadhāti
bhāvānām aparimlāna svabhāva aucitya sundaram

original: cetanānāṃ jaḍānāṃ ca svarūpaṃ dvividhaṃ smṛtam // Vjiv_3.5 //
analyzed: cetanānām jaḍānām ca svarūpam dvividham smṛtam
bhāvānām varṇyamāna vṛttīnām sva rūpam parispandaḥ
kīdṛśam dvividham
dve vidhe prakārau yasya tat tathā uktam
smṛtam sūribhiḥ āmnātam
keṣām bhāvānām cetanānām jaḍānām ca
cetanānām saṃvidvatām prāṇinām iti yāvat
jaḍānām tad vyatirekiṇām prāṇa caitanya śūnyānām
etat eva ca dharmi dvaividhyam dharma dvaividhyasya nibandhanam
kīdṛś svarūpam aparimlāna svabhāva aucitya sundaram

original: aparimlānaḥ pratyagraparipoṣapeśalo yaḥ svabhāvaḥ pāramārthiko dharmastasya yadaucityamucitabhāvaḥ prastāvopayogyadoṣaduṣṭatva tena sundaraṃ  #
analyzed: a parimlānaḥ pratyagra paripoṣa peśalaḥ yaḥ svabhāvaḥ pāramārthikaḥ dharmaḥ tasya yat aucityam ucita bhāvaḥ prastāva upayogya doṣa duṣṭa tva tena sundaram
sukumāram tad vid āhlādakam iti arthaḥ
etat eva dvaividhyam vibhajya vicārayati
tatra pūrvam prakārābhyām dvābhyām eva vibhidyate
sura ādi siṃha prabhṛti prādhānya itara yogataḥ

original: tatra dvayoḥ svarūpayormadhyāt pūrvaṃ yatprathamaṃ cetanapadārthasaṃbandhi tad dvābhyāmeva rāśyantarābhāvāt prakārābhyāṃ vibhidyate bhedamāsādayati,
analyzed: tatra dvayoḥ svarūpayoḥ madhyāt pūrvam yat prathamam cetana padārtha saṃbandhi tat dvābhyām eva rāśi antara abhāvāt prakārābhyām vibhidyate bhedam āsādayati
dvividham eva saṃpadyate
kasmāt sura ādi siṃha prabhṛti prādhānya itara yogataḥ
sura ādayaḥ tridaśa prabhṛtayaḥ ye cetanāḥ sura asura siddha vidyādhara gandarva nara prabhṛtayaḥ

original: ye cānye siṃhaprabhṛtayaḥ kesaripramukhāsteṣāṃ yatprādhānyaṃ mukhyatvamitaradaprādhānyaṃ ca tābhyāṃ yathāsaṃkhyena pratyekaṃ yo yogaḥ saṃbandhastasmāt  #
analyzed: ye ca anye siṃha prabhṛtayaḥ kesari pramukhāḥ teṣām yat prādhānyam mukhya tvam itarat aprādhānyam ca tābhyām yathāsaṃkhyena pratyekam yaḥ yogaḥ saṃbandhaḥ tasmāt
kāraṇāt

original: tadevaṃ surādīnāṃ mukhyacetanānāṃ svarūpamekaṃ kavīnāṃ varṇanāspadam /
analyzed: tat evam sura ādīnām mukhya cetanānām svarūpam ekam kavīnām varṇanā āspadam
siṃha ādīnām amukhya cetanānām paśu mṛga pakṣi sarīsṛpāṇām svarūpam dvitīyam iti etat eva viśeṣeṇa unmīlayati
mṛkhyam akliṣṭa rati ādi paripoṣa manoharam
sva jāti ucita hevāka samullekha ujjvam param

original: mukhyaṃ yatpradhānaṃ cetanasurāsurādisaṃbandhi svarūpaṃ tadevaṃvidhaṃ sat kavīnāṃ varṇanāspadaṃ bhavati svavyāpāragocaratāṃ pratipadyate /
analyzed: mukhyam yat pradhānam cetana sura asura ādi saṃbandhi svarūpam tat evaṃvidham sat kavīnām varṇanā āspadam bhavati sva vyāpāra gocara tām pratipadyate
kīdṛśam akliṣṭa rati ādi paripoṣa manoharam

original: akliṣṭaḥ kadarthanāvirahitaḥ pratyagratāmanoharo yo ratyādiḥ sthāyibhāvastasya paripoṣaḥ śṛṅgāraprabhṛtirasatvāpādanam,
analyzed: akliṣṭaḥ kadarthanā virahitaḥ pratyagra tā manoharaḥ yaḥ rati ādiḥ sthāyibhāvaḥ tasya paripoṣaḥ śṛṅgāra prabhṛti rasa tva āpādanam
sthāyī eva tu rasaḥ iti nyāyāt
tena manoharam hṛdaya hāri

original: atrodāharaṇāni vipralambhaśṛṅgāre caturthe 'ṅke vikramorvaśyāmunmattasya purūravasaḥ pralapitāni /
analyzed: atra udāharaṇāni vipralambha śṛṅgāre caturthe ṅke vikrama urvaśyām unmattasya purūravasaḥ pralapitāni
yathā

original: tiṣṭhetkopavaśātprabhāvapihitā dīrghaṃ na sā kupyati svargāyotpatitā bhavenmayi punarbhāvārdramasyā manaḥ /
analyzed: tiṣṭhet kopa vaśāt prabhāva pihitā dīrgham na sā kupyati svargāya utpatitā bhavet mayi punarbhāva ārdram asyāḥ manaḥ

original: tāṃ hartuṃ vibudhadviṣo 'pi na ca me śaktāḥ purovartinoṃ sā cātyantamagocaraṃ nayanayoryāteti ko 'yaṃ vidhiḥ // VjivC_3.25 //
analyzed: tām hartum vibudha dviṣaḥ na ca me śaktāḥ sā ca atyantam agocaram nayanayoḥ yātā iti kaḥ yam vidhiḥ
atra rājñaḥ vallabhā viraha vaidhurya daśā āveśa vivaśa vṛtteḥ tad asaṃprāpti nimittam anadhi
gacchataḥ prathamataram eva svābhāvika saukumārya saṃbhāvyamānam anantara ucita vicāra apasāryamāṇa upapatti
kim api tātkālika vikalpa ullikhyamānam anavalokana kāraṇam utprekṣamāṇasya tad āsādana samanvaya asaṃbhavāt nairāśya niścaya vimūḍha mānasa tayā
rasaḥ parām paripoṣa padavīm adhairopitaḥ
tathā ca etat eva vākya antaraiḥ uddīpitam yathā

original: padbhyāṃ spṛśedvasumatīṃ yadi sā sugātrī meghābhivṛṣṭasikatāsu vanasthalīṣu /
analyzed: padbhyām spṛśet vasumatīm yadi sā su gātrī megha abhivṛṣṭa sikatāsu vana sthalīṣu

original: paścānnatā gurunitambatayā tato 'syā dṛśyeta cārupadapaṅktiralaktakāṅkā // VjivC_3.26 //
analyzed: paścāt natā guru nitamba tayā syāḥ dṛśyeta cāru pada paṅktiḥ alaktaka aṅkā

original: atra padbhyāṃ vasumatīṃ kadācit spṛśedityāśaṃsayā tatprāptiḥ saṃbhāvyeta /
analyzed: atra padbhyām vasumatīm kadācid spṛśet iti āśaṃsayā tad prāptiḥ saṃbhāvyeta

original: yasmājjaladharasalilasekasukumārasikatāsu vanasthalīṣu gurunitambatayā tasyāḥ paścānnatatvena nitarāṃ mudritasaṃsthānā rāgoparaktatayā ramaṇīyavṛttiścaraṇavinyāsaparaṃparā
analyzed: yasmāt jaladhara salila seka sukumāra sikatāsu vana sthalīṣu guru nitamba tayā tasyāḥ paścāt nata tvena nitarām mudrita saṃsthānā rāga uparakta tayā ramaṇīya vṛttiḥ caraṇa vinyāsa paraṃparā
tasmāt nairāśya niścitiḥ eva sutarām samujjṛmbhitā
yā tad uttara vākya unmatta vilapitānām nimitta tām abhajat
karuṇa rasa udāharaṇāni tāpasa vatsarāje dvitīye ṅke vatsa rājasya paridevitāni
yathā

original: dhārāveśma vilokya dīnavadano bhrāntvā ca līlāgṛhā- nniśvasyāyatamāśu kesaralatāvīthīṣu kṛtvā dṛśaḥ /
analyzed: dhārā veśma vilokya dīna vadanaḥ bhrāntvā ca līlā gṛhāt niśvasya āyatam āśu kesara latā vīthīṣu kṛtvā dṛśaḥ

original: kiṃ me pārśvamupaiṣi putraka kṛtaiḥ kiṃ cāṭubhiḥ krūrayā mātrā tvaṃ parivarjitaḥ saha mayā yāntyātidīrghāṃ bhuvam // VjivC_3.27 //
analyzed: kim me pārśvam upaiṣi putraka kṛtaiḥ kim cāṭubhiḥ krūrayā mātrā tvam parivarjitaḥ saha mayā yāntyā ati dīrghām bhuvam
atra rasa paripoṣa nibandhana vibhāva ādi saṃpad samudayaḥ kavinā sutarām samujjṛmbhitaḥ
tathā ca asya eva vākyasya avatārakam vidhūṣaka vākyam evaṃvidham prayuktam

original: pamādo eso kkhu devīe puttakidako dariṇapodo attabhavantaṃ aṇusaradi // VjivC_3.28 //
analyzed: pamādaḥ esaḥ kkhu devīe putta kidakaḥ dariṇa podaḥ atta bhavantam aṇusaradi

original: pramādaḥ / eṣa khalu devyāḥ putrakṛtako hariṇapoto 'trabhavantamanusarati //
analyzed: pramādaḥ eṣa khalu devyāḥ putra kṛtakaḥ hariṇa potu trabhavantam anusarati
iti chāyā
etena karuṇa rasa uddīpana vibhāva tā hariṇa potaka dhārāgṛha prabhṛtīnām sutarām samutpadyate

original: tathā ca “ayamaparaḥ kṣate kṣārāvakṣepaḥ” iti rumaṇvadvacanānantarametatparatvenaiva vākyāntaramupanibaddham, yathā
analyzed: tathā ca ayam aparaḥ kṣate kṣāra avakṣepaḥ iti rumaṇvat vacana anantaram etad para tvena eva vākya antaram upanibaddham yathā

original: karṇāntasthitapadmarāgakalikāṃ bhūyaḥ samākarṣatā cañcvā dāḍimabījamityabhihatā pādena gaṇḍasthalī /
analyzed: karṇa anta sthita padmarāga kalikām bhūyas samākarṣatā cañcvā dāḍima bījam iti abhihatā pādena gaṇḍa sthalī

original: yenāsau tava tasya narmasuhṛdaḥ khedānmuhuḥ krandato niḥśaṅkaṃna śukasya kiṃ prativaco devi tvayā dīyate // VjivC_3.29 //
analyzed: yena asau tava tasya narma suhṛdaḥ khedāt muhur krandataḥ niḥśaṅkam na śukasya kim prativacaḥ devi tvayā dīyate
atra śukasya evaṃvidha durlalita yuktatvam vāllabhya pratipādana paratvena upāttam
asau iti kapolasthālyāḥ sva anubhava svadamāna saukumārya utkarṣa parāmarśaḥ
evaṃvidha uddīpana vibhāva eka jīvita tvena karuṇa rasaḥ kāṣṭha adhirūḍhi ramaṇīya tām anīyata
evam vipralambha śṛṅgāra karuṇayoḥ saukumāryāt udāharaṇa pradarśanam vihitam
rasa antarāṇām api svayam eva utprekṣaṇīyam

original: evaṃ dvitīyamapradhānacetanasihādisaṃbandhi yatsvarūpaṃ taditthaṃ kavīnāṃ varṇanāspadaṃ saṃpadyate /
analyzed: evam dvitīyam apradhāna cetana siha ādi saṃbandhi yat svarūpam tat ittham kavīnām varṇanā āspadam saṃpadyate
kīdṛśam sva jāti ucita devāka samullekha ujjvalam

original: svā pratyekamātmīyā sāmānyalakṣaṇavastusvarūpā yā jātistasyāḥ samucito yo hevākaḥ
analyzed: svā pratyekam ātmīyā sāmānya lakṣaṇa vastu svarūpā yā jātiḥ tasyāḥ samucitaḥ yaḥ hevākaḥ

original: svabhāvānusārī parispandastasya samullekhaḥsamyagullekhanaṃ vāstavena rūpeṇopanibandhastenojjvalaṃ bhrājiṣṇu,
analyzed: svabhāva anusārī parispandaḥ tasya samullekhaḥ samyak ullekhanam vāstavena rūpeṇa upanibandhaḥ tena ujjvalam bhrājiṣṇu
tad vid āhlāda kārī iti yāvat
yathā
kadācid etena ca pāriyātra guhā gṛhe mīlita locanena
vyatyasta hasta dvitaya upaviṣṭa daṃṣṭra aṅkura añcat cibukam prasuptam

original: atra giriguhāgehāntare nidrāmanubhavataḥ kaisariṇaḥ svajātisamucitaṃ sthānakamullikhitam /
analyzed: atra giri guhā geha antare nidrām anubhavataḥ kaisariṇaḥ sva jāti samucitam sthānakam ullikhitam
yathā vā

original: grīvābhaṅgābhirāmaṃ muhuranupatati syandane dattadṛṣṭiḥ paścārdhena praviṣṭaḥ śarapatanabhayād bhūyasā pūrvakāyam /
analyzed: grīvā bhaṅga abhirāmam muhur anupatati syandane datta dṛṣṭiḥ paśca ardhena praviṣṭaḥ śara patana bhayāt bhūyasā pūrva kāyam

original: darbhairardhāvalīḍhaiḥ śramavivṛtamukhabhraṃśibhiḥ kīrṇavartmā paśyodagraplutatvādviyati bahutaraṃstokamurvyāṃ prayāti // VjivC_3.31 //
analyzed: darbhaiḥ ardha avalīḍhaiḥ śrama vivṛta mukha bhraṃśibhiḥ kīrṇa vartmā paśya udagra pluta tvāt viyati bahutaram stokam urvyām prayāti
etat eva prakāra antareṇa unmīlayati
cetanānām amukhyānām jaḍānām ca api bhūyasā
cetanānām prāṇinām amukhyānām apradhāna bhūtānām yat svarūpam tat evaṃvidham sat
varṇanīya tām pratipadyate prastuta aṅga tayā upayujyamānam
kīdṛśam rasa uddīpana sāmarthya vinibandhana bandhuram

original: rasāḥ śṛṅgārādayasteṣāmuddīpanamullāsanaṃ paripoṣastasmin sāmarthyaṃ śaktistayā vinibandhanaṃniveśastena bandhuraṃ hṛdayahāri /
analyzed: rasāḥ śṛṅgāra ādayaḥ teṣām uddīpanam ullāsanam paripoṣaḥ tasmin sāmarthyam śaktiḥ tayā vinibandhanam niveśaḥ tena bandhuram hṛdaya hāri
yathā
cūta aṅkura āsvāda kaṣāya kaṇṭhaḥ puṃskokilaḥ yat madhuram cukūja

original: manasvinīmānavighātadakṣaṃ tadeva jātaṃ vacanaṃ smarasya // VjivC_3.32 //
analyzed: manasvinī māna vighāta dakṣam tat eva jātam vacanam smarasya

original: jaḍānāṃ cāpi bhūyasā---jaḍānāmacetanānāṃ salilatarukusumasamayaprabhṛtīnāmevaṃvidhaṃ svarūpaṃ rasoddīpanasāmarthyavinibandhanabandhuraṃ varṇanīyatāmavagāhate
analyzed: jaḍānām ca api bhūyasā ajaḍānām acetanānām salila taru kusuma samaya prabhṛtīnām evaṃvidham sva rūpam rasa uddīpana sāmarthya vinibandhana bandhuram varṇanīya tām avagāhate
yathā

original: idamasulabhavastuprārthanādurnivāraṃ prathamamapi mano me pañcabāṇaḥ kṣiṇoti /
analyzed: idam asulabha vastu prārthanā durnivāram prathamam api manaḥ me pañcabāṇaḥ kṣiṇoti
kim uta malaya vāta unmūlita āpāṇḍu patraiḥ upavana sahakāraiḥ darśiteṣu aṅkureṣu
yathā vā

original: udbhedābhimukhāṅkurāḥ kuravakāḥ śaivālajālākula-prāntaṃ bhānti sarāṃsi phenapaṭalaiḥ sīmantitāḥ sindhavaḥ /
analyzed: udbheda abhimukha aṅkurāḥ kuravakāḥ śaivāla jāla ākula prāntam bhānti sarāṃsi phena paṭalaiḥ sīmantitāḥ sindhavaḥ

original: kiñcāsmin samaye kṛśāṅgi vilasatkandarpakodaṇḍika-krīḍābhāñji bhavanti santatalatākīrṇānyaraṇyānyapi // VjivC_3.34 //
analyzed: kiñca asmin samaye kṛśa aṅgi vilasat kandarpa kodaṇḍika krīḍā bhāñji bhavanti santata latā ākīrṇāni araṇyāni api
evam svābhāvika sundara parispanda nibandhanam padārtha svarūpam abhidhāya tat eva upasaṃharati
śarīram idam arthasya rāmaṇīyaka nirbharam
upādeya tayā jñeyam kavīnām varṇanā āspadam

original: arthasya varṇanīyasya vastunaḥ śarīramidam upādeyatayā jñeyaṃ grāhyatvena boddhavyam /
analyzed: arthasya varṇanīyasya vastunaḥ śarīram idam upādeya tayā jñeyam grāhya tvena boddhavyam
kīdṛśam sat rāmaṇīyaka nirbharam
saundarya paripūrṇam
aupahatya rahita tvena tad vid āvarjakam iti yāvat
kavīnām etat eva yasmāt varṇana āspadam abhidhāvya apara agocaram
evaṃvidhasya asya sva rūpa śobhā atiśaya bhrājiṣṇoḥ vibhūṣaṇāni upaśobhā antaram ārabhante
etat eva prakāra antareṇa vicārayati
vyavahāra ucitam ca anyat labhate varṇanīya tām
vyavahāra ucitam ca anyat

original: aparaṃ padārthānāṃ cetanācetanānāṃ svarūpamevaṃvidhaṃ varṇanīyatāṃ labhate kavivyāpāraviṣayatāṃ pratipadyate /
analyzed: aparam padārthānām cetana acetanānām sva rūpam evaṃvidham varṇanīya tām labhate kavi vyāpāra viṣaya tām pratipadyate
kīdṛśam vyavahāra ucitam
loka vṛtta yogyam
kīdṛśam sat dharma ādi sādhana upāya parispanda nibadhanam

original: dharmādeścaturvargasya sādhane saṃpādane upāyabhūto yaḥ parispandaḥ svavilasitaṃ tadeva nibandhanaṃ yasya tattathoktam /
analyzed: dharma ādeḥ caturvargasya sādhane saṃpādane upāya bhūtaḥ yaḥ parispandaḥ sva vilasitam tat eva nibandhanam yasya tat tathā uktam

original: tadidamuktaṃ bhavati---yat kāvye varṇyamānavṛttayaḥ pradhānacetanaprabhṛtayaḥ sarve padārthāścaturvargasādhanopāyaparispandaprādhānyena varṇanīyāḥ,
analyzed: tat idam uktam bhavati yat kāvye varṇyamāna vṛttayaḥ pradhāna cetana prabhṛtayaḥ sarve padārthāḥ caturvarga sādhana upāya parispanda prādhānyena varṇanīyāḥ
ye pi apradhāna cetana svarūpāḥ padārthāḥ te pi dharma artha ādi upāya bhūta sva vilāsa prādhānyena kavīnām varṇanīya tām avataranti

original: tathā ca rājñāṃ śūdrakaprabhṛtīnāṃ mantriṇāṃ ca śukanāsamukhyānāṃ caturvargānuṣṭhānopadeśaparatvenaiva caritāni varṇyante /
analyzed: tathā ca rājñām śūdraka prabhṛtīnām mantriṇām ca śuka nāsa mukhyānām caturvarga anuṣṭhāna upadeśa para tvena eva caritāni varṇyante

original: apradhānacetanānāṃ hastihariṇaprabhṛtīnāṃ saṃgramamṛgayādyaṅgatayā parispandasundaraṃ svarūpaṃ lakṣye varṇyamānatayā paridṛśyate /
analyzed: apradhāna cetanānām hasti hariṇa prabhṛtīnām saṃgrama mṛgayā ādi aṅga tayā parispanda sundaram svarūpam lakṣye varṇyamāna tayā paridṛśyate

original: tasmādeva ca tathāvidhasvarūpollekhaprādhānyena kāvyakāvyopakaraṇakavīnāṃ citracitropakaraṇacitrakaraiḥ sāmyaṃ prathamameva pratipāditam /
analyzed: tasmāt eva ca tathāvidha svarūpa ullekha prādhānyena kāvya kāvya upakaraṇa kavīnām citra citra upakaraṇa citrakaraiḥ sāmyam prathamam eva pratipāditam

original: tadevaṃvidhaṃ svabhāvaprādhānye rasaprādhānyena ca dviprakāraṃ sahajasaukumāryasarasaṃ svarūpaṃ varṇanāviṣayavastunaḥ śarīramevālaṅkāryatāmevārhati,
analyzed: tat evaṃvidham svabhāva prādhānye rasa prādhānyena ca dvi prakāram sahaja saukumārya sarasam svarūpam varṇanā viṣaya vastunaḥ śarīram eva alaṅkārya tām eva arhati
na punar alaṅkāraṇa tvam

original: tatra svābhāvikaṃ padārthasvarūpamalaṅkaraṇaṃ yathā na bhavati tathā prathamameva pratipāditam /
analyzed: tatra svābhāvikam padārtha svarūpam alaṅkaraṇam yathā na bhavati tathā prathamam eva pratipāditam
idānīm rasa ātmanaḥ prādhāna cetana parispanda varṇyamāna vṛtteḥ alaṅkārakāra antara abhimatām alaṅkāra tām nirākaroti
alaṅkāraḥ na rasa vat parasya apratibhāsanāt
sva rūpāt atiraktasya śabda artha asaṅgateḥ api
alaṅkāraḥ na rasavat
rasa vat iti yaḥ yam utpādita pratītiḥ nāma alaṅkāraḥ tasya vibhūṣaṇa tvam na upapadyate iti arthaḥ
kasmāt kāraṇāt svarūpāt atiriktasya parasya a pratibhāsanāt

original: varṇyamānasya vastuno yat svarūpamātmīyaḥ parispandastasmādatiriktasyābhyadhikasya parasya anyasya apratibhāsanādanavabodhanāt /
analyzed: varṇyamānasya vastunaḥ yat svarūpam ātmīyaḥ parispandaḥ tasmāt atiriktasya abhyadhikasya parasya anyasya a pratibhāsanāt anavabodhanāt

original: tadidamatra tātparyam---yat sarveṣāmeva satkavivākyānāmidamalaṅkāryamidamalaṅkaraṇam ityapoddhāravihito viviktabhāvaḥ sarvasya yasya kasyacit  #
analyzed: tat idam atra tātparyam yat sarveṣām eva sat kavi vākyānām idam alaṅkāryam idam alaṅkaraṇam iti apoddhāra vihitaḥ vivikta bhāvaḥ sarvasya yasya kasyacid  /
pramātuḥ cetasi parisphurati

original: rasavadalaṅkāravadityasmin vākye punaravahitacetaso 'pi na kiñcidetadeva budhyāmahe /
analyzed: rasavat alaṅkāravat iti asmin vākye punar avahita cetasaḥ na kiñcid etat eva budhyāmahe

original: tathā ca---yadi śṛṅgārādireva prādhānyena varṇyamāno 'laṅkāryaḥ tatastadanyena kenacidalaṅkaraṇena bhavitavyam /
analyzed: tathā ca yadi śṛṅgāra ādiḥ eva prādhānyena varṇyamānaḥ laṅkāryaḥ tatas tad anyena kenacid alaṅkaraṇena bhavitavyam

original: yadi vā tatsvarūpameva tadvidāhlādanibandhanatvādalaṅkaraṇamityucyate tathāpi tadvyatiriktamanyadalaṅkāryatayā prakāśanīyam /
analyzed: yadi vā tad svarūpam eva tadvida āhlāda nibandhana tvāt alaṅkaraṇam iti ucyate tathā api tad vyatiriktam anyat alaṅkārya tayā prakāśanīyam

original: tadevaṃvidho na kaścidapi vivekaścirantanālaṅkārakārābhimate rasavadalaṅkāralakṣaṇodāharaṇamārge manāgapi vibhāvyate /
analyzed: tat evaṃvidhaḥ na kaścid api vivekaḥ cirantana alaṅkārakāra abhimate rasa vat alaṅkāra lakṣaṇa udāharaṇa mārge manāk api vibhāvyate
tathā ca
rasavat darśita spaṣṭa śṛṅgāra ādi
iti rasavat lakṣaṇam

original: atra darśitāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ spaṣṭaṃ vā śṛṅgārādayo yatreti vyākhyāne kāvyavyatirikto na kaścidanyaḥ samāsārthabhūtaḥ saṃlakṣyate /
analyzed: atra darśitāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ spaṣṭam vā śṛṅgāra ādayaḥ yatra iti vyākhyāne kāvya vyatiriktaḥ na kaścid anyaḥ samāsa artha bhūtaḥ saṃlakṣyate

original: yo 'sāvalaṅkāraḥ kāvyameveti cet tadapi na suspaṣṭasauṣṭhavam /
analyzed: saḥ alaṅkāraḥ kāvyam evā iti ced tat api na su spaṣṭa sauṣṭhavam

original: yasmāt kāvyaikadeśayoḥ śabdārthayoḥ pṛthak pṛthagalaṅkārāḥ santītyupakramyedānīṃ kāvyamevālaṅkaraṇamityupakramopasaṃhāravaiṣamyaduṣṭatvamāyāti
analyzed: yasmāt kāvya eka deśayoḥ śabda arthayoḥ pṛthak pṛthak alaṅkārāḥ santi iti upakramya idānīm kāvyam eva alaṅkaraṇam iti upakrama upasaṃhāra vaiṣamya duṣṭa tvam āyāti

original: yadi vādarśitāḥ spaṣṭaṃ śṛṅgārādayo yeneti samāsaḥ,
analyzed: yadi vā adarśitāḥ spaṣṭam śṛṅgāra ādayaḥ yena iti samāsaḥ
tathā api vaktavyam sau iti
pratipādana vaicitryam evā iti ced
tat api na samyak samarthana arham
yasmāt pratipādyamānāt anye eva tad upaśobhā nibandhanam pratipādana vaicitryam
na punar pratipādyamānam eva
spaṣṭa tayā darśitam rasānām pratipādana vaicitryam yadi abhidhīyate
tat api na su pratīpādanam
spaṣṭa tayā darśane śṛṅgāra ādīnām sva rūpa pariniṣpattiḥ eva paryavasyati

original: kiñca rasavataḥ kāvyasyālaṅkāra iti tathāvidhasya satastasyāsāviti na kiñcidanena tasyābhidheyaṃ syāt /
analyzed: kiñca rasavataḥ kāvyasya alaṅkāraḥ iti tathāvidhasya sataḥ tasya asau iti na kiñcid anena tasya abhidheyam syāt
athavā tena eva alaṅkāreṇa rasavat tvam tasya ādhīyate

original: tadevaṃ tarhyasau na rasavato 'laṅkāraḥ pratyuta rasavānalaṅkāra ityāyāti,
analyzed: tat evam tarhi asau na rasavataḥ laṅkāraḥ pratyuta rasavān alaṅkāraḥ iti āyāti
tad māhātmyāt kāvyam api rasavat saṃpadyate

original: yadi vā tenaivāhitarasasambandhasya rasavataḥ kāvyasyālaṅkāra iti tatpaścādrasavalaṅkāravyavadeśamāsādayati---yathāgniṣṭomayājyasya putro bhavitetyucyate,
analyzed: yadi vā tena eva āhita rasa sambandhasya rasavataḥ kāvyasya alaṅkāraḥ iti tat paścāt rasa valaṅkāra vyavadeśam āsādayati yathā agniṣṭoma yājyasya putraḥ bhavitā iti ucyate
tat api na su pratibaddha samādhānam

original: yasmād “agniṣṭomayāji'-śabdaḥ prathamaṃ bhūtalakṣaṇe viṣayāntare niṣpratipakṣatayā samāsāditaprasiddhiḥ paścād bhaviṣyati vākyārthasabandhalakṣaṇayogyatayā  #
analyzed: yasmāt agniṣṭoma yāji śabdaḥ prathamam bhūta lakṣaṇe viṣaya antare niṣpratipakṣa tayā samāsādita prasiddhiḥ paścāt bhaviṣyati vākya artha sabandha lakṣaṇa yogyatayā
tam anubhavitum śaknoti
na punar atra evam prayujyate
yasmāt rasavataḥ kāvyasya alaṅkāraḥ iti tat saṃjñandhi tayā eva asya sva rūpa abdhiḥ eva
tad saṃbandhi nibandhanam ca kāvyasya rasavat tvam iti evam itaretara āśraya lakṣaṇa doṣaḥ kena apasāryate

original: yadi vā raso vidyate yasyāsau tadvānalaṅkāra evāstu ityabhidhīyate,
analyzed: yadi vā rasaḥ vidyate yasya asau tadvān alaṅkāraḥ eva astu iti abhidhīyate

original: tathāpyalaṅkāraḥ kāvyaṃ vā nānyat tṛtīyaṃ kiñcidatrāsti /
analyzed: tathā api alaṅkāraḥ kāvyam vā na anyat tṛtīyam kiñcid atra asti
tad pakṣa dvitayam api pratyuktam
udāharaṇam lakṣaṇa eka yogakṣema tvāt pṛthak na vikalpyate

original: mṛteti pretya saṅgantuṃ yayā me maraṇaṃ smṛtam /
analyzed: mṛtā iti pretya saṅgantum yayā me maraṇam smṛtam

original: saivāvantī mayā labdhā kathamatraiva janmani // VjivC_3.36 //
analyzed: sā evā avantī mayā labdhā katham atrā eva janmani
atra rati paripoṣa lakṣaṇa varṇanīya śarīra bhūtāyāḥ cittavṛtteḥ atiriktam anyat vibhaktam vastu na kiñcid vibhāvyate
tasmāt alaṅkārya tā eva yuktimatī
yat api kaiścid
iti anena pūrvam eva lakṣaṇam viśeṣitam
tatra sva śabda āspada tvam rasānām aparigata pūrvam asmākam

original: tatasta eva rasasarvasvasamāhitacetasastatparamārthavido vidvāṃsa evaṃ praṣṭavyāḥ---kiṃ svaśabdāspadatvaṃ rasānāmuta rasavata iti /
analyzed: tatas te eva rasa sarvasva samāhita cetasaḥ tad paramārtha vidaḥ vidvāṃsaḥ evam praṣṭavyāḥ kim sva śabda āspada tvam rasānām uta rasavataḥ iti

original: tatra pūrvasmin pakṣe---rasyantaiti rasāste svaśabdāspadāsteṣu tiṣṭhantaḥ śṛṅgārādiṣu vartamānāḥ santastajjñairāsvādyante /
analyzed: tatra pūrvasmin pakṣeḥ rasyante eti rasāḥ te sva śabda āspadāḥ teṣu tiṣṭhantaḥ śṛṅgāra ādiṣu vartamānāḥ santaḥ tajjñaiḥ āsvādyante
tat idam uktam bhavati yat sva śabdaiḥ abhidhīyamānāḥ śrutipatham avatarantaḥ cetanānām

original: carvaṇacamatkāraṃ kurvantītyanena nyāyena ghṛtapūraprabhūtayaḥ padārthāḥ svaśabdairabhidhīyamānāstadāsvādasaṃpadaṃ
analyzed: carvaṇa camatkāram kurvanti iti anena nyāyena ghṛtapūra prabhūtayaḥ padārthāḥ sva śabdaiḥ abhidhīyamānāḥ tad āsvāda saṃpadam
saṃpādayanti iti evam sarvasya kasyacid upayoga sukha arthinaḥ taiḥ udāra caritaiḥ ayatnena eva
tad abhidhāna mātrāt eva trailokya rājya saṃpad saukhya samṛddhiḥ pratipādyeta eti namaḥ tebhyaḥ
rasavataḥ tad āspada tvam na upapadyate
rasasya eva sva vācyasya api tad āspada tva abhāvāt
kim uta anyasya iti
tad alaṅkāra tvam ca prathamam eva pratiṣiddham

original: śiṣṭaṃ sthāyyādi pūrvalakṣaṇaṃ vyākhyātameveti na punaḥ paryālocyate /
analyzed: śiṣṭam sthāyi ādi pūrvalakṣaṇam vyākhyātam eva iti na punar paryālocyate
yat api
rasa bat rasa saṃśrayāt

original: iti kaiścillakṣaṇamakāri tadapi na samyak samādheyatāmadhitiṣṭhati /
analyzed: iti kaiścid lakṣaṇam akāri tat api na samyak samādheya tām adhitiṣṭhati
tathā hi rasaḥ saṃśrayaḥ yasya asau rasa saṃśrayaḥ
tasmāt kāraṇāt ayam rasavat alaṅkāraḥ saṃpadyate
tathā api sau rasa vyatirikta vṛttiḥ anya padārthaḥ
kāvyam evā iti ced tat api pūrvam eva pratyuktam
tasya sva ātma nikriyā virodhāt alaṅkāra tva anupapatteḥ

original: athavā rasasya saṃśrayo rasena saṃśriyate yastasmād /
analyzed: athavā rasasya saṃśrayaḥ rasena saṃśriyate yaḥ tasmāt
rasa saṃśrayāt iti
tathā api kaḥ sau iti vyatirikta tvena vaktavya tām evā yāti
udāharaṇa jātam api asya lakṣaṇasya pūrveṇa samāna yogakṣema prāyam iti na
pṛthak paryālocyate
rasa peśalam
iti pāṭhe na kiñcid atra atiricyate
atha vastu svabhāva rasa ādi

original: pratipādakavākyopārūḍhapadārthasārthasvarūpamalaṅkāryaṃ rasasvarūpānupraveśena vigalitasvaparispandānāṃ dravyāṇām iva kathamalaṅkaraṇaṃ bhavatītyetadapi  #
analyzed: pratipādaka vākya upārūḍha padārtha sārtha svarūpam alaṅkāryam rasa sva rūpa anupraveśena vigalita sva parispandānām dravyāṇām iva katham alaṅkaraṇam bhavati iti etat api
cintyam eva

original: kiñca tathābhyupagame 'pi pradhānaguṇabhāvaviparyāsaḥ paryavasyatīti na kiñcidetat /
analyzed: kiñca tathā abhyupagame pi pradhāna guṇa bhāva viparyāsaḥ paryavasyati iti na kiñcid etat
atra eva dūṣaṇa antaram
pakramate śabda artha asaṅgateḥ api
śabda artha asaṅgateḥ api
śabda arthayoḥ abhidhāna abhidheyayoḥ asamanvayāt ca rasa vat alaṅkāra upapattiḥ nā asti
atra ca rasaḥ vidyate tiṣṭha

original: ti yasyeti matuppratyaye vihite tasyālaṅkāra iti ṣaṣṭhisamāsaḥ kriyate,
analyzed: ti yasya iti matup pratyaye vihite tasya alaṅkāraḥ iti ṣaṣṭhī samāsaḥ kriyate
rasavān ca asau alaṅkāraḥ ca iti viśeṣaṇa samāsaḥ vā

original: tatra pūrvasmin pakṣe---rasavyatiriktaṃ kimanyat padārthāntaraṃ vidyate yasyāsāvalaṅkāraḥ /
analyzed: tatra pūrvasmin pakṣerasa vyatiriktam kim anyat padārtha antaram vidyate yasya asau alaṅkāraḥ
kāvyam eva iti ced

original: tatrāpi tadvyatiriktaḥ ko 'sau padārtho yatra rasavadalaṅkāravyapadeśaḥ sāvakāśatāṃ pratipadyate ?
analyzed: tatra api tad vyatiriktaḥ kaḥ sau padārthaḥ yatra rasa vat alaṅkāra vyapadeśaḥ sāvakāśa tām pratipadyate

original: viśeṣātiriktaḥ padārtho na kaścit paridṛśyate yastadvānalaṅkāra iti vyavasthitimāsādayati /
analyzed: viśeṣa atiriktaḥ padārthaḥ na kaścid paridṛśyate yaḥ tadvān alaṅkāraḥ iti vyavasthitim āsādayati
tat evam ukta lakṣaṇe mārge rasavat alaṅkārasya śabda artha saṅgatiḥ na kācid asti

original: yadi vā nidarśanāntaraviṣayatayā samāsadvitaye 'pi śabdārthasaṅgatiyojanā vidhīyate, yathā
analyzed: yadi vā nidarśana antara viṣaya tayā samāsa dvitaye śabda artha saṅgati yojanā vidhīyate yathā

original: tanvī meghajalārdrapallavatayā dhautādharevāśrubhiḥ śūnyevābharaṇaiḥ svakālavirahād viśrāntapuṣpodgamā /
analyzed: tanvī megha jala ārdra pallava tayā dhauta adharā iva aśrubhiḥ śūnyā iva ābharaṇaiḥ sva kāla virahāt viśrānta puṣpa udgamā

original: cintāmaunamivāsthitā madhukṛtāṃ śabdairvinā lakṣyate caṇḍī māmavadhūya pādapatitaṃ jātānutāpeva sā // VjivC_3.40 //
analyzed: cintā maunam iva āsthitā madhukṛtām śabdaiḥ vinā lakṣyate caṇḍī mām avadhūya pāda patitam jāta anutāpā iva sā
yathā vā
taraṅga bhrū bhaṅgā kṣubhita
vihaga śreṇi raśanā vikarṣantī phenam vasanam iva saṃrambha śithilam

original: yathāviddhaṃ yāti skhalitamabhisaṃdhāya bahuśo nadībhāveneyaṃ dhruvamasahanā sā pariṇatā // VjivC_3.41 //
analyzed: yathā āviddham yāti skhalitam abhisaṃdhāya bahuśas nadī bhāvena iyam dhruvam asahanā sā pariṇatā
atra rasavat tvam alaṅkāraḥ ca prakaṭam pratibhāsete
tasmāt na kathañcid api tad vivekasya duravadhāna tā

original: tena rasavato 'laṅkāra iti ṣaṣṭhīsamāsapakṣe śabdārthayorna kiñcidasaṅgatatvam,
analyzed: tena rasavataḥ laṅkāraḥ iti ṣaṣṭhī samāsa pakṣe śabda arthayoḥ na kiñcid asaṅgatatvam
rasa paripoṣa para tvāt alaṅkārasya tat nibandhanam eva rasavat tvam
rasavān ca asau alaṅkāraḥ ca iti viśeṣaṇa samāsa pakṣe na kiñcid asaṅgatvam

original: tathā caitayorudāharaṇayorlatāyāḥ saritaścoddīpanavibhāvatvena vallabhābhāvitāntaḥ karaṇatayā nāyakasya tanmayatvena (niścetana?)
analyzed: tathā ca etayoḥ udāharaṇayoḥ latāyāḥ saritaḥ ca uddīpana vibhāva tvena vallabhā bhāvita antar karaṇa tayā nāyakasya tad maya tvena niścetana

original: meva padārthajātaṃ sakalamavalokayataḥ tatsāmyasamāropaṇaṃ taddharmādhyāropaṇaṃ cetyupamārūpakakāvyālaṅkārayojanaṃ vinā na kenacit prakāreṇa
analyzed: padārtha jātam sakalam avalokayataḥ tad sāmya samāropaṇam tad dharma adhyāropaṇam ca iti upamā rūpaka kāvya alaṅkāra yojanam vinā na kenacid prakāreṇa
tad lakṣaṇa vākya tvāt
satyam etat
kintu alaṅkāra śabda abhidhānam vinā viśeṣaṇa samā
kṣe kevalasya rasavān iti asya
prayogaḥ prāpnoti
rasavān alaṅkāraḥ iti ced pratītiḥ abhyupagamyate
tat api yukti yukta tām nā arhati
rūpaka ādeḥ abhāvāt
rasavataḥ laṅkāraḥ iti na su spaṣṭa samanvayaḥ
sarvasya kasyacid kāvyasya rasavat tvam eva

original: yasmātsātiśayatvanibandhanaṃ tathāvidhaṃ tadvidāhlādakāri kāvyaṃ karaṇīyamiti tasyālaṅkāra
analyzed: yasmāt sātiśaya tva nibandhanam tathāvidham tadvida āhlāda kāri kāvyam karaṇīyam iti tasya alaṅkāra

original: ityāśrite sarveṣāmeva ca rūpakādīnāṃ rasavadalaṅkāratvameva nyāyopapannatāṃ pratipadyate /
analyzed: iti āśrite sarveṣām eva ca rūpaka ādīnām rasavat alaṅkāra tvam eva nyāya upapanna tām pratipadyate

original: alaṅkārasya ca yasyakasyacitsarvasya rasavattvād viśeṣaṇasamāsapakṣe 'pyeṣaiva vārttā /
analyzed: alaṅkārasya ca yasya kasyacid sarvasya rasavat tvāt viśeṣaṇa samāsa pakṣe pi eṣā eva vārttā
tad abhyupagame pi pratyekam utskhalita lakṣaṇānām prakṛta paripoṣa para tayā labdha ātmanām alaṅkāraṇām prātisvika lakṣaṇa abhihita atiśaya vyatiriktam anena
na kiñcid ādhikyam ādhīyate
tasmāt tad tad lakṣaṇa
karaṇa vaiyarthyam a prativārita prasaram eva parāpatati
na ca evaṃvidha viṣaye rasavat alaṅkāra vyavahārasya avakāśaḥ
tad jñaiḥ tathā anavagamāt
alaṅkāra antarāṇām ca mukhya tayā vyavasthānāt
athavā cetana padārtha gocara tayā rasavat alaṅkārasya
niścetana vastu viṣaya tvena ca upamā ādīnām viṣaya vibhāgaḥ vyavasthāpyate
tat api na vidvas jana āvarjanam vidadhāti
yasmāt acetanānām api rasa uddīpana sāmarthya samucita sat kavi samullikhita saukumārya sarasā tvāt upamā ādīnām

original: praviralaviṣayatā nirviṣayatvaṃ vā syāditi śṛṅgarādirasanisyandasundarasya satkavipravāhasya
analyzed: pravirala viṣaya tā nirviṣaya tvam vā syāt iti śṛṅgara ādi rasa nisyanda sundarasya sat kavi pravāhasya

original: ca nīrasatvaṃ prasajyata iti pratipāditameva pūrvasūribhiḥ /
analyzed: ca nīrasa tvam prasajyate iti pratipāditam eva pūrva sūribhiḥ
yadi vā vaicitrya antara manohāri tayā rasa vat alaṅkāraḥ pratipādyate
yathā abhiyukta tarauḥ taiḥ eva abhyadhāyi
pradhāne vākya arthe yatra aṅgam tu rasa ādayaḥ

original: kāvye tasminnalaṅkāro rasādiriti me matiḥ // VjivC_3.42 //
analyzed: kāvye tasmin alaṅkāraḥ rasa ādiḥ iti me matiḥ
iti

original: yatrānyo vākyārthaḥ prādhānyādalaṅkāryatayā vyavasthitastasmin tadaṅgatayā vinabadhyamānaḥ śṛṅgārādiralaṅkāratāṃ pratipadyate /
analyzed: yatra anyaḥ vākya arthaḥ prādhānyāt alaṅkārya tayā vyavasthitaḥ tasmin tad aṅga tayā śṛṅgāra ādiḥ alaṅkāra tām pratipadyate
yasmāt guṇaḥ pradhānam bhāva abhivyakti pūrvam evaṃvidha viṣaye vibhūṣayati
tasmāt bhūṣaṇa viveka vyaktiḥ ujjṛmbhate yathā

original: kṣipto hastāvalagnaḥ prasabhamabhihato 'pyādadānoṃ'śukāntaṃ gṛhṇan keśeṣvapāstaścaraṇanipatito nekṣitaḥ saṃbhrameṇa /
analyzed: kṣiptaḥ hasta avalagnaḥ prasabham abhihataḥ gṛhṇan keśeṣu apāstaḥ caraṇa nipatitaḥ na īkṣitaḥ saṃbhrameṇa

original: āliṅgan yo 'vadhūtastripurayuvatibhiḥ sāstranetrotpalābhiḥ kāmīvārdrāparādhaḥ sa dahatu duritaṃ śāmbhavo vaḥ śarāgniḥ // VjivC_3.43 //
analyzed: āliṅgan yaḥ vadhūtaḥ tripura yuvatibhiḥ sa astra netra utpalābhiḥ kāmī iva ārdra aparādhaḥ sa dahatu duritam śāmbhavaḥ vaḥ śara agniḥ
atra sa astra netra utpala ādi śabda gmya vaiklavyasya śāmbhava śara agni dahyamāna asura sundarīṇām
tripura ripu prabhāva prakhyāpana parasya prayojaka tvena karuṇaḥ rasaḥ aṅga
na punar īrṣyā vipralambha śṛṅgāraḥ
tasya an anubhūyamāna tvāt
tat ayam atra parama arthaḥ kavi pratibhā paripoṣita prakarṣa gamyamāna karuṇa rasa upabṛṃhita saundarya dhārā adhirūḍhaḥ bhagavat prabhāva atiśayaḥ kām api
sahṛdaya hṛdaya hāri tām pratipadyate

original: na ca śabdavācyatvaṃ nāma samānaṃ kāmiśarāgnitejasoḥ saṃbhavatīti tāvataiva tayostathāvidhaviruddhadharmādhyāsādivaruddhasvabhāvacoraikyaṃ  #
analyzed: na ca śabda vācya tvam nāma samānam kāmi śara agni tejasoḥ saṃbhavati iti tāvatā eva tayoḥ tathāvidha viruddha dharma adhyāsa ādi varuddha svabhāvacoḥ aikyam
kathañcid api vyavasthāpayitum pāryate
parameśvara prayatnena api svabāvasya anyathā kartum aśakya tvāt

original: na ca tathāvidhaśabdāvācyatāmātrādevaṃ tadvidāṃ tadanubhavapratītirastiḥ guḍakhaṇḍādiśabdābhidhānādapi prītiviṣādādestadāsvādaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: na ca tathāvidha śabda avācya tā mātrāt evam tad vidām tad anubhava pratītiḥ astiḥ guḍa khaṇḍa ādi śabda abhidhānāt api prīti viṣāda ādeḥ tad āsvāda prasaṅgāt
tad anubhava pratītau satyām rasa dvaya samāveśa doṣaḥ u pi anivārya tām ācarati

original: rasadvayasamāveśādoṣo 'pyatra guṇapradhānabhāvasya pra(yojaka iti vaktuṃ na pāryate) /
analyzed: rasa dvaya samāveśāt oṣaḥ pi atra guṇa pradhāna bhāvasya prayojakaḥ iti vaktum na pāryate

original: yadi vā bhagavatprabhāvasya mukhyatve dvayorapyetayoraṅgatvād bhūṣaṇatvamityucyate tadapi (na)
analyzed: yadi vā bhagavat prabhāvasya mukhya tve dvayoḥ api etayoḥ aṅga tvāt bhūṣaṇa tvam iti ucyate tat api na
samañjasam

original: yasmāt karuṇasya vāstavatvādeka eva syāt nirmūlatvādeva tayorbhāvābhāvayoriva na kathañcidapi sāmyopapattirityalamanucitacarvaṇacāturyacāpalena
analyzed: yasmāt karuṇasya vāstava tvāt ekaḥ eva syāt nirmūla tvāt eva tayoḥ bhāva abhāvayoḥ iva na kathañcid api sāmya upapattiḥ iti alam anucita carvaṇa cāturya cāpalena

original: yadi vā nidarśane 'sminnanāśvasantaḥ samāmnātalakṣaṇodāharaṇasaṅgatiṃ samyak samīhamānāḥ savimarṣaṇā udāharaṇāntaraṃ rasavadalaṅkārasya vyācakṣate,
analyzed: yadi vā nidarśane smin anāśvasantaḥ samāmnāta lakṣaṇa udāharaṇa saṅgatim samyak samīhamānāḥ sa vimarṣaṇāḥ udāharaṇa antaram rasavat alaṅkārasya vyācakṣate

original: kiṃ hāsyena na me prayāsyasi punaḥ prāptaścirāddarśanaṃ keyaṃ niṣkaruṇa pravāsarucitā kenāsi dūrīkṛtaḥ /
analyzed: kim hāsyena na me prayāsyasi punar prāptaḥ cirāt darśanam kā iyam niṣkaruṇa pravāsa ruci tā kena asi dūrīkṛtaḥ

original: svapnānteṣviti te vadan priyatamavyāsaktakaṇṭhagraho buddhvā roditi riktabāhuvalayastāraṃ ripustrījanaḥ // VjivC_3.44 //
analyzed: svapna anteṣu iti te vadan priyatama vyāsakta kaṇṭha grahaḥ buddhvā roditi rikta bāhu valayaḥ tāram ripu strī janaḥ
atra bhavat vinihata vallabhaḥ vairi vilāsinī samūhaḥ śoka āveśāt aśara

original: ṇaḥ karuṇarasakāṣṭhādhirūḍhivihitamevaṃ vidhavaiśasamanubhavatī“ti tātparye sa eva prādhānyena vākyārthaḥ,
analyzed: ṇaḥ karuṇa rasa kāṣṭhā adhirūḍhi vihitam evam vidha vaiśasam anubhavati iti tātparye saḥ eva prādhānyena vākya arthaḥ
tad aṅga tayā vinibadhyamānaḥ karuṇaḥ
pravāsa vipralambha śṛṅgāra para tvam atra na paramārthaḥ
paraspara anvita padārtha sārtha samarpyamāṇa vṛttiḥ guṇa bhāvena avabhāsanāt alaṃṅkaraṇam iti ucyate
tasya ca nirviṣaya tva abhāvāt rasa ālambana vibhāva ādi sva kāraṇa sāmagrī viraha vihitā lakṣaṇa anupapattiḥ na saṃbhavati
rasa dvaya samāveśa duṣṭatvam api dūram apāstam eva

original: dvayorapi vāstavasvarūpasya vidyamānatvāttadanubhavapratītau satyāṃ nātmavirodhaḥ spardhitvābhāvāt /
analyzed: dvayoḥ api vāstava svarūpasya vidyamāna tvāt tad anubhava pratītau satyām na ātma virodhaḥ spardhi tva abhāvāt

karuṇa rasasya niścāyaka pramāṇa abhāvāt

original: prabodhāvasare ca tathāvidhatvaṃ yuktyā saṃbhavatastasya karuṇasyetyubhayamupapannamiti prathamatarameva kathamasau samudbhavatīti caitadapi  #
analyzed: prabodha avasare ca tathāvidha tvam yuktyā saṃbhavataḥ tasya karuṇasya iti ubhayam upapannam iti prathamataram eva katham asau samudbhavati iti ca etat api
na samañjasa prāyam

original: yasmāccāṭuviṣayamahāpuruṣapratāpākrānticakitacetasāmitastataḥ svavairiṇāṃ tatpreyasīnāṃ ca palāyanairapi pṛthagavasthānaṃ na yuktiprayuktatāmativartate
analyzed: yasmāt cāṭu viṣaya mahāpuruṣa pratāpa ākrānti cakita cetasām itastatas sva vairiṇām tad preyasīnām ca palāyanaiḥ api pṛthak avasthānam na yukti prayukta tām ativartate
karuṇa rasasya sati api niścaye
tasya eva tathāvidha paripoṣa daśa ādhāra adhirūḍheḥ ekāgra tā stimita mānasasya tathā abhyasta vyasana adhivāsita cetasā
su cirāt samāsādita svapna samāgamaḥ pūrva anubhūta vṛttāntu samucita samārabdha kānta saṃlāpaḥ
katham api saṃprabuddhaḥ prabodha samanantara samullasita pūrva apara anusaṃdhāna vihita prastuta vastu visaṃvāda vidārita antaḥ
karaṇaḥ bhavat vairi vilāsinī sārthaḥ roditi iti karuṇasya eva paripoṣa padavī samadhirohaḥ
tathāvidha vyabhicāri aucitya cāru tvam tad svarūpa anupraveśaḥ vā iti kutas pravāsa vipralambhasya
pṛthak vyāpāre rasa gandhaḥ pi

original: yadi vā preyasaḥ prādhānye tadaṅgatvāt karuṇarasasyālaṅkaraṇatvamityabhidhīyate tadapi na niravadyam /

original: na karuṇasya rasatvād vyaṅgyasya sato vācyatvamupapannam /

tat katham anaucitya parimlānaḥ kāma ādi kāraṇa kalpanā upasaṃhata vṛttiḥ alaṅkāra tā ava bhāsa tām prayāsyati

original: tathā ca tathāvidhe viṣaye varṇanīyāntarasamānatayā rasavattāṃ parikalpayantaḥ satkavayo nitāntaṃ (vi) rājante /
analyzed: tathā ca tathāvidhe viṣaye varṇanīya antara samāna tayā rasavat tām parikalpayantaḥ sat kavayaḥ nitāntam vi rājante
yathā
paśupatiḥ api tāni ahāni kṛcchrā dagamayat adrisutā samāgama utkaḥ

original: kamaparavaśaṃ na viprakuryuḥ vibhumapi taṃ yadamī spṛśanti bhāvāḥ // VjivC_3.54 //
analyzed: kam aparavaśam na viprakuryuḥ vibhum api tam yat amī spṛśanti bhāvāḥ
tat etat avasara āpatitam asmābhiḥ paryālocitam
nanu bha tanaya nipuṇa mānasānām parama artha vidām tatrabhavatām asmin viṣaye
vayam vivadāmahe

original: yo 'yamatrodāhṛtaḥ sa bhagavān rasābhāsaviṣayatayā varṇanīyatāmarhati na veti ?
analyzed: yaḥ yam atrā udāhṛtaḥ sa bhagavān rasa ābhāsa viṣaya tayā varṇanīya tām arhati na vā iti
kim aucitya anaucitya parikalpanena
sarvathā yathā tatrabhavadbhyaḥ pratibhāsate tat tathā eva āstām

original: tathāpi tathāvidhastadīyaścittavṛttiviśeṣaḥ prādhānyena varṇyamānatvāt alaṅkāryatāṃ nātikrāmati /
analyzed: tathā api tathāvidhaḥ tadīyaḥ cittavṛtti viśeṣaḥ prādhānyena varṇyamāna tvāt alaṅkārya tām na atikrāmati

original: “dviḥ sandadhāti” ityādau vīrasya vakturlokottarapauruṣābhidhānavyasaninaḥ sahajotsāhotsiktacittavṛttyatiśayavyatirekeṇa na kiñcidanyanmukyatayā  #
analyzed: dvis sandadhāti ityādau vīrasya vaktuḥ lokottara pauruṣa abhidhāna vyasaninaḥ sahaja utsāha utsikta cittavṛtti atiśaya vyatirekeṇa na kiñcid anyat mukya tayā
vākya artha tām upanītam
tathā hi sāyaka sandhāna kriyā abhyāvṛtti gaṇanam akasmāt api sva parispanda tiraskāra kāraṇam manyamānaḥ kim iti anena pariharati
karṇaḥ iti abhimāna pratītiḥ pradhānam puruṣa vakra bhāva upabṛṃhitam
rūḍhi vaicitrya yoginaḥ śalya iti āmantraṇa padasya abhiprāyaḥ
pārthāya iti sāmānyasya kasyacid ākāra antara śabda ra

original: pratīkārasya śatroḥ kṛte tatpratighātasamarthopādhyantaropakaraṇaṃ kadācitsaṃbhāvyetāpi iti prakaraṇāt pratīyate /
analyzed: pratīkārasya śatroḥ kṛte tad pratighāta samartha upādhi antara upakaraṇam kadācid saṃbhāvyeta api iti prakaraṇāt pratīyate
āgataḥ iti tat pratiniyata artham
manā artham

original: prayatnenābhimānenānyo 'pi svayamāgataḥ san apākṛta ityabhimānotkarṣapratītiḥ prakaraṇādgamyate /
analyzed: prayatnena abhimānena anyaḥ pi svayam āgataḥ san apākṛtaḥ iti abhimāna utkarṣa pratītiḥ prakaraṇāt gamyate
udāharaṇam eva ūrjitam

original: tadevamayaṃ pradhānacetanalakṣaṇopakṛtātiśayaviśiṣṭacittavṛttiviśeṣaḥ vastusvabhāva eva mukhyatayā varṇyamānatvātalaṅkāryo na punaralaṅkāraḥ
analyzed: tat evam ayam pradhāna cetana lakṣaṇa upakṛta atiśaya viśiṣṭa cittavṛtti viśeṣaḥ vastu svabhāvaḥ eva mukhya tayā varṇyamāna tvāt alaṅkāryaḥ na punar alaṅkāraḥ
tat idam uktam udāra sva parispanda sundara tvena varṇanam
vastunaḥ vakra śabda eka gocara tvena vakri tā
iti

original: tasmādevaṃvidhasya cittavṛttiviśeṣatvāt rasabhāvatadābhāsānāṃ yathāyogamekatamasmin vivakṣāvaśādantarbhāvaḥ saṃbhavatītyalaṅkāryatvameva yuktam  #
analyzed: tasmāt evaṃvidhasya citta vṛtti viśeṣa tvāt rasa bhāva tad ābhāsānām yathāyogam ekatamasmin vivakṣā vaśāt antarbhāvaḥ saṃbhavati iti alaṅkārya tvam eva yuktam
na tu alaṅkāra bhāve iti
tasmāt na rasavat ādi abhihita dūṣaṇa pātra tām atikrāmati
tat etat uktam atra sarvam eva yojanīyam
tadvat apakartā aham asmi iti aparam udāharaṇam anena eva nyāyena samāna yogakṣema prāyam iti gatārtham eva
evam udāttasya ubhaya prakārasya api alaṅkārya tā eva yuktimatī na punar alaṅkaraṇa tvam
tatra prathamasya tāvat lakṣaṇa vākyam eva duradhigama samanvayam
udāttam ṛddhimat vastu
iti
atra yat vastu tat udāttam

original: alakaraṇaṃ kīdṛśamityākāṅkṣāyām ṛddhimadityanena yadi viśeṣyate tattadeva saṃpadupetaṃ
analyzed: alakaraṇam kīdṛśam iti ākāṅkṣāyām ṛddhimat iti anena yadi viśeṣyate tat tat eva saṃpad upetam

original: vastu varṇyamānamalaṅkāryaṃ tadevālaṅkaraṇamiti svātmani kriyāvirodhalakṣaṇasya doṣasya
analyzed: vastu varṇyamānam alaṅkāryam tat eva alaṅkaraṇam iti sva ātmani kriyā virodha lakṣaṇasya doṣasya
durnivāra tvāt svarūpāt atiriktasya vastu antarasya apratibhāsanāt ūrjasvi vat udātte bhūṣa
ṇa bhāva anupapattiḥ

original: athavā ṛddhimadvastu yasmin yasyetyapi vyākhyānaṃ kriyate,
analyzed: athavā ṛddhimat vastu yasmin yasya iti api vyākhyānam kriyate
tathā api tad anya padārtha lakṣaṇam vastu vaktavyam eva yat samāsa artha upanītam

original: tatkāvyameva tathāvidhaṃ bhaviṣyatīti cettadapi na kiñcideva,
analyzed: tat kāvyam eva tathāvidham bhaviṣyati iti ced tat api na kiñcid eva

original: yasmāt kāvyasyālaṅkāra iti prasiddhirna punaḥ kāvyamevālaṅkaraṇamiti /
analyzed: yasmāt kāvyasya alaṅkāraḥ iti prasiddhiḥ na punar kāvyam eva alaṅkaraṇam iti

original: yadi vā ṛddhimadvastu yasmin yasya vā ityasāvalaṅkāraḥ (eva)
analyzed: yadi vā ṛddhimat vastu yasmin yasya vā iti asau alaṅkāraḥ eva
samāsa arthena upanīyate tathā api varṇanīyāt alaṅkaraṇam atiriktam alaṅkaraṇa kalpam anyat atra na kim

original: cidevopalabhyate ityubhayathāpi śabdārthāsaṃgatilakṣaṇo doṣaḥ saṃprāptāvasaraḥ saṃpadyate /
analyzed: cit eva upalabhyate iti ubhayathā api śabda artha asaṃgati lakṣaṇaḥ doṣaḥ saṃprāpta avasaraḥ saṃpadyate
kim ca udāttasya alaṅkaraṇa tve sati
alaṅkaraṇa antara vidhānāt tad apekṣā nibandhanasya saṃsṛṣṭi saṃkara vyapadeśasya aprasiddheḥ anyasmin

original: viṣaye varṇanīyāntare rūpakādivat tadviruddhasya samṛddhirahitasya varṇanīyāntarasya
analyzed: viṣaye varṇanīya antare rūpaka ādi vat tad viruddhasya samṛddhi rahitasya varṇanīya antarasya
ca alaṅkāra tva prasaṃgāt udāttasya na kathañcid api bhūṣaṇa tva upapattiḥ asti
tathā dvitīyasya api udātta prakārasya alaṅkārya tvam eva upapannam
na punar alaṅkāra bhāvaḥ
tathā ca etasya lakṣaṇam
caritam ca mahātmanām
upalakṣaṇa tām prāptam na iti vṛtta tvam āgatam
iti
tatra vākya artha parama artha vidbhiḥ evam paryālocyatām

original: yanmahānubhāvānāṃ vyavahārasya lakṣaṇamātravṛtteranvayaḥ prastute vākyārthe kaścicat vidyate na veti /
analyzed: yat mahā anubhāvānām vyavahārasya lakṣaṇa mātra vṛtteḥ anvayaḥ prastute vākya arthe kaścid cat vidyate na vā iti

original: tatra pūrvasmin pakṣe tatra tadalīnatvāt pṛthagabhidheyasyāpi padārthāntaravat tadavayavatvenaiva vyapadeśonyāyyaḥ,
analyzed: tatra pūrvasmin pakṣe tatra tad alīna tvāt pṛthak abhidheyasya api padārtha antara vat tad avayava tvena eva vyapadeśaḥ nyāyyaḥ
pāṇi ādeḥ iva śarīre
na punar eva alaṅkāra bhāvaḥ iti

original: dvitīyasmin pakṣe tadanvayābhāvādeva vākyāntaravartipadārthavat tatra tasya sattaiva na saṃbhavati iti na punaralaṅkāracarcā /
analyzed: dvitīyasmin pakṣe tad anvaya abhāvāt eva vākya antara varti padārtha vat tatra tasya sattā eva na saṃbhavati iti na punar alaṅkāra carcā
nanu ca rūpaka ādeḥ alaṅkārasya api tatra anvayaḥ vidyate
tatas tasya api tad anvita tvāt alaṅkāra tā nivartate
satyam etat
kim tu tad anvitasya dvaividhyam vidyate
vibhūṣaṇa antara vat tad upaśobhā kāri tva mātreṇa eva ca
tatra pūrvasmin pakṣe yuktaruktā eva
tad vicchatti vidhāyi tva mātre mahāpuruṣa caritasya dūṣaṇāni iti na duṣparihāraṇī eva
tad viruddha vṛtteḥ varṇanīya antarasya alaṅkāra tva prasaṅgaḥ
alaṅkāra antara saṃnidhāne tad apekṣā nibandhana saṃsṛṣṭi saṃkara vyapadeśa yogya tā
viṣaya antare pi alaṅkāra antara vat pravartanam ca iti
yat api samañjasa udāharaṇa bandhana vyasani tayā pūrva sūribhiḥ atra ādara prathana pūrvakam pratiṣṭhitam
tat api prastuta tātparya parāyatta vṛtti tvāt eva sahṛdaya bhāva

original: nāṃ prati manāgapi na pātratāṃ pratipadyate /
analyzed: nām prati manāk api na pātra tām pratipadyate
yathā
nethā kunthapṛthak tarjarattā masthāpatteḥ vicchitti

original: mahendrakandarakvaṇatkarṇeṣu ṭaṅkānvitāḥ te nīlā...śekharaśarakṣepaikavīthībhuvā... durgā avigāhitāḥ śaśirucā kīrtyā vasantyāstava (?) // VjivC_3.57
analyzed: mahā indra kandara kvaṇat karṇeṣu ṭaṅka anvitāḥ te nīlā śekhara śara kṣepa eka vīthī bhuvā durgāḥ avigāhitāḥ śaśi rucā kīrtyā vasantyāḥ tava  /
atra pūrva apara varṇitaḥ mahāpuruṣa carita lakṣaṇa padārthaḥ vyatireka upabṛṃhitaḥ
prastata vākya artha tātparyam eva vighaṭate
na punar tad upaśobhā mātram eva
tathā ca ayam atra abhiprāyaḥ yat askhalitaiḥ laikha mahāpuruṣa puruṣa prabhṛtiḥ sakala saṃcārita carita apasaraṇam

original: saṃraṃbhamātmasātkṛte ca kārye tadatiriktavṛttāntapuruṣāntaravyatirekeṇa na kasyacidanyasya
analyzed: saṃraṃbham ātmasāt kṛte ca kārye tad atirikta vṛttānta puruṣa antara vyatirekeṇa na kasyacid anyasya
niḥsāmānya vṛtteḥ api prakāśate

original: tasmāttathāvidhamahāsattvāpadānamahamuditeṣvapi teṣu pradeśeṣu bhavataḥ paraṃ pratāpaḥ prathituṃ pragalbhata iti ?)
analyzed: tasmāt tathāvidha mahāsattva apadānam aham uditeṣu api teṣu pradeśeṣu bhavataḥ param pratāpaḥ prathitum pragalbhate iti
evam samāhitasya api alaṅkārya tvam eva nyāyyam na punar alaṅkaraṇa bhāvaḥ
tat āha tathā samāhitasya api

original: “tathā“---tenaiva prakāreṇa pūrvoktenasamāhitābhidhānasya cālaṅkārasya “bhuṣaṇatvam” alaṅkaraṇatvaṃ na vidyate nāstītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: tathā tena eva prakāreṇa pūrvoktena samāhita abhidhānasya ca alaṅkārasya bhuṣaṇa tvam alaṅkaraṇa tvam na vidyate na asti iti arthaḥ
tathā hi tasya idam lakṣaṇam
anya anubhāva niśśūnya rūpaḥ yaḥ tat samāhitam
rasa bhāva tad ābhāsānām praśama vyapadeśa viṣayaḥ daśā viśeṣaḥ
tad anantara rasa avatāra taraṅga varjitaḥ nija vyañjaka vyāpāra virāma viśrānta vibhramaḥ prathama parispandaiḥ
parisamāpteḥ uttara samudāyāt anabhivyakteḥ asaṃvedyamāna kramaḥ sandhyā samaya nibha saṃniveśa viśeṣaḥ
sat kavibhiḥ api kathañcid unneya vṛtti
nimitta manoharaḥ samāhitam alaṅkaraṇam
tathā

original: akṣṇoḥ sphuṭāśrukaluṣo 'ruṇimā vilīnaḥ śāntaṃ ca sārdhamadharasphuraṇaṃ bhrukuṭyā /
analyzed: akṣṇoḥ sphuṭa aśru kaluṣaḥ ruṇimā vilīnaḥ śāntam ca sārdham adhara sphuraṇam bhrukuṭyā
bhāva antarasya tava

original: gaṇḍagato 'pi kopo nodgāḍhavāsanatayā prasaraṃ dadāti // VjivC_3.59 //
analyzed: gaṇḍa gataḥ pi kopaḥ na udgāḍha vāsana tayā prasaram dadāti
tat api na saṃpad samyak samāhitam
yasmāt rasa ādi viśeṣasya sataḥ tasya svarūpa lobhaḥ

original: teṣāṃ ca cittavṛttiviśeṣatvāt bhūṣaṇatve nipiddhasyāpi tadekarūpatvāt kathaṃ tadupapadyate /
analyzed: teṣām ca citta vṛtti viśeṣa tvāt bhūṣaṇa tve nipiddhasya api tad eka rūpa tvāt katham tat upapadyate
kim ca pradhāna cetana sva rūpa tvāt varṇanīya svabhāva bhūtasya tad anyavidhasya
artha ātmanaḥ sahaja vyañjaka asahiṣṇoḥ vyatirikta padārtha antara saṃparka sahatvam svaccha svabhāva tvāt eva
na kathañcid api samañjasatām samāsādayati iti evam svarūpāt atirikta padārtha antarasya apratibhāsanāt ityādi
yathāsaṃbhavam anivāryam

original: yadapi kaiścitprakārāntareṇa samāhitākhyamalakaraṇamākhyātaṃ tasyāpi tathaiva bhūṣaṇatvaṃ na vidyate,
analyzed: yat api kaiścid prakāra antareṇa samāhita ākhyam ala karaṇam ākhyātam tasya api tathā eva bhūṣaṇa tvam na vidyate
tat abhidhatte
tathā samāhitasya api prakāra dvaya śobhinaḥ

original: pūrvoktena prakāreṇa anena cāpareṇeti dvābhyāṃ prakārābhyāṃ śobhamānasya samāhitasyālaṅkaraṇatvaṃ na sabhavati /
analyzed: pūrva uktena prakāreṇa anena ca apareṇa iti dvābhyām prakārābhyām śobhamānasya samāhitasya alaṅkaraṇa tvam na sabhavati
tathā ca asya lakṣaṇa udāharaṇe
kiñcid ārabhamāṇasya kāryam daiva vaśāt punar
tad sādhana samāpattiḥ yat tam āhuḥ samāhitam
iti
spaṣṭa artham idam vākyam
mānam asyāḥ nirākartum pādayoḥ me patipyataḥ
upakārāya diṣṭayā etat udīrṇam ghana garjitam

original: atra pūrvasya pūrvasya vastunaḥ pradhānaṃ samarthanamuttaratra samāhita (miti)
analyzed: atra pūrvasya pūrvasya vastunaḥ pradhānam samarthanam uttaratra samāhitam iti
yat ucyate tat āstām
samāhita śabda vācya tve na kenacid nivāryate
alaṅkaraṇa tvam sarasa vṛtta tvāt guṇa pradhāna bhāvasya abhāvāt na kiñcid upapadyate
dvayoḥ api vastu dharma tayā varṇanīya tvam eva samānam tad artham
dīrṇam iva iti pratītau utprekṣā bhaviṣyati iti alam atiprasaṅgena

original: tadevaṃ cetanācetanapadārthabhedabhinnaṃ svābhāvikasaukumāryamanoharaṃ vastunaḥ svarūpaṃ pratipāditam /
analyzed: tat evam cetana acetana padārtha bheda bhinnam svābhāvika saukumārya manoharam vastunaḥ svarūpam pratipāditam
idānīm tat eva kavi pratibhā ullikhita lokottara atiśaya śāli tayā nava narmitam manojña tām upanīyamānam ālocyate
tathāvidha bhūṣaṇa vinyāsa vihita saundarya atiśaya vyatirekeṇa bhūṣya tva nimitta bhūtam na tadvida āhlāda kāri tāyāḥ kāraṇam

original: prasiddho vastudharmo yo na vicchittyāśrayo bhavet /
analyzed: prasiddhaḥ vastu dharmaḥ yaḥ na vicchitti āśrayaḥ bhavet
tat evam kavi mukhyānām varṇanā yogam āsthitaḥ
tasya lokottara utkarṣa lekhā lagita vṛttibhiḥ
guṇaiḥ śca bhāsamānasya nava tvam upapadyate
iti antara ślokau
tat evam nūtana atiśaya vidhāyinaḥ kāvya artha svarūpasya alaṅkārāḥ
tatas tān eva upakramate
abhidhāyāḥ prakārau staḥ kaḥ pi enam sphuṭayati asau
kāvyasya kaścid vicchittim dyotayati aṅgataḥ sthitaḥ
abhidhāyāḥ ityādi
rasavat alaṅkāra ādiḥ kaścid aṃśena vartamānaḥ vibhūṣyasya śobhā atiśayam āvahati

original: kaścidaṅgato vyavasthitastasya mukhyatāṃ dyotayannātmano vibhūṣaṇabhāvamāviṣkarotīti codāhariṣyāmaḥ /
analyzed: kaścid aṅgataḥ vyavasthitaḥ tasya mukhya tām dyotayan ātmanaḥ vibhūṣaṇa bhāvam āviṣkaroti iti ca udāhariṣyāmaḥ
idānīm etat eva vibhajya vicārayati
yathā sa rasavat nāma sarva alaṅkāra jīvitam
kāvya eka sāra tām yāti kathā idānīm vicāryate
yathā ityādi
yathā sa yena prakāreṇa saḥ pūrva prakhyāta vṛttiḥ alaṅkāraḥ rasavat nāma
rasavat abhidhānaḥ kāvya eka sāra tām yāti kavi karma eka sarvasva tām pratipadyate
sarva alaṅkāra jīvitam sarveṣām alaṅkārāṇām upamā ādīnām jīvitam sphurita bhūtam ca saṃpadyate
tathā tena prakāreṇa edānīm adhunā vicāryate vivacyate
lakṣaṇa udāharaṇa bhedena vitanyate
tam eva rasavat alaṅkāram lakṣayati
rasena vartate tulyam rasavat tva vidhānataḥ
yaḥ laṅkāraḥ sa rasa vat tad vid āhlāda nirmiteḥ
rasena ityādi
yaḥ laṅkāraḥ sa rasavat iti
yaḥ kila evaṃsvarūpaḥ rūpaka ādiḥ sa rasa vat abhidhīyate
kiṃsvabhāvaḥ

original: “rasena vartate tulyaṃ“---rasena śṛṅgārādinā tulyaṃ vartate samānamātiṣṭhati /
analyzed: rasena vartate tulyam rasena śṛṅgāra ādinā tulyam vartate samānam ātiṣṭhati

original: yathā brāhmaṇena tulyaṃ vartate brāhmaṇavat kṣatriyastathaivasau rasavadalaṅkāraḥ /
analyzed: yathā brāhmaṇena tulyam vartate brāhmaṇa vat kṣatriyaḥ tathā eva asau rasavat alaṅkāraḥ
kasmāt rasavat tva vidhānataḥ iti rasavat kāvyam
tasya bhāvaḥ tattvam
kutas tadvida āhlāda nirmiteḥ tat kāvyam vidanti iti tadvidaḥ tajñāḥ
teṣām āhlāda nirmiteḥ ānanda niṣpādanāt

original: yathā rasaḥ kāvyasya rasavattāṃ tadvidāhlādaṃ ca vidadhātyevamupamādirapyubhyaṃ niṣpādayan rasavadalaṅkāraḥ saṃpadyate /
analyzed: yathā rasaḥ kāvyasya rasavat tām tad vid āhlādam ca vidadhāti evam upamā ādiḥ api ubhyam niṣpādayan rasavat alaṅkāraḥ saṃpadyate
yathā

original: sa ca śleṣacchāyāmanojñaviśeṣaṇavakrabhāvāt viśiṣṭaliṅgasāmarthyācca sutarāṃ samudbhāsamānaḥ

na punar janya tva prameya tva ādi sāmānyam
yasmāt tena eva pūrva ukta lakṣaṇa sāmyena varṇanīyam sahṛdaya hṛdaya āhlāda kāri tām avatarati
tasya ekam sarva svam kevalam eva jīvitam
tad nibandhana tvāt rūpaka pravṛtteḥ

ati kāntimat tva ādi guṇa vṛtti tām avalambate

tatas tad atiśaya paripoṣikāyām atiśayoktau alaṅkāra kṛtaḥ kṛta ādarāḥ
evaṃvidha svarūpāḥ te yathā ullāsita kāntayaḥ
rasa svabhāva alaṃkārāḥ parām puṣṇanti vaktra tām
evaṃvidha sva rūpāḥ te yathā ullāsita kāntayaḥ samuddīpita śobhā atiśayāḥ trayaḥ pi parām vakra tām alaukikam kāvya rahasya bhūta vakra bhāvam puṣṇanti
udbhāsayanti
yathā
candrakānta maṇi durdine sadmani
tyajat rājahaṃsam anubadhnatī girā

original: jyotsnayā janitasaṃśayā punaḥ vakradūtiriva rauti sārasī // VjivC_3.121 //
analyzed: jyotsnayā janita saṃśayā punar vakra dūtiḥ iva rauti sārasī
yathā vā

anvamīyanta bhṛṅga ali vācā saptacchada drumāḥ
atra bhāva svabhāva atiśayaḥ param paripoṣam adhiropitaḥ
yathā vā

original: yasya prajvalati pratāpatapane tejasvināmityalaṃ lokālokadharādhare 'pyatiśayaḥ śītāṃśubimbe vṛthā /
analyzed: yasya prajvalati pratāpa tapane tejasvinām iti alam loka aloka dharādhare pi atiśayaḥ śītāṃśu bimbe vṛthā

original: trailokyaprathitāpadānamahite kṣoṇīśavaṃśodbhave sūryācandramasau svayaṃ kṛśataracchāyāṃ samārohataḥ // VjivC_3.123 //
analyzed: trailokya prathita apadāna mahite kṣoṇīśa vaṃśa udbhave sūryācandramasau svayam kṛśatara chāyām samārohataḥ
yathā ca
hima ambu nirvṛtta nimajjanānām bāla ātapa sparśana nirmalānām

original: sāvitrabhāsā vihatāṅgaraga- maṅgaṃ kimapyaṅkuritaṃ sthalīnām // VjivC_3.124 //
analyzed: sāvitra bhāsā vihata aṅgaraga maṅgam kim api aṅkuritam sthalīnām
atra pūrvasmin rūpaka alaṅkāra atiśaya paripoṣa prakarṣaḥ
tathā prathame parasmin ca rasavat alaṅkāra paripuṣṭiḥ
tathā ca tuhina salila kṣālana kṣapita kalaṅkitayā nūtana ātapa pihata aṃśukena abhivyakta vimala bhāvena aṃbhaḥ snāna ādi sarasa ramaṇī vyapāra samāropaṇena kim api
saukumāryam āropitam
yatā ca
śakyam oṣadhipateḥ nava udayāḥ karṇapūra racanā kṛte tava
a pragalbha yava sūci komalā chettum agra nakha saṃpuṭaiḥ karāḥ
atra rasa parispanda saundarya atiśayaḥ samudbhāsate

original: tathā ca nūtanodayānāṃ darśitasaukumāryāṇāṃ śaśāṅkakiraṇānāmanyādṛśaḥ ko 'pyatiśayaḥ saṃprati samujjṛmbhate,
analyzed: tathā ca nūtana udayānām darśita saukumāryāṇām śaśāṅka kiraṇānām anyādṛśaḥ kaḥ pi atiśayaḥ saṃprati samujjṛmbhate
yena atyartham kapola karṇa alaka saṃparka ślāghanīyām karṇapūra racanā vicchittim arhati iti
pārvatīpatiḥ priyāyāḥ pratipādayan tad vadana indu saundarya darśanena tad kāla udita śaśāṅka kara avalokanena
ca rasa uccalita cittavṛttiḥ pratīyate
evam alaṅkāryasya vastunaḥ pradhāna bhūtasya aṅga bhāvena
pi alaṅkāra vargaḥ kiñcid atirikta vṛttitayā upanibadhyamānaḥ saṃniveśa saukumārya māhātmyāt udrikta bhāvena

original: parisphuran guṇabhūto 'pi mukhyatāmivāpadyamānaḥ nibandhanaprabhāvāttu prādhānyenāvabhāsamāno vyākhyātaḥ /
analyzed: parisphuran mukhya tām iva āpadyamānaḥ nibandhana prabhāvāt tu prādhānyena avabhāsamānaḥ vyākhyātaḥ
idānīm sāmya samudbhāsinaḥ vibhūṣaṇa vargasya vinyāsa vicchittim vicārayati
vastunaḥ kenacid sāmyam tad utkarṣavatā upamā
tām sādhāraṇa dharma uktau vākya arthe vā tad anvayāt

original: ivādirapi vicchittyā yatra vakti kriyāpadam // Vjiv_3.36 //
analyzed: iva ādiḥ api vicchittyā yatra vakti kriyā padam
vivakṣita ityādi ya trayasyām
vastunaḥ prastāva adhikṛtasya
kenacid aprastutena padārtha antareṇa
sāmyam sopamā aupamā alaṅkṛtiḥ iti ucyate
kimartham aprastutena sāmyam iti āha vivakṣita parispanda manohāri tva siddhaye vivakṣitaḥ vaktum abhipretaḥ
yaḥ sau parispandaḥ kaścid eva dharma viśeṣaḥ tasya manohāri tvam hṛdaya āhlādaka tvam
kīdṛśena padārtha antareṇa tad utkarṣavatā
tat iti manohāri tvam parāmṛśyate
tasya utkarṣaḥ atiśayaḥ
sa vidyate yasya sa tathā uktaḥ
tena tad utkarṣavatā
manohāri tva atiśayavatā

original: tadidamatra tātparyam---varṇanīyasya vivakṣitadharmasaundaryasiddhyarthaṃ aprastutapadārthena dharmiṇā sāmyaṃ yuktiyuktatāmarhati /
analyzed: tat idam atra tātparyam varṇanīyasya vivakṣita dharma saundarya siddhi artham aprastuta padārthena dharmiṇā sāmyam yuktiyuktatām arhati
dharmeṇa iti na uktam

evaṃvidhām upamā aṅkaḥ pratipādayati iti āha kriyā padam ityādi
kriyā dhātvarthaḥ
kriyā pada śabdena
vācaka sāmānya mātram atra abhipretam na punar ākhyāta padam eva

original: yasmāt amukhyabhāvenāpi kriyā yatra vartate tadapyupamāvācakameva /

original: tathā ca pācakaḥ ityatra pākaśakteḥ prādhānyena tadantarlonavṛttiḥ prakṛtyartho vidyata eva,
analyzed: tathā ca pācakaḥ iti atra pāka śakteḥ prādhānyena tad antar lona vṛttiḥ prakṛti arthaḥ vidyate eva

m upamā utprekṣayoḥ

original: anantapuṣpasya madhorhi cūte dvirephamālā saviśeṣasaṅgā // VjivC_3.138 //

atra yasmāt tathāvidha ananta sāmagrīkasya madhoḥ api tad samāna upa nīta cūte pratītiḥ upa
lapsyate iti nyāyyam etayoḥ su vyaktam eva sāmyam upagamayati
tathā ca asaṃkhya kusuma tva ādi dharma saukumārya atirekāt sāmya saṃpatti ādiḥ vivakṣitā ityādi upamā lakṣaṇa tātparya
vikalpam eva atra samarpyate

tasya vākya artha tātparya sāmya

original: tasmādanena nyāyena samānavastunyāsopanibandhanā prativastūpamāpi na pṛthagvaktavyatāmarhati,
analyzed: tasmāt anena nyāyena samāna vastu nyāsa upanibandhanā prativastūpamā api na pṛthak vaktavyatām arhati

original: tathā ca lakṣaṇodāharaṇe tasyāḥ samānavastunyāsena prativastūpamā yathā---
analyzed: tathā ca lakṣaṇa udāharaṇe tasyāḥ samāna vastu nyāsena prativastūpamā yathā
kiyantaḥ santi guṇinaḥ sādhu sādhāraṇa śriyaḥ

atra samāna vilasitānām ubhayeṣām api kavi vikṣita tā
virala tva lakṣaṇa sāmya vyatireki na
kiñcid anyat manohāri jīvitam atiricyamānam upalabhyate
tat evam prativastūpamāyāḥ pratīyamāna upamāyām antarbhāva upapattau satyām idānīm upameya upamā ādeḥ upamāyām antarbhāvaḥ vicāryate
upameyā umapā yā iyam upamāna upameyayoḥ
sāmānyā prastuta tvāt tu lakṣaṇā ananyathā stiteḥ
upameyopamā ityādi upameyopamā nāma kācid alaṅkṛtiḥ

kasmāt kāraṇāt

tathā ca upameyam upamānam yasyām iti vigrahe
yam upamānam upameyam saṃpadyate

original: “prasuptamathāvā nidrā ca śokātmatāmāpannasya hṛdayahārīti raterāśvāsanābhūmayaḥ” // VjivC_3.140 //

etasyām bahavaḥ dvau padārthāḥ tulya yoginaḥ
prakāra tvam prapadyante prādhānyasya nivartanāt

kim syāt kasya bhūṣaṇam

original: yeyaṃ tulyayogitā nāma nāsāvalaṅkṛtiḥ yasmāt “etasyāṃ dvau bahavo vā padārthāḥ tulyayoginaḥ prakāratvamupapadyante,
analyzed: yā iyam tulyayogitā nāma na asau alaṅkṛtiḥ yasmāt etasyām dvau bahavaḥ vā padārthāḥ tulya yoginaḥ prakāra tvam upapadyante

atra varṇyate mukhya tayā varṇanīyam vastu iti

original: kiṃ kasya vibhūṣaṇaṃ syāt alaṅkaraṇaṃ bhavet /

original: pratyekaṃ prādhānye niyamā niściteḥ na kiṃcit kasyacidityarthaḥ /

tatra etat api na upapadyate

original: yadi vā rājānucarādāvekasmin mukhyatvaṃ guṇabhāvaśca saṃbhavatītyabhidhīyate,

original: tathā ca rājānucareṣu svāmyapekṣayā bhṛtyabhāvaḥ svabhṛtyāpekṣayā svāmibhāvaśceti dharmadvayaṃ viruddhavyapekṣādvitayalakṣaṇasya rūpadvayasya  #
analyzed: tathā ca rāja anucareṣu svāmi apekṣayā bhṛtya bhāvaḥ sva bhṛtya apekṣayā svāmi bhāvaḥ ca iti dharma dvayam viruddha vyapekṣā dvitaya lakṣaṇasya rūpa dvayasya
vidyamāna tvāt upapannam eva
tat evam iha api svarūpa antara sadbhāve bhūṣaṇa tvam kena vāryate
satyam etat tat

original: bhūṣaṇatvaṃ na vāryate tulyayogitāprakāratvaṃ punarapasāryate ityāha---
analyzed: bhūṣaṇa tvam na vāryate tulya yogitā prakāra tvam punar apasāryate iti āha
varṇya tvam eṣām athavā sāmyam yadi atiricyate

original: eteṣāṃ prastutānāṃ sā bhavatyupamitiḥ sphuṭam // Vjiv_3.41 //
analyzed: eteṣām prastutānām sā bhavati upamitiḥ sphuṭam
varṇya tvam ityādi athavā iti anena prakāra antarasya upapatteḥ

original: avarṇyatve 'pi varṇanīyabhāve bhavatyapyeteṣāṃ prastutānāṃ padārthānāṃ yadi “sāmyaṃ” = sādṛśyaṃ kadācitatiricyate = varṇyamānatvādadhikatāṃ  #
analyzed: avarṇya tve varṇanīya bhāve bhavati api eteṣām prastutānām padārthānām yadi sāmyam sādṛśyam kadācid atiricyate varṇyamāna tvāt adhikatām
pratipadyate

original: tataḥ kiṃ syādityatrāha---“sā bhavatyupamitiḥ sphuṭam” prakaṭā cāsāvalaṅkṛtiḥ sāmyasamanvayādisaṃvādādupamaiva nānyā kācidityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tatas kim syāt iti atra ahasā bhavati upamitiḥ sphuṭam prakaṭā ca asau alaṅkṛtiḥ sāmya samanvaya ādi saṃvādāt upamā eva na anyā kācid iti arthaḥ

original: tathā samuccitopamāyāṃ---samuccitena varṇyamānatayār'thenābhisaṃbadhyamāne sati samuccitā upamā yasyāṃ sā tathoktā samuccitopamā,
analyzed: tathā samuccita upamāyām samuccitena varṇyamāna tayā arthena abhisaṃbadhyamāne sati samuccitā upamā yasyām sā tathā uktā samuccita upamā
tadvat tayā tulyam vartate
upamā abhidhānam atra upamāne vartate na samuccita upamāyām

original: upamānaṃ prastutatvāt varṇanīyaṃ sāmyasamanvayātirekāt alaṅkaraṇāya kalpate yathā---
analyzed: upamānam prastuta tvāt varṇanīyam sāmya samanvaya atirekāt alaṅkaraṇāya kalpate yathā

original: pararaimattaa amahe puṇo ssaṇo dei dāri aar pasaṇanu vinudi khilāsiṇio aṇo hucchaṇaṃ yadusadaṃ ca dappaṇo bahuṇi are (?) // VjivC_3.141 //
analyzed: puṇaḥ dei dāri aṇo aṇo ca bahuṇi are
tat etat evam iha api varṇyamāna tve pi sāmya atirekāt upamā eva bhavatum arhati iti bhāvaḥ
yathā
janasya sāketa nivāsinaḥ tau dvau api abhūtām abhinandya sattvau
guru pradeya adhika niḥ spṛhaḥ rthaḥ nṛpaḥ rthi kāmāt adhika pradaḥ ca
rucira saukumārya atireka subhaga dharma antara viṣayam upamānam kalpitam samullasati yathā

original: ubhau yadi vyomni pṛthak-pravāhā- vākāśagaṅgāpayasaḥ patetām /
analyzed: ubhau yadi vyomni pṛthak pravāhāḥ vā ākāśagaṅgā payasaḥ patetām
tena upamīyeta tamāla nīla mā mukta muktā latamasya vakṣaḥ
e tat dvayoḥ api nidarśanam

original: tadevamananvaye 'pi varṇyamānasaukumāryamāhātmyāt kālpanikamapyumānaṃ nopapannamiti manyamānāḥ tatsvarūpasamāropitavyatirekāmupamāṃ tāṃ varṇyanti
analyzed: tat evam ananvaye varṇyamāna saukumārya māhātmyāt kālpanikam api umānam na upapannam iti manyamānāḥ tad svarūpa samāropita vyatirekām upamām tām varṇyanti
yathā

original: tatpūrvānubhave bhavanti laghavo bhāvāḥ śaśāṅkādayaḥ tadvaktropamite paraṃ pariṇamecceto rasāyāmbujāt /
analyzed: tad pūrva anubhave bhavanti laghavaḥ bhāvāḥ śaśāṅka ādayaḥ tad vaktra upamite param pariṇamet cetaḥ rasāya ambujāt

original: evaṃ niścinute manastava mukhaṃ saundaryasārāvadhi badhnāti vyavasāyametumupamotkarṣaṃ svakāntyā svayam // VjivC_3.144 //
analyzed: evam niścinute manaḥ tava mukham saundarya sāra avadhi badhnāti vyavasāyam etum upama utkarṣam sva kāntyā svayam
tat evam abhidhā vaicitrya prakārāṇām evaṃvidham vaiśvarūpyam na pūnar lakṣaṇa bhedānām
abhidhāyāḥ prakārāṇām ānantyam pratibhā udbhavam
vaktum na pāryate kāntā līlā vaicitrya vat sphuṭam
antaraślokaḥ
tulya yogitā api atra eva antarbhāvāt na atiricyate
tathā ca lakṣaṇam nidarśanam ca etasyāḥ
nyūnasya api viśiṣṭena guṇa sāmya vivakṣayā
tulya kāla kriyā yogāt iti uktā tulya yogitā
iti
taiḥ pratipāditā
yasmāt sāmya atiśayāt
yathā

original: śeṣo himagiristvaṃ ca mahānto guravaḥ sthirāḥ /
analyzed: śeṣaḥ himagiriḥ tvam ca mahāntaḥ guravaḥ sthirāḥ
jātu a laṅghita maryādāḥ calantīm bibhṛtha kṣitim
atra lakṣaṇe tāvat upamā antarbhāvam tulya yogitāyāḥ pratipādayati asi
dvi atiśayasya vastunaḥ siddha atiśayena sādharmya samanvayaḥ nibandhanam upamāyāḥ

original: purarasyā guṇasāmyavivakṣayā tulyakālakriyāyogaḥ prastutāprastutasāmyavyatirekeṇa na kiñcidatra tātparyaṃ pratipādayati /
analyzed: purar asyāḥ guṇa sāmya vivakṣayā tulya kāla kriyā yogaḥ prastuta aprastuta sāmya vyatirekeṇa na kiñcid atra tātparyam pratipādayati
nidarśanam api evaṃprāyam eva

original: varṇanāviṣayasya varṇyamānavṛttiśleṣādisāmyavyatirekeṇa atiriktatayā na kiñcidapi pratibhāsate /
analyzed: varṇanā viṣayasya varṇyamāna vṛtti śleṣa ādi sāmya vyatirekeṇa atirikta tayā na kiñcid api pratibhāsate

original: tena caitadudāharaṇaṃ vivaktārthavṛttiśliṣṭatāpratibhāsamāhātmyāt na ca nidarśanāntaramiti yadabhiyuktataraiḥ tairevābhyadhāyita,
analyzed: tena ca etat udāharaṇam vivakta artha vṛtti śliṣṭa tā pratibhāsa māhātmyāt na ca nidarśana antaram iti yat abhiyuktataraiḥ taiḥ eva abhyadhāyita
na tat api yukti yuktam
yathā

original: yairdṛṣṭā sā na vā dṛṣṭā muṣitāḥ samameva te /
analyzed: yaiḥ dṛṣṭā sā na vā dṛṣṭā muṣitāḥ samam eva te
hṛtam hṛdayam ekeṣām anyeṣām cakṣuṣaḥ phalam
etat alaṅkāra vārtā mātra anabhijñasya kasyacid pralapitam iti sa cetasām pratibhāsate

original: yasmādvaidagdhyasya bhaṅgyā taruṇīlāvaṇyātiśayapratipādanapareyaṃ aprastutapraśaṃsā kavicetasi parisphurati /
analyzed: yasmāt vaidagdhyasya bhaṅgyā taruṇī lāvaṇya atiśaya pratipādana parā iyam aprastuta praśaṃsā kavi cetasi parisphurati
yadi vā nidarśana antara viṣaya tvena tulya yogitā saṃbhavati
yathā

original: yatkāvyārthanirūpaṇaṃ prayikathālāpā raho 'vasthitaṃ kaṇṭhāntaṃ mṛdugītamādṛtasuhṛdaduḥkhāntarāvedanam // VjivC_3.149 //
analyzed: yat kāvya artha nirūpaṇam prayi kathā ālāpāḥ rahaḥ vasthitam kaṇṭha antam mṛdu gītam ādṛta suhṛda duḥkha antara āvedanam
ananvayaḥ upi upamāyām eva antarbhavati iti vivecyate
tathā ca asya lakṣaṇam udāharaṇam ca
yatra tena eva tasya syāt upamāna upameya tā
a sādṛśya vivakṣātaḥ tam iti āhuḥ ananvayam
tāmbūla rāga valayam sphurat daśana dīdhiti
indīvara ābha nayanam tava iva vadanam tava
etasya lakṣaṇa ananyatvam eva vaṃ
tad sahāya
ca iti dvitayam api upamā antarbhāvam eva sādhayati
tatra upamāna upameya bhāva vyavasthiteḥ

original: upamāntareṇa saha lakṣaṇānvitatvamananvayasya na saṃbhavatītyabhīdhīyate tadapi na samādhānaṃ,
analyzed: upamā antareṇa saha lakṣaṇa anvita tvam ananvayasya na saṃbhavati iti abhīdhīyate tat api na samādhānam
yasmāt samāropita rūpasya dvi tvasya abhyupagamāt u
pamāna upameya bhāva saṃbandha nibandhanam eva sāmyam
bhavatām ananvaya laśraṇasya pravṛtti nimittam
asmākam kevalena api sādhyate tat iti āha
kalpita upamayā tulyam kavayaḥ nanu ayam viduḥ
kalpitā a ullikhitā vā
upamā yasyāḥ sā tathā uktā
tathā kalpita upamayā tulyam anyūna anatiriktam ananvayam alaṅkaraṇam kavayaḥ tad vidaḥ viduḥ jānanti

original: tathā ca kalpitopamāyāṃ varṇanāviṣayasya vastunaḥ saundaryadhārādhirūḍhasvasāmya samanvayaḥ samudbhavati /
analyzed: tathā ca kalpita upamāyām varṇanā viṣayasya vastunaḥ saundarya dhārā adhirūḍha sva sāmya samanvayaḥ samudbhavati

original: sātiśayatvasamarpaṇasāmarthyavirahāt sarveṣāṃ padārthānāṃ bhūtānāmasadbhataṃ kimapi kālpanikamupamānamullikhanto yathāruci rucirāśayāḥ kavayaḥ  #
analyzed: sātiśaya tva samarpaṇa sāmarthya virahāt sarveṣām padārthānām bhūtānām asat bhatam kim api kālpanikam upamānam ullikhantaḥ yathāruci rucira āśayāḥ kavayaḥ
paridṛśyante
a sat bhūtam
samullikhitam iti ca punar api paraspara sāmya nibandhanaḥ tayoḥ upamāna upameya bhāvaḥ paryavasyāti
na anyat kiñcid atiriktam manohāri tāyāḥ kāraṇam
tathā ca lakṣaṇam udāharaṇam ca

original: upameyopamāṃ nāma bruvate tāṃ yathoditām // VjivC_3.152 //
analyzed: upameyopamām nāma bruvate tām yathā uditām

original: ambhojamiva te vaktraṃ tvadāsyamiva paṅkajam // VjivC_3.153 //
analyzed: ambhojam iva te vaktram tvad āsyam iva paṅkajam
na api atra lakṣaṇam upamā alaṅkārāt alaṅkāra antarasya kāraṇam
pūrva uktayā nītyā tasya nirākṛta tvāt
upamāna upameya bhāvaḥ ca atra paryāyataḥ bhavet
te na upamāna upameya bhāve bheda
pratibhāsaḥ bheda pratibhāsaḥ māṇaḥ
na ca upamāna antara nirāsa lakṣaṇa tātparyāt alaṅkāra antara tvam
mukham induḥ ityādau upamāna itara svabhāva gandhasya api avidyamānatvāt
pratibhā pratibhāsi prauḍhi pratipāditam abhidhā prakāra vaicitrya mātram eva atra vijṛmbhate na punar alaṅkaraṇa antara tvam
vācya antareṣu api vaicitrya antara dar śanāt
yathā

original: tadvalgunā yugapadunmiṣitena tāvat sadyaḥ parasparatulāmādhirohatāṃ dve //
analyzed: tad valgunā yugapad unmiṣitena tāvat sadyas paraspara tulām ādhirohatām dve

original: praspandamānaparuṣetaratāramantaḥ cakṣustava pracalitabhramaraṃ ca padmam // VjivC_3.154 //
analyzed: praspandamāna paruṣa itara tāram antar cakṣuḥ tava pracalita bhramaram ca padmam
yathā
janasya sāketa nivāsinaḥ tau dvau api abhūtām abhinandya sattvau
guru pradeya adhika niḥ spṛhaḥ rthaḥ nṛpaḥ rthi kāmāt adhika pradaḥ ca

punar alaṅkāra bhāvaḥ
yathā vā
helā avabhagna hara kārmukaḥ eṣa saḥ pi helā
paritoṣita candra cūḍaḥ

original: tasyaiva so 'sya ca....sakhya vā syāt ślāghyaṃ dvayorubhayathāpi tavādya teṣām // VjivC_3.156 //
analyzed: tasya eva vā syāt ślāghyam dvayoḥ ubhayathā api tava adya teṣām
atra pūrvoktam eva anusandheyam
yadi api upamā lakṣaṇa avasare bhāva mātram iti ubhaya niṣṭham alaṅkaraṇam ākhyātam
tathā api tatra aprastuta tvāt upamānasya para aṅga tvam upapannam
iha punar prastutasya mukhya tvam
katham tat iti vicāritam eva
parivṛttiḥ api anena nyāyena pṛthak na asti iti nirūpyate
tathā ca lakṣaṇam parivṛtteḥ

original: “arthānāṃ yo vinamayaḥ parivṛttistu sā matā ” // VjivC_3.157 //
analyzed: arthānām yaḥ vinamayaḥ parivṛttiḥ tu sā matā
iti
parivartanam ca sau antara avakāśe vastu antarasya avasthānam
asau parivṛttiḥ alaṅkāraḥ bhidhīyate

original: sā ca bahuprakārā---ekasyaiva viṣayiṇā samucitaviṣayāvakāśe viṣayāntaraṃ parivartate /
analyzed: sā ca bahu prakārā ekasya eva viṣayiṇā samucita viṣaya avakāśe viṣaya antaram parivartate
yathā

original: svalpaṃ jalpa bṛhaspate suraguro naiṣā sabhā vijriṇaḥ // VjivC_3.158 //
analyzed: su alpam jalpa bṛhaspate sura guro nā eṣā sabhā vijriṇaḥ
kvacid ekasya eva krameṇa samuccita dharma gocare dharma antaram parivartate
yathā
visṛṣṭa rāgāt adharāt nivartitaḥ stana aṅga rāga aruṇitāt ca kandukāt
kuśa aṅkura ādāna pikṣata aṅguliḥ kṛta u kṣa sūtra praṇayī tayā karaḥ

original: atra gauryāḥ karakalalakṣaṇo dharmaḥ parivartitaḥ kvacidekasyaiva dharmiṇaḥ sucitasvasaṃvādidharmāvakāśe dharmāntaraṃ parivartate /
analyzed: atra gauryāḥ kara kala lakṣaṇaḥ dharmaḥ parivartitaḥ kvacid ekasya eva dharmiṇaḥ su cita sva saṃvādi dharma avakāśe dharma antaram parivartate
yathā
kim iti apāsya ābharaṇāni yauvane
tvayā dhṛtam vārdhaka śobhi valkalam

original: kvacidvahūnāmapi dharmiṇāṃ parispardhinā pūrvoktāḥ sarve 'pi parivartante /
analyzed: kvacid vahūnām api dharmiṇām parispardhinā pūrvoktāḥ sarve parivartante
tathā ca lakṣaṇa kāreṇa atra eva udāharaṇam darśitam
yathā
śastra prahāram dadatā bhujena tava bhūbhujā

original: cirārjitaṃ hṛtaṃ teṣāṃ yaśaḥ kumudapāṇḍuram // VjivC_3.161 //
analyzed: cira arjitam hṛtam teṣām yaśaḥ kumuda pāṇḍuram
tat evam parivṛtteḥ alaṅkaraṇa tvam na
yuktam iti āha
vinivartanam ekasya yat tat anyasya vartanam

original: tadalaṅkaraṇaṃ na syāt pūrvavat parivartanāt // Vjiv_3.43 //
analyzed: tat alaṅkaraṇam na syāt pūrvavat parivartanāt
vinivartanam ityādi yat ekasya padārthasya vinivartanam apākaraṇam tad anyasya tad vyatiriktasya parasya
vartanam tat upanibandhanam tat alaṅkaraṇam na bhavati
kasmāt ubhayoḥ parivartamāna tvāt mukhyena abhidhīyamāna tvāt
katham pūrvavat yathāpūrvam pratyekam prādhānyāt niyama aniściteḥ ca yathā
na kiñcid kasyacid alaṅkaraṇam
tadvat iha api vicāritam
na ca tāvat mātra rūpa tayā tayoḥ vibhūṣya
bhāvaḥ tathā sati
prādhānya nivartana prasaṅgāt

original: rūpāntarānirodheṣu punaḥ sāmyasadbhāve bhavatyupamitireṣā cālaṅkṛtiḥ samuccitopamāvat pūrvavadeva /
analyzed: rūpa antara anirodheṣu punar sāmya sadbhāve bhavati upamitiḥ eṣā ca alaṅkṛtiḥ samuccita upamā vat pūrvavat eva
yathā
sa dayam bubhaje mahā bhujaḥ sahasā udvegam iyam vrajet iti

original: aciropanatāṃ sa medinīṃ navapāṇigrahaṇāṃ vadhūmiva // VjivC_3.162 //
analyzed: acira upanatām sa medinīm nava pāṇigrahaṇām vadhūm iva
atra sama tayā dhriyamāṇaḥ
sa anurāgaḥ pṛthivī vadhū bhoga
yatnaḥ pārthivasya pratīyate
dvayoḥ api varṇyamāna tvāt
tathā parivṛttau api sāmya pratiteḥ upamā eva
yathā
ayam raṇaḥ cāraṇa jīvitānta kṛt nananda tuḥ ca eva
narasya sainikāḥ

original: iha vrato śaktiśirobhirādarāt navāsidhārā na khalūtpalastrajaḥ // VjivC_3.163 //
analyzed: iha śakti śirobhiḥ ādarāt nava asi dhārāḥ na khalu utpala stra jaḥ
sāmya pratibhāsa mātram atra
manohāri tāyāḥ kāraṇam iti alaṅkaraṇam
yasmāt evaṃvidhe viṣaye vicchitti vidhānasya saṃniyata sāmyam
pratīyamānam alaṅkaraṇam upanibadhnanti
na punar abhidhīyamānam eva
pratīyamāna tvam parivṛtteḥ api dṛśyate
yathā

original: nirdiṣṭāṃ kulapatinā sa parṇaśālā- madhyāsya prayataparigrahadvitīyaḥ /
analyzed: nirdiṣṭām kula patinā sa parṇa śālāḥ madhyāsya prayata parigraha dvitīyaḥ

original: tacchiṣyādhyayananiveditāvasānāṃ saṃviṣṭaḥ kuśaśayane niśāṃ nināya // VjivC_3.164 //
analyzed: tad śiṣya adhyayana nivedita avasānām saṃviṣṭaḥ kuśa śayane niśām nināya
atra sarvāṇi api padāni yathāsvam ākṣipta parivartanīya padārtha antarāṇi upanibaddhāni
tatas pratīyamāna tvāt tadvida āhlāda kāri tvam api na ca
saṃvādinī parivṛttiḥ katham anyathā satyam
yuktam etat
na parivṛtteḥ atyanta abhāvaḥ smābhiḥ abhidhīyate
varṇanīya tvāt alaṅkṛtiḥ na bhavati iti asmākam abhiprāyaḥ
na ca pratīyamāna tā mātram alaṅkaraṇa sādhanam
alaṅkārya vastu mātre pi tasyāḥ saṃbhavāt
tathā ca etat eva udāharaṇam

original: na ca yatpratīyamānaṃ tadalaṅkaraṇaṃ tadvidāhlādakāritvāt iti yujyate vaktum /
analyzed: na ca yat pratīyamānam tat alaṅkaraṇam tadvida āhlāda kāri tvāt iti yujyate vaktum
alaṅkārye pi tad vid āhlāda kāri tvasya darśanāt
vastu mātram alaṅkāraḥ rasa ādayaḥ ca iti bheda tritaya anupapatteḥ ca

original: kiṃ ca parivṛtteralaṅkāratve tadupaśobhāyai bhūṣaṇāntaraṃ nopayujyate,
analyzed: kim ca parivṛtteḥ alaṅkāra tve tad upaśobhāyai bhūṣaṇa antaram nā upayujyate
kim iti apāsya ābharaṇāni ityādau

original: yadi vā “vada pradoṣe sphuṭacandratārakā vibhāvarī yadyaruṇāya kalpate” iti /
analyzed: yadi vā vada pradoṣe sphuṭa candra tārakā vibhāvarī yadi aruṇāya kalpate iti

na punar anyasmin

original: neyaṃ pūrvoktayā nītyā pratyekameva parasparaṃ dvayorapi bhūṣaṇabhāve pratyārakhāte parivṛttervibhūṣā saṃbhavati,

original: yathā--- pavāṇa cala vijju ca duliṃ rāiāsu khanaanti me aāso uvāṇa urulisavdayami hiḷiāsuka jillai virahae /

atra garjita śabdam śrutvā mahilāsu kāsucid cala vidyut bhāvikāḥ

tam induḥ ardha udita bimba śobhā pi

original: tataśca gatārthatvābhidhāyinaḥ śabdasyāprayogaḥ sākṣādvilocanarathavṛttirna bhavatītyupacārapāraṃparyeṇa tadviśeṣaṇatāṃ prāpyate /

original: tathā ca dharmadharmibhāvalakṣaṇāyāḥ pratyāsatteḥ prathamaṃ svābhidheyalakṣaṇalakṣaṇāyā
analyzed: tathā ca dharma dharmi bhāva lakṣaṇāyāḥ pratyāsatteḥ prathamam sva abhidheya lakṣaṇa lakṣaṇāyāḥ

original: guṇamātreṇaiva tataśca sādṛśyanibandhanāyāḥ pratyāsattereva tatsadṛśe vilocanacchāyātiśayavṛttimāsādayati /
analyzed: guṇa mātreṇa eva tatas ca sādṛśya nibandhanāyāḥ pratyāsatteḥ eva tad sadṛśe vilocana chāyā atiśaya vṛttim āsādayati

original: tadviśeṣaṇatvādeva samāse 'smin nīlotpalaśabdasya pūrvanipātaḥ saptamīviśeṣaṇe bahuvrīhāviti /

original: indumukhītyatra induriva mukhaṃ yasyāḥ sā tathoktā /
analyzed: indu mukhī iti atra induḥ iva mukham yasyāḥ sā tathā uktā
sakala loka vilokyamāna akhila mṛgāṅka maṇḍala saṃsthāna sādṛśye nimitta bhāve pūrva uktayā eva nītyā
indu śabdasya eva viśeṣaṇa tvam iti pūrvavat eva samāsa upapattiḥ

original: yadi vā indumukhamiva mukhaṃ yasyāḥ sā tathoktetyatra induśabdastadekadeśe mukhe viśeṣaṇam (bhavati)
analyzed: yadi vā indu mukham iva mukham yasyāḥ sā tathā uktā iti atra indu śabdaḥ tad eka deśe mukhe viśeṣaṇam bhavati
yathā grāmaḥ dagdhaḥ iti
śiṣṭam pūrva uktam eva anusandheyam
puruṣa vyāghraḥ iti atra pratīyate

pada abhisaṃbandha sāmarthyāt tasya avagatau gata artha tvāt sāmānya śabdasya a prayogaḥ
tat idam uktam upamitam vyāghra ādibhiḥ sāmānya a prayoge iti

original: induriva kāntaṃ mukhaṃ yasyāḥ sā indukāntamukhītyatra sāmānyaśabdasya śrūyamāṇatayā yuktirabhidhīyate /
analyzed: induḥ iva kāntam mukham yasyāḥ sā indukānta mukhī iti atra sāmānya śabdasya śrūyamāṇatayā yuktiḥ abhidhīyate

original: “induriva kāntamindukāntam” iti “upamānāni sāmānyavacanaiḥ” ityanena samāse vihite paścādindukāntaṃ mukhaṃ yasyāḥ sā tathokteti /
analyzed: induḥ iva kāntam indukāntam iti upamānāni sāmānya vacanaiḥ iti anena samāse vihite paścāt indukāntam mukham yasyāḥ sā tathā uktā iti

original: sāmānyaśabdasya vṛttivākyayordvayorapi upapadyamānatvānna kenacinnyāyena śrūyamāṇatā vicārayituṃ pāryate,
analyzed: sāmānya śabdasya vṛtti vākyayoḥ dvayoḥ api upapadyamāna tvāt na kenacid nyāyena śrūyamāṇa tā vicārayitum pāryate
yatas tena eva saha pada antaram samasyate

original: na punaranyeneti kutastasya śrūyamāṇavṛtteḥ pratīyamānatā kalpeta ? /
analyzed: na punar anyena iti kutas tasya śrūyamāṇa vṛtteḥ pratīyamāna tā kalpeta
tat evam vivakṣā vaśāt kvacid gamyamāna tā
kvacid prayujyamāna tvam
evamādīnām sādṛśya nibandhana ubhaya viṣaya sāmānya
saṃbandha abhidhāyinām gamyamāna tvāt prayujyamāna tvam
artha pratyāyana artham hi śabdasya prayogaḥ kriyate

original: sa cet kavikauśalakalpitāt prākārāntarāt pratipannaḥ tataḥ kiṃ śabdaprayogeṇa ? /
analyzed: sa ced kavi kauśala kalpitāt prākāra antarāt pratipannaḥ tatas kim śabda prayogeṇa
tathā ca yatra anyūna atirikta chāyā viśeṣam arthataḥ śabdataḥ ca upamāna upameyayoḥ sāmya samarpaṇa
sāmarthya subhaga prasāda sundaram upanibandha bandhuram vākyam śruti samanantaram eva
varṇa ānupūrvyāḥ pratibhāsa vat artha pratipatti pūrvakam alaṅkāra pratīti m utpādayati
tatra tad upapādakānām iva ādīnām gatārtha tvāt aprayuktiḥ
yathā
mahībhṛtaḥ putravataḥ pi
yatra api alaṅkāra antara bheda nibandhanam antareṇa padārtha parivartana ādau kavi kauśala ullāsita atirikta sāmya samanvaya māhātmyāt upamāna upameya bhāva avagatiḥ udbhidyate
tatra api abhidhāna prakāra vaicitrya vaśāt alaṅkaraṇa vicchittiḥ eva tad vidām tad pratīti kāriṇām camatkṛti kāri tām āvahati iti pratīyamāna tvam alaṅkārasya
tad abhidhāyinām iva ādīnām aprayogaḥ yathā
mahā sida dhārāḥ na khalu utpala stra jaḥ iti
yatra punar vācyam alam karaṇam

tathā ca padārtha viṣayāyām upamāyām vākya eka deśa vartinoḥ upamāna upameyayoḥ paraspara sāmya vācke prayukte

original: tasminneva vākye stanāntaravartinorupamānopameyayoḥ sādṛśyasaṃbandhābhidhāyī punarivādiḥ prayujyate /
analyzed: tasmin eva vākye stana antara vartinoḥ upamāna upameyayoḥ sādṛśya saṃbandha abhidhāyī punar iva ādiḥ prayujyate
yadi api pratiyugalam upamāna upameya bhāvasya parisamāptiḥ
tathā api vākya artha niṣpattau upamāna upameya bhāvasya saṃbhave prathama abhihitā eva yuktiḥ anusartavyā
yathā
tatas pratasthe kauberīm bhāsvān iva raghuḥ diśam
śaraiḥ ustraiḥ iva udīcyān uddhariṣyan rasān iva
kvacid padārtha upamāyām eva vākya eka deśa vyavasthitayoḥ upamāna upameyayoḥ sādṛśya samanvayaḥ vācikaḥ

original: vācakayukte tasminneva vākye tayorekatarasya dharmyantareṇa saha dharmāntaraṃ (ra)

original: varṇyamānavṛtterupameyatve tāvanmātraviśeṣaṇaiḥ svairviśiṣṭaṃ padārthāntaramupamānatāṃ yadā prāpnoti,

tat evaṃvidha

original: upamādoṣaṇāṃ tu lakṣaṇasyeva sughaṭitatvāt dūrotsāritatvena neyārthādivadaparigaṇanam /

iti antara ślokaḥ
evam prasuta aprastuta vācya sādṛśya jīvitam upamā ākhyam alaṅkaraṇam abhidhāya samāna chāyā prāyam vācaka sādṛśya sarvasvam śleṣam abhidhatte
tat eka śabda vācya tvam arthayoḥ dhāryate dvayoḥ

tena vācya tvam abhidheya tvam

original: “arthayoḥ” = vastunorabhidhīyamānayoḥ dvayoḥ satyabhūtayoḥ vākyārthatātparyasvarūpayoḥ “dhāryate” yasmin sa śleṣābhidhāno 'laṅkāraḥ /

original: “tādṛgvācakavācyatā” = sa iva dṛśyate yaḥ sa tādṛgucyate,
analyzed: tādṛś vācaka vācya tā saḥ iva dṛśyate yaḥ sa tādṛś ucyate

tena vācya tā vācya tvam abhidheya tvam

original: tādṛśārthavācakatvaṃ yatra yasmin so 'pi śleṣa ucyate /
analyzed: tādṛśa artha vācaka tvam yatra yasmin saḥ u pi śleṣaḥ ucyate
yaḥ śruti sāmyāt saḥ iva anubhūyate sau tādṛś ucyate
punar saḥ eva svara ādi dharmāṇām udātta ādīnām anya tvāt bhidyate
atra paraspara apekṣa tvam eva dvayoḥ api sādṛśyam

original: yādṛgeko 'sya vācakaḥ tādṛk evāsāviti samāśrito vāstavapadavṛrtirvā yatraikasmin kvacidvākyaikadeśe,
analyzed: yādṛś ekaḥ sya vācakaḥ tādṛś eva asau iti samāśritaḥ vāstava pada vṛrtiḥ vā yatra ekasmin kvacid vākya eka deśe
tad eka śabda vācya tvam dvayoḥ

original: atha tayoḥ tādṛgvācakavācyatvāviśeṣe 'pi śleṣa eveti katham /
analyzed: atha tayoḥ tādṛś vācaka vācya tva aviśeṣe pi śleṣaḥ eva iti katham
atas tribhiḥ prakāraiḥ trividhaiḥ padārthaiḥ eva tad pratīteḥ
