original: “padārthāntaraṃ” = śliṣṭapadavyatiriktaṃ “aparaṃ” tatsamarpaṇasāmarthyasametametasya śleṣālaṅkārasya pratipādakaṃ samarpakaṃ kavayastadvidaḥ“pratijānate”  #

pratyavabuddhyanti

original: vācakaviśeṣa “maparaṃ ivādi” ivaprabhṛti vā padārthāntarādivyatiriktaṃ vācyasāmarthyamevavā kevalaṃ vākyaṃ sakṛtpratipāditam /
analyzed: vācaka viśeṣa iva ādi iva prabhṛti vā padārtha antara ādi vyatiriktam vācya sāmarthyam eva vā kevalam vākyam sakṛt pratipāditam

original: triṣvapyeteṣu prakāreṣu dvayorarthayoḥ prādhānyena ca varṇyamānatve tathāvidhaśabdavācyatvalakṣaṇasāmyasamanvayasvarūpaṃ

original: prastutāprastutayorarthayoḥ pradhānaguṇabhāve sati tathaiva tathāvidhaśabdavācyatvasāmyasamanvaya eva /

original: ārūḍhaṃ rasavāsanāpariṇateḥ kāṣṭhāṃ kavīnāṃ paraṃ kāntānāṃ ca vilokitaṃ vijayate vaidagdhyavakraṃ vacaḥ // VjivC_3.177 //

original: yasyāhuḥ śaśimacchirohara iti stutyaṃ ca nāmāmarāḥ pāyātsa svayamandhakakṣayakarastvāṃ sarvado-mādhavaḥ // VjivC_3.178 //

asatya bhūta artha śleṣa udāharaṇam yathā

original: dṛṣṭyā keśava goparāgahṛtayā kiñcinna dṛṣṭaṃ mayā tenaiva skhalitāsmi nātha patitāṃ kiṃ nāma nālambase /
analyzed: dṛṣṭyā keśava gopa rāga hṛtayā kiñcid na dṛṣṭam mayā tena eva skhalitā asmi nātha patitām kim nāma na ālambase

original: ekastvaṃ viṣameṣu khinnamanasāṃ sarvābalānāṃ gatiḥ gopyevaṃ gaditaḥ sa leśamavatādgoṣṭhe hasantyā hariḥ // VjivC_3.180 //
analyzed: ekaḥ tvam viṣameṣu khinna manasām sarva abalānām gatiḥ gopī evam gaditaḥ sa leśam avatāt goṣṭhe hasantyā hariḥ

sāmya eka nibandhana tvāt upamā rūpaka śleṣa kāraṇa ekam vyatirekam abhidhatte sati tad śabda vācya tve dharma sāmye nyathā sthiteḥ

original: sa cāsau śabdaśceti vigṛhya tacchabdena śaktyā śleṣanimittabhūtaḥ śabdaḥ parāmṛśyate,

original: setuṃ badhnāti bhūyaḥ kimiti ca sakaladvīpanāthānuyātaḥ tvayyāyāte vikalpāniti dadhata ivābhāti kampaḥ payodheḥ // VjivC_3.183 //

original: atra varṇyamānasya nārāyaṇatvasamāropaṃ vinā tadārambhasaṃbhāvanā na saṃbhavatīti tasya tattvādhyāropaṇāt pratīyamānatayā rūpakameva pūrvasūribhiḥ

original: kīdṛśaḥ---“vākyārthāntaravinyāsaḥ“---parasparānvitapadasamudāyābhidheyaṃ vastu vākyārthaḥ tasmādanyasmāt = aprakṛtatvāt prastutavyatireki vākyārthāntaraṃ,
analyzed: kīdṛśaḥ vākya artha antara vinyāsaḥ paraspara anvita pada samudāya abhidheyam vastu vākya arthaḥ tasmāt anyasmāt aprakṛta tvāt prastuta vyatireki vākya artha antaram

original: paryāyeṇa manobhuvā virahiṇāṃ veddhuṃ mano nirdayaṃ puṣpeṣūnniśitāgratāṃ vijayinī netuṃ niyakto mama // VjivC_3.209 //

original: tava kusumaśaratvaṃ śītaraśmitvamindoḥ dvayamidamayathārthaṃ dṛśyate madvidheṣu /

original: pūrṇendoḥ paripoṣakāntavapuṣaḥ sphāraprabhābhāsuraṃ nedaṃ maṇḍalamabhuyudeti gaganābhoge jigīṣorjagat /

original: evamalaṅkārāṇāṃ tantratayā pratyekamalaṅkāryaṃ prati vicchittividhāyitvamabhidhāyedānīṃ samuditānāṃ tadevābhidhatte---

original: kathaṃ rājantītyāha---“yatā padārthā vākyārthe” = tātparyalakṣaṇe vastuni “yathā”

sva ātmanā sphurantaḥ pi paraspara anvaya lakṣaṇa saṃbandha nibandhana svabhāvāḥ pradhāne
hi pāratantryam anubhavantaḥ tat eva samudāya ātmakam eka vākya artha tātparyam pratipādayanti

original: yathā tena prakāreṇa yadetayoravisaṃvādisamavāye saṃbandhitayā saṃsṛṣṭāvanyonyānvitavṛttayaḥ
analyzed: yathā tena prakāreṇa yat etayoḥ avisaṃvādi samavāye saṃbandhi tayā saṃsṛṣṭau anyonya anvita vṛttayaḥ
paraspara saṃbandha avagata sāmarthyāt pṛthak bhūta vākya artha avayava eka deśa vartinaḥ pi alaṅkārāḥ
kām api sahṛdaya saṃvedya paraspara saṃsarga ātma tām evam
sakala vākya artha viṣayām vicchittim upapādayantaḥ paratantrāḥ parisphuranti iti abhiprāyaḥ
yathā

original: āśliṣṭo navakuṅkumāruṇaravivyālokitairvistṛto lambāntāmbarayā sametya bhuvane dhyānāntare sandhyayā /
analyzed: āśliṣṭaḥ nava kuṅkuma aruṇa ravi vyālokitaiḥ vistṛtaḥ lamba anta ambarayā sametya bhuvane dhyāna antare sandhyayā
candra aṃśu utkara koraka ākula patat dhvānta dvirephaḥ dhunā devī eva arpita dohadaḥ kuravake bhāti pradoṣa gamaḥ

original: atra rūpakādinā svātmanā pṛthakkṛtakṛtyena parasparasaṃsargasaṃpadupārjitā vākyārthavakratāvicchittiḥ kācideva parisphurati /
analyzed: atra rūpaka ādinā sva ātmanā pṛthak kṛta kṛtyena paraspara saṃsarga saṃpad upārjitā vākya artha vakra tā vicchittiḥ kācid eva parisphurati
yathā vā

original: mlāniṃ vāntaviṣānalena nayanavyāpāralabdhātmanā nītā rājabhujaṅga pallavamṛdū rambhā tatheyaṃ tvayā /
analyzed: mlānim vānta viṣa analena nayana vyāpāra labdha ātmanā nītā rāja bhujaṅga pallava mṛduḥ rambhā tathā iyam tvayā

original: adyāpīśvaraśekharendukiraṇasmerasthalīlāñchite kailāsopavane yathā sugahane naiti prarohaṃ punaḥ // VjivC_3.213 //
analyzed: adyā api īśvara śekhara indu kiraṇa smera sthalī lāñchite kailāsa upavane yathā sugahane nā eti praroham punar

original: atra pūrvavadeva rūpakādīnāṃ parasparasaṃsargasaṃpadupārjitā vakratāvicchittiḥ vibhāvyate /
analyzed: atra pūrvavat eva rūpaka ādīnām paraspara saṃsarga saṃpad upārjitā vakra tā vicchittiḥ vibhāvyate
evam saṃsṛṣṭim abhidhāya tathāvidha chāyā vicchitti vidhāyinam saṃkara alaṅkāram abhidhatte
alaṅkāra kalāpaḥ yam anyaiḥ saṃkīrṇa tām gataḥ
sphuran anekadhā vākye saṃkaraḥ saḥ abhidhīyate
alaṅkāra ityādi
pūrva ukta lakṣaṇam ākrānta vṛttiḥ alakāra kalāpaḥ yam rasavat ādi alaṅkāra nikurambaḥ saṃkara ākhyaḥ bhidhīyate saṃkara nāmā nigadyate
kīdṛśaḥ saṃkīrṇa tām gataḥ saṃmiśra tām prāptaḥ
sabala tvena pratibhāsa tvam adhirūḍhaḥ
kim kurvan sphuran ātmanaḥ sphuritam samupadarśayan pratibhāsamāna tām upasaran
vākye saṃkīrṇa tām upapadyate

original: tatsaṃveśanaviśeṣasyānupapatteḥ bhaṇitāntarvarto yaḥ kaścidalaṅkāro yathopapatti vibhūṣaṇāntareṇa saṃkīrṇaḥ saṃkara saṃjñāviṣayatāṃ pratipadyate
analyzed: tad saṃveśana viśeṣasya anupapatteḥ bhaṇita antarvartaḥ yaḥ kaścid alaṅkāraḥ yathopapatti vibhūṣaṇa antareṇa saṃkīrṇaḥ saṃkara saṃjñā viṣaya tām pratipadyate
tena sakalasya api alaṅkāra kalāpasya saṃkaraḥ iti abhidhānam saṃpadyate
yathā

original: rohanmūlātigaurairuragapatiphaṇaistatra pātālakukṣau prodyadvālaṅkuraśrīḥ diśi diśi daśanairebhirāśāgajānām /
analyzed: rohat mūla ati gauraiḥ uraga pati phaṇaiḥ tatra pātāla kukṣau prodyat vāla aṅkura śrīḥ diśi diśi daśanaiḥ ebhiḥ āśā gajānām

original: asminnākāśadeśe vikasitakusumā rāśibhistārakāṇaāṃ nātha tvatkīrtivallī phalati phalamidaṃ bimbamindoḥ sudhārdram // VjivC_3.214 //
analyzed: asmin ākāśa deśe vikasita kusumā nātha tvad kīrti vallī phalati phalam idam bimbam indoḥ sudhā ārdram

original: atra kīrtivallīti rūpakālaṅkāraḥ siddhabaddhatatsāmyāśaṅkāṃ vinā na yuktayuktatāṃ pratipadyate /
analyzed: atra kīrtivallī iti rūpaka alaṅkāraḥ siddha baddha tad sāmya āśaṅkām vinā na yukta yuktatām pratipadyate
tena tad āśaṅkā nibandhana tathāvidha parispanda kīrti sandarśita samudbhuta ta saṃbhāvanā anumāna māhātmyāt pratīyamāna vṛttiḥ utprekṣā atra kaveḥ abhipretā
yasmāt etayoḥ dvayoḥ api paraspara saṃbhāvanām vinā sva rūpa labdhiḥ eva na parya
vasyati iti saṃkīrṇayoḥ atha saṃvādāt evaṃvidha viṣaye saṃkara uktiḥ pravartate

original: vākyaikadeśe yathā “nirmokamuktiriva gaganoragasya” iti niṣkampatayā vyavahartumaśakyatvāt,
analyzed: vākya eka deśe yathā nirmoka muktiḥ iva gagana uragasya iti niṣkampa tayā vyavahartum aśakya tvāt
nirmoka muktiḥ iva iti utprekṣayā rūpaka alaṅkārasya svarūpa lābha avakāśaḥ samarpyate
tathā eva utprekṣāyāḥ
yasmāt atra api saṃkara alaṅkāra vyavahāraḥ

original: nanu cānenanyāyena “asyāḥ sargavidhau” iti “kiṃ tāruṇyataroḥ” ityādeḥ saṃkarālaṅkāroktiḥ pravartatām ?
analyzed: nanu ca anena nyāyena asyāḥ sarga vidhau iti kim tāruṇya taroḥ ityādeḥ saṃkara alaṅkāra uktiḥ pravartatām
na pravartate
yasmāt atra ar tha sāmarthya avagataḥ
tprekṣāyāḥ sa sandeham vinā anupapatteḥ

original: parasmiṃśca tathaiva rūpakasyeti dvayorapyetayoḥ tattvaṃ tulyam /
analyzed: parasmin ca tathā eva rūpakasya iti dvayoḥ api etayoḥ tattvam tulyam
sa sandehasya punar tad vibhūṣaṇa tvena antar vidhāne maṇi maya pada kabandha bandhura hāra ādi ramaṇīya tvam iti uktam eva
saṃsṛṣṭeḥ nānāvidha chāya maṇi mālā manohara tā
saṃṅkara alaṅkārasya vividha kānti ratna vinyāsa victra bahula atula kānti kalpa tvam iti sarvam eva vibhaktam

original: evaṃ yathopapattyalaṅkārān lakṣayitvā keṣāñcidalakṣitatvāt lakṣaṇāvyāptidoṣaṃ parihartumupakramate /
analyzed: evam yathā upapatti alaṅkārān lakṣayitvā keṣāñcid alakṣita tvāt lakṣaṇa avyāpti doṣam parihartum upakramate
bhūṣaṇa antara bhāvena śobhā śūnya tayā tathā
alaṅkārāḥ tu ye kecid na alaṅkāra tayā manāk
bhūṣaṇa ityādi
ye pūrva ukta vyatiriktāḥ kecid alaṅkārāḥ te na alaṅkāratayā manāk na vibhūṣaṇa tvena abhyupagatāḥ
kena hetunā bhūṣaṇa antara bhāvena anyat bhūṣaṇam bhūṣaṇa antaram
tebhyaḥ vyatiriktam
tad bhāvena tad svabhāva tvena tad ananyatvena pūrvoktānām eva anyatama tvena iti arthaḥ

original: “śobhāśūnyatayā tathā” = śobhā kānatiḥ tayā śūnyaṃ rahitaṃ śobhāśūnya tasya bhāvaḥ śobhāśūnyatā tayā hetubhūtayā /
analyzed: śobhā śūnyatayā tathā śobhā kānatiḥ tayā śūnyam rahitam śobhā śūnya tasya bhāvaḥ śobhā śūnyatā tayā hetu bhūtayā
na kevalam tābhyām eva
yāvat alaṅkārya tayā vibhūṣya tvena api teṣām alaṅkaraṇa tvam anupapannam
evam ca
yathāsaṃkhyam alaṅkāraḥ pūrvaiḥ āmnāt eva yaḥ
kāraṇa dvitayena api nā alaṅkāraḥ sa saṃmataḥ
yathāsaṃkhyam alaṅkāraḥ pūrvaiḥ āmnātaḥ tulya kramam
kaiścid sva śabdena abhihitaḥ sva nāmnā sa nā alaṅkāraḥ
kāraṇa dvitayena api bhūṣaṇa antara bhāvena śobhā śūnya tayā ca
tathā ca tasya udāharaṇam
vaktra kānti īkṣaṇa gati svara keśaiḥ tvayā jitā
atra ātma kṛta lakṣye bhaṇiti vaicitrya virahāt na kācid kāntiḥ vidyate

original: satyāmapyetasyāṃ sāmyaṃ vyatireko vā jīvitamāmnātaṃ na punaḥ samānasaṃkhyātvam /
analyzed: satyām api etasyām sāmyam vyatirekaḥ vā jīvitam āmnātam na punar samāna saṃkhyā tvam

original: (kevala) samānasaṃkhyātve “yathāsaṃkhyamanudeśaḥ samānām” iti sūtrodāharaṇanyāyāt saṃkhyātānudeśāt na kiñcidatiricyate /
analyzed: kevala samāna saṃkhyā tve yathāsaṃkhyam anudeśaḥ samānām iti sūtra udāharaṇa nyāyāt saṃkhyāta anudeśāt na kiñcid atiricyate
keṣāñcid āśīḥ prabhṛtīnām alaṅkāra tayā matānām bhūṣaṇa tva anupapatteḥ
lakṣaṇa udāharaṇāni na iha paṭhyante

original: teṣu cāśaṃsanīyasyaivārthasya mukhyatayā varṇanīyatvādalaṅkāryatvamiti preyolaṅkāroktāni dūṣaṇānyāpatanti /
analyzed: teṣu ca āśaṃsanīyasya eva arthasya mukhya tayā varṇanīya tvāt alaṅkārya tvam iti preyaḥ ulaṅkāra uktāni dūṣaṇāni āpatanti
na preyasaḥ viruddhaḥ syāt alaṅkāra antare sati
saṃsṛṣṭi saṃkarau syātām anyatra adarśanāt api
antaraślokaḥ
viśeṣa ukteḥ api ukta alaṅkāra antarbhāvena alaṅkārya tayā ca bhūṣaṇa tva anupapattiḥ
tathā ca udāharaṇam etasyāḥ
saḥ ekaḥ trīṇi jayati jaganti kusumāyudhaḥ

original: haratāpi tanuṃ yasya śambhunā na hṛtaṃ balam // VjivC_3.217 //
analyzed: haratā api tanum yasya śambhunā na hṛtam balam
atra sakala loka prasiddha jayi tva vyatireki kandarpa svabhāva mātram lokottara tvena vākya arthaḥ
evam sūkṣma leśa hetavaḥ na alaṅkārāḥ
tathā ca bhāmahaḥ
hetuḥ ca sūkṣmaḥ na alaṅkāratayā mataḥ
samudāya abhidheyasya vakrokti anabhidhānataḥ
tathā ca sūkṣmasya udāharaṇam
saṃketa kāla manasam viṭam jñātvā vidagdhayā
hasat netra arpita ākūtam līlā padmam nimīlitam
atra varṇanīya ātmā sūkṣmaḥ na punar alaṅkāraṇam
kasmāt sākṣāt abhidhayā vaktavya arthaḥ tathāvidhayā yuktyā pratipādyate
leśasya udāharaṇam yathā
rāja kanyā anuraktam mām roma udbhedena rakṣakāḥ
avagaccheyuḥ ā jñāta maho śīta anilam vanam
atra api etat eva vaktavyam vastu katham vibhūṣaṇa tām arhati
yad paraḥ śabdaḥ sa śabda arthaḥ iti nyāyāt
hetoḥ udāharaṇam
ayam āndolita prauḍha candana druma pallavaḥ
utpādayati sarvasya prītim malaya mārutaḥ
evam upamā rūpakam api na alaṅkaraṇam
samagra gagana āyāmamāna daṇḍaḥ rathāṅginaḥ
pādaḥ jayati siddha strī mukha indu nava darpaṇaḥ
atra rasavat alaṅkāra vat
vācya vācakayoḥ saṃgatiḥ eva na asti

original: tathā ca upamā ca rūpakaṃ ceti vigrahe dvandvo vā vivakṣitaḥ syāt,
analyzed: tathā ca upamā ca rūpakam ca iti vigrahe dvandvaḥ vā vivakṣitaḥ syāt
viśeṣaṇa samāsaḥ vā
tatra dvandva pakṣe kvacid vākya eka deśe rūpakam kvacid upamā iti
praṇibandhanam na kiñcid ekasmin

original: tatrāpi pratyekaṃ parispandatayā svasthāne samaṃ vibhātīti parasparāpekṣāṃ vinā samudāyātmakasya viśeṣyasyāsaṃbhavāt dvandvapakṣo 'nupapannaḥ
analyzed: tatra api pratyekam parispanda tayā sva sthāne samam vibhāti iti paraspara apekṣām vinā samudāya ātmakasya viśeṣyasya asaṃbhavāt dvandva pakṣaḥ nupapannaḥ
viśeṣaṇa samāse pi sarvasmin vākye

original: ekadeśe vā dvitayamapīti dvayorekasmin vastuni yugapat parasparaviruddhayośchāyātapayoriva samāveśānupapattiḥ /
analyzed: eka deśe vā dvitayam api iti dvayoḥ ekasmin vastuni yugapad paraspara viruddhayoḥ chāyā ātapayoḥ iva samāveśa anupapattiḥ

original: ekatarapakṣāvalambinyā vācā pratyekaṃ vācyavācakasvarūpaniścitāvaparasyāvakāśabhaṅgo 'pi na sambhavatīti parasparāpekṣāṃ vinā samudāyātmakaviśeṣaṇasamāso  #
analyzed: ekatara pakṣa avalambinyā vācā pratyekam vācya vācaka sva rūpa niścitau aparasya avakāśa bhaṅgaḥ pi na sambhavati iti paraspara apekṣām vinā
pya kicit karaḥ
kathañcid tatra ekatara niścaye pramāṇa abhāvāt anyatara kalpanena doṣa ayogāt saṃkara vyavahāraḥ
prastute punar evaṃvidha svarūpa niṣpattau api saṃsiddhi vivakṣayā yasya ātma siddhau api
sandeha dolā adhirūḍhiḥ tatra api asambhūtāt vastutaḥ vyavasthitā eva kadācid asti iti yat kiñcid eva
vākya sāmarthyāt avaseyaḥ
pratīyamāna prakārāt tṛtīyam ramaṇīyam alaṅkaraṇa kalāpam iti vākya vakra tā sarvasvam samākhyeyam
samudāya ātmaka vākya vakra tā svarūpam āsūtrayati
lāvaṇya ādi guṇa ujjvalā pratipada nyāsaiḥ vilāsa añcitā vicchittyā racitaiḥ vibhūṣaṇa bharaiḥ alpa enohāriṇī
atyartham rasavat tayā ārdra hṛdayā śaknoti udārā abhidhā vāc vakrā su kaveḥ tathā eva ca
manaḥ hartum yathā nāyikā
lāvaṇya ādi ityādi
āsām evaṃvidha vākya svarūpa āyatta avagamana udāharaṇam pravakṣyati
tad samudāya ātmakasya vākyasya
rasavattayā manaḥ cetaḥ

original: hartuṃ ca saknoti yatā nāyikā tathā /
analyzed: hartum ca saknoti yatā nāyikā tathā
kīdṛśī lāvaṇya ādi guṇa ujjvalā lāvaṇya ādibhiḥ
lāvaṇya prabhṛtibhiḥ guṇaiḥ prathama ullekha lakṣaṇaiḥ guṇaiḥ ujjvalā bhrājiṣṇuḥ pratipadanyāsaiḥ pratipadanyāsaḥ prati sup tiṅ anta upanibandhānāni

original: taiḥ “vilāsāñcitā” śobhātiśayenābhyañcitā “vicchittyā” vaidagdhyabhaṅgyā kayācit “racitaiḥ” upanibaddhaiḥ “alpaiḥ” parimitaiḥ (vibhūṣaṇabharaiḥ)
analyzed: taiḥ vilāsa añcitā śobhā atiśayena abhyañcitā vicchittyā vaidagdhya bhaṅgyā kayācid racitaiḥ upanibaddhaiḥ alpaiḥ parimitaiḥ vibhūṣaṇa bharaiḥ
alaṅkaraṇaiḥ upamā ādibhiḥ
manohāriṇī hṛyaparañjikā vāc śobhā atiśaya nidhāna tām pratipadyate
kīdṛśī vākudāra abhidhā audārya guṇa yuktā abhihitā

original: “atyarthaṃ rasavattayā” rāgādimattvena “ārdrahṛdayā” sarasābhiprāyā kāntāpi tathāvidhavilāsāñcitā bhavati /
analyzed: atyartham rasavat tayā rāga ādimat tvena ārdra hṛdayā sarasa abhiprāyā kāntā api tathāvidha vilāsa añcitā bhavati
nāyikā pakṣe lāvaṇya ādayaḥ saundarya prabhṛtayaḥ
vilāsaḥ ceṣṭā viśeṣaḥ vākpakṣe
vicchittiḥ vaidagdhyam
vāc vākyam
bhūṣaṇāni alaṅkārāḥ
ka vi abhidhā vacanam
prabandha sāmarthyam iti

original: iti śrīrājānakakuntakaviricite vakroktijīvite kāvyālaṅkāre tṛtīya unmeṣaḥ / ====================================================================
analyzed: iti śrī rājānaka kuntaka viricite vakroktijīvite kāvyālaṅkāre tṛtīyaḥ unmeṣaḥ
vakrokti jīvitam caturtha unmeṣaḥ evam sakala sāhitya sarva sva kalpa vākya vakra tā prakāśana anantaram avasara prāptām prakaraṇa vakra tām avatārayati
yatra niryantraṇa utsāha parispanda upaśobhinī
vṛttiḥ vyavahartṝṇām sva āśaya ullekha śālinī
api ā mūlāt an āśaṅkya samutthāne manorathe
kā api unmīlati niḥsīmā sā prabandha aṃśa vakra tā
yatra ityādi
prabandha aṃśa vakra tā prakaraṇa
vakra bhāvaḥ bhavati iti sambandhaḥ
yatra yasyām vyavahartṝṇām tad tad vyāpāra parigraha vyagrāṇām pravṛttiḥ kā api alaukikī unmīlati udbhidyate
kiṃviśiṣṭā niryantraṇa utsāha parispanda upaśobhinī nirargala vyavasāya sphurita sphāra vicchittiḥ
atas eva sva āśaya ullekha śālinī nirupamani ja
kasmin sati api ā mūlāt an āśaṅkya samutthāne manorathe kandāt prabhṛti asaṃbhāvya samudbhede samīhite
tat ayam amatra arthaḥ yatra manāk mātram api anunmīlita manorathe kathā madhye nirupadhi māna dhanānām adhyavasāya paddhatiḥ
nirantara vyavasāya ati sphārā cetana camatkāriṇī tad vihita vakra tā vicchittiḥ prikaraṇasya alaṅkaraṇāyate
prabandhasya ca
yathā abhijñānajānakī nāmni nāṭake tṛtīye ṅke setubandhe na a kalita vidyā balānām avidita vaidehī dayita divya astra
prabhāva saṃpadām vānara pravīrāṇām prathamam eva makarākaram ālokayatām bandha adhyavasāyaḥ
tathā hi tatra nīlasya senāpateḥ vacanam

original: śailāḥ santi sahastraśaḥ pratidiśaṃ valmīkakalpā ime dordaṇḍāśca kaṭhoravikramarasakrīḍhāsamutkaṇṭhitāḥ /
analyzed: śailāḥ santi sahastraśas pratidiśam valmīka kalpāḥ ime dordaṇḍāḥ ca kaṭhora vikrama rasa krīḍhā samutkaṇṭhitāḥ

original: karṇāsvāditakumbhasaṃbhavakathāḥ kiṃ nāma kallolinī- kānte goṣpadapūraṇe 'pi kapayaḥ kautūhalaṃ nāsti vaḥ // VjivC_4.1 //
analyzed: karṇa āsvādita kumbha saṃbhava kathāḥ kim nāma kallolinī kānte goṣpada pūraṇe kapayaḥ kautūhalam nā asti vaḥ
vānarāṇām uttara vākyam nepathye kalakala anantaram

original: āndolyante kati na girayaḥ kandukānandamudrāṃ vyātanvānāḥ kapiparisare kautukotkarṣatarṣāt /

atra dvayoḥ api bahūnām upakārya upakāraka tvam svayam utprekṣaṇīyam
eka prakaraṇa prāpta prakāra antara śobhitaḥ
prabandhaḥ bhāsate nūtna parispandaḥ iva uditaḥ
iti antara ślokaḥ
asyāḥ eva prakāra antaram prakāśayati
pratiprakaraṇam prauḍha pratibhā bhoga yojitaḥ

original: eka evābhidheyātmā badhyamānaḥ punaḥ punaḥ // Vjiv_4.7 //
analyzed: ekaḥ eva abhidheya ātmā badhyamānaḥ punar punar
badhnāti vakra tā udbheda bhaṅgīm utpādita adbhutām
badhnāti niyantrayati nibandhayati iti yāvat
kām vakra tā udbheda bhaṅgīm gambhīra vakra bhāva āvirbhāvitām śobhām
kiṃviśiṣṭām udbhāvita adbhutām kandalita kutūhalām
kaḥ ekaḥ eva abhidheya ātmā tat eva vastu svarūpam
kim kriyamāṇaḥ badhyamānaḥ prastuta aucitya cāru racanā mātra spandamānaḥ
katham punar punar vāram vāram
kva pratiprakāraṇam prakaraṇe prakaraṇe
sthāne sthāne iti yāvat
nanu evam punarukta tā pātra tām samāsādayati iti āha anyūna nūtana ullekha rasa alaṅkaraṇa ujjvalaḥ avikala abhinava ullāsa śṛṅgāra rūpaka ādi parispanda bhrājiṣṇuḥ
kīdṛśaḥ prauḍha pratibhā bhoga yojitaḥ pragalbhatara prajñā prakāra prakāśitaḥ
ayam asya parama arthaḥ tat evam sakala candra udayāḥ di
prakaraṇa prakāreṣu vastu prastuta kathā saṃvidhānaka anurodhāt muhur muhur upanibadhyamānam
yadi paripūrṇa pūrva virūpa rasa alaṅkāra rāmaṇīyaka nirbharam bhavati tadā kām api rāmaṇīyaka maryādām
vakra tām avatārayati
yathā harṣacarite abhinava bhaṅgī parigraha grathita saubhāgya upasaṃpad dharā
dhara vibhāvarī virām di
rāmaṇīyaka kartraḥ na eka sthāneṣu camatkurute
tatas eva ca tat āsvādanīyam
bahu tvāt atra varṇayitum aśakyam
rājā a sa karuṇam puras valokya
hā devi pādapaiḥ api apagatā asi
kuravaka taruḥ gāḍha āśleṣam
mukha āsava lālanām bakula viṭapī
rakta aśokaḥ tathā caraṇa āhatim

original: tava sukṛtinaḥ saṃbhāvyaite prasādamahotsavān anugatadaśāḥ sarve,
analyzed: tava su kṛtinaḥ saṃbhāvya ete prasāda mahā utsavān anugata daśāḥ sarve
sarvaḥ śaṭhaḥ na yathā vayam

original: yathā anyatra hi--- pradīptāntaḥ pureṇa kṛśānunā kavalitān vilāsaśākhinaḥ paśyannabhinavaśokāveśavivaśāntaḥ karaṇa;
analyzed: yathā anyatra hi pradīpta antar pureṇa kṛśānunā kavalitān vilāsa śākhinaḥ paśyan abhinava śoka āveśa vivaśa antaḥ karaṇa
sākṣāt devīm anusarantaḥ te iti samutpanna mati nirvikalpam avayava ekaika prasāda pātrebhyaḥ
avidvadbhyaḥ pi samanuṣṭhita samucita sāhasebhyaḥ samucita tādṛśa prasāda sādhanam abhyasta tad āsvāda anubhava sarva svam api ātmānam
tad samaye eva priya anugamanam an ācarantam adhamam manyamānaḥ nirupama vrīḍā niveśa nirbharam
nirbhartsayati vatsa rājaḥ
dhārāveśma ityādi
karṇaḥ ityādi ca śloka dvayam prāk udāhṛtam atra yojyam
tṛtīye ṅke rājā asa astram niśvasya

original: sarvatra jvaliteṣu veśmasu bhayādālījane vidrute trāsotkampavihastayā pratipadaṃ devyā patantyā tadā /
analyzed: sarvatra jvaliteṣu veśmasu bhayāt ālī jane vidrute trāsa utkampa vihastayā pratipadam devyā patantyā tadā

original: hā nātheti muhuḥ pralāpaparayā dagdhaṃ varākyā tathā śāntenāpi vayaṃ tu tena dahanenādyāpi dahyāmahe // VjivC_4.20 //
analyzed: hā nātha iti muhur pralāpa parayā dagdham varākyā tathā śāntena api vayam tu tena dahanena adya api dahyāmahe
atra śāntena api nirvāṇena api tena a mlāna mālatī mukula komala deha vidāha anumīyamāna nairghṛṇyena dahanena api eka vyāpāra an apagata

original: karaṇā vayamadyāpi dahyāmahe iti nūtanollekhavirodhālaṅkāreṇa karuṇā pūrvaṃ niviṣṭāpi vakratāṃ nīyate /
analyzed: karaṇāḥ vayam adya api dahyāmahe iti nūtana ullekha virodha alaṅkāreṇa karuṇā pūrvam niviṣṭā api vakra tām nīyate

original: api ca tathā vidhātuṃ komalatvādeva devyā tadaiva dagdhaṃ,
analyzed: api ca tathā vidhātum komala tvāt eva devyā tadā eva dagdham

original: vayaṃ punarvajrasārātikaṭorimāṇo 'dyāpi dahyāmahe na bhasmībhavāma iti viśeṣaṇaṃ prastutamevollāsayati /
analyzed: vayam punar vajrasāra ati kaṭoḥ imāṇaḥ dahyāmahe na bhasmībhavāmaḥ iti viśeṣaṇam prastutam evā ullāsayati
caturthe ṅke rājā a sa karuṇam ātma gatam hā devi

original: cakṣuryasya tavānanādapagataṃ nābhūtkvacinnarvṛtaṃ yenaiṣā satataṃ tvadekaśayanaṃ vakṣaḥsthalī kalpitā /
analyzed: cakṣuḥ yasya tava ānanāt apagatam na abhūt kvacid narvṛtam yena eṣā satatam tvad eka śayanam vakṣaḥ sthalī kalpitā

original: yenoktāsi vinā tvayā bata jagacchūnyaṃ kṣaṇājjāyate so 'yaṃ dambhadhṛtavrataḥ priyatame kartuṃ kimapyudyataḥ // VjivC_4.21 //
analyzed: yena uktā asi vinā tvayā bata jagat śūnyam kṣaṇāt jāyate saḥ yam dambha dhṛta vrataḥ priyatame kartum kim api udyataḥ
iti sakhedam āste

original: atra hi kvaciditi keliklamāpanodananimittaṃ niketapṛṣṭhasaṃcāraṇīyāsu līlāsu aprayatnasulabhadarśane
analyzed: atra hi kvacid iti keli klama apanodana nimittam niketa pṛṣṭha saṃcāraṇīyāsu līlāsu aprayatna sulabha darśane
tanu mātra unmīlita saṃpāta bimba lāvaṇya leśa śaṅkamāna tva dānana antevāsi tve candramasi darśita nija vākya upārūḍha padārtha tvāt
paryālocanayā karuṇam eva
pratyāyayati

original: yeneti paryaṅkārdhaśayanamapi pravāsapadamiva pariharatīti tadeva vyanakti /
analyzed: yena iti paryaṅka ardha śayanam api pravāsa padam iva pariharati iti tat eva vyanakti

original: kṣaṇāditi etāvantamapi kālaṃ tvayā virahitasya jīvataḥ kiyadaugyaṃ mama /
analyzed: kṣaṇāt iti etāvantam api kālam tvayā virahitasya jīvataḥ kiyat augyam mama

original: (evaṃ) punaḥ sakalo 'pyalīka evāyaṃ premabandho 'vadhāryatāmiti tathaiva pratipādayati /
analyzed: evam punar sakalaḥ pi alīkaḥ eva ayam prema bandhaḥ vadhāryatām iti tathā eva pratipādayati
saḥ yam ityādi prāk eva vyākhyātam
evam etat antara vākya kadambaka abhivyaktayā abhinava bhaṅgyā pūrvasmāt svādāt āsvāda antara sampadam kām api karuṇasya kurute
pañcame ṅke rājā asa viśeṣa utkaṇṭham niśvasya

original: bhrūbhaṅgaṃ rucire lalāṭaphalake tāraṃ samāropayet bāṣpāmbuplutapītapatraracanāṃ kuryātkapolasthalīm /
analyzed: bhrū bhaṅgam rucire lalāṭa phalake tāram samāropayet bāṣpa ambu pluta pīta patra racanām kuryāt kapola sthalīm

original: vyāvṛttairvinibaddhacāṭumahimāmālokya lajjānatā tiṣṭhet kiṃ kṛtakopacārakaruṇairāśvāsayaināṃ priyām // VjivC_4.22 //
analyzed: vyāvṛttaiḥ vinibaddha cāṭu mahimām ālokya lajjā natā tiṣṭhet kim kṛta ka upacāra karuṇaiḥ āśvāsaya enām priyām
atra adhigama pratyāśā saṃbhāvita padmāvatī pāṇipīḍasya an aṅkurita manoratha leśasya api tad kāla kandalita autsukya para vaśīkṛta antaḥ
karaṇa vṛtteḥ unmādyataḥ iva prāptām eva pradyota rāja putrīm manvānasya
rājñaḥ prasāda samaya samucita prakāra cintanam kāṣṭhām
karuṇasya avatārayati
tatra eva aṅke

original: kiṃ prāṇā na mayā tavānugamanaṃ kartuṃ samutsāhitā baddhā kiṃ na jaṭā na vā praruditaṃ bhrāntaṃ vane nirjane /
analyzed: kim prāṇāḥ na mayā tava anugamanam kartum samutsāhitā baddhā kim na jaṭā na vā praruditam bhrāntam vane nirjane

original: tvatsaṃprāptivilobhanena punarapyūnena pāpena kiṃ kiṅkṛtvā kupitā yadadya na vacastvaṃ me dadāsi priye // VjivC_4.23 //
analyzed: tvad saṃprāpti vilobhanena punar api ūnena pāpena kim kim kṛtvā kupitāḥ yat adya na vacaḥ tvam me dadāsi priye
iti roditi ityantena manāk unmāda mudrā api unmīlitā tam eva proddīpayati
ṣaṣṭhe ṅke rājā ahā devi

original: tvatsaṃprāptivilobhanena sacivaiḥ prāṇā mayā dhāritāḥ tanmatvātyajataḥ śarīrakamidaṃ me nāsti niḥsnehatā /
analyzed: tvad saṃprāpti vilobhanena sacivaiḥ prāṇāḥ mayā dhāritāḥ tat matvā a tyajataḥ śarīrakam idam me nā asti niḥsneha tā

original: āsanno 'vasarastadānugamane jātā dhṛtiḥ kiṃ tvayaṃ khedo yacchatadhā gataṃ na hṛdayaṃ tadvatkṣaṇe dāruṇe // VjivC_4.24 //
analyzed: āsannaḥ vasaraḥ tadā anugamane jātā dhṛtiḥ kim tu ayam khedaḥ yat śatadhā gatam na hṛdayam tadvat kṣaṇe dāruṇe
atra nairāśyena rāśībhūta bhūritara śoka āvega vedanā dahyamāna mānasa pratīkāra kāraṇam kālindī nāma nimnagā saṃgamanam
tasya priya anugamam api vastu vācya vistaram prakaraṇābharaṇāyate
procyate kiyat iti uktyā vividhaiḥ vā vilāsaiḥ
kutas kathā upakārakāt iti kathāyāḥ samāśaṅkita vicchedāyāḥ prarohayati iti

original: kimuktaṃ bhavati---svalpo 'pi vācyaviśeṣaḥ saviśeṣavisphāritaḥ samuddhāṭitarasakavāṭadvārasarasoktivisaravikāsinyā prakaraṇavicchittyā vitanyamānaḥ  #
analyzed: kim uktam bhavati su alpaḥ pi vācya viśeṣaḥ sa viśeṣa visphāritaḥ samuddhāṭita rasa kavāṭa dvāra sarasa ukti visara vikāsinyā prakaraṇa vicchittyā vitanyamānaḥ
kam api vakrimāṇam āsādayati

original: yathā raghuvaṃśe mṛgayāprakaraṇe--- atra hi taraṅgiṇītīralekhāsvākheṭavāṭodyatena
analyzed: yathā raghuvaṃśe mṛgayā prakaraṇe atra hi taraṅgiṇī tīra lekhāsu ākheṭa vāṭa udyatena

original: pramādyatā daśarathena rājñā sthavirāndhatapasvibālavadho vyadhīyateti ekavākyaśakyapratipādano
analyzed: pramādyatā daśarathena rājñā sthavira andha tapasvi bāla vadhaḥ vyadhīyata iti eka vākya śakya pratipādanaḥ
pi ayam arthaḥ punar
kavinā tādṛśyā prakaraṇa vicchittyā visphāritaḥ cetana camatkāra kāraṇatām adhitiṣṭhati
tathā hi yat yatra aneka naktandina anubandhi vividha mṛgayā vyāpāra para vaśīkṛta antar karaṇa kavalita sakala tad itara vyāpāra
vyāvṛtti avasara prasarat abhyāsa rasa sodara ātmaka mṛgayā anurāga garimā atas prāṇī etādṛś rūpaḥ na pratihanyeta

original: tadā sadācārasaṃpādanacaṇe tribhuvanābhayadīkṣādhikāriṇi kiraṇamālinaḥ kule tilakāyamānasyākhilavidyāpārāvārapāradṛśvanaḥ kīrtidhanasya dhanya(daśaratha)
analyzed: tadā sat ācāra saṃpādana caṇe tribhuvana abhaya dīkṣā adhikāriṇi kiraṇamālinaḥ kule tilakāyamānasya akhila vidyā pārāvāra pāra dṛśvanaḥ kīrti dhanasya dhanya daśaratha
nāmnaḥ dharitrīpateḥ pavitrita tridiva adhipa ardha āsanasya tathāvidha akaraṇīya karaṇam mahā ṛṣiṇā api udāhriyamāṇam anupapanna prāyam eva pratibhāseta āpātataḥ
idam ca tatra eva sakalam unmīlitam manāk udāhriyate
vyāghrān abhīḥ abhimukha utpatitān guhābhyaḥ phulla āsana agra viṭapān iva vāyu rugṇān

original: śikṣāviśeṣalaghuhastatayā sa dhanvī tūṇīcakāra śarapūritavaktrarandhrān // VjivC_4.25 //
analyzed: śikṣā viśeṣa laghu hasta tayā sa dhanvī tūṇīcakāra śara pūrita vaktra randhrān

original: api turagasamīpādutpatantaṃ mayūraṃ na sa rucirakalāpaṃ bāṇalakṣīcakāra /
analyzed: api turaga samīpāt utpatantam mayūram na sa rucira kalāpam bāṇa lakṣīcakāra

original: sapadi gatamanaskaśchinnamālyānukīrṇe rativigalitabandhe keśahaste priyāyāḥ // VjivC_4.26 //
analyzed: sapadi gata manaskaḥ chinna mālya anukīrṇe rati vigalita bandhe keśa haste priyāyāḥ

original: lakṣyīkṛtasya hariṇasya hariprabhāvaḥ prekṣya sthitāṃ sahacarīṃ vyavadhāya dehāt /
analyzed: lakṣyīkṛtasya hariṇasya hari prabhāvaḥ prekṣya sthitām sahacarīm vyavadhāya dehāt

original: ākarṇakṛṣṭamapi kāmitayā sa dhanvī bāṇaṃ kṛpāmṛdumanāḥ pratisaṃjahāra // VjivC_4.27 //
analyzed: ākarṇa kṛṣṭam api kāmi tayā sa dhanvī bāṇam kṛpā mṛdu manāḥ pratisaṃjahāra
ityādi
etaiḥ hi vicitra vācya vācaka aucitya cārubhiḥ vākya viśeṣaiḥ vivadha vyāpāra pāravaśyam ati tarām pratīyate
yathā
sa lalita kusuma pravāla śayyām jvalita mahā oṣadhi dīpikā sanāthām
vana rati rati vāhayāṃbabhūva kvacid asameta paricchada striyāmām

original: atra vanaratiriti viśeṣaṇavakratā vane sthityā vilāsagṛhakelīparyaṅke preyasī sametya
analyzed: atra vana ratiḥ iti viśeṣaṇa vakra tā vane sthityā vilāsa gṛha kelī paryaṅke preyasī sametya
madhu goṣṭhī prabhṛti upabhoga pratīti pratyākhyāta pratītim pratipādayantyā prastuta rasa āveśaḥ eva vitanyate
tri yāmā iti vacana vakra tā ullekhena ciratara samayam andha kāraḥ
samunmīlyate
rūḍhi vakra tā mahimnā ca nirbhara andhakāra nivārita rucira vyāpāra prakāra antara sa antarāya kāri tvāt tad pratikūla tā pratipādyate

original: ata evātivāhayāṃbabhūveti kriyāvakratvavaicitryeṇa dāruṇadehavedanāṃ śayanagataḥ apagamayāmāsa,
analyzed: atas eva ativāhayāṃbabhūva iti kriyā vakra tva vaicitryeṇa dāruṇa deha vedanām śayana gataḥ apagamayāmāsa
parama pariśrama vidhāne nidrā rasa dāyinī iti abhinananda
yathā ca
iti vismṛta anya karaṇīyam ātmanaḥ saciva avalambita dhuram dharāpatim

original: parivṛddharāgamanubandhasevayā mṛgayā jahāra catureva kāminī // VjivC_4.29 //
analyzed: parivṛddha rāgam anubandha sevayā mṛgayā jahāra catuḥ eva kāminī
atra jahāra iti kriyā vakra tva vicchittyā
mṛgayāyā karaṇīya itara bhāvanā su vikala antar karaṇa tvam aṅkuritam mahībhartuḥ
tathā
atha jātu ruroḥ gṛhīta vartmā vipine pārśvacaraiḥ alakṣyamāṇaḥ

original: śramaphenamucā tapasvigāḍhāṃ tamasāṃ prāpa nadīṃ turaṅgameṇa // VjivC_4.30 //
analyzed: śrama phena mucā tapasvi gāḍhām tamasām prāpa nadīm turaṅgameṇa
atra tapasvi gāḍhām iti viśeṣaṇa vakra tayā vividha dharma ācāra parāyaṇa tāpasa saṃkulām tamasām

original: paśyannapi śabdaśravaṇamātrāt śaraṃ vyākṛṣya śaramokṣamavikalāntaḥ karaṇaḥ kathamakurvateti prakāśyate /
analyzed: paśyan api śabda śravaṇa mātrāt śaram vyākṛṣya śara mokṣam avikala antaḥ karaṇaḥ katham akurvata iti prakāśyate

original: “apathe padamarpayanti hi śrutavanto 'pi rajonimīlitāḥ” ityanena nyāyena paradhārādhirūḍhadurdharavyasanarāgāndakārakavalitavivekadṛṣṭayastathāvidhā
analyzed: apathe padam arpayanti hi rajaḥ nimīlitāḥ iti anena nyāyena para dhārā adhirūḍha durdhara vyasana rāga andakāra kavalita viveka dṛṣṭayaḥ tathāvidhā
aśuddha adhvani sañcarantaḥ iti upapattiḥ api upapāditā
uttara kathā upakāraḥ pi eka deśasya asti eva
tathā hi

original: diṣṭāntamāpsyati bhavānapi putraśokā- dante vayasyahamiveti tamuktavantam // VjivC_4.31 //
analyzed: diṣṭāntam āpsyati bhavān api putra śokā dante vayasi aham iva iti tam uktavantam

original: iti viśīrṇatāpasavitīrṇaśāpasya tāpasaṃ prati prativacanaṃ kausalyāpateḥ---tathā hi
analyzed: iti viśīrṇa tāpasa vitīrṇa śāpasya tāpasam prati prativacanam kausalyā pateḥ tathā hi
śāpaḥ pi adṛṣṭa tanaya ānana padma śobhe sa anugrahaḥ bhagavatā mayi pātitaḥ yam

original: kṛṣyāṃ dahannapi khalu kṣitimindhaneddhaḥ bījaprarohajananīṃ dahanaḥ karoti // VjivC_4.32 //
analyzed: kṛṣyām dahan api khalu kṣitim indhana iddhaḥ bīja praroha jananīm dahanaḥ karoti

original: atra śāpa iti evaṃvidhāpacāraprāgbhāraprabhavo bhavatu nāma /
analyzed: atra śāpaḥ iti evaṃvidha apacāra prāgbhāra prabhavaḥ bhavatu nāma
sa anugrahaḥ iti anugrahaḥ punar ayam anupapannaḥ eva asyām avasthāyām
bhagavatā iti anartha darśanena sahaja dayālunā

original: yadi vā bhagavatā śāpo 'pi iti śāpānugrahayordahanavāriṇorivaikakālamekaviṣayavartitvamasatorapi bhagavat(svarūpa)
analyzed: yadi vā bhagavatā iti śāpa anugrahayoḥ dahana vāriṇoḥ iva eka kālam eka viṣaya varti tvam asatoḥ api
saṃpad sāmarthyāt eva saṃbhāvyate

original: adṛṣṭatanayānanapadmaśobhe mayi etasmādevānugrahādavaśyaṃbhāvinaḥ sucirakālābhikāṅkṣitasya sutāvalambanatanorjovitaphalasya vilokanotkaṇṭhāpāravaśyāt
analyzed: adṛṣṭa tanaya ānana padma śobhe mayi etasmāt eva anugrahāt avaśyaṃbhāvinaḥ su cira kāla abhikāṅkṣitasya suta avalambana tanoḥ jovita phalasya vilokana utkaṇṭhā pāravaśyāt
iti alam atiprasaṅgena
asyāḥ eva prabheda antaram unmīlayati
kathā vaicitrya pātram tat vakrimāṇam prapadyate
yat aṅgam sargabandha ādeḥ saundaryāya nibadhyate
tat vakrimāṇam prapadyate
kim tat yat aṅkam sargabandha ādeḥ saundaryāya nibadhyate yat jala krīḍā ādi prakaraṇam sargabandha ādeḥ
mahākāvya prabhṛteḥ saundaryāya
upaśobhā niṣapattyai nibadhyate niveśyate

original: ayamasya paramārthaḥ---prabandheṣu jalakelikusumāpacayaprabhṛti prakaraṇaṃ prakrāntasaṃvidhānakānubandhi nibadhyamānaṃ nidhānamiva kamanīyasaṃpadaḥ  #
analyzed: ayam asya parama arthaḥ prabandheṣu jala keli kusuma apacaya prabhṛti prakaraṇam prakrānta saṃvidhānaka anubandhi nibadhyamānam nidhānam iva kamanīya saṃpadaḥ
saṃpadyate
yathā raghuvaṃśe
atha ūrmi lola unmada rājahaṃse rodhaḥ latā puṣpa vahe sarayvāḥ

original: vihartumicchā vanitāsakhasya tasyāmbhasi grīṣmasukhe babhūva // VjivC_4.33 //
analyzed: vihartum icchā vanitā sakhasya tasya ambhasi grīṣma sukhe babhūva
ityādi

kanduka krīḍā lakṣaṇam utsava antaram uttara kathā upakārī upapadyate

original: tatastasminnādarodrekādanviṣṭe 'pyanāsādite pāthontarvartinaṃ nāganāyakamānīya niveditaṃ kumudamuddiśya daśānanāntakanandanaḥ samadhatta dhanuṣi  #
analyzed: tatas tasmin ādara udrekāt anviṣṭe pi an āsādite pāthaḥ ntar vartinam nāga nāyakam ānīya niveditam kumudam uddiśya daśānana antaka nandanaḥ samadhatta dhanuṣi
dhanvī gārutmatam astram

original: atha paritrāṇaparyākulaḥ kumudaḥ kumudvatīṃ svasāramābharaṇena samaṃ karakamalālaṅkāriṇā videhanandinīnandanasyār (payāmāsa) /
analyzed: atha paritrāṇa paryākulaḥ kumudaḥ kumudvatīm svasāram ābharaṇena samam kara kamala alaṅkāriṇā
atra sūktāni kānicid udāhriyante

original: avaimi kāryantaramānuṣasya viṣṇoḥ sutākhyāmaparāṃ tanuṃ tvām /
analyzed: avaimi kāri antara mānuṣasya viṣṇoḥ suta ākhyām aparām tanum tvām

original: so 'haṃ kathaṃ nātha tavācareya- mārādhanīyasya dhṛtervighātam // VjivC_4.34 //

hradāt patat jyotiḥ iva antarikṣā dadatta jaitra ābharaṇam tvadīyam

original: bhujena rakṣāparigheṇa bhūme- rupaitu yogaṃ punaraṃsalena // VjivC_4.36 //

original: imāṃ svasāraṃ ca yavīyasīṃ me kumudvatīṃ nārhasi nānumantum /
analyzed: imām svasāram ca yavīyasīm me kumudvatīm na arhasi na anumantum

original: ātmāparādhaṃ nudatīṃ cirāya śuśrūṣayā pārthiva pādayoste // VjivC_4.37 //

analyzed: eteṣu bhujaṅga rāja vākyeṣu ādye viṣṇoḥ iti rūḍhi vakra tayā vaktṛ prabhāvāt paryaṅkībhūya

original: bhuvanādhāreṇa anantena niṣevyamāṇasya sakalājñāpālanasaṃpādane sajjo bhujaṅgāntaro
analyzed: bhuvana ādhāreṇa anantena niṣevyamāṇasya sakala ājñā pālana saṃpādane sajjaḥ

original: bhaktiriti vidheyatāniyantritasya mama na kenāpi prakāreṇa duścaritāpannaṃ śīlamāśaṅkyamiti /

original: tṛtīye 'pi tadetaditi saṃvṛtivakratayā yasya tvatpitururasthalamiva kaustubhasya

original: bhadrajayavibhūṣyatāviṣayaḥ iti “rakṣāparigheṇa bhūmeḥ” iti rūpakeṇa nivāritanikhilavasundharāduḥkhasya
analyzed: bhadra jaya vibhūṣya tā viṣayaḥ iti rakṣā parigheṇa bhūmeḥ iti rūpakeṇa nivārita nikhila vasundharā duḥkhasya

original: “śuśrūṣayā pādayo' riti caraṇaśuśrūṣāpavitreṇa pāṇināṃ saṃpāditapariṇayotsavāṃ “yaviyasī' miti drutataratāruṇyāvatāritatvadanurāgaprāgbhārām

original: kiṃ bahunā, vicitrasaṃbhāvanāgahane nītivartmani vicakṣaṇaṃmanyasya rākṣasasyāpi tathā saṃbhramaḥ santāpamujjanayāṃbabhūve,

kutas tatra eva tasya niṣpatteḥ natra eva kārya antara anuṣṭhāne tasyāḥ ādhikārikasya niṣpatteḥ saṃsiddheḥ
tatas eva nirnibandha rasa ujjvalām nirantarāya taraṅgita aṅgirasa prāgbhāra bhrājiṣṇum
ayam asya parama arthaḥ yā kila ādhikārika kathā niṣedhi kārya antara vyavadhānāt jha c iti
vighaṭamāna alabdha avakāśā api vikāśyamānā sā prastuta itara vyāpārāt eva prastuta vastu niṣpanna indīvara sita rasa nirbharā
prabandhasya rāmaṇīyaka vakrimāṇam ādadhāti
yathā śiśupāla vadhe
sa hi sargabandhaḥ
trailokya rakṣā adhikāra vyāpṛta bāhunā vāsudevena devarṣi mukhāt
tat indra sandiṣṭam upendra yat vacaḥ kṣaṇam mayā viśvajanīnam ucyate
ityādinā purandara saṃdeśam
om iti uktavataḥ thaśārṅgiṇaḥ
ityādinā tad kāla kandalita krodha anubhāva bhaṅgyā niśamya aṅgīkṛtam ādhikārikam māhiṣmatīnātham an ādṛtya
iṃndraprastham prati pratiṣṭhāsyamānena nimagna nikhila vīra sthitiḥ viṣaya tām anīyata
tatas tasmin eva saṃśrita sakala rājake dharmarājasya rājasūya maṇḍape
mānam asahamānena ati duḥsaha vākya pāruṣya avarodha paraṃparā viracana catureṇa cedi rājena ca
prabandha vakra tām eva prikāra antareṇa vyācaṣṭe
yatra eka phala saṃpatti samudyuktaḥ pi nāyakaḥ
phala antareṣu ananteṣu tad tulya pratipattiṣu
dhatte nimitta tām sphāra yaśaḥ saṃbhāra bhājanam
sva māhātmya camatkārāt sā parā api asya vakra tā
sā parā api anyā api na kevalam prāk uktā
asya rūpaka ādeḥ
vakra tā vakra bhāvaḥ bhavati iti saṃbandhaḥ
yatra eka phala saṃpatti samudyuktaḥ pi nāyakaḥ
ya trayasyām
eka phala saṃpatti samudyuktaḥ pi para abhimata vastu sādhana vyavasitaḥ pi nāyakaḥ
phala antareṣu ananteṣu phala antareṣu sādhya rūpeṣu vastuṣu
ananta iṣu gaṇanā atīteṣu
tad tulya pratipattiṣu dhatte nimitta tām tad tulya pratipattiṣu ādhikārika phala samāna upapattiṣu
prastuta artha siddheḥ eva adhigata siddhiṣu ati yāvat
kiṃbhūtaḥ spharā yaśaḥ saṃbhāra bhājanam sphārasya brahmāṇḍa udara bhari tvāt atiriktasya
yaśasaḥ kīrteḥ yaḥ saṃbhāraḥ samudayaḥ
tasya bhājanam pātram bhūmiḥ iti yāvat
kutas hetoḥ sva māhātmya camatkārāt sva māhātmyam svasya prabhāvaḥ
tasya camatkāraḥ āścarya kāri tvam tasmāt
etat uktam bhavati niḥsīma manoratham alaṅkariṣṇunā ekena aṃśakena phalena
tādṛśa svarūpāṇi phalāni agamyāni adhyavasāyāt an icchan api sva prabhāva saṃpadā saṃpādayan nāyakaḥ
kam api kāmanīyaka nidhāna kalaśam prabandhasya vakrimāṇam āvahati
yathā nāgānande tatra durnivāra vairāt api vainateya antaka āde kākinam
sakala kāruṇika cūca maṇiḥ śaṅkhacūḍam jīmūtavāhanaḥ nija deha dānāt abhirakṣan na kevalam tam
rakṣitavān apitu sakalam tat kulam eva

original: āstāṃ vastuṣu vaidagdhī kāvye kāmapi vakratām /
analyzed: āstām vastuṣu vaidagdhī kāvye kām api vakra tām
pradhāna saṃvidhāna aṅka nāmnā api kurute kaviḥ
āstām vastuṣu vaidagdhī āstām dūratas eva vartatām
vastuṣu abhidheyeṣu prakaraṇa pratipādyeṣu
vaidagdhī vicchittiḥ

original: “kāvyaṃ kāmapi vakratāṃ kurute kaviḥ” ṭhakāvye'---nāṭake sargabandhādau ca,
analyzed: kāvyam kām api vakra tām kurute kaviḥ ṭhakāvye nāṭake sargabandha ādau ca
kām api vakra tām kurute vidadhāti
kena pradhāna saṃvidhāna aṅka nāmnā api pradhānam prabandha prāṇa prāyam
yat saṃvidhānam kathā yojanam
na t aṅkaḥ cihnam upalakṣaṇam yasya yatra vā tat tathā uktam
tat ca tat nāma ca tena api
api śabdaḥ vismayam uddyotayati
idam asya rahasyam vicārita vicitra vastu vicchitteḥ prabandhasya vakra tā āvirbhavati iti
kim adbhutam
adbhutam punar idam yat sāratara saṃvidhānaka nibandha lakṣaṇā yojita sara
sa akṣareṇa nāmnā api sā niveśyate
yathā abhijñāna śākuntala mudrā rākṣasa pratimā niruddha māyā puṣpaka kṛtyā rāvaṇa chalita rāmapuṣpa dūṣitaka ādīni nāmāni
evaṃvidhāni kāvya bandhānām nāmadheyāni api nirupama ullekhāni vilakṣaṇa vakra tā sarasā
kṣarāṇi nivedita antargata viśiṣṭa saṃbandha tayā nibadhnanti eva vakrimāṇam
na punar hayagrīva vadha śiśupāla vadha pāṇḍava abhyudaya rāma ānanda rāma carita prāyāṇi sarala svarūpāṇi
api ekaka kṣayā baddhāḥ kāvya bandhāḥ kavi īśvaraiḥ
puṣṇanti anarghām anyonya vailakṣaṇyena vakra tām
puṣṇanti ullāsayanti
anarghām aparicchedyām
vakra tām vakra bhavam
kena anyonya vailakṣaṇyena paraspara vaisādṛśyena
ke te kāvya bandhāḥ rūpaka puraḥsarāḥ
kiṃviśiṣṭāḥ api eka kakṣayā baddhāḥ ekena api iti vṛttena yojitāḥ

original: kaiḥ---“kavīśvaraiḥ'---anyatra vistīrṇaṃ vastu saṃkṣipadbhiḥ saṃkṣiptaṃ vā vistārayadbhiḥ,
analyzed: kaiḥ kavi īśvaraiḥ anyatra vistīrṇam vastu saṃkṣipadbhiḥ saṃkṣiptam vā vistārayadbhiḥ
vicitra vācya vācaka alaṅkaraṇa saṃkalanayā nava tām naya adbhiḥ iti arthaḥ

original: idamatra tātparyam---ekāmeva kāmapi kandalitakāmanīyakāṃ kathāṃ nirvahadbhirbahubhirapi
analyzed: idam atra tātparyam ekām eva kām api kandalita kāmanīyakām kathām nirvahadbhiḥ bahubhiḥ api
kavi kuñjaraiḥ nibadhyamānāḥ bahavaḥ prabandhāḥ manāk api anyonya saṃvādam an āsādayantaḥ
sahṛdaya hṛdaya āhlādakam kam api vakrimāṇam ādadhati
yathā ekasyām eva dāśarathi kathāyām rāma abhyudaya audātta rāghava vīracarita bālarāmāyaṇa kṛtyā rāvaṇa māyāpuṣpaka prabhṛtayaḥ
te hi prabandha pravarāḥ tena eva kathā mārgeṇa nirargala rasa āsāra garbha sandarbha saṃpadā

original: pratipadaṃ prativākyaṃ pratiprakaraṇaṃ ca prakāśamānābhinavabhaṅgīprāyāḥ bhrājiṣṇavo
analyzed: pratipadam prativākyam prati prakaraṇam ca prakāśamāna abhinava bhaṅgī prāyāḥ bhrājiṣṇavaḥ
nava unaba unmīlita nāyaka adbhuta guṇa utkarṣa ākarṣāḥ harṣa atirekam anekaśas pi āsvādyamānāḥ samutpādayanti sahṛdayānām
evam anyat api nidarśana antaram udbhāvanīyam
kathā unmeṣe samāne vapuṣi iva nijaiḥ guṇaiḥ

original: prabandhāḥ prāṇina iva prabhāsānte pṛthak pṛthak // VjivC_4.56 //
analyzed: prabandhāḥ prāṇinaḥ iva prabhāsa ante pṛthak pṛthak
iti antara ślokaḥ
bhūyas pi asyāḥ bhedam upapādayati
mahā kavi prabandhānām sarveṣām asti vakra tā
nūtana upāya niṣpanna naya vartma upadeśinām
mahā kavi prabandha nāmnava nirmāṇa nipuṇa nirupama kavi prakāṇḍa viracitānām sarveṣām
kiṃbhūtānām
nūtana upāya niṣapanna naya vartma upadeśinām nūtanāḥ pratyagrāḥ

original: “upāyāḥ“---sāmādiprayogaprakārāḥ tadvidāṃ gocarā ye “tairniṣpannaṃ' siddhaṃ yat “nayavartma” nīti (mārgaḥ)
analyzed: upāyāḥ sāma ādi prayoga prakārāḥ tad vidām gocarāḥ ye taiḥ niṣpannam siddham yat naya vartma nīti mārgaḥ
tat upadiśanti śikṣayanti ye te
tathā uktāḥ teṣām

original: kimuktaṃ bhavati---sakaleṣvapi satkaviprabandhaṣu abhinavabhaṅgīniveśapeśalinyā nītyāḥ phalamupapadyamānaṃ pratipādyopadeśadvāreṇa kimapi camatkāraṇamupalabhyata  #
analyzed: kim uktam bhavati sakaleṣu api sat kavi prabandhaṣu abhinava bhaṅgī niveśa peśalinyā nītyāḥ phalam upapadyamānam pratipādya upadeśa dvāreṇa kim api camatkāraṇam upalabhyata
eva

original: yathā mudrārākṣase--- tatra hi pravaraprajñāprabhāvaprapañcitavicitranītivyāpārāḥ pragalbhanta eva /
analyzed: yathā mudrārākṣase tatra hi pravara prajñā prabhāva prapañcita vicitra nīti vyāpārāḥ pragalbhante eva
yathā ca tāpasa vatsa rāja uddeśaḥ eva vyākhyātaḥ
evam anyat api utprekṣaṇīyam
vakra tā ullekha vaikalya m asat kāvye vi lokyate

original: prabandheṣu kavīndrāṇāṃ kīrtikandeṣu kiṃ punaḥ // VjivC_4.57 //
analyzed: prabandheṣu kavi indrāṇām kīrti kandeṣu kim punar
iti antara ślokaḥ
samāpta prāyaḥ yam granthaḥ
